Absalon, Maachee pachayaruri, Apanlleem ungirtapi átu, Dapiyaa wamachtashi Ahitofelaatsshat kuruzurangiya wipunasheema. Anshat tputs kizpur yasampanimuncha. Waparee Dapiyaa kizpur istarangitamta. Yakat Guiloyash taarangiya. Amb ashirangu, waanaatsi kizpureem ínarangu, waparish kurakush zamumaam zandarangiya. Ashirucha, tiptsirshat aranginasha pzapanimaam zandarangu, zapan tputs Absalonash tachitaranganaya.
Tputssha anoo parangu, Dapiyaatsshat tsiyatssee kamankatu, naatarangiya. Kamanku tárangiya. Absalon Israelchichee tputs tiptsireem ínayanlliya. Amb ashirangu waanaatsi kurakaam ínakiya. Uwshtisin Absalonaam kapung istamaam zandkanaya, tárangiya.
Dapiyshat tiptsiree ashpari Irusarinash taakana anoo kuruzeeru, Pzaa, suwayani, nda Absalon iyaa pachamaama. Míkintsa. Putanaaparee iyaa kamatkachu, iyaa ichingarootsini m'chitpat pachachiya. Irusarinshuchee tpachingachiya. Paptsa, tárangiya Dapiya.
Tputssha ichingarusin, Zuraktishcha. Ashiriya, pzaya. Shiyaam kutakaniya. Yuwaa shiy kurakish kamachtakish anoo uru tuminchinipa, táranganaya.
Amb tárangusin, kurak káyarandsin, ichingaru tiptsirpatari pangusee ksutamapan taakana, anpatari ashpari káchingayarandsin, naataranganaya. Tputs ashpari káchingarangusin, Dapiy wizanlleetsimshat chung mashingamawaa anootsimshat panguseem ksutamaam kasarangiya.
Yaktaa shitungeerandsin, kuraksha wipunashpatari tspakatu anush xiyaranganaya.
Xiyarangusin, anush kurak tiptsir zapan shurangat, shurangat ashiranganaya. Keretewshutshitisin, mishat Peletshuchtamsin kurak tsipasaw ksutamapan taakana anuwtamsin shurangaranganaya. Jetewshuchtamsin 600 sundar Gadamand tsap káyarandsin anshutam shurangaranganaya.
Ashirucha, kurakshat Gadshuchee tputs sur Itayaa tsiyatarangu, ¿Mayaamshat siy iyash tachitarangtamsa? Siy waptam kanapungints. Siynaa kurakaa kaneeschee ksutangtsa, watam siy arapichsawa tputsis.
Singiri siy nuwash ksutamaam kusarangus, ¿tamareeja nuw siyaa, Nuwash zurampatari tchitangtsa, táchee? ¿Antaati nuw yap naachini anoo yasaree? Ashiriya, kanapungtsa, nuw siyaa atashina. Tputsiriptish naangcha, tina. Apanll shiyaa kapung chinakiya. Siyaa urutamari wanasir ksutchiya, Dapiy tárangiya.
Itayshat, Zurampatari Apanllimun sur, mishat shiyamunatam surish táchinllpa. Yaptaati waritaru, ambtaati naakchush, iyshat ambiritam naamaam zandkiniya. Mantsirimshiptaatiya naakchush, iyshat ambitam tsipamaam zandkiniya. Ashirucha amb atuni, nda kanapumaam zandkiniya. Yaptam naakchish ambitam naachinipa, watam shiyaam istamaam káyaraniwa, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, siyaptatampari washunand naachchi, Dapiyshat tárangiya. Ashirucha Itay anuritam Dapiypat ipuneerandsin wasundururpatari, ichingaru Dapiy wasundurur machiru anpatarisha washunand yápandayarandsin naataranganaya.
Tputsshitin ichingarusin, kizpur tanuranganaya. Tputsima Sedronaa kung kíteerandsin, ushimunsha kurak Dapiy kítarangitamta. Tputsee yamarsin naataranaya. Arangirisha tsap puzap naataranganaya.
Itaru, Sadokshat Leviychichpatarta, uwshtisin Apanllee kajonarini kumpani Irusarinnung watandpun natumasa kutaranganaya. Tputs ichingarusin shitungeerandsin, uwshtisin anshutamsin tachitaranganaya.
Itaru, kurakshat Sadokaa, Shiyshat Apanllee kajonarini yáyarush, wapitam wayangcha. Wandaya Apanll nuwaa istaku, yusur kanapkachuri, anshuri Apanllee kajonarini yusur pangchima.
Itaru, Apanll nduniya nuwaa wanasir napku, waana zandku, nuwaa ashtachiya, Dapiy tárangiya Sadokaatsi.
Mishat, kurakaa Sadoka apanllpaneetsi tárangitamta. Mazinangcha. Siysa Abiyatarpat ipuneerush Irusarinap naangtsa. Iparpatis Ahimaaspat, mishat Jonatanpat naangtsa; tsiyatssee kamanimapaneem taangtsa.
Itaru, nuwshat watandsash taachima. Anush tsiyatssee yasamaam kutachima, tárangiya.
Sadokshat Abiyatarpat Apanllee kajonarini yáyarandsin, waptam Irusarinap kanapuranganaya. Ashirangsin, anshurisha taaranganaya.
Anshat Dapiy Olivos machip káreerandsin, Dapiy kapung tanurangu, spatshari naatarangu, muchush tsarunpat tpararangiya. Ichingaru wasundurur tanuksin, ambitam ashirangtamsinaya.
Anushshat, Dapiyaa tputs kamaniranganaya. Ahitofel kapung istakiya Absalonaama, táranganaya. Dapiyshat anoo mazinarangu, Apanllee tsiyatarangiya. Apaa, yuwaa Ahitofel Absalonaa mangoo p'tsimaam tsiyatku anoo shiyshat tayutariteerush ksangcha, tárangiya.
Táyaru, yuwamunari mach tsparatu, Apanlleem tsiyatkana anush kuseeramchu, Husayshat Arkitaschich tputs anshutam Dapiyangaz kusarangiya. Wamar izichimaw, muchumunshat tsarun yásimbaru, naantach ashirangiya.
Dapiyshat parangu, Shiy zuwaa, nuwash tachitkachush, nuwaatshapa xarashish wayachsha, watam kizpur wachinshawa.
Nda ashimaam shiy waptam Irusarinap kanapunlla. Absalonash napeerush, Kurakaa, nuw shiyaa istachinllpa. Nuw sirú apareetsish mangoo p'tsimaam istaranguri, natsha shiyaa wanasiritam istachinllpa, tángcha. Amb ashkachush, yuwaatsinaa Ahitofel mangoo p'tsimaam tsiyatku anootssha shiysha tayutaritachpasha.
Mishat, amb kuseerush, apanllpanee Sadokaa, Abiyataraatstam pangachpasha. Pakeerush, yuwaa Absalon tsiyatku anoo kamanimachcha. Uwshtisin siyaa istachtamparee nuwaa kamanimaama.
Wip Ahimaas amb taaritamanaya. Jonatantam anshutamta. Anush ichingaru shiy kamaningcha. Uwshtisin nuwash tsiyatssee wayachinllinaya, Dapiy tárangiya.
Husaysha Dapiy wamkur waptam kanapeeranllu, Irusarinash kuskamchu, Absalonshat yaktash washitungash pshtutaa ashirangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Absalon kurakaa Dapiyaa kapeetamaam zandarangu anootsi.
Dapiysha machee pakich arangiri naanata sheeranllu, Sibaatsshat chamayangarangiya. Sib Mefibosetcha muchchuri. Uwshat káyaranllu, pangati átu, tsimbun burru yamayaranllu, anamun katungatsshat 200 panga, mishat kizaruntam mayapshim 100 taxaptam, mishat wanuspasaru 100 kizarun pusam, mishat vinootstam maachtash tas tatsitam aship tuchipayarandsin, kurakash yushindakamchu,
kurakshat anoo parangu, ¿Mayaamshat nee payutaranllsha? tárangu. Sibshat, Nee burru nuw yuwash kurak wip naachinllina anoomcha. Pangaatsshat mishat wanuseetstam sundaroom watungash yushindarangina. Vinootsshat yuwaam apusap naatarandsin nizitssin sachitambachinllina anoom waamaam yushindarangina, tárangiya.
Kurakshat, ¿Yapinaaree paturunarish wachinllinoo? tárangiya. Sibshat, Ambiri Irusarinshuri taariya. Mangush chinarangu Israelchich tputs nuwaa kurakaam ínachpasinaya. Watam pachiri kurakamunawa, tárangu, anshuri Irusarinush kutariya, tárangiya.
Dapiyshat, Sibaa, na nimand yuwaa nuw Mefibosetaam maachtaa panarangi anoo shiyaamshat panachinllpa, tárangu, Sibshat, Zuraktishcha. Nuw uru shiyaam kurakareemi istampan táchina, tárangu, tsapush timuchta ashirangiya.
Dapiy Bahurimashsha tsap kuskamchusin, Saularinsha maachiri Guerá wip sur Simiy anush taaru, anshat Dapiyaa parangu, kapung natsarangu, tsiyatku, yutaritaam ínarangiya.
Natsaku, patumbichpa tiyá, tiyá Dapiyaa, wasundurureetstam ashirangiya. Ashirucha amb ashirangu, wasundururshitisin urkaree pachindkusin arang, arang sheersin kámanaranganaya, nda tiyá ashimaama atusina.
Anshat tputs sur Simiy natsaku, Dapiyaa, ¿shiy ning tamakatshasha? Pachampanish tputsish yutarittish.
Shaanamandari shiyaa Apanll waneeku ashiksha. Yuwamand shiy, Nuw kurakaam kinapi átush, nuwaa maachiriti Saularineetsi tupcharangish anumand kiyung kachiykisha. Itaru, natshat Apanll ipareetsshitish kurakaam ínayanlliya, anoom tsap ksutamaama. Na shiyshat shaanamandari kiyung kachiykush taatsha. Shiy pachampantishcha tputsish, tárangiya.
Abisayshat Seroyarini wip anoo mazinarangu, uwshat, Kurakaa, ¿Mayaamshat in tputs nda waritaru tumuz tsipar tamapari ashiritaa shiyaa kurakaatsish tamundakcha? Nuwaam ksanda. Nuw muchoo turuyaruri kasachima, tárangiya.
Itaru kurakshat, Nda watsta amb tárinllpa. ¿Antaati shiyaatseeja muntak? Apaz Apanll waana nuwaa tayutaritamaam kamachtaku ashkusina. Ashiri chiyshat ashima tsiyatkuch, ¿ameecheezich? Waana Apanll kamachtaku anootsee, tárangu.
Abisayaa mishat wasundurureetstam wanasir waneerangiya. Watam nuwaa ipartaati pachamaam zandkuwa, ashiri waanipari Benjaminchich tputs nuwaa pachachindanaya. Ksangasinda. Waani pachapanda, watam waana Apanll anoo kamachtaku ashkanawa.
¿Apaz Apanll yuwaa kiyung kachiykachi anoo pakchu, yusur nuwaa naynikchu, ndushat yutaritshishee nuwaam wayachiya? Itaru, nuwaatsshaparee kapung istachiya, tárangiya.
Dapiy tiptsir ashpari yusur anoo kasayarandsin, minupshat mach naataranganaya. Simiyshat ambitam tachiteeru, machish Dapiyamunari arangiri patumbichpa tiyá tiyá ashirangu, tsapuptatam tachuyaru kuruta, kuruta ashirangiya.
Dapiyshat ichingaru tiptsirpatari Ortagamun wing napiwaranganaya, anootsirishat kapung nizirangsin, kanuskusin, shanee ashiranganaya.
Itaru, Absalonshat Ahitofelpat mishat muchchurtamsin yuw tachitarangana anpatari ashparitssin yaktashurishat Irusarinash pshturanganaya.
Itaru, Dapiyshat wamkur Husay Arkitaschich anoo parangu, Absalonnung wátsiri káyamayaru kapung tsiyatarangu shambatampat, Kurakaa, shiy urutamari kurakarush taatsha, tsiyatku táta táta ashirangiya.
Absalonshat tsiyatarangu, ¿Tamashat Dapiyaa amikureesha nda amikuripish kutakatush tachitasha? tárangiya.
Husayshat tsiyatarangu, Aparshish tachitamaam izuuru pinasakina. Apanll shiyaa kurakaam ipusarangu, Israelchich tputs ichingarusin shiyaa kurakaam ínarangusin, ¿tamareeja nuw shiyash nda tachitchee?
Mishat, kurakaa, táchinllpa. Nuw amikureetsi kapung istaranguri, natunaa nuw shiyaa aranginasha Dapiyatseerush wipish ishtachinllpa, tárangiya.
Absalonshat anumun yusur Ahitofelaa masharangiya. Mazinangcha zuwaa. ¿Mayaa mangishish chinaksha? Yuw chinakish anoo nuwaa kamaninganda, tárangu.
Ahitofelshat, Aparish wizanll mashingamaw pangoo ksutamaam kasarangiya. Ashiri aparshish wizanll pshtuyarush maangcha. Amb ashkachush, Israelchich ichingarusin yasakchusin, waparee tayutariteenllcha, táchinllinaya. Tákchusin, yuw shiyash tputsirish tachitarana anin kapung mang' ksachinllinaya, tárangiya.
Maasheemshat pangus kapungush yuwar wanupship wayaranganaya. Amb yuwar Absalon waparpat wizanll mashingampa maaranganaya. Anootsshat yuwaa waparee wizanll mantsir patatarangu, anoo ichingarusin Israelchich paranganaya.
Anpurshat zar Ahitofel uru Apanllee kuk kamanimapanpaz ashiru taarangiya. Ashirucha amb ashku, anumandari Dapiy anumun mang' taturangiya. Absalonshat anumuntam mang' taturangiya. Ahitofelamari wamari kasiru istamapaneem taarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiy izuuru suwayaru, Absalonsha kurakaam waparish zamurangu anootsi.
Ahitofelshat Absalonaa tsiyatarangiya. Nuwaam sundarurish yuwanandari kizpuri anunandari 12 mil ipuseerush, pananda. Anpat naturitam psaan Dapiyap tachiteeri pangatama.
Watam arap naataranganawa. Ashiriya, na sambaytachpasinaya. Nuwshat tachitayaruri, yuwash sambaytachinllina anush kuseeri, tpuxtayaruri, ichingaroo tiptsiree tusuwayaruri, apareetsimtish pachatama.
Anumunsha, nuwsha tputsee ichingaru shiyash tachitamaam tsiyatchima. Shiyaa tatsuyayarusin, kisshapa shiyash tachitchinllinaya. Kiz kaneesich yamaam tamatarparee ashiru shiyash kis taachinllinaya. Minamari tputsee pachayaruch, kasachchi. Ashkachuch, tputs ichingarusin mapiychinllinaya, tárangiya.
Absalonshitisin, mishat anshuchtamsin Israelchish, ashchiri, Amb shingsi, táranganaya.
Itaru, Absalonshat, Arkitaschichee Husayaa yasapi. Uwshat ¿mayaja chinach? tárangu, kuruzurangiya.
Husayshat Absalonash kusarangu, Absalonsha, ¿Shiy may mangishish chinaksha yuwaa Ahitofel átu anootsi? ¿Shiy amaksha? tárangu.
Husaysha, Ahitofel tsiyatku an kaapa wanasireeja.
Shiy apareetsish yasaksha. Kizpurtanda. Wasundarurshat kizpurinandaritam taaranaya. Manginshuchee chaniwa wip putayaruch, wipangaz kapung tsiyanataru ashirusin na shaneeranaya. Mishat, Aparish kapung tapazish xapshingama. Waanung tputs psaanta káyamamaam ndunari.
Natshat ¿yapimasaja taariya? Wachushpari tapishuru tsangariya. Nda ashku piyamazuwa tapishuriwa. Wapaz ambshat ashiru, anush sundarureetsish zapan pachakchu, yutarit shitungchiya. Tputsshitisin anoo mazinakchusin, mang' kzuw ashkatssin, shiyaatssha mikeersin kasachinllinaya.
Sundarurish kizpuritaa taaku, kuwitsam watsiyun ashiritaateesinaya, itaru uwshat anoo tsiyatsis mazinakchusin, suwasuwachinllinaya. Ichingarusin tputs, Israelchichtamsin yasakanaya aparish yuwaa ashtaru anootsi.
Nuwaana shiyaa wanasir wanichinllpa. Nish tsap Israelchich taakana anoo yambiyarush, wanasir tsiyatangi. Yakat Danpatari Beersebamun yakat kuruzungi. Aship ashkachush, sundarurish marimun wing mazach wasipur taataru aship shaana imachingcha.
Ambinaapa sheeruch, apareetsish pakchuch, yapimasaja tapishuriya, anoo izuuru ashchiri katiripeeruch, sirin tsapumun xuwatkachu ashchiri kanachitaru sheerush, shiyamari kasitsha. Amb ashkachuch, wasundurur nda minumtiyam kamungchinllinaya. Izuuru kachingeeruch, kasachchee.
Wandaya yaktash kamungamaam pshturanginaariya, iy Israelchichini waskaa zapan yáyaruni, patumbchee ichingaru tusis tusis ashkachuni, izuuru wazawap kapeet kapeet ashtachinipa, Husayari tárangiya.
Absalonshat ichingarusin Israelchichtamsin Husayaa wayasash chinarangusin, Ashiri ambinaa sheeni. Ninacha Ahitofelmand wanasir tsiyatkasha, táranganaya. Apanll waana chinarangu, Absalon waanaatsisha tayutaritap átu, yuwaa Husay tsiyatku anoo kis payurangiya. Itaru Ahitofelaa kuk ngatarangiya.
Husayshat apanllpanee Sadokaa, mishat Abiyataraatstam tsiyatarangu, Ahitofel Absalonaa ichingaru Israelchicheetstam, Pza piy sheeruni, Dapiyaa pachani tárangiya. Itaru nuwshat Absalonaa tamapingaranguri amb shirintspa, anoom zandkus piynaa shingints nguti tárangina.
Ashiri siysat naturi teet sheerus, Dapiyaam kamanishinints. Neetsiri maarintspa arachich Ortagaa kung kitangints tángcha. Ndunnaa ashkush, uru neetsiritanda tputsirpatartish shiyaa pachachinllina tángcha tárangiya.
Jonatanshat Ahimaaspat apanllpantamsin wasina kutaksin kung tipashish sur En-rokel taarangu annungiri shanee ashiranganaya. Yaktash pshtukchuni, tputs paruneepa atusin ashiranganaya. Tputsshumshat muchchur kizash kamasinash Sadokash wip tsiyatssee wayarangiya. Sadoksha wip, Kamaniti Dapiyaatsi átu naatarangiya.
Nllurshat kanungas shitungeeranllu, naantachu, kizaa parangiya. Ashirucha, Absalonapshat teet sheeru kamanirangiya. Jonatanshat Ahimaaspat anoo mazinarangusin, Papcha, paruneepa, tárangusin anuritam teet ashirangsin, wamkurip Bahurimap pang' kusaranganaya. Anushshat kuseersin, kung tipashish tsap ktsimash wantsush pshtuyarusin, tapishuranganaya.
Anshat tputs wizanll washtangasheem tinayaru, anpat wachoo shtandayaru kasarangiya. Sheeru anumunshat, tirikpashat zap washtangashimun iwaz kuruteeru, ashchiri puyaru kasarangiya.
Anushshat, Absalon wasundurur kusarangsin, anshuchee kiz masharangiya. ¿Shiy partatish Ahimaasaatsi, mishat Jonatanaatstamta? ¿Yapeeja naayanllina? tárangusin, kizshat, Neetsina tushiyaranllusincha kungup piy naatarangana, tárangiya. Absalonshat wasundurur amb nachungaksin xapooyarandsin yusur waptam Irusarinap kanapuranganaya.
Kanaputaramchusin, apanllpanshitisin Ahimaas, mishat Jonatantam kungush tipashshish shitungarandsin, Dapiyapshat kamankatssin, teet ashiranganaya. Anshat Dapiyash kuseersin, kamankusin táranganaya. Papcha shiy suwangi, naturi mikeerush Ortagaa arachich kitanancha. Ndunnaa ashkush papcha. Ahitofel Absalonaa, Pza kamateeruni pachani táyasintanda shiyaatsi, táranganaya.
Ashiriya Dapiyshat anuritam psaanari tiptsir ashpari Ortagaa arachichshat mikimari kitaranganaya. Putam zar tputs kachingamshat ashirangiya.
Ahitofel Absalonaa piy sheeni átu xapooyaru, anumand kapung tsiyantayaru, burrurimunini ush kuxineeranllu, waanpeetam pang' Guilbowap naatarangiya. Anushshat yuwash nlluratarangu anush kuseeru, maachiritaa ashpari tsiyatam yuwapayaru, waanaatsi wayarpunish spuyaru tsiparangiya. Tsiparamchu yaptam waparina mapurangana ambitam mapuranganaya.
Dapiyshat naatarangu, Majanayimapshat yakat kusarangiya. Absalonshat ambitam tachitaru, wasundurur Israelchich ashpari Ortagaa kung kitaranganaya.
Anpurshat sundar urkar sur Jowab kizpur tapazee waratamaam yasarangiya. Itaru, anootsshat Absalon, Shiy watsta, tárangu tashitungayaru, minootsshat Ismaelchichee Itráy wip Amasayaa sundaroom urkar ínarangiya. Itráyshat Najasa wip Abigayilaa yamarangiya, Sarve muna. Sarveetsshat Jowab waniri.
Absalon Israelchichpat tachitarusin, Galaadash tsap kusaranganaya.
Itaru, Dapiyshat Galaadanung tsap Majanayimash yakat kusarangu, anshuchshitisin Najas wip Amónshuch Rabaa yanungamarini sur Sobi kis Dapiyaa chamayangarangiya. Lodebarshuchshat Amiyel wip Makir chamayangarangitamta. Galaadshuchshat Rokelimshuch yakat Barsilay sur chamayangarangitamta.
Tuchpisin chamayangakatssin, tiptsireemtam maash wirmaam, mangawatam kapungumash, suwitam, mishat katungtsitam tirik, sebaadatam, wach wasipuritam, maachtatam kpichim, yamarunlltam, mikatam pakchimash,
kinduratam, wakaratam mimir minam, opeejatam mimir minam, aship an yáyarandsin Dapiyaam mishat tiptsireemtam watungash yátaranganaya. Mangush chinarangusin, apuspimand tsap naatarandsin, kapungpari niziranganaya, mishat mariztam, sachistam kayateenllpasinaya, tárangusin zapan katungats yátaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Absalon Ahitofelaa kuk ngatarangu anootsi.
Dapiyarini wasundururee tácheeru, milosh sundar yuw kizpur kurakaa anoo ksutamaam wayarangiya. Anshuritam 100 sundar ksutamaam yuw tsipas kurakaa anoom wayarangiya.
Sheeru, wasundururee tuchip chawpishtayaru, zanganirangiya. Minam chawpishtarangu anoo kurakaam Jowabaam ksutamaam kamachtarangiya. Tsimbunarnishshat chawpishtam kurakaamtam Jowabaam zoonll Seroya wip Abisayaa ksutamaam kamachtarangiya. Tuchparinishshat chawpishtam kurakaam Gadshucheem tputs Itayaam sur ksutamaam kamachtarangiya. Aship sheeru, Dapiy wasundururee zangankachu, Itaru, nuwaptatampari naachchi, tárangiya.
Wasundarurshitisin, Nduni. ¿Mayaamaja shiy amb naachish? Shiynaa neetsiri taarapcha. Yaanitari naachinipa. Kundararish shiyaatsinaa sundarurish kaapa nda pachamaam zandkanaya. Apaz kundararish shiyaatsshat pakchusin, uru shiyaatsimari pachachinllinaya. Iysha suwakchuni, ndusha iyangzina tachitchinllinaya. Iyaatsinaa 10 milootsini tputsini nda pachamaam zandkanaya. Itaru, shiyaatsimari pachamaam chinakanaya. Shiyaatsimari pachakchusin, kapung mang' ksaksin 10 milootspaz sundar pachayarusina ashtachinllinaya. Anoomcha shiyaa neetsiri taarapcha, táshiniya. Sundar iyaam pishtakinaariya, nimandari shiysha tputsee zanganitsha, táranganaya.
Dapiyshat, Zuraktischa. Ashiri nuw neetsiri taapama, tárangu, yaktaa washitungash piyam ngootsee ktapuz xiyarangiya. Ashirangu, yuwshat milosh tputs minum kurak kizpur wayaku, anshuritam 100 sundar tsipas kurak wayaku ashirangu, anshitisin naakchusin, shitungaranganaya.
Dapiyshat Jowabaa, Abisayaatstam, mishat Itayaatstam yusur tsiyatarangiya, yuwaa tuchip kurak kizpurinand naakchinllina anootsi. Nuwaa chinakinaareesa, kaapanaa ipareetsinaari Absalonaa pcharintspa, tárangiya, Sundarshitisin ichingarusin yuwaa Dapiy wipaa pachamaam pachindarangu anoo mazinaranganaya.
Dapiy wasundurur Israelchicheem pachakatssin, Efrayinarinpini watsapun naataranganaya.
Anushshat, Israelchichish pshturangusin, Dapiy wasundurur zapan Absalonaa wasundurur pacharangusin, washunand 20 mil pacharanganaya.
Anshat waanpatatin waratarangsin, tputs zapan manginash tatsitarangiya. Ashirangsin, manginash zapan tsiparangusin, machinsha waanpatatin m'chitpa pacharanganaya.
Absalonsha kapaachumun muúlamun kuxinaranllu, naantach ashirangu, yap nda chinaru anush Dapiyaa wasundurur chamayangarangiya. Anoo puniku, muúlshat piyamshat manginap teet ashku, mantsirishshat pshtukamchu, Absalonshat much yasinash wapzar sarichirangiya. Ashkachu, muúlshat arang teet ashku Absalonaa anshuri tsharangiya. Ashirangu, Absalonshat anshuri much saricheeru, yuwarshat kambiptaramach ashirangiya.
Sundarsha anoo parangu, Jowabaatsshat kamanirangiya. Absalon yasinash much saricheeru, yuwar kambiptarpa, mang tárangiya.
Jowabshat mazinarangu, Ashiriya, ¿mayaamsha nda anuri pareesha pachayarush kasasha? Ashkinaareesha, nuw mangi kisparee. Yuwamand pacharangish anumand nuwshat shiyaam kurikee 10 mbammash yáyaruri, mishat kichpushitam yuw kizpur wanasirimshi anoo panachinlla, tárangiya.
Itaru sundarshat, Nuw ¿tamari kurakaa kuk mazinanlluri, amb nuw ashtachee? Watam iy ichingaruni yuwaa Dapiy shiyaa, Abisayaatstam, mishat Itayaatstam, Nuwaa kuki mazinangtsa. Ipareetsinaari Absalonaa pchamanaa pcharintspa, tsiyatku, tárangu, anoo mazinaranginiwa. Ashirucha, shiy nuwaam zapantaati kurikee 10 miltaa mbammash panakush, nuw anoo nda ayu táchina.
Nuw pachakchinaareena, kurakshapa yasakchu, nuwaatsshat kamachtachiya. Pachayarush ksangcha, tákchu, shiyatamshat nuwaa pachatsha, tárangiya.
Jowab anoo tsiyataramchu, ¿Mayaam anoom ngutish tsiyatstapich? Pzaya, Ashtaa, pachayani, táyaranllu, naanataa sheeranllu, wandaritam much yasinamun wapzar sarichiru, kambiptaru parangiya. Ashiriya, uwshat turuwpat mangoo tuchip kayungarangu, Absalonshat nda musá tsipaku, anuritam kchit kambiptar ashirangiya.
Yuwshtisin Jowabaam istampan tachitarana, anshitisin izuuru pachayarusin, kasaranganaya.
Anshat pacharamchusin, Absalonaa wanuts yáyarusin, manginapshat mantsirish tsap wach kawaru anush tapshuyarusin, anumun patumbichpashat wachoo kámanayarusin, kasaranganaya. Sheerandsin, Jowab tiptsiree kukunamaamshat kamachtarangiya. Anumandarishat, Israelchichee ndushat arang tachitarangsin, watam Jowab watsta táranguwa. Israelchichshitisin anoo mazinarangusin, kapung punirangusin, waptam pangup suwaranganaya.
<range>
Absalon kchitama, waama mapshissheem tinamaam tputsee kamachtarangiya. Kurakash mapshini tinarangiya. Kizpur wanasir tinayaru, waanaatsi sur anumun yandarangiya. Wip nduneeru, sur minamari yandarangiya. Wandarit anush pshkuru pataraniya. Itaru, uru kurimunaz taakiya.
Sadokshat wip Ahimaas Jowabaa tsiyatarangu, Nuw shiyaa mashkina. Nuwma kurakap teet sheeri kamanitama, Apanll wizpurpat na kundarareetsish tachiyarangiya, tátamasima, tárangiya.
Itaru Jowabshat, ¿Antaati shiy anoo kamanimaam waritarish? Nda. Minushparee zar shiyaam kamanimaam waritachiya, watam na kurak wip tsiparanguwa, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Jowab wasundurureetsshat Etiyopee kuruzeeru, Shiynaa yuwaa nish ashpari parangish anoo kurakaa kamanishini, tárangu. Etiyopshat anuritam kamankatu kurakap iripurangiya.
Ahimaasshat yusur Jowabaa masharangiya. Ashtaa, nuwshat Etiyopimun ush tachiteeruri pangatama, tárangu, itaru Jowabshat, ¿Shiy mayangazshat amb naamaam zandaksha? ¿Tamati átshasha? ¿Ambtaati naayarush mayshtaja yáyachish? tárangiya.
Ahimaasshat, Ashiritaata, napatama, watam nuwaantari napamaam zandkuri tinawa. Ashiri napachtandi, tárangu, Jowabshat, ¿Tamanda? Naamaam zandkush, napashini, tárangiya. Ashiriya, Ahimaasshat anuritam tándsapiri iripurangu, Etiyopee arangeem kaneeru imazarangiya.
Dapiysha iwanung yakat washitungash tsimbun wach kawaru annung apusash kuxinxinaw ashirangiya. Yaktaa washitungash ksutamapanshat tandapunuzimun yuwar kuxinxinawu, napanapaw ashirangu, tputs arap minamari káyashinu iripeeshinu, anoo parangiya.
Anshat paranllu, kurakaatsshat, ¿Tamaki tputs ashtar? Minumari káyashinu iripeeshinsha, tárangiya. Dapiysha, Minumaritaya káyashinu tsiyatsis wanasirtanda payuru shitaranllu, tárangiya. Anshat yuwaa tputs watsiritataranllu anoo,
yusur ksutamapan arang nap ashku, mishat tputs minamtam káyashinu iripeeshinu parangiya. Anootsshat parangu, yusur kurakaa, Min anuwaa tputs arangeem minumtam káyashinu iripeeshinu, tárangiya. Kurakshat an tputs nda mangu naanllpa. Tsiyatsis wanasiritamtanda payuru naanllu, tárangiya.
Ksutamapanshat parangu, Yuw imazaru naanllu anu Ahimaascha Sadok wipaya, tárangiya. Kurakshat Ahimaas tputs wanasircha. ¿Tamama tputs tsiyatssee wanasirimash payuru kusach? Napa: Nuwangzimari kamaniti átu naatiya, tárangiya.
Anshat Ahimaas kurakash kusarangu, kurakanung wats tsapush tutunlltayaru, much timuchta sheeru, Apanllimari kizpurcha. Shiyaa chinarangu, na kundarareetsish waamari kasirangiya, tárangiya.
Dapiyshat, Wanasircha. ¿Natuwa? ¿Iparshitinawa? ¿Absalonaa na tamara? tárangu. Ahimaasshat, ¿Mayaatsimasaja? Jowab nuwaa ningeem tsiyatsseem kamanimaam zangankachu, anshumaritcha ningeem naakchuri, zamangarandsin mazinanshina. Itaru, nuw nduntam yasarina. ¿Mayaatsimasaja táranllina? tárangiya.
Kurakshat, Neetsiri piyam xiyangimasi, musápa, tárangu, Ahimaasshat ayu tárangu, anootsiri piyam xiyeeru kutarangiya.
Anshat musásiritam Etiyopshat iriputaranllu kusarangiya. Kurakaatsshat, Shaana tputsirish tsiyatssee shiyaam zanganeeru, anoo shiyaam kamankatina. Apanll shiyaam kapung istarangiya. Yuwamand shiyaa kundararish kapung natsamaam zandarangana anumand Apanllshat kapung anshuchee tputs waneerangiya, tárangiya.
Dapiyshat Etiyopee, ¿Natuwa? ¿Iparshitinawa? ¿Na tamara? tárangu, Etiyopshat, Apanll waana zandku, kundarareetsish ichingarusin nllur tamapari ashisha taachinllinpa, kamapshimpa kamanku tárangiya.
Dapiyshat anoo mazinarangu, kapung mang' mantsarangu, nungtarangiya. Watandpunupshat káreeranllu, ambiri maaship kárkachu, wachup tanunukach ashirangiya. Tanuku tárangiya, Iparinaa Absalonarinaa. Iparinaa Absalonarinaa. Sitatsti, ipari tsipayanllu. ¿Mayaamsha nllurinaashtish tsiparangsha? Nuwaanacha wachini tsipakuri wanasiriya, tanuku ákamach ashirangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Absalonarineetsini pacharangana anootsi.
Tputsshitisin yuwaa Dapiy wip Absalonarini tsiparangu anungaz mang' mantsaku, tanuku anoo parangusin, Jowabaatsshat kamankatssin naataranganaya. Dapiyshat wasundurur anuritam yuw kapung mang' ksaksin, shambatarangana, anoo kasayashtisin, mang' mantsakshitisin, shanee ashiranganaya.
<range>
Ashirucha amb ashirangsin, ichingarusin sundar apinll naattusin, pázirpat yaktash pshturanganaya. Tapazeetspaz suwarangusina ashiranganaya.
Itaru, kurakshat wchoo chirikpat kámanarangu, kapung tanurangu, Iparinaa Absalonarinaa. Iparinaa, tanuku átar ashirangiya.
Jowabshat kurakash pang' pshtuyaru, kurakaa tsiyatarangiya. Kurakaatssha, ¿Mayaamsha iy shiyaa taarasheetsish, ipareetstamtish, mishat izanlleewaatstamtish, mishat izanllish mashingamawaatstam, tapachindarangitaatani, shiyshat iyaa tputsireetsish ipazamaam zandaksha?
Amb ashkush, shiy kundarareetsish kapung chinakpaz ashiksha. Itaru, yuwaatsinashat shiyaa taarashish tapachindarangu, anootsinasha sundarureewaatsish ichingaru tputsireetsish natsakpaz ashiksha. Waanariya Absalon kchitanaariya, iynaariya ashparitani tsiparanguni, anootsinaapa shiy mangish kapung ksachsha, tárangu,
Pzaya, watsta. Shtungangi. ¿Mayaamsha amb ashiksha? Shitungeerush, sundarureetsish tsiyateerush, arang tuwizpurtangi. Papcha. Ndunnaa ashkush, uru zurampatari na psaan sundarurish ashparipa suwasuwachinllinaya. Amb ashkatssin, ¿shiyaa chakaja ksutchinllina? Shiyshat kanungasimasish kiyung kachiyarangush, wachinarangush yutaritshish shiyaa tushiyrangu, natsha tputsirish shiyaa kasakchusin, uru aranginashat mangish mantsatsha, tárangiya.
Ashirucha, Dapiy anuritam chiyzayaranllu, yaktanung washitungash naateeru, kuxinarangshita. Tputsshitisin ichingarusin anoo yasarangusin, kurakangaz ashparitssin kusaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Jowab Dapiyaa izamzarangu anootsi. Anshat Israelchich yuw Absalonaa istarangana an yusur ichingarusin waptam pangup suwasuwaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, ichingarusin Israelchichin waanpatatin tsiyatkusin, Sirútari kurak Dapiy iyaa kundararini Filistewshuchee tpachingarangu, iyaa tapachindarangiya. Ashirangitaa, itaru wipamand Absalonarini kurakaam kinamaam zandarangu, anumand tsiyantayaru, minupshat tsap suwarangiya.
Ashirangu, iyshat ¿chakamunshitaja mangini tateechini? Atuni, Absalonaatstshat kurakareemani ínaranginiya. Itaru, na watam tapazishsha tsiparanguwa. Ashiri, ¿ndushat yusur Dapiyaatstam kurakareemich ínanda át? táranganaya.
Dapiyshat yuwaa Israelchich waanpatatin tsiyatarangana anoo mazinarangu, uwshat apanllpanee Sadokaa, mishat Abiyataraatstam kuruzeeru, Siysat Utaáchichpa wachinanur tsiyatashinints, Kurak ateeja siyaatsi. ¿Mayaamshat zaptaksa? ¿Nda nuwaa musásiri yusur kurakareemis ínaksa? Sheerus, ¿nuwaa nda pangipi yusur wayaksa?
¿Antaati nuw siyapat tunareezini? Zuwanlltanicha. Kurasirini waannandaritcha. Ashiriya ambitaa ashiruni, ¿mayaamsha siysat nuwaa nda mikeerus kurakareemis ínaksa? átcha kuraka, táyarus,
Amasayaa kamaningtamtsa. Kurak shiyaa táranlleeja: Iy shiyapat kapungcha zuwanlliniya; kurasirini waannandaritcha. Ashirucha, nuw shiyaa kizpureem kurak ínamaam zandkashina. Na Jowabaa tashitungayaruri, shiyaatsshat kurakaam ínachinllpa. Zurampataricha atashina. Nguti ngichkachinaareena, uru Apanllshapari nuwaa kapung wanichindanaya, átcha kurak Dapiyaa tángtsa, táyaru, Dapiy tsiyatssee apanllpanish zanganirangiya.
Dapiy amb tárangu anoo, Amasayshat mazinarangu, uwshat ichingaru Utaáchchee tsiyatarangiya. Utaáchichshat anuritam chinarangusin, tsiyatssee kurakaam zanganiranganaya. Kurakaa, mapiyrush, sundaruriptish urkar ashpari ningtam kanapeerush kusangcha, táranganaya.
Kurakshat anoo mazinarangu, kanapeeshinu, kung Ortagamun kusarangiya. Utaáchichshat chamayangakatssin, Guilgaalash tsap kusaranganaya. Ortagaa kung arachich kitamaam istakatssina.
Benjaminarinchichshat, Guerarini wip yuw Bahurimash nllurtarangu, anshat sur Simiy Dapiyangaz chamayangakatam káyaranllu, Utaáchichpat washunand yápandayarandsin naataranganaya.
Benjaminarinchich mil tputs washunand yápandayarandsin naataranganaya. Sibaatsshat Saularineetsini maachiri ksutamapan taarangu anshat, anshutam wip ashpari 15, muchchurshat 20 taaru, ashparitssin naatarangsin, ndaturi kurak anush kusaru, uwmasin Ortagash kung kusaranganaya.
Ashirucha, Kurakaa arachich itsipungayaruni, kuraksha iyaa kissha napchiya, atusin, anoom kapung istaranganaya. Wipaatstam putayarusin, arachich itsipungayarusin kasaranganaya. Anshat kurak arachich kitaramchu anush, Simiyshat, yuw Dapiyaam patumbchee kapeetarangu, anshat kurakanung iriptaranllu much tsapush timuchta sheeru,
Kurakaa, nuw shiyaa atina. Yuwamand shiyaa Irusarinash shitungeeshinush, nuw mantsir tsiyatarangi, anumand nuwaa tsiyantarishpa; anoo izuuru mbizangcha. Na shiyaatsimarishat kukish payukuni, taachinipa.
Nuw Osiyarinchichtana. Ashirucha, yuwaa nuw shiyaa mantsir tsiyatarangi anoo nuwaanaatsi yasaranguri, nuw wasina shiyangaz tsiyatati aturi, nuwma imazayaruri kusarangi, tárangiya.
Abisayshat Seroyarini wip, ¿Mayaamsha kurakaa, shiy nee Simiyaa napaksha? Pachayarush ksachishpa, watam shiyaa Apanlleetstaatish ipusamarini mantsir tsiyataranguwa, tárangiya.
Kurakshat, Nduni shiy nuwaa tamundarishpa. ¿Antaati shiyaa Seroyaatsish wipish tsiyatak? Watam na nuwaa Israelchich yusur chinarangusin, kurakaam ínaranganawa. Ashiriya, amb ashirangsin, nuwshat ¿mayamandshitaja Israelchichee msangeeri pachachee? tárangiya.
Ashirucha, Dapiy amb tárangu, Simiyaa, zurampatari nuw shiyaa pachachinllpa, tárangiya.
Saularinshat wachinllin Mefiboset kurakaa chamayangarangitamta. Anshat Mefiboset yuwapur Dapiy Irusarinash tsap shitungarangu, anpuri kapung Dapiyangaz mang' mantsarangu nda chumaku, mishat wamareetstam nda káchaku, mishat wasusootstam nda kumaku anuri pásiru anush Dapiy kanapeeshinu kusarangiya.
Ashirucha, ashimari Irusarinamand káyashinu, kurakangaz chamayangakatu kusarangu, kuraksha anoo parangu, Mefibosetaa masharangiya. ¿Mayaamsha shiy yuwapururi nuw naatarangi anpur nda nuwash tachitarangsha? tárangu,
Mefibosetshat, Ichee kurakaa, watam nuw kutsi wanguy kuyamchinawa; nda putit naamaam waritakinawa. Ashirucha, m'chachureetsi Sebaa kamachtaranguri, Nuwaam burr putayarush, yarangi kurakaripi pangatama, tárangitaati, itaru m'chachurshiti nuwaa mangu tamapingarangiya.
Amb sheeru, nuwaa yutaritaam ínayaru, shiyapshat nuwamun ngichirangiya. Ashiriya shiyshat, watam Apanll wasundurur ashirush taakshawa, nuwaa yuwari shaana zandkish anuritam shingandama, tárangiya.
Shiy nuwaa pachirinimandi Saularinimand pachamaam waritartaa, shiyshat mangish wanasireerush aparinimandi Jonatanamand nuwaa kapung chinarangsha. Ashirangush, nuwapat washunand shiyamun misarish katungaranginiya. Ashiri amb ashkuri, ¿mayaatsee shiyaa arang mashchi? tárangiya.
Kurakshat, ¿Mayaatsi tsiyateechich? Arang nuw tsiyatssiri wanindaja. Nuw Sibaa sirútari kamachtarangina. Siysat Mefibosetash watsapun tarawaztakchus, waama pakchitam panangtsa, tárangi. Anuri wandari nuw chinakina, tárangiya.
Mefibosetshat, Waanipari Sibsha watsapuneem ashchiri yachiya. Nuw tsapungaz mangi mantsakeezi, watam kaapa yuwangaz mangi mantsakuri, kurakari yusur kchit kanapuchpa táranguri, na shiyshat yusur pangishish kusarangush, na mangi kischa, tárangiya.
Anpurshat min tputs Barsilay Dapiyangaz napkatu watsapunimand Galaadamand káyashinu, Rokelimash tsap chamayangayaranllu, Ortagaa kung arachich itsipungakatu tachitarangiya. Anush arachich itsipungaramchu, yusur waptam kanapurangiya.
Barsilaysha kizpur wachin masachirini 80 taarangiya. Anshat mang yuwapur Dapiy Majanayimap tsap suwarangu anpur kizpur kurikpan taarangiya. Ashirucha, Dapiyaamsha maacheetsi yuwangaz zandku, anuwaa zapan istarangiya.
Dapiyshat Barsilayaa tsiyatarangu, Pzaa. Shiyapa nuwap tsapuni Irusarinap naayani. Amb nuw shiyaa ksutchinllpa, tárangiya.
Itaru, Barsilayshat, ¿Tamari na wachinayanlluri tsipani tutundeenllshat, shiyap tsapunish Irusarinap naachi? Mutatayanllshacha tsipani.
Watam naturi 80 masachiri taaruwa. Katungamaamtam ndushat kis káchayaruri katungkina. Waamaamtam mangutarishti kamasingaruri waakina. Amb ashkuri, katungtsee ksamsheewa, mishat yutaritawaatstam ndushat káchakina. Mishat, ¿antaati yaseesshee yaseekana, kizawtamsin yaseekana anoo mazinacheezi? watam kitsi zamamawshitawa. Ambshapari ashkuri, shiyaatsshat tuxarakuri, shiyshat nuwapat mápeetshasha. Nda ashishtamaam kurakaa, ¿mayaamaja nuw shiyap naachi?
Watam na yuwangzina kapung zandarangi anootsina na shiyaam istaranguri, na arachich kiteenshawa. Mishat, ¿mayamandshat shiy nuwaam kapung istamaam zandaksha? watam nuw shiyaam Ortagaatsim kitamaam istaranginawa.
Ashirucha, nuw kurakaa, shiyaa atashina. Nuwaa ksangandama. Nuw nuwaanpeetam tsapuni naayaruri, tsipamma. Ambiri tsipakchuri, nuwaatsshat aparninungiritam mapchinllinaya. Itaru, neewa. Nuw ipari sur Kimjama machimaam tsapunpish zandkinaareesha, maachtatcha. Zandkush shaamatari tputsirish izuuru yamangcha, tárangiya.
Kurakshat ashiri ipareetsish Kimjama nuwaanpee tsapuni machchima, watam shaana átshawa. Ashiri yuwari shaana átish anuritam ashtachima. Uru nuwaamatari tputsiri yamakchuri, nuwashurisha taachiya, tárangiya.
Anshat ichingaru tputs Ortagaa kitarangsin, kurakshat kitarangtam, Barsilaya kasakchu, pachipeeru, ishambeersin kasaranganaya. Ashiriya amb ashirangsin, Barsilay yusur waptam watsapunip kanapurangiya.
Kurakshat tiptsir ashpari Utaáchich Kimjampatatam washunandari káyarandsin, Guilgaalap tsap naataranganaya. Israelchich chawpitam anush tachitaranganaya.
Israelchichshitisin kurakash kuseersin, ¿Mayaamshat Utaáchich ashparitisin shiyaa pachindkanaya? Káchingayarandsin, shiyangaz Ortagamun kuseersin, uwshtisin shiyaa amuytayarusin, istanda tápani atusin, pachindkanaya, táranganaya.
Utaáchichshitisin tsiyatarangsin, ¿Antaati iy mangutaritani ashpini kachingaruni kusaranganee? Watam nee kurakaa yaantari Utaáchchini zuwanlliniwa. Ashiri siysat ¿mayamandsha iyaa tsiyantaksa? Mishat, ¿antaati iy mangutaritani kurakash kuseeruni katungkinee? Machtawaatstam ¿antaati iyaam mangutaritaja panak? Nda, uwshtisin táranganaya.
Yusur Israelchichshitisin tsiyatarangsin, Itaru, kaapa yaanacha siyamand arang kurakaa amuytashiniya. Iynaa siyaa Utaáchcheetsis yanuruni, zapantanicha. Ashiriya, ¿mayaamsha siy iyaa niyraksa? Watam iyma chtaru kurakareetsini kanapungi táranguni, na kurakareetsini yanpuranginiwa, táranganaya. Tárangitaatssin, Utaáchich kapung tsiyantarangusin, Israelchichpat nambaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiyarini yusur watsapunishtam kusarangu anootsi.
















































Dapiyarini Apanllee yaseeku, Apanll nuwaa tapachindarangu, Saularini nda pacharanganda, mishat kundartamti nda nuwaa pacharangiya, átu yaseeku tárangiya.
Apaa, shiyamari kizpureerush, nuwaa tapachindarangush, nuw patumbchishpaz wach pshturanguri, ashiru shiyash kamungarangi.
Shiyash patumbich wach tamapari ashiru anush nuw kamungkina; nuwaa tapachindaksha. Mishat, xanxapishpapaz kámanaku ashiru nuwaa wizpurirpatish kámanakush, nuwshat kamungkina. Mishat, arang yuwarpaz kámanaru ashiru anush nuwaa pishuksha. Ashkush, shiyamari wizpurirpatish nuwaa ksutkush taaraasheetsi tapachindaksha. Nuwaa tputs kiyung yachamaam zandarangtaatssin, itaru shiyshat nuwaa tapachindarangsha.
Apaa, shiyaatsimaritcha wanasireem ínamaam waritaksha. ¿Nuw shiyaa wanipaja masharangi? Nuwaam istanda táranguri, shiyshat nuwaa kundarari tapachindarangsha.
Nuw tsipamaam waritarangina. Waraspaz ashiru nuwaa mangeetsi yambutarangu, nuwshat kapung punirustarangina.
Mishat, wanumbpapaz maachtaam tutsangtarich, ashimashtaa nuwaam tsipamaam waritarangitaati,
nuwaa taxararangusin, ¿Tamayareezi kamungchi? táranguri, Apaa, shiyaatsshat pangishish mashiranguri, kapung tanuranguri, shiyshat k'keetsi mazinarangush,
shiyshat yuwamand tsipats kinarangi anumand kapung tsiyantarangush, tsap kapung mundaztarangu, kanindpitam mundaztarangiya. Shaana Apaa, wizpurirpatish ashirangsha.
Mishat, kizpur tsiyantarangush, shipishish msas ashiru kizpur shitungarangiya. K'kishitish sumas ashiru shitungarangu, watsam ashiru kurakurtaru, ningeem zanganirangsha.
Kanindaa wach tawatakpaz ashirangush, msaseetsshat kizpur tuwap tsapush zanganirangsha.
Ashirangush, kambusur machimun pantsatarangu, maacheetsi wazitpungach wanindawa tpurangarangu, kambusurush naatarangiya.
Kambusurshat kizpur tap ashirangu, sinshat sinamaam zandarangu, anushshat shiy tapishurangsha.
Anushshat, kapung kariytarangu, watsamshat sumas sin ashiru tsapush pantsatarangiya.
Ashirucha, Apanllimari kizpureeru, kariyaa zanganku, kapung kariytakachu, kanindap kimakiya.
Ashirangu, kundarareetstamti mangoo tamamarpamaam wásaparinpa tiyanurangu, mamaroo kayungarangu, kizpur mamartarangiya.
Tputsee wanimaam zandarangu, kizpur maraa kung tapusirangu, tsapoo wanshuchee puzarangiya. Tputsshitisin ichingarusin tsapoo wanshuchee paranganaya.
Apanllshat waana íwarimand uw paxayarangu, uwish nuwaa wayarangu, nuwshat mar kapungootstaa kitarangina.
Amb ashiranguri, kundarari kizpureewtaatssin nda nuwaa pacharangusin, nuwamaritam kamungarangina, nuwaa kapungtaa natsarangusina. Uwshtisin tputs nuwamand kizpureew taaranganaya.
Yuwash nuw wizpuriri ndunareerangu anush, nuwaa pachamaam zandarangsin, itaru Apanllsha nuwaa istarangu,
nuwaa tashitungarangiya. Ashirangu, nuwshat kamungarangina. Apanll nuwaa kapung chinaku ashirangiya.
Watam nuwshat wanasir taaranginawa. Ashirucha, Apanllshat nuwaam wanasiritam istarangiya.
Watam nuw Apanllish kis tachitaranginawa. Ashiranguri, ayamamtiyam nuw Apanllee nda kasachina.
Ichingaru yuwaa tsiyatarangu anootstam nuw payuranguri, nda minumtiyam kukoo kapeetarangina.
Amb ashiranguri, wanasir taarangina; nda yutaritshishush pshturangina; yutaritshisheetsshat izuuru kasarangina.
Ashirucha yuwamand nuw kizpur wanasir tárangi anumandtam, Apanllsha nuwaam wanasiritam istarangiya.
Apaa, shiyaa tputs k'keetsish payukana, anoo shiyshat wanasiritam napaksha. Mishat, nda yutaritshishush pshtukana, anootstam shiyshat chinaksha.
Zurampatari shiyaa chinakana, anoo shiyshat zurampatartatam chinaksha. Itaru, tputs tamapingampaneetsshat, shiyshat zurampatari waneeksha.
Mishat, yuwaatsimari shiyaa kukish payukana anootsimari tapachindaksha. Itaru, yuwaatsshat shiyaa kukish nda payuksin, waanaatstamari chinakana, anootsshat shiyshat waneeksha.
Apaa, shiyamari nuwaa tuwasineeksha. Apaa, shiyaa nuwcha Apanlliri. Ashirucha, nuw tapish taamaam waritaktaati, itaru shiyshat nuwaa mangeetsi tuwasineeksha.
Shiy nuwaam istarangush, nuwamari kundarareetsi kasirangina. Mishat, yakat tandapunumaatsta nuwamaritam pshturangina.
Ashirucha, Apanllimari wamachtash kizpur wanasiriya. Mishat, Apanllimunari kuk chiy mangich tatukchi. Tputs Apanllimunamari mang' tatku anoo uwshat ksutkiya.
¿Tamamshat Apanllee kasiru min taaraa? Mishat, ¿taamaam Apanll iyaa taarasheetsini kizpur wanasir ksutka?
Apanllimari kizpureeru, iyaa taarasheetsini tapachindakiya. Mishat, yutaritshishireetsini tachingkiya.
Nuwaam istarangu, k'tseetsi murish wayarangu, nuwshat manllanus ashiruri machpitaa káriranguri, nda pantsarangina.
Apanll tapazeemtam waratamaam nuwaa tuxapshingarangiya. Ashirangu, nuwshat wizpuriri kapung taaranguri, tsaktsakaa ngusambaatstaa tinamaa yáyaruri, mbamaatstaa tsak ashirangina tputseem pachamaama.
Apaa, shiyamari nuwaa tapachindarangush, nuwshat kamungarangina. Amb ashirangush, nuwamari kizpur taakina.
Nuwaa wanasirip ngoots tuyamandarangush, nuwshat amb naataranguri, nda pakchiyam pantsarangina.
Ashirucha, kundarareetsi pacharanguri, nuwamari ashparitaa kachingaranguri, yusur nuwamaritam kanapurangina.
Nuwamari kundarareetsi izuuru kachingeeri, zurampatari tpachingarangina. Pantsarangusin, ayamtaati yusur chiyzachazinllinaja. Nuwanungiri tum tum ashiranganaya.
Apanllsha nuwaa kapung wizpurireemi panarangiya tapazeem waratamaama. Ashirangu, yuw tputs nuwaa natsamaam zandarangana, anoo nuwamari kasiranguri, nuwanungeem timuchta ashiranganaya.
Itaru, nuwshat kundarari kizpur puniksin suwaranganaya. Amb sheeruri, kundarareetsi nuwamari kasirangina.
Ashirangsin, tputseewaatstam istanda tárangitaatssin, itaru tputsshitisin nda istaranganaya. Apanllingaztam kuruzurangsin, Apanllshat nduntam mazinarangiya.
Izuuru kachingaranguri, tsapoo tachuwchayaruch, wasipureem ínatarich ashirangina. Ashiranguri, tsiparimun kapcharanguri, sharamungash kapchatarich ashirangina.
Apaa, tputs iyaa natsarangana anoo shiyshat tpachingarush, nuwaa kurakaam ínarangsha. Ashirangush, na tputs ichingarusin nduntaa nuwaa natstaksin, k'keetsi payukanaya.
Arapcheewtamsin nuwash kuseersin, nuwaa kis ungirtakanaya. Yuwaatstam kamachtaki anootstam kis mazinayarusin, payukanaya.
Tputs arapcheew kuseersin, nuwaa nungtaksin, tapishutusin, púnirpatari kuskanaya.
Ashiri Apaa, shiyamari urutamari taatsha. Shiyashumari nuw kamungkina. Shiyaatsimari nuw wanasir tsiyatchima. Shiy nuwaa taaraasheetsi tapachindaksha.
Shiyshat Apanlleerush kurandarareetsini kisatarangish. Tputsshitisin ichingaru na nuwaa ksutkanaya.
Apaa, nuwaa kundarari natsamaam zandarangtaatssin, itaru shiyshat Apanlleerush, nuwaa kundarari kizpureewaatstaa, ashtaa nuwaa tapachindarangsha.
Ashirucha, yuwamand ashirangish anumand nuwshat ichingarupa tsapurunas shiyaa surish shambatkiniya.
Shiyamari kasirangush, nuwaatssha kurakaam ínarangsha. Shiy kurakish kizpureerush, shaana nuwaa kurakaam ipusarangsha. Shiy urutamari nuwaa, mishat chinllineetstamti kis napaksha, Dapiy tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiyarini yaseeku tárangu anootsi.
Dapiyarini kuk tuwatspamaam tsiyatku tárangiya. Dapiya Jeseyarini wipa. Apanll waana Dapiyaa kizpureem kurak ínarangiya. Yuwamand Akoparini Apanllee kapung chinarangu, anumandtam Apanllsha Dapiyarineetsi kurakaam ipusarangiya. Dapiyshat Israelchich kis yasimpan taarangiya. Dapiy tárangiya.
Apanll waana wanee zanganirangu, nuwaa tutsiyatstarangiya. Ashirucha, nuwsha kis tsiyatchina.
Israelchich Apanllirini tárangiya; Nuw Israelchicheem tapachindampaneem taachima, Apanll waana nuwaa tárangiya. Kurak tiptsiree taárash itsinsaru yasakchu, nuwaa kuki tatsamooru payukchu, nuwsha kis chinachina.
Urutamari kis taachiya. Kanindap 'sinitaraa ashikpaz ashtachiya. Zartam tarasitaranllu, puturi msas ndunariri kizpur 'sineekchu, mzatsish maachi kis kxunkachu, anumunshapaz sin sinakchu, kuraksha ashikpaz ashiru kis taachiya, Apanll tárangiya.
Ashirucha, nuw nlluranuri urutamari Apanllchicheem taachinllinaya. Watam Apanll waana urutamari shiyachchee kasacheezi, táranguwa. Ashirucha, nuwamari kundarareetsi kasikina. Apanllsha nuwaa istakchu, yuwari nuw chinaki anoo zurampatari tatsameerinand kasachiya.
Itaru, tputs yutaritshishpanshitisin kap tamapari ashirusin taakanaya. ¿Chakaja kpaa tputs uwpat putayach? Ashiri arap kpaa kapeetamaam waritakcha.
Itaru, chiyshat kpaa patatamaam zandkuch, ngusamb pazuyaruch, patatamaam waritakiya. Anootsshat sumasish pshtamaam waritakiya, izuuru ashpari muchimaama, Dapiy tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiyarini kuk iwatsparangu anootsi. [Wapparee. Watamcha Samuelarini kuku kuzizimon yandama.]

























































Dapiyarini kizpur wachinarangu ndusha waritarangiya. Yuwaam kachizatku, anoom punllupa irpungaktaatssin, itaru nda ksaneerangiya.
Ashirucha, anoom muchchurshitisin Dapiyaa: ¿Chakaja shiyaa ksutach? Minum kiz kamasin nachungayaruni, shiyaam ksutamapaneem wayachinipa. Anpatatam maakchush, ksanichpasha, táranganaya.
Tárangusin, ichingarusin ashchiri tsap Israelash nachungarangusin, anush kizaa sur Abisaka paranganaya. Ansha kiz watsapun Sonema. Anootsshat yamayashinusin, kurakaamsha Dapiyarineemi ksutamaam wayaranganaya.
Abisaksha kiz kizpur wanasirimuna. Ansha kiz kurakaam Dapiyarineemi wanasir ksutarangiya. Itaru, kuraksha Dapiyarini anpa kizapat nda mantsir mangush chinarangiya; wanasiriri taaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiyarini kizpur wachinarangu, anoom ksutamapaneem kizaa kamasina wayarangana anootsi.
Yuwash Dapiyarini kizpur wachinarangu, anush wip Adoniyas minshuch wizanll mashingamash Aguit wip kurakaam kinapi táyaru, waparee pachapi átu, zapan kapaachoo pshiyrshinee tapazpanee, mishat sundar kapaachoo kinaku anootstam yushindarangiya. Sundarootstam 50 kuruzeeru, waanaatsi ksutamaam wayarangiya.
Wapar wipaa Adoniyasa yuwamandari nllurtarangu anumandari nda waneerangiya, nduntam yuwawa ashku anoo ¿Mayaamshat shiy piy ashiksha? nda tárangiya. Adoniyas yuwamun Absalon nllurtarangu anumun iwaz nllurtarangiya. Zoonll wach ashiritam taarangiya.
Anshat, Adoniyas kurakaa Jowabaa Seruyarinee wip, misha apanllpanee urkar Abiyataraa kuruzurangitamta. Ashirangu, anoom tputs zapan istaranganaya.
Itaru, minootssha apanllpan urkar Sadoka, misha Benaniyas, Joyadarinee wipa, misha Apanllee kuk kamanimapantam sur Natána, misha Simeetstam, Dapiyarineetstam wamkuri, ashiru ashpa an tputs nda kuruzurangiya. Mishat yuwatamsin sundar kizpureew Dapiyash tachitarangana, antamsin nda Adoniyasash tachitaranganaya.
Anpurshat zar, Adoniyas shambatshisheem kapung wayarangiya. Yuwanung patumbich kapungumash Suhélet taarangu, kungshat sur Rokel kizpur wir shtungataru, annungiri shaniyaranganaya. Tputsee anush zapan kuruzurangu, anoom martamaam opeejaa, misha wakaraatstam yuwaa kapungoowa anoo zapan pacharangiya. Mishat, zoonlleetstam Dapiyarinee wip kuruzurangitamta. Mishat, Utaáchchee urkar yuwaa Dapiyaam ksutarangana anootstam kuruzurangitamta.
Itaru, Apanllee kuk kamanimapaneetssha Natána, misha Binaniyas, misha sundarootsitam Dapiyarineetsi ksutaru anootsitam, misha zoonllee Salomona nda kuruzurangiya.
Ashirucha, Natánsha mangush chinarangu, Betsabeypa Salomonpa wanir tsiyatarangiya. Mazinanlla; ¿Shiy yasarangish yuwaa Adoniyas kurakaam kinapi átu, zapan tsiyatssee zanganirangu anootsi? ¿Iyaana kurakarini Dapiy yasarangeeja?
Natu, nuw shiyaam tsiyatsis wanasir kamanchinllpa. Shaanaatsi taarashish, misha ipareetstamtish Salomonaa taárash tapachindamaam zandkeesha,
na mazinanlla; Dapiyap kurakap naayarush napashini. Anush kuseerush, Na kurakaa, mazinanlla. Shiy tsipakchush Salomonshapari iparish kurakaam kinachiya. Shiy kurakaam kinarangish ashtachtamtaya. Itaru, ¿tamaysha Adoniyassha kurakaam kinamaam chinaka? tángcha.
Ántarish anush nuwsha kuschima. Yuwaa tsiyatsis shiyaa kamachtakachi anoo nuwsha wanasirinaasha kurakaa kamanchima.
Betsabeyaa tárangu, Betsabeysha, yap Dapiyarini taaku amb pangatama átu naatarangiya. Anushsha kusarangu, Dapiyarini wachin taaru, kiz ksutamapan ksutatawu anush kusarangiya.
Betsabey kusarangu, kurakaa tasaseeru timuchta tsapumun char tuw ashirangiya. Anootssha kurak parangu, ¿Tamakatsha shiyaa? tárangiya.
Kizsha; Na mazinanlla; zurampatari Apanll waana yasaritamta. Shiy tsipakchush, anumun nuwsha ipari Salomon kurakaam kinachiya. Uwsha shiy kurakaam kinarangish ashtachiya.
Itaru, natsha in yuwaa Adoniyas zapan tsiyatssee zangan zangan ashirangu, anoo ¿antaati shiy kis kurakaa, mazinakish? Anoo nda shiy yasarangsha.
Ashirangu, wakaraa, misha opeejaatstam zapan pacharangiya, tputseem maritamaama. Ipareetstamtish kurakaa, kuruzurangtamta. Ashiritam apanllpanee urkar Apiyatara, misha kurakaatsitam sundaroo urkar Jowabaa kuruzurangiya. Itaru, Salomonaa, misha ichingarusin anshuchee tputs nda kuruzurangiya, yuwaatsinaasha shaanaatsi urutamari istampaneem taarangana anootsinaashta.
Watam, na in ichingarusin Israelchich tputs kutakanaya. Ashiri na shiyshat itsinsaru kamaningcha. Shiy chakaatsimasaja inpari kurakaam kinachiya, tákachsha, anootsimarisha kukoo payumaama.
Itaru, ndunnaa shiy wazareetsiri kamachtakush, shiy tsiparamchush, anumun ipareetsi Salomonaa, misha nuwaatstam yutaritshishpaneempaz ashiru iyaa pachachinllinaya.
Ashiriya, yuwash kiz kurakaa Dapiyarineetsi tsiyatku, ántaru anush Apanlleetssha kuk kamanimapan sur Natán tsiyatssee itsinsaru kamaniti átu kusarangiya.
Dapiyaam ksutamapan taakana anshat Natánaa parangu kurakaatsshat kamanirangiya. Anumun Natánshat Dapiyash pshtuyaru, tasaseeru, xiyeeru, timuchta tsapumun much tuw ashirangiya.
Anumunsha Dapiyarineetsi masharangiya. ¿Shiy kamachtarangish? ¿Adoniyas kurakaam kinachpa tárangish?
Kamapareeja na yuwash shaniyamaam wayarangu anush tputs zapan shaniykanaya. Anoomcha tputseem maritamaam Adoniyas wakaraa, misha opeejaatstam zapan pacharangiya. Anush kurakaa, ipartamtish ichingaru tputsee zapan tushaneeyaru, sundaroowaatstam urkar, misha apanllpaneetstam urkar Apiyataraam yáskiya. Ichingarusin katungkusin, waaktamsin, zamamtaranaya. Anushsha, tsiyatkusin, Waani urutamari kurakaam Adoniyas taachiya kizpuriya, ántaranaya.
Itaru, nda nuwaatsshat, mishat apanllpaneetstam urkar Sadokaa kuruzurangiya. Mishat, Binaniyasa Joyadaa wip, misha ipareetsish Salomonaa nduntam kuruzurangiya, Apanllee kuk kamanimapan Natán kurakaa Dapiyarinee kamanku tárangiya.
Mishat, ¿antaati shiy anoo kamachtarangish? Kurakaa, ¿mayaamshat nuw shiyaa kapung chinaktaati, itaru shiyshat anoo nda nuwaam kamanirangsha, yuwaa shiyash kurakaam zamuchu anootsee? tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Adoniyas kurakaam kinapi táyaru tputsee zapan tushaneerangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, Dapiyarini Betsabeyaa kuruzumaam muchchuree kamachtarangiya. Kuruzeeru, Betsabeysha kusarangu, kurakaa Dapiya tasaseeru, xiyeeramchu,
kuraksha tsiyatarangiya. Na zurampatari Apanllimun sur nuw shiyaa atashina. Apanll nuwaa uru tapachindarangu,
Israelchicheetstam kapung chinakiya. Ashiriya, yuwari nuw sirú shiyaa tárangi, anoo na zar tatsameenlliya. Iparini Salomon nuw tsiparamchuri, anumun uwshapari kurakaam kinachiya. Uwsha, ichingarooma tsapuranas Israelaa ksutku taachiya, nuw siyaa tárangina, tárangiya.
Betsabeysha anoo mazinarangu, timucheeru, tsapumun much tuw sheeru, Kurakaa Dapiyaa, shiyari kurakish urutamari taangcha, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Dapiyarini muchchuree kamachtarangiya tputsee yamamaama. Kurakaa Sadokaa, misha Apanllee kuk kamanimapanee Natána, misha Binaniyas Joyadaarini wipa. Aship an ichingarusin kurakash kusataranganaya.
Anootssha kamachtaku, Ichingarus naayarus, ksutangints. Nee Salomona ipareetsi macheerus, nuwamun kapaachuri tunuxinayarus, Guijónap machingints. Anoo ungirtakus wanasir imarchangtsa.
Ashkachus, apanllpanshat urkar Sadok, mishat apanllpantam Natán ashirusin Salomonaa wasina Israelchicheem urkar ipuseersin shambatkusin, opeejash wits puu puu táchinllinpa. Tákchusin anush, tputsshitisin tsiyatkusin, Waani kurak Salomon urutamari taachiya, atusin zapan zamangachinllinpa.
Ipareetsi imarchachtaranllus, kurakamun uxinash tunuxinangtsa, yuwamunari uru kurak kuxinku anumuna. Ashiriya, iparshiti uwsha kurakaam taachiya. Nee Israelaa tsapurunas ichingaroom ksutamaama, Utaáchcheetstam tputs ksutku taachiya, tárangiya.
Tárangu, anoo Benaniysha mazinarangu, Kurakaa, zuraktishcha. Apanll waana anoo kamachtaranginaariya, kizpurcha wanasiriya. Waani ambiri ashtachiya.
Shiyaa Apanll ksutarangu, ambitam Salomonaatssha ashtachiya. Ashkachu, shiyamand aranginasha kasiru tputsee ksutchiya, tárangiya.
Anumun apanllpanshat urkar Sadok, Apanllee kuk kamanimapanitam Natána, misha Binaniyas Joyadaarini wip, misha Keretewshuch, misha Peletshuch ashirusin, Salomonaa Dapiyamun kapaachurini tunuxinayarusin, Guijónap machiranganaya.
Anush apanllpan urkar Sadok, Apanllish pang' pshtuyaru, wakaraa wits yáyaru, wayungunpashat zaweeru, Salomonaa kurakaam ipusaranganaya. Yuwash ichingarusin tputs shaneerana anush wakaraa wits yarangusin, ichingarusin tputs zamangaranganaya. Waani Salomon urutamari kurak taachiya, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, anumun ushimun tachitarusin, tiruchkusin, tputs zapan zamangarangusin, tsapsha zpuzarangu, pátangamaam zandarangiya.
Adoniyas, mishat ichingarusin yuw tputs anush ashparitin shaneerana an waarangusin, misha katungam iwaparangusin, anush yuwaa yaktash zapan zamangarangana, anoo mazinaranganaya. Anushshat Jowabshat sundar urkar mazinarangu, uwshat tsiyatku, ¿Mayaamshtaja nish yaktash tputs zapan zamangakanaya? ántar ashirangiya.
Yuwash, sundar urkari ántaru anush; apanllpanshat Abiyatar wip, Jonatansha apanllpantam kusarangiya. Kusarangu, anoo Adoniyasaatssha: Pshtungi, Shiy kizpurtishcha wanasirish. Shiy uru tsiyatssee wanasirimshee yushindaksha, tárangiya.
Anushsha Jonatan Adoniyasaa kamanirangiya. Mazinantsa; nuw min tsiyatsis yushindarangina. Iyaana Kurakarini Dapiy na Salomonaa kurakaam ínarangiya.
Ashirucha, kurak Dapiy kamachtarangu, ichingarusin apanllpan urkar Sadok, mishat Apanllee kuk kamanimapanee Natán, mishat Binaniyas Joyadarini wipa, misha Keretewshuch, misha Peletshuch, ashpisin ipuneersin, Salomonaa kurakaam ínamaam Dapiyamun kapaachurini tunuxinayarusin, machiranganaya.
Apanllpantamsin ichingarusin apanllpan urkar Sadok, misha Apanllee kuk kamanimapan Natán ashirusin ngootsip machtayarusin, Guijónash Salomonaa kurakaam ínaranganaya. Sheersin, mang' kapung ksaranganaya. Ashirucha, anush yaseeksin, kapung zamangaranganaya. Anoocha siysa mazinarangatasa, yuwaa Salomonaa kurakaam ínarangusin, zamangarangana anootsiya, tárangiya.
Na in Salomon kurakaam kinarangu, wapar kurakamuna na uwsha ashiritam kizpur kuraka.
Ichingarusin Dapiyarineetsi sundar ksutarangana an Salomonaa ichingaritam ungirtaranganaya. ¡Waamari kizpur taachiya! Ashiriya, Apanllpari istarangiya. Aranginasha tchitangcha. Shiysha kurakaam kinarangush, ichingaroo tsapoo wanasir ksutangcha, táranganaya. Ántarusin anush Dapiyarinshitini kurak chiyzayaru, yuwash maaku anush pshtuyaru, maashimun kuxineeru, much tuw sheeru Apanllpa tsiyatarangiya.
Apaa, ¿shiy tamaru ashiksha? Shiy kizpurtishcha. Na in ichingaroo Israelchicheem tsapurunas ksutamaam shaana nuwachcheetstam ínarangsha. Na nuwsha kizpur wachinataati, kchipti parangina, tárangiya.
Yuwsha Adoniyas tputsee zapan kuruzeeru, tushaneerangu, ansha kapung puniranganaya. Ashparitssin chiyzartarangusin, tátat shitangat ashiranganaya. Yapirisha waana zandkana, ambeewarisha suwaranganaya.
Adoniyassha yuwaa zoonll Salomon kurakaam kinarangu, anoo puniku, Apanllipsha pang' tapishumchi, táyaranllu, naatarangiya.
Anootssha tputs pakeeru, Salomonaatssha kamanirangiya. Adoniyas shiyaa puniku, apanllpanishsha pang' pshtuyaru, yuwanung maacheetsi muchkana annung, Apanllee masharangu, Apaa, kurakareetsi shiyshat watsta pcharinllpa, tángcha nuwaa nda pachamaama, tárangiya.
Salomonshat Zurampatari nuw táchintspa. Ashiriya, pachamana pachacheezi ndambaree. Itaru, wandaya mantsiriya taaku, tsipamaam waritakiya. Itaru, nimunarisha wanasir taakchu anoo patatcheezi. Pakchiyam minumtiyam much kxucheeja, tárangiya.
Tárangu, Adoniyasaa yamamaam kamachtarangiya. Adoniyassha kuseeru, zoonllee tasaseeru, ungirtaku timuchta ashirangiya. Ashiriya, Salomonsha anuritam, Wanasircha. Ashiri pangipitamtish kanapungsi. Sheerush, ayamtaati pangishish shtunginllpa, tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Adoniyas kurakaam kinapi táyaru, itaru Salomonsha kurakaam kinarangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, Dapiyarini wipaa Salomonaa tsipash mutatanasha anush wanasir waneeru, kasarangiya.
Na, tsapuranas yuwamunari tspakatu anumunari ichingaru wanasir ksutkush taangcha. Mishat, wanasir taamaam kamanchinllpa. Wanasir taangcha. Shaanaatsi ksutangcha. Wanasiriri taamaam chinangcha.
Apanllee kamachtamarini tatsamoongcha; tatsamooru yuwaatsimari Apanll zandku anootsimari chinangcha. Yuwaatsitam Móysisarini Apanllee kamachtamarini yandarangu, anootsitam tatsamooru tuminungcha; payungcha. Ambinaariya ashkush, aranginasha wanasir tarawzurish naachiya. Yapitaa naakish ambitam wanasir shiyaa Apanll ksutchiya.
Mishat, yuwaa Apanll nuwaa kamanirangu, anoo shiyaa kamanchinllpa. Apanllsha nuwaa, Waanari shiyachich nuwaa kuki tuminkusin, nuwaa chínashpatari mangpatari chinaksin, ichingarusin wanasiri waanaatsi ksutkusin, wanasir taarash taaksin, nuwsha anoo kis napchina. Shiyachich Dapiyaa, urutamari ayamtaati kurakaam kinamaam waritachiya, nishuchee Israelchichee tsap ksutamaama, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya.
Mishat, shiy yasartamsha, yuwaa sirútama Jowab Seroyarini wip tputsee Israelchich wasundur urkar tsimbun pacharangiya. Iy wanasiritaa taaranguni, itaru uwsha Abneraa Nerarini wipa, misha Amasaataa Jeterarini wipa, ashpisin an tputsee pacharangiya; ursiree kapung tuchumurangiya. Ashirangu anoo, nuwaamsha xarash wayarangiya, yuwamand tputsee pacharangu anumanda.
Ashiri, natsha in shiyshat anoo tputs ysangcha. Anoo tputs shiysha tsipatspatari waneeyarush, ksangcha. Waani kiyung kachiyachpa.
Itaru, Basiriyaa Galaadshuchee tputs wanasir chinangcha. Shaanshu pangish yushindayarush, washunand ktungangtsa, watam an tputs yuwapur nuwaa zuwanllish Absalon kiyung yachamaam chinarangu anpur uwsha nuwaa tapachindaranguwa. Ashirucha, nuwsha shiyaa, anoo tputs chinangcha, atina.
Mishat, mangishish chinangcha. Nishuri shiyash tputs taariya sur Simi, Gueray wipa. Shiyshat anoo tputs tamarangpari átush mangishish chinangcha. Nuw apusap Maanayimap tsap naataranguri, uwsha nuwaa kapung kiyung yacharangiya. Nuw anush kungumun Ortagumun wing naatachuri, nuwaa chamayangarangu, pachamaam zandarangu, nuwshat Apanll waana partam pacharishpa; ksangandama, tárangina.
Ashirucha, nuwsha shiyaa atashina. Anoo tputsee niyrangcha. Chinarinllpa. Mangishish chinayarush, ¿tamacheezi anoo tputsi? tángcha. Anoo tputs pachamaam zandkinaareesha, wanasirpatari pcharintspa; kiyungutam yachayarush pchangcha, yuwamand nuwaa kiyung yacharanganda anumanda, Dapiyarini wipaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiyarini wipaa Salomonaa Móysisarineetsi wirkar tuminungcha tárangu anootsi.
Dapiyarini tsiparamchu, wansshutaritam watsapun mapuranganaya.
Dapiyarini kurakaam kinaru, Israelshucheem ichingaru washunand 40 masach ksutarangiya. Ichtaru Hebronash yakat 7 masach taarangiya. Anumunsha yakat Irusarinush 33 masach taarangiya.
Ashirangu, anumun iwaz wipsha Salomon kurakaam kinarangu, Dapiyarini tamarupa ksutarangiya uwshat ashiritam ksutarangiya. Kizpur kurakaam kinaru, zapan masach taarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Dapiyarini tsiparangu, wipsha kurakaam kinarangu anootsi.


































Salomon parawarinpat kizpur chinarangusin, Ijiptop tsap naayaru, parawarinee wip yamarangiya. Amb kizaa yamayashinu, waanpeetam Irusarinap, Dapiyarinshini yaktarini yushindarangiya. Anpur zar ndaturi kurakaam Salomonaam pang' iwaparsin, mishat Apanlleem pang' ndanturitam pangursin, mishat yakat Irusarinaatssha ndaturitam patumbichpa kámanamaam kayatarusin, pishtaruri anush kusarangiya.
Ashirucha, tputs anshuch ichingarusin, Apanllee ungirtamaam yapirisha zandkana ambeewarisha Apanlleem muchiranganaya. Yapsha mangutaritin apanllputsee tputs arapich ungirtakana, ambitam uwshtisin ungirtaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena, yuwaa Salomon parawarinee wip yamarangu anootsi.
Salomon Apanllee kizpur chinarangiya. Yuwaa wapar Apanllee kuk kamanirangu anoo tatsamooru payurangiya. Itaru, ashiritaa, Apanllee ungirtapi átu, maacheetsi muchimaam piyamsha machip wayarangiya.
Itaru, tputssha ichingarusin Gabawonap ungirtamaam kizpur chinaranganaya. Ashirucha, Salomonsha aranginasha Gabawonapsha ungirtapi tárangu, maacheetsi muchimaam minum mil wayarangiya.
Ashirangu, Salomon yuwash Gabawonash maaranllu, anush Apanllee pamasarangiya. Apanllsha Salomonaa, ¿Mayaa zandaksha? Yuwaa zandkish anoo mashangandama. Nuwsha panachinllpa, tárangiya.
Salomonsha tsiyatarangu, Shiy aparineetsi kizpur chinarangsha, shaanaatsi tputsirish. Ashirangush, shiyaa aparini wanasir chinarangu, zurampatari shiyaa kukish payurangiya. Tputsee taárash itsinsaru yasarangitamta. Ashiritam, tsiyatsseetstam wanasirpatari chinayaru, tsiyatarangiya. Wanasir shiy aparinipti chinarangsha. Ashiritam, natsha in shaantatam ipuseerush, nuwaa Israelchicheem kurak wayarangsha.
Ashiri, Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha. Yuwaa aparini ksutarangu, anoo nuwsha kurakaam kinaranguri ksutkina. Itaru, nuw naturitana kanungasiritana. Ashirucha, nda kaapa zapan chinashi taariya. ¿Tamareeja amb ashiruri, nuw tputsee wanasir ksuteechee?
Itaru, ashiritaati, anoo shaana nuwaa ksutamaam wayarangsha. Mishat, tputsitam zapan taaru, táchimaam pinasakiya.
Ashiriya, shiy Apaa, nuwaam yasasheemi kizpur wanasirimash panangandama. Ashkachinaareesha, nuwshat tputsireetsish wanasir ksutachshaparina. Ndushapari yutaritshishish pshtuchina; itsinsampatarishapa shiyaa chinachina. Apaa, ¿tamamaja tputs nee shiyaa tputsirish ashpa in zapanee ksutach? Wanindaja, tárangiya.
Tárangu, anoo Apanllsha: ¿Shiy tamaru chinaksha? Yuwaa nuwaana chinarangi anoo tatsamooru shiysha masharangsha, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, shiy nda nuwaa taarasheemish, misha kurikpaneemtam kinamaam, misha kundarareetstamtish ashpari tpachingamaam nda masharangsha. Itaru, chinasheemamtish masharangsha. ¿Tamayareezi nee ashpa tputsireetsish ksuteechi? átush anoomam nuwaa masharangsha.
Zuraktishcha. Ashiriya, nuwshat yuwaa mashkish anoo mangeemish kapung panachinllpa. Sirútama tputs nda minumtiyam ashim taarangu, nimun nduntam tputs ashim taachiya. Shiyamari mangish kapung taachsha.
Mishat, na yuwaatssha shiy nda masharangish anootssha istachinllpa. Na nimun taarashish kapungpari taachsha. Shiyamun tputs arangeem kurak taacheeja.
Ashiriya, shiysha nuwaa kuki tatsamoongcha. ¿Aparinish tamaru chinaranga? shiysha ashiritam chinangcha. Ashkinaareesha, nuwsha shiyaam urutamari taamaam wayachinlla, Apanll Salomonaa tárangiya.
Apanll ántaru anush Salomon támarangiya. Támarangu, mangush chinaku, Apanlleetsti pamaseenlli, tárangu, anuritam chiyzarangu, yakat Irusarinap naatarangiya. Anushsha kuseeru, Apanllip kajonarini naatarangu, mangoom yaramaam opeejaa wayayaru, Apanlleem muchirangiya. Anumunsha, katungtseetsitam wayayarusin, ichingarusin tiptsirpat washunandari katungaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Salomon Apanllee chínash kapungumaam masharangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, kurak Salomon pangush taarangu, amb kiz tsimbun yutaritshishpan naataranganaya. Anushsha, kurakash kuseersin, kurakaa tasaseersin tsiyataranganaya.
Minumma kiz tsiyatku; Na kurakaa, mazinanlla. Niptamari kizapa tsimbunandani minumtash pangus taakaniya. Anushshat, nuwsha ipareetsi iparinarangina.
Iparinaramchuri, anumun tuchip zar tushiyramchu anush, insha kiz iparinarangitamta. Min tputs nllitari anush wanindamunaja; yaanitari kizanandani taaranganiya.
Ashiriya, anushsha psaan maaranguni, insha kiz wipaa kanaxarangu, wipsha tsiparangiya.
Ashirangu, yuwash maari anush nuwaatssha ipareetsi yamayaru, wanshusha wiram wayarangiya. Sheeru, waanaatsisha wip tsiparee yamayashinu, nuwashsha kirimi wayarangiya.
Nuwshat psaan tameeruri, ipareetsi tumimtapi turi, pachipkuri, nllursha tsipar kachiz patatarangina. Itaru, ¿tamayashtaja tsipaya? Na taraseechu pangpi, táranguri, taraseetssha napkuri, waj nllur nllitarisha parangina, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, waanpatatin natsatstangat ashirangsin, minsha kiz, In nllur kchita an nuwcha ipari, tárangu, minsha kiz, Nduni. Yuw nllur kchita an nuwcha iparina. Yuw nllur tsipari an shiycha iparish, waanpatatin kizaptatin ákaktangat ashiranganaya. Amb tárangusin, kurak paru, kiz waanpatatin natsatstangat ashiranganaya.
Ashiriya, kuraksha anoo mazinarangu, mangush chinarangiya. In kiz yuw tána an ¿tamamaja itsinsampatari át? Watam min tsiyatku, In kchitaa an nuwcha ipari, atiya. Mishat, tsiyatku, Dancha. Kaapa nuwaanacha ipari, atiya.
Anoo kuraksha mangush chinarangu, sundaroo; Natu, mchit yashini, tárangu, sundarsha anuritam mchitaa yáyaru, kurakash xiyarangiya. Kuraksha sundaroo:
Natu, nee nlluraa putayarush, apusash taarayarush, minoom kiz panaku, minoom panaku shingi, tárangiya.
Yuwaa kurak táyachu, anoo nllursha wanir mazinarangu, kapung punirangiya. Tanuku, kurakaatssha: Kurakaa, watsta. Nlluraa pchamanaa pcharinllpa. Waani kiz nlluraa waamatari yamachpa, tárangiya. Itaru, minsha kiz: Nduni. Kurakaa, sundar pachakchinaariya, ashiriya iyshat tsimbunartini iparini ndunar taachiniya, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, kuraksha anoo mazinarangu, sundaroo: Watsta pcharinllpa. Neemanaa kizaam minoom panangi. In nllur wanir zurampatari watanacha; tuwanpungi wanireema, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Salomon mangpatari tsiyatarangu, Israelchich tputs ichingarusin mazinarangusin, ¿Tamaru kurak chinaka? ¿Apanllpari mangoom kapung panarangu, ashiru chinakiya? táranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena, yuwaa Salomon mang' kapung taarangu anootsi.


































Ashiriya, yuwaa Salomon kurakaam kinarangu, anootssha kurak Irám mazinarangu, kizpur mang' ksarangiya. Watam sirútama Dapiyarinpatini kizpur chinaranganawa. Tiptsiree wanasir tsiyatamaam zanganirangiya.
Ashirucha, kurak Salomon tsiyatssee wasundururish kurakaam Irámaam zanganirangitamta.
Ashiriya, shiy yasarangitamsha yuwaa aparini pangusee Apanlleem ungirtamaam nda pangurangu anootsi. Watam anpur tapazeem kapung xiyranganawa. Itaru, natsha Apanll kundarareetsini ashpari kachingeeru kasarangiya.
Ashirangu, Apanll iyaam kizpur wanasir taamaam wayarangiya. Natunaa iy kundararini, misha yuw kiyung kachiytarini anutam izuuru ndunarshacha; kissha taakaniya.
Ashirucha, na nuwsha, Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chinakina. Sirútama Apanll aparineetsi kamanku tárangu, Shiy tsipakchush, iparish Israelchicheem kurak kinachiya. Anshapari yuwash nuwaanaatsi ungirtachinllina anoom panguchinllinaya, Apanll tárangiya. Ashirucha, anuritam tuminpi aturi, pangumaam zandkina.
Ashiriya, Shiysha, tputsireetsish karipan katspamaam kamachtangcha. Nuwsha tputsireetsi istamaam zanganchitamma. ¿Ashiriya, wanipamasaja tputsirish tarawaztakchinllina, anumand tuwapamaam zandaksha? Nuwsha anuritam tuwapachinllpa. Watam shiy iyaa yasaksha; iysha karipanaa ipusamaam nda yasaraniya. Tputs Sidonshuch karipanaa ipuskana, ashimaam pinasakaniya, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, anootsshat kurak Irám mazinarangu, kizpur mang' ksarangiya. Apanllpa tsiyatarangiya; Apaa, ¿tamaru shiy ashiksha? ¡Dapiyarineemi wip Salomonaam kapung mangoom panarangsha! Ashirucha, na uwsha wanasir tiptsiree ksutkiya, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Irámsha tsiyatssee zanganirangtamta. Nuw yuwaa kamachtarangish anoo kis mazinarangina. Ashiri anoo tatsamchima. Karipan, misha pinootstam katspayaruni zanganchinllpa.
Nuwaanpata tputsiri nimand karipanaa payutuni, marap wayayaruni, warsaam tinayaruni, yuwashumasaja wayangi tákatsha, anshurisha wayayruni, warsaa tapureeruni, kasachinipa. Shiysha anumand sundarureetsish karipanaa yamaam kamachtangcha. Itaru, shiysha nuwaa kuki payungtamcha. Nuwaam katungtsiptamari tputsireemi istangandama, tárangiya Iráma.
Ashiriya, yuwaa Salomon zandarangu anoo kurak Irám ichingaru panarangiya.
Anumunsha, Irámaam katungtsee zapan zanganirangiya. 4'400,000 mil litor tirikoo tatsitarangiya. Mishat, 4,400 litor olivoo wayungun tatsitarangitamta. Aship sheeru, washunand zanganirangiya. Ichingaru masach ashpatam zanganta, yusur ashpatam zanganta ashtariya.
Apanll sirútama kurakaam mangoom kapung panachima tárangu anuritam Salomonaam chínasheem kapung panarangiya. Ashirangu, Salomon kurak Irámpat wanasir tsiyatarangsin, kizpur chinaranganaya. Tsiyatsis ndunar mapiyrsin taaranganaya.
Ashiriya, Salomon wanshu watsapun tputs tarawzupaneem, ichingaru 30 mil washunand tushaneerangiya. Ashirangu, ichingaroo tputs Israelchichee tarawaztamaam kamachtarangiya.
Ashirangu, tputsee 10 mil ichtarima minumtam tsup tarawzupaneem wayarangiya. Ashiriya, minum tsup tatsamkachu, anush yusur misha ashpatam kustaranaya. Amb ashkusin, yuw ichtaru tarawaztarangu, an pangusshurisha kanuskusin, tsimbun tsup tsindasari taataranaya. Anootssha tarawzupaneem urkar tputsee ksutamaam Adoniramaa wayarangiya.
Anumunsha, Salomon kumpaneem ichingaru 70 mil wayarangiya. Mishat, patumbchee kchampaneemsha machip 80 mil tputsee wayarangitamta.
Anumunsha iwaz tarawzupansha urkar 3,300 taarangitamta.
Ashirangu, Salomon Apanlleem pang' pangumaam, patumbchee kapungoowa arap waritaku anumashee, misha patumbich wanasir tamikuktamawa anootsitam yamaam wasundururee kamachtarangiya.
Ashirucha, kurak Salomon, misha kurak Irám, misha anshuchiritam tputs Guebala, ashpisin an wasundurur Apanlleem pang' pangumaam, karipanaa misha patumbcheetstam wanasir tamikuktayarusin, ichingaru maachi iwapayarusin xanataranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena, yuwaa Salomon kurak Irámpat kizpur chinarangana anootsi.
Ashiriya, Salomon ipunpunar masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, anush Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chtarangiya, masach kaneeschishurita, tsupsha tsimbunarinishi. Yuwamun Israelchich Ijiptosh tsap shitungarangana, anumun 480 masach tushiyramchu, anush chtarangiya.
Anush Salomon Apanlleem pang' pangumaam táchirangiya; wazuranirini 27 metro, wamanirinsha 9 metro, íwaririnsha 13 metro anumun chawap táchirangiya.
Sheeru, wachushsha shaniyshisheem táchirangiya, wazuranirini 9 metro. Watam pang' nuevitam metro taaranguwa. Wachoomsha yapiri pangus tásingaru ambiri zánganarini 4 metro anumun chawap wayarangiya.
Anumunsha, Salomon pangusee watandaramaa 'sineemaamsha kzupirangitamta. Anootssha yuwapa tsingarutaru anpa wanasir kámanarangiya.
Panguseetssha, ashchiri turipingaru, patumbichpa kámanarangitamta. Sheeru, pangusish wach watandaramanung zangamich kararu, naamaam waritaru, ichingaru watandaram wayarangiya. Annungiri wchoo pakcheew tandapunut, tandapunut ashirangiya.
Anootssha, táchirangiya; 2 metro anumun chawpi wamanirini. Sheeru, tsimbunarnisha písurini 3 metro táchirangiya. Anumunsha, tuchparinisha písurini 3 metro anumun chawpitam táchirangiya. Amb ashirangu, yuwaa wach zángan táchirangana anoo pakich itsipasarangiya. Yuw unambtarangana an nda ichipamaama atusin, wanasir táchiranganaya.
Ashirangsin, Apanlleem pang' pangumaam arap patumbchee wanasir tamangeechusin, anpasha wayayarusin, wanasir kayataranganaya. Nda minumtiyam anush martichpa, misha ngusambpa tarawaztaksin, nda tamundaranganaya. Izuuru zaputaru wanasiriri panguranganaya.
Tsapushchish yuwanungiri wachoom wayarangu, annungiri mbutsanungach watandaram minumamari káringashish wayarangiya, tsimbunamari písurini íwar kárimaama. Ansha, káringashish minum ngusamb tuxirangusin, anumun iturpipit iturpipit sheeru, íwar kárimaam ashirangiya.
Anoo, Salomon Apanlleem pang' tsapush iwaparamchu, unambeemsha yasina yáyaru, anumun wanasir maachi tina, tina, tina sheeru, kizpur wanasiri anpa ichingaru Apanlleem pang' unambtarangiya.
Sheeru, tandapunuzimunsha táwarpa íwaririni 2 metro anumun chawpi ashchiri taturpiru tapatstarangiya. Sheersin, ichingaru wanasir karipanpat yuwamunari patumbich kayatama anumunari unambtaranganaya.
Ashirangu, anoo Apanllsha parangu, Salomonaa tsiyatarangiya.
Salomonaa, wanari shiy nuwaa kuki payukush, wanasir taakush, itsinsaru nuwaa chinakush, yuwaatsiritam nuw yandarangi anootsimaritam tatsamooru tuminkush, nuwsha shiyaam tatsamchitamana, yuwaa sirútama shiyapa aparinish tsiyatarangi anootsi.
Nuwaa kuki payukinaareesha, nuwsha urutamaripa Israelchicheem tputs taachina. Ayamtaati nee pangusee kasacheezi, Apanll tárangiya.
Salomon Apanlleem pang' pangoom ichingaru iwaparangiya.
Ashirangu, wachush waantsush ichingaru táwarpatari watandaramaa tapatstarangiya. Sheeru, písumunsha táwar wanasirimshipa, yasin sur pino anpat ashchiri wanasir tapatstarangiya.
Sheeru, anumunsha íwaritam, misha tsapushutam ichingaru wanasir táwar karipanpa tapatstarangiya. Anootssha íwaririni 9 metro táchirangiya. Wachoomsha Apanlleemamari taarash wayarangiya.
Ashiriya, yuwaa Apanlleemamari pang' wayarangu, anpatari tasasaru kararu, anoo wazuranirini 18 metro táchirangiya.
Anootssha ashchiri táwarpa wanasir tapatstarangiya. Sheeru, anumunsha chaputam, misha wanusitam wanasireew tinarangiya. Ashirangu, Apanllish pang' wantsush ichingaru karipanpatanandari tapatstarangiya. Ashchiri patumbichpa kámanarangu, pamaam pinasarangiya.
Ashirangu, kurak Salomon yuwash Apanllee wizpuririni kajon tinamaa wayachinllina, anoom ichingaru kizpur wanasir iwapayaru kasarangiya.
Yuwaatssha, Apanlleemamari taarash wayarangu, anootsshat wantsush táchirangiya. Wazuraniri 9 metro, wamanirinsha 9 metrotamta, íwarinsha 9 metrotam wayarangiya. Sheeru, anpatartatam tasasaru, maachi muchimaam Salomon karipan tinayaru, anumun ur matsit tapatstaranganaya.
Sheeru, yuwashsha Apanlleem taarash wayarangana, anushsha wantsush ichingaru orpa matsitpatatam tapatstarangiya. Anumunsha, wachunungsha ur kateen tamapari ashiru anpa katindingeeru kasarangiya.
Amb ashirangu, ichingaru Apanllee pang' orpatanandari tapatstarangiya. Mishat, yuwaatsitam kzammashee Apanlleem muchimaam, Apanllpatari taárash tasasaru wayarangu anootsitam ashchiri orpatatam matsitpat tapatstarangiya.
Anumunshat, yuwanung Apanlleem taárash wayarangana, annungiri wachunung yasinpat sur oliv tsimbun tputs tamapari ashiru tinayarusin, wazitpungach wanindaw wayarangiya. Ansha wazuranirini 4 metro anumun chawpi taarangiya.
Wazitpungachsha minnungicheewari 2 metro anumun chawap wayarangiya. Ashirucha, tsimbunarisha wazitpungach wazuranirini 4 metro anumun chawpi wayarangiya.
Wazuranirinsha, ashchinandari 4 metro anumun chawpi taarangiya. Tsimbunari wanasiririni ashimatam, misha ashimatam ashiru tinaranganaya.
Wazuranirinsha, ashchinandari tsimbunari 5 metro tácheersin wayaranganaya.
Anootssha Salomon Apanlleem taarash wayarangu, annungiri shitungash tsimbunari wazitpungach imangakaru wayarangiya. Tsimbunartisin, minnungicheew wazitpungach íwar tandapunuzimun tuw ashirangiya. Minungichichsha wazitpungchiptatari tuw ashiru wayarangiya. Waanpatatin apusshuri wazitpungich tuw ashirangiya.
Sheeru, anumunshat Salomon ashchiri orpasha tsimbunarta wanasir tapatstarangiya.
Apanllimunsha pang' iwaz tandapunuzimun, misha wachushutam tputs ashiru wazitpungach imangakaru zapan tinarangiya. Mishat, chaputam, misha kuyani tamapari ashiritam zapan maachi wanasireew anush tinarangiya.
Anumunsha, Apanllish pang' wantsush yuwamun katkich anshutam ichingaru orpatanandari matsitpat wanasir tapatstarangiya.
Sheeru, Apanlleem taarash wayarangu, anoomsha wachoom shtandashini táwar olivaa wanasir tstsayarusin, tápaam shtandamaam kasarangiya. Itaru, wachoomsha yasinaa zameetpat wayarangiya.
Anumunsha, wachumun shtandashini yasin olivaa tsimbun wamaneew tinarangiya. Sheeru, anumunsha tápamun tsimbun tputs wazitpungach wanindaw tinarangu, misha kuyanitam, misha chaputam wanasireew zapan tinarangiya. Anootssha ashpari orpatanandari wanasir tapatstarangiya.
Apusanandsha, yuwaa shaniyshisheem kapung kureeru wayarangu, anoomsha wachoom zangan yasin olivpat wayarangiya. Wachoom zánganarini ashtam, íwarinsha ashtam, sheeru wanasir tácheeru wayarangiya.
Anoomsha, shtandamaam yasin pino, anoo tápaam tsimbun tinaranganaya. Sheersin, wachoom wanasir tstsayarusin, apusashsha tawatamaam wayarangiya.
Tápamunsha, tsimbun tputs tamapari ashiru wazitpungach imangakaru, misha kuyanitam, misha chaputam kizpur wanasireew tinarangiya. Sheeru, anootssha orpasha matsitpat wanasir tapatstayaru kasarangiya.
Wachushsha, yuwash Apanlleem ungirtamaam wayarangana anootsshat, apusanand patumbichpa tuchip shurangarangu, anumunshat karipanpa tushuweeranganaya. Amb sheersin, iwaparanganaya.
Salomon, yuwash ipunpunar masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, tsupsha tsimbunarinishi anush Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chtarangiya.
Anoo, pangusee yuwashsha 11 masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, tsupshat 8 anush izuuru pangusee iwaparangiya. Ashirangu anoo, Apanlleem pang' panguchima tárangu, anoo ichingaru tatsamooru iwaparangiya. Ashirucha, washunand 7 masach pangusee iwaparanganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena, yuwaa Salomon Apanlleem pang' pangurangu anootsi.



















































Ashiriya, Salomon Irusarinshuchee wachinanur kurakawaa, Israelchichee maachirit ichingaroo tushaneerangiya. Apanllee wizpuririni kajonee, yuwaa tsap Siyonash Dapiyarinshini watsapun taarangu, anoo yáyarusin, Irusarinapsha Apanllish pang' wayamaama.
Ashirangsin, minum zar shambatshisheem Apanlleem ungirtamaam wayaranganaya. Tsupsha 7 anush zar ichingarusin Israelchich, washunand kurak Salomon shaniyaranganaya.
Anush, ichingarusin Israelshuch wachinanur kusaranganaya. Apanllpansha urkar kajonee tinamaa kuranganaya.
Sheersin, anoo Apanllipsha pang' wayamaam yátaranganaya. Ashirangsin, apanllpan urkar Leviyarinchich yuwaa maachi anush Apanlleem kizpur wanasireew wayarangana anoo ashpari yátaranganaya.
Yuwaa, kajonee yáyashinusin kukutanana, anootssha kurak Salomon Apanllee ungirtamaam, ichingaroo Israelchichee tushaneerangu, opeejaa misha wakaraatsitam zapaniri Apanlleem ungirtamaam wayayarusin muchiranganaya.
Ashirangsin, apanllpan urkar kajonee, Apanllishsha pang' yapshturanganaya. Anushsha yuwanung Apanlleem taarash wayarangana, annungiri tsimbun tputs ashiru wazitpungach imangakaru anush apusash wayaranganaya.
Ansha, yasinpatari yuw kajonee kumaam kamtarangana, anoo ashchiri wazitpungachpa kámanarangiya. Watam wazitpungach kizpur wazuraneew imangakaruwa.
Itaru, yasinsha kumaam kizpur wazuraneew wayarangusin, yuwaatsimari pshkurutaru anoo apanllpan urkar pamaam waritarangiya. Itaru, tputsshat yuw shaneerana anshitisin pamaam pinasarangana. Yapiri wayarangana mang ambiri ashiru kasaranganaya.
Anushsha, kajonish tsimbunandari patumbich táwar ashiru pshtaranaya. Yuwamari Móysisarini Apanlleem tsap Orebash machip tuyandarangu, Israelchichee Apanll kizpur chinarangu, Ijiptosh tsap tashitungayaru waanaatsisha kukoo payumaam yandarangu, anumari kajonish taarangiya.
Ashiriya, apanllpan urkar kajonee Apanllinung taarash wayayarusin, yuwash shitungachinllina anush, Apanllsha wizpur msas tamapari ashiru pangusish tatsitarangiya.
Ashirucha, apanllpansha urkar Apanllee ungirtamaam pinasarangiya. Watam Apanll wizpur msas ashiru, ashchiri pangusish tatsitaranguwa. Ashiriya, na kamaneena, yuwaa kajonee yáyashinusin Apanllinung taárash wayarangana anootsi.
Ashiriya, Salomon Apanllee; Shiy Apaa, sirú tapishpaz taakuri ashkina, tárangsha.
Itaru, Apaa, natsha nuw shiyaam pangeemish pangurangina. Na nish shiyaam pangeemish pangurangi anushsha 'sinishsha taangcha. Urutamari, Apaa, ichingaru zar anush taachsha, tárangiya.
Apanllee tárangu, anumun Salomon yusur chiyzayaru, tputsee ichingaru Israelchichee tasaseeru, tputseemsha masharangiya.
¿Tamaru Apaa, shiy ashiksha? ¿Shiy Israelchichee tputs kizpur chinaksha? Shiy aparinipti tsiyatarangush, na in tatsamooksha. Aparineetsi tárangish.
Sirútama nuwaa tputsiri Israelchichee Ijiptosh tsap yushuranguri, nuwaam taarasheemi ndunarimuna. Yaktareem uru taamaam nduntam ipusarangina. ¿Yapeeja nuw Israelchichish taachi? tárangitaati, pangi ndunimasa. Itaru, zapish nuw shiyaa, Dapiyaa tputsireetsi ishinamaam ipusarangina. Shiysha Dapiyaa, nuwaam pangeemi pangumaam kis chinarangsha, Apanll aparineetsi tárangiya.
Ashirucha, aparini Apanlleem pang' pangumaam zandarangitaa, itaru yuwash Israelchich ichingarusin ungirtachinllina, anoom pinasarangiya.
Apanllsha, aparneetsi tsiyatarangu, Pangeemi pangumaam chinakish, an kizpurcha wanasiriya.
Itaru, shiynaa nuwaam pangeemi pangucheezish ndambaree. Itaru, shiypari iparish nuwaam panguchiya, tárangiya.
Ashirucha, yuwaa Apanll tárangu anoo na tatsamoorangiya. Na nuwsha Israelchicheem kurakaam kinaranguri, aparinishi zamuranguri, Apanlleem pang' pangurangina.
Ashiranguri, kajoneemtam wayamaam yararanguri, na kajonee anush wayarangina. Yuwaa Apanll sirútama zitaminarneetsi kizpur chinarangu, Ijiptosh tsap tapachindarangu, anootsi, Salomon tárangiya.
