Ashiriya, anushsha Elisew kusarangu, pangush pshtuyaru, napku, maashimun nllur tsipar tuwinatam tamuru parangiya.
Ashiriya, anushsha waanitari pshtuyaru, wachoo mbamari shtandarangiya. Sheeru, anush Apanllpa tsiyatarangiya.
Ashirangu anumun, maashimun kárirangiya, yuwamun nllur tsipar tamuru anumuna. Nlluraa tsipari pachipurangu, kuk kukpatartatam tuw sheeru, wachsha wachpatataritam kandaneeru, uwshat uwpatataritam kandaneeru, wanootssha wanutspatartatam kandaneeru pachipurangiya. Ashirangu anush, musásiritam nllur wanuts ashchiri ksanitaraa ashirangiya.
Ashiriya, Elisewsha chiyzayaru, anshuri tandapunuzish naanat ashishtar ashirangiya. Sheeru, yusur nlluramun ambitam ashiru pachipurangiya. Sheeru, anumun tuchparinshtini yusur nlluramun ambitam sheeru pachipurangiya. Ashirangu, anumun musásiri nllur ksheendarangiya. Arangich tsimbun kuwiz matayaru ksheendarangiya. Ashkachu anush, musásiri nllur wach naparangiya.
Elisewsha muchchuree Guehasiya tsiyatarangiya. Na mikeerush nllur wanir kuruzungi, tárangiya. Guehasiysha anuritam kuruzurangiya. Ashiriya, nllur wanir kusarangiya. Kizaatssha, Neewa, iparish támeenlliya, tárangiya.
Kizsha anoo wipaa parangu, Elisewash watsish tutunlltayaru, ungirtarangiya. Sheeranllu, wipaa yamayaranllu, yusur anoo pangusee shitungeeru, mang' kizpur ksarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Elisew nlluraa tsiparee ituyamarangu anootsi.







Ashiriya, Naaman sundar urkar Síriyash tsap taarangiya. Síriyshuch kurak Naamanaa kizpur chinatariya. Watam Naamanpat wizpuririni Apanll waana istarangu, anoo tsapoo Síriya waamatarishtisin watsapun yaranganawa. Itaru, ansha sundar urkar wanguyamuna. Tsutashish tsutarangiya, yuwamash tas tutungataru anumashi.
Ashiriya, yuwash Israelchichpa tsiyantarangusin, zapan xiyrangana, anush Naaman kizaa nllura putayaru, yamayaru, wizanlleem muchchuri wayarangiya.
Ansha nllur Naamanaa wizanlli, Zaranlleetsish kamaningi. Waani naayaru, yap Apanllee kuk kamanipan yakat Samariyash taaru, amb naakchu, wánguyar yarat, tárangiya. Kizsha wazaranllee kamanirangu,
Naamansha anoo mazinarangu, Síriyashchee kurak kamanirangiya.
Kuraksha Síriyshuch uwsha, Wanasircha. Na, napashini. Nuw kirak yandayaruri, Israelchicheem kurak zanganchima. Ashkachuri, waritachparee, tárangiya. Anootssha Naaman mazinarangu, pangup naatarangiya. Anush kuseeru, kurikee mbammash 30 mil mburshimashi yarangiya. Sheeru, anumunsha 6 mil kurik mbammash oroo yarangiya. Anumunsha 10 wámaree yarangiya.
Sheeru, kurakapsha Israelchichip kirakaa yandama yáyaranllu, naatarangiya. Anushsha kirakash yandamash tsiyatsis taarangiya. Nee kiraka yakchush, natstangcha; anush pangatsha. Naaman sundar urkar zanganchinllpa. Shiysha anoo yarangcha wánguyareetsi, tárangiya.
Anootssha kurak Israelchich kirakaa yáyaru natstarangiya. Natstayaru, uwsha kizpur mang' mantsaku, wamaree putayaru, izichirangiya. Anushsha tsiyatku, tárangiya. ¿Antaati nuw Apanlleezi? Apanllcha tputseem taárash panatarasha. Mishat, taárashee itutsimaam yasaritamta. ¿Antaati nuw Apanllinawa, nuwaam amb táyarush yandapich? ¿Nuw anoo wanguyaa yarcheena ashiru? tárangiya. Na mangishis chinantsa. In kurak nuwaa tuxaramaam zandkiya, tárangiya.
Elisewsha yuwaa kurak wamaree izichirangu, anoo mazinarangu, tsiyatssee zanganirangiya. ¿Mayaamsha wamaree izichka? Waani Naaman ningeem naanpa, nuwangaz pakatu. Nuwash kuskachu, nuwsha yarchima. Ashkachuri, Naamansha, Zuraktishcha. Israelush Apanllee kuk kamanipani taarcha, táchiya, tárangiya.
Naaman anoo mazinarangu, kapaachush pshiyrshini zaruyaru, naayaranllu, Elisewash kuseeru, pangusinung wach xiyarangiya.
Itaru, Elisewsha tiptsiree tsiyatssee kamanimaam zanganirangiya. Napanlla. Apanllee kuk kamanipan ateeja. Ortagup kung naayaru, anush arangich kuwiz tsimbun matayaru chumachpa. Ashkachu, uru wanguyarini mikeeru yarchiya, átcha, tárangiya.
Naamansha anoo mazinarangu, kapung tsiyantarangiya. Kanapeeranllu anush tsiyatarangiya. Nuw mangishi chinaranguri, táranginatana. Kurak shitungeeru, ¿Tamarimta? táyaru, nuwanung xiyeeru, nuwaa tasaseeru, nuwaa patateeru, Apanllpa mashkachu, Apanllsha nuwaa yarchiya, táranginatana, tárangiya.
¿Antaati in kung' Damáskooja? misha kung Abanaja, misha kung Farfaraja, ¿antaati in kung anooja? Ancha kung' kizpur wanasiriya. Ichingarooma Israelshuchee kasiriya. ¿Nuw tamareeja amb ashtachi? ¿Antaati ashkachuri, anush wanguyari yarcheeja? amb tárangu, kapung tsiyantarangu, kasayaru, wapitam kanapurangiya.
Itaru, apussha naantachusin, Naamansha muchchur, Naamanaa, Mazinanlla. ¿Antaati Apanllee kuk kamanipan shiyaa yutaritaja tsiyatarang? Nduni. Wánariya mbamanaaree kamachtarangu, ¿ndunnaarshaparee kukoo payurangsha? Ashiriya, mangish itsinsaru chinangcha. Shiy naayarush, kungush chumangi. Ashkachush, uru nutsish wanasiritsha, tárangiya.
Kuraksha Naaman anoo mazinarangu, Ashiriya, waritachpari. Zuraktishcha, tárangu, Elisewaa kuk payurangu, arangtach tsimbun kuwiz matayaru kung Ortagush chumarangiya. Ashiriya, chumarangu, wánguyar yararangiya. Yusur wanuts ashchiri wanasireerangiya, nllur wanuts tamapari ashirangiya.
Ashiriya, Naamansha anoo parangu, Elisewap tsiyatamaam wipunashpa naataranganaya. Ashiriya, anush kusarangsin, Naaman tsiyatarangiya. Na in nuw mangi kizpur kisa, watam minup tsap minumtiyam Apanllee kuk kamanipan kizpur wanindaja. Israelshumari kizpur taariya. Ashiriya, na nuw shiyaam maachee panachinllpa, yuwamand shiy nuwaa yararangish anumanda. Nuw shiyaa tputsirtana, tárangiya.
Itaru, Elisewsha, Nduni. Zurampatari Apanll waana paritam, yuwaa átish anoo ayu tácheezi, ndambari, tárangiya. Itaru, kuraksha Naaman, Ashiritaa, Neewa, yángi, Elisewaa tárangiya. Elisewsha ashiritaa ngatarangiya.
Ashiriya, sundarsha urkar Naaman, Ashiriya, na ayu tángandama. Nuw kapaachumun ush tsapureetsish pakich nuwaanpee yachima, watam na nimandari shaana nuwaa paritamtish, yusur apanllputsee chinacheezi. Ayamtaati yusur apanllputsee ungirtacheezi. Minumtaatsiri Apanlleetsimari Taarashipanee ungirtachima, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, minumari shiy nuwaa istangandama, Apanll nuwaa yutaritshishiri tachingamaama. Nimand naakchuri, nuwaa kurakarshiti, apanllputsip Rimonash pang' ungirtayani, tákchu, nuwamun uw putayaru, apanllputsinung tutunlltayaruni, tsimbunarishtini ungirtakchiniya. Ashkachi anoom, nuwaam Apanllpat tsiyatangandama, anoo Apanll tachingamaama, tárangiya.
Elisewsha, Waritariya. Mapiyrush naatacha, tárangiya. Naamansha anuritam mapiysha naatarangiya.
Ashiriya, Naaman naayaranllu, arapsha naanakchu, anoo Elisew muchchur Guehasiy mangush chinayaru, ¿Tamashtaja nuw kurakari Elisew kurikee ngatarang? Ashiriya, nuwnaa tachiteeruri, kamateeruri, mashatama. ¿Nduneeja nuwaam panachinda? tárangiya.
Tárangu, Guehasiy mikeeru yap Naaman naayaranllu, amb tachitarangiya. Ansha kurak uship napku, Elisewaa muchchur parangu, kapaachush pshiyrshini karuwarangiya. Karuweeru, masharangiya. ¿Maya k'kuz yutarit taaru naatatsha? tárangiya.
Guehasiysha, Mangutariti pakaturi kusarangina, tárangiya. Itaru, nuwaa kurakari zanganirangiya shiyaa kamanimaama. Apanllee kuk kamanipan tsimbun kanungaseew tsap Efrayinamand káyashinusin, kusataranganaya. Ashiriya, shiy kurikee nuwaam panamaam waritakcha, tárangiya. Nuwaam panangandama. Tuchip mil kurik mbammash panangandama; anumunsha tsimbunatam kamarish panangandama, tárangiya.
Naamansha kurak anoo mazinarangu, Zuraktishcha. Ashiriya, neewa. Shiyaam kurik panachinllpa. Aranginashta 6 mil kurik mbammash panachinllpa. Ngatinllpa, tárangiya. Táyaru, kurikeetstam, misha wamareetstam pursash tsimbunari pshtayaru, panarangiya. Ashirangu, tsimbun muchchur Guehasiyash ipunamaam zanganirangiya. Ansha muchchur yáyarandsin, Guehasiypa washunand ipuneerandsin naataranganaya.
Naayarandsin, machimun káreerandsin, anush kuskamchusin, Guehasiysha pursaa yaruwayaru, wansshutarisha pang' wayarangiya. Anumandari Naamanaa muchchuri, Kurakaripish kanapungtsa, tárangu, waanpeetam urkarip naataranganaya.
Guehasiysha Elisewash kuseeru, Elisewsha muchchuree masharangiya. ¿Yapimandsha káyashinsha? tárangiya. Guehasiysha, ¿Antaati nuw naareezi? Neetsiritcha taari; tárangiya.
Itaru, ashiritaa Elisewsha, Na in ¿antaati nuwaa kamapshicheezish? Nuw parangtana. Tputs kapaachoo pshiyrshini kasayaru, karuweeru, shiyaa tsiyatarangiya. Nuw anshutamana. Nuw kani anushpaz ashirangina. ¿Antaati na in kurikee chinamaam waritak? ¿Mayaamaja kurikee, misha kamazeetstam, misha mzatseetstam kizarunpat, misha opeejaatstamta, misha wakaraatstamta, misha m'chachureemtamtish, misha kizaatsitam m'chachureemish anoo ichingaru shiy chinachish?
Ashiriya, yuwamand ashirangish anumand Naaman tsútash shiyaa tsutachiya. Maachiritaatsish ichingaroom urutamari tsutaku taachiya, tárangiya. Tárangu, Guehasiysha mazinarangu, Elisewaa kasayaru, naatarangiya. Ashkachu, wanutsish tsutashish kizpur pshturangiya. Ashchiri wanutsee tsutarangu, wanuts tútungkayaru mburashsha taarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Guehasiy Naamanaa urkiree yarangu, itaru waanaatsisha tsutashish tsutarangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, minush zar Apanllee kuk kamanimapan Elisewpa tsiyataranganaya. Mazinangcha, Elisewaa. Yuwash taakani anush kizpur iyaam tstsariya. ¿Tamareeja ashimash taachich?
Ashiriya, natsha in naayaruni, Ortagap kung yasin katspayaruni, yaamataritam pangeemani panguyani. Sheeruch, anshunaapari taachchi, táranganaya. Elisewsha, Waritacha, naaksints, tárangu.
Itaru, uwshtisin, Nduni. Pza, shiyaptari ipuneeruni naayani, wipunashitisin táranganaya. Ashiriya, Elisewsha, Waritariya. Nuwapapa ipunachchi, tárangiya.
Elisew ipuneerandsin, Ortagap kung naataranganaya. Kuseersin, yasinaa katsparanganaya.
Minum yasin katspayarusin, yusur minootssha katspaksin, anush m'chukee pataxirangu, kungush kanacharangiya. Ashirangu, yuwsha m'chukee kanacharangu ansha, Aay. Mayistoroo, m'chukee kanachachima. ¿Antaati nuwaantaja m'chukiri? Tputsee muchkir nuw yáyarana, tárangiya.
Itaru, Elisewsha, ¿Yuwaatssha m'chuk chipuyeera? tárangiya. Uwsha, Neetstanda chipuyeeru, tárangiya. Elisewsha yasin zangamich wareeyaru, yuwash m'chuk chipuyeeru, anush kapeetarangiya. Ashirangu, m'chuksha muzingarangiya.
Ashkachu, Natu, yanancha, tárangu, uwsha uwpatari yáta ashirangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa m'chukee kanachayarusin, Elisewsha Apanllpa wizpur pamuzingarangu anootsi.
Kurak Síriyshuch kapung Israelchichpa waratarangsin, Síriyshuchsha kurak, Pzaa, piyam shaniyeeruni, nda tputs mazinaru, tsiyatani. ¿Tamayarinaareezich chiyamari kasichich? Piy sundarureetsini tushaneeyaruni, tsangangints, iyamari Israelchichee kasimaama, táyani, tárangiya.
Elisewshat anoo mazinarangu, Israelchicheem kurak mikeeru tsiyatssee zanganirangiya. Papcha. Síriyshuch tputs amb siyaam tsakakchinllinpa. Ashiriya, amb naarintspa, tárangiya.
Israelchichshat kurak anoo mazinarangu, wasundururee piyam zapan zanganirangiya. Ashirangu, Israelchich tputs ndusha Síriyshuchish tputs pshtuyarusin tsiparanganaya.
Síriyshuchshat kurak anoo mazinarangu, kapung tsiyantarangiya. Wasundaruree tushaneerangu, ¿Chakshat tputs yuwaa yaani tsiyatarangani anoo kamaniranganaya? tárangu,
wasundururshitisin, ¿Chakaja kurakaa, kamanich? Wanindaja. ¿Ndushat Apanllee kuk kamanipan Elisew Israelash taaku an kamanirang? Watam an ichingaroo yasaruwa. Yuwaatstam shiy kirimshish tsiyatkish anootstam yasakiya, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, kuraksha anoo mazinarangu, wasundururee, Natu saanpata yasangints. ¿Yapeeja Elisew taar? Yasakchuri, sundarureetsi Elisewaa putamaam zanganpi atina, tárangu, wasundururshitisin waanpatatin masharangsin, Elisew Ndutanaptanda yakat taaru, táranganaya.
Kuraksha wasundururee kapaachush pshiyrshini zapan zanganirangiya. Anshat psaan Ndutanash kusarangsin, yaktaa ashchiri taturpirangusin,
putamshat puturi tarasitaranllu, Elisew muchchur chiyzayaru, wishchip shitungeeru, napku, sundar urutarisha yaktareetsini taturpim kapaachumunaw shaneersin parangiya. Anshat paranllu, Elisewangaz iriptaranllu, Ichee, ¿tamatarchee? ¿Yapeeja kamungeechich? tárangiya.
Elisewsha, Nduni punirinllpa, watam iyaa anoo kasirinasha sundar ksutamapan taaruwa, tárangiya.
Tárangu, Elisew Apanllpasha tsiyatarangiya. Apaa, shiy tputsiri kapung puniku, anoo shaana wizpurirish tuyamandangi, tárangu, Apanllsha Elisewaam tiptsir wizpuree tuyamandarangu, Elisewshat tiptsir machip nap ashku, sundar zapan kapaachumun ashchiri tatsitaru, Elisewaam tapachindamaam kámanarsin parangiya.
Anshat Síriyshuch sundar Elisewaam pachamaam izuuru watsiritanasha káyamarangusin, Elisewsha yusur Apanllpa masharangiya. Apaa, shiyshat izuuru nee tputs wachoo kzateerush ksangi, tárangiya. Apanllshat anuritam Síriyshuchee sundar ashpari izuuru wachoo kzatarangiya.
Elisewsha mangu tamapingaku, Siy piyamcha ngoots masatarangis. ¿Antaati yuwangaz nachungakis an ningeem wanindaja? Piyamcha taaksha. Nuwnaa amb macheerunts, yámandachintspa, tárangu, Elisew Samariyapsha yakat machtarangiya.
Anshat anush yakat kusarangsin, yusur Elisew Apanllee masharangiya. Apaa, yusur tputsee wach yarangcha, tárangu, Apanllsha yusur tputsee yararangiya. Sundarsha yusur napartarangusin, mangu yap nda chinarana amb yakat Samariyaatssha parangusin, Xam. ¿Yapshitiniya? táranganaya.
Israelshuchshat kurak anoo parangu, Elisewaa masharangiya. Pachambeeruni kasayani. Watam nish yushindarangshawa, tárangu,
itaru Elisewsha, Nduni. Pcharintspa. ¿Mayaamaja pachachich? watam tapazish putayariniwa. Katungtsina yáyarus, maritangints. Sheerus, kungutam waamaam panangints. Wayarusin, waani urkarpitam kanapunllina, tárangiya.
Kuraksha Israelshuch, Zuraktishcha, tárangu, katungtsee zapan yarangu, ashparitam martarangiya. Sheeru, kungootstam yásirangiya. Ashiramchusin, kurakaa tsiyateerandsin, Ashiri natunaa naamachinipa, tárangusin, yusur urkarpitam kanapuranganaya. Anumandarisha Síriyshuch kurak tapazee izuuru kasaranganaya. Ndushat Israelshuchpa pachamaam chinaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Elisewaa pachamaam xapoorangana anootsi.
Anumun yusur Síriyshuch kurak Ben-jadad wasundururee tushaneerangiya. Sheerandsin, Samariyash yakat kuseersin, ashchiri yaktaa taturpiranganaya.
Ashirucha, Samariyshuchsha tputs yaktarineetsini wach mbamari shtandaranganaya. Ashirangsin, tputs nda minumtiyam mazarip shitungarangsin, mariz kapung kayataranganaya. Iwariz maringarangu, katungats arap waritarangiya. Burrumanda much 80 kurik mbammash waritarangiya. Mukukumandsha chik pakchimanda 5 kurik mbammash waritarangiya.
Kuraksha Israelchich yaktaa tandapunuzimun íwar waman kámanaru anumun naantach ashirangu, kizsha minum tsiyatarangiya. Kurakaa, istangandama, tárangiya.
Kuraksha, Apanlltaa shiyaam nda istaku, ¿nuwnaashtaja istachee? ¿Nuwshtaja shiyaam tiriku, vinootstam panaychee?
¿Amakshitish shiyataati amb átsha? tárangiya. Itaru, kizsha, Iy kizaptatini tsiyataranguni, Pzaa, iparini pachayaruni katungeeni, táranguni, nuwma ipareetsi pachayaruri katungaranganiya. Sheeruni, putamsha, Shiyshat iparish pachayaruni, katungeeni, táranguri,
uwsha wipaa pishurangiya, kurakaa kamanku tárangiya.
Kuraksha anoo mazinarangu, kapung tsiyantarangu, wamaree putayaru, izichirangiya. Tputsshitisin ichingarusin anoo paranganaya, watam tandapunuzimun íwar naantach ashiranguwa. Sheeru, mantsirimashsha watunireem purusamashsha yáyaru kamartarangiya.
Ashirangu, Apanll waani nuwaa kizpur wanichindama. Naturi zar Elisewaa much turuchima, Safatarineetsi wipa. Zurampatari atina, tárangiya.
Itaru, Elisewnaa pangush wachinanurpat shanee ashiranganaya. Kuraksha wasundururee amb pachamaam zanganirangiya. Itaru, ndatuma kurak wasundurur Elisewash kusaru, Elisewma wasina wachinanuree tsiyatarangu, Napangtsa. Na tputs kpachamash wasundururee ningeem nuwaam muchi turumaam tuzanganichiya. Itaru, siysa mazinantsa. Kurak wasundurur kuskachu, wach mbamari shtandayarush, annungiri kámanayarus, ksutangtsa. Paptsa. Urkar musápa kuzizimun kuschiya, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, yuwaatsiri tsiyatkusin, ántarana anootsiri kurak wasundurur Elisewash kusaranganaya. Elisewaa tsiyatarangsin, Ashiriya, iyaam Apanll nda istaku, ¿mayaamaja Apanlleem kutachinee? Yaana yasachinipa, táranganaya.
Elisewsha, Mazinangtsa. Yuwaa Apanll táranllu anoo kamanchintspa. Apanll ateeja. Pu zar asheetstam in zar, Samariyash washitungash katungtsee paxanxamaam taachpari. 7 litorumand tirik wasipur, minumpatamari kurik mbammash paxanxamaam waritachiya, Sebaadamandsha 15 litorumand minumaritam kurik mbammash waritachiya, Apanll tárangiya, tárangu,
kuraksha wasundurur Elisewaa, Ashimaam wanindaja. Apanlltaapari kanindaa wach tawateeru, katungtsee zangankachu, nda ashtachiya, tárangiya. Itaru, Elisewsha, Nuw zurampatari atina. Uru shiy kchiptartish pangchitampasha. Itaru, anoo shiynaa katungcheezish, ndambari, tárangiya.
Itaru, anushsha yakat washitungashinung tputs ipunpunar tsutashish tutungamash tsutamaw taaranganaya. Uwshtisin waanpatatin tsiyatstangand ashirangsin, ¿Mayaamshat iy neetsiri tsipatsingaz zandkuni, neetsirisha kutakuni kuxinataranll ashkiniya?
Nishutaatiya Samariyash pshtukchuch, tsipachtampachi, watam na in nish yakat katungats maringaranguwa. Mishat, neetsiritaatiya shanee ashkuch, tsipachtampachi. Nda ashishtamaam pza. Síriyshuch taarana ambinaa naayani. Apaz anush kuskamchuch, chiyaa chinakshitisina. Ashkinaareesinaya, chiy anshurishapa taachchi. Wandaya chiyaa natsaksin, pachakchusin, yaanipari tsipaktaateechi ashiru, táranganaya.
Tárangusin, psaanari káyarandsin, Síriyshuchipsha naataranganaya. Itaru, anushshat kuskamchusin, watsiri napkusin, tputs ndunarsha zaputarshat paranganaya.
Watam Apanll Síriyshucheem wasundurur tpuxtamaam wayaranguwa. Ashirucha, uwshtisin anoo parangusin, suwaranganaya. Yuwaa kapaachush pshiyrshini tputs zapan naanllpaz ashirangu, anoo mazinarangusin, suwaranganaya. Israelchichpari kurak Hititshuchpa kurak, misha Ijiptoshuchpa kurak washunand ipuneerandsin, iyaam pachamaam naanllinaya, tárangusin, suwaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, anuritam psaan suwayaranllsin, ichingaru maachiritaa, watambureetstam, kapaachuwaatstam, chinuwaatstam ichingaru kasaranganaya. Pcharuneepa atusin, wanutsirinandari tit ashiranganaya.
Ashirucha, anush wanguyaw kurimunazish kusarangsin, wishchipiri xiyartayarusin, mazinaksin, zaputar ashirangiya. Ashirucha, sundarushsha watambur pshtuyarusin, katungtsee parangusin, yáyarusin, katungarangana. Waasheetstam waarangitamsinaya. Mishat, kurikeetstam, orootstam, chirikootstam waamatarishtisin yaranganaya. Ashirangsin, zapan maacheetsi yáyarusin, pishuranganaya. Sheersin, minushsha tamb pshtuyarusin, yusur maacheetsi yáyarusin, pishurangitamsinaya.
Ashirangsin, waanpatatin tsiyatarangsin, ¿Antaati yuw piy ashkini an wanasireeja? Na in zar ¿ndusha tputsee kamaninda át? ¿Mayaamsha kamapshikiniya? táranganaya. Pushapari zar tsiyatsis mazinakchusin, iyaatssha wanichinllinaya. Ashiriya, nda amb ashimaam, pzaya, naturi naayaruni, kurakap pang' kamanini, táranganaya.
Tárangusin, kanapeersin, yaktash kusarangsin, sundarootssha wachoo ksutamapanee kuruzuranganaya. Anootssha kamanirangsin, Síriyshuch sundar taarangana anoo parangtanicha. Ichingaru tputs wanindaja. Nda minumtiyam tputs paranginiya. Itaru, maachisha ichingaru anshuri taariya. Kapaachutam anootsiri kasamawa. Watamburitamsin ichingaru anuritam kasamawa, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, sundarsha mikeeru kurakaa ksutamapani kuruzurangiya.
Kuraksha psaaniritaa chiyzarangiya. Wipunashee kurakpatatin tsiyatarangiya. Paptsa. Síriyshuch iyaa tamapingapani atusin, mangu suwakpaz ashiranganaya. Manginashpari iyaam tsangamaam tapishuranganaya. Yuwaa iy marizimun kiyung kachiykini anoo yasarangusin, iysha katungtsingaz shitungachuni, uwshtisin iyaa putayarusin, kchitaatsiritani kamuriyarusin, kurakaamsha panachinllinaya. Sheersin, uwshtisin kuzizimunni yaktarinshini pshtuyarusin, iyashchee izuuru kasipani, tupsinaya, mangu tamapingaksin, ashiranganaya, kurak tárangiya.
Tárangu, wipunashsha tsiyatarangiya. Ashiriya, ¿tamaycheezich? ¿Ndushat zameetpa tputs kapaachumun zanganinda át yasamaama? Wandaya anush taakamchusin, pachakchusin, ¿tamaycheezich? Waaniparee ashkitaateesinaya. Watam iynaa Israelchichini neetsiri ichingaruni marizimun tsipachtamchiwa, táranganaya.
Tárangu, tsimbun kapaachoo pshiyrshini yáyarusin, kapaachpatari sundaroo Síriyshuchip yasamaam zanganiranganaya.
Ashiriya, uwshtisin sundar amb naayarandsin, anush kusarangsin, yapshat suwayaranllina ambshat tachiteerandsin, kung Ortagup naataranganaya. Napkusin, zapan maacheetsi ipantstaranganaya. Watam mikeersin suwasuwaranganawa. Ichingaru wamareetsitam, misha anichoowaatsitam apus ipantstambach ashiranganaya. Ashiriya, anoo parangusin, kurakap kamankatssin, yusur wapitam kanapuranganaya.
Kuseeramchusin, kamankusin, tputssha ashpari ichingarusin turut ashirangsin, Síriyshuchip watambur machee yakatssin naataranganaya. Katungtsee zapan yaranganaya. Ashirangsin, Apanllee kuk kamanipan Elisew kamanirangu anuritam tuminuranganaya. Ashiriya, tirikoo 7 litorumand minumpa kurik mbammash tupaxanxaranganaya.
Sebaadamandsha 15 litorumand minumtam kurik mbammash waritarangiya. Kuraksha wipunashee kamachtarangu, Shiy yaktaa washitungash ksutangcha, tárangu, itaru tputsshtisin turut ashirangsin, kurakamun wipunash ush kata, kata ashirangsin, uwsha annungiri wachunung pantsarangu, anootsirisha tsiparangiya. Ashirangu, Elisew kuk tatsamoorangiya.
Yuwaa Elisew Israelshuchee kurak wipunashi kamanku, Pu asheetstam in zar nish yaktash Samariyash washitungash paxanxshish taachiya. 7 litorumand tirik, misha 15 litorumand sebaad minumaripari kurik mbammash waritachiya, átu,
kuraksha wipunash Elisewaa, Nduni, ¿mangutish ngichkush átsha? Apanlltaapari kanindaa tawateeru, nda ambinaa ashtachiya, tárangu, itaru Elisewsha, Nduni. Nuw zuraktana. Uru shiy kchiptartish pangachsha. Itaru, shiynaa anoo katungcheezish, ndambari, tárangu, anuritam tatsamoorangiya,
Ashirucha, anuritam tuminurangu, yaktaa washitungash tsangakatu, anshuri wachunung tputssha zapan turut ashirangsin, kurakaatssha wipunash ipantsaranllusin, izuuru tsiparangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa yaktash Samariyash marizimun kiyung kachiyarangana anootsi.
















































































































































Okosiyasarini, wip Jowas yakat Utaásh 23 masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, anumunshat Jehúwarinsha wip Jowakas Israelchicheem urkar yakat Samariyash kinarangitamta. Sheeru, uwshat 17 masach ksutarangiya.
Itaru, taárashsha kizpur yutarit taarangu, Apanllee kuk kapeetarangiya. Nabatarini wip Jerobowam apanllputsee Israelash tsap wayarangu, uwsha ashirangtamta.
Ashirucha, Apanllee tatsiyuntarangu, Apanllsha Israelchichee zapan masach undararimarisha kasimaam wayarangiya. Waani Asael Síriyshuch kurak, wipatam Ben-jadadamarisha kiyung yachaku taachpa, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Jowakassha anoo parangu, uwsha Apanllee masharangu, Apanllsha mazinarangiya. Watam Apanll yuwaa Síriyshuch kurak Israelchichee kiyung yacharangu anoo paranguwa.
Ashiriya, Apanllee masharangu, Apanllsha Israelchicheem kapung istarangu, tapachindampaneem tputsee wayarangiya. Uwsha Israelchichee tapachindarangu, Síriyshuchsha kurak ndusha Israelchichee kiyung yacharanganaya. Anumunarisha wanasir taaranganaya. Sirútama taarangana ashirangtamsinaya.
Itaru, Apanll ashirangtaa, wand yutaritshishee nda kasaranganaya. Jerobowamchich yutaritshishee chinaksin, Israelaatssha tayutaritaranganaya. Watam Samariyash yakat apanllputs Asera taarangu, anoo ungirtaranganawa.
Ashirangu, kurak Jowakas ndusha zapan wasundurur taarangiya. 50 sundar taarangiya. Kapaachshat pshiyrshini tapazpan 10 payuranganaya. Ashirangu, 10 milomarisha tiptsir washunand taarangiya. Watam Síriyshuch tputs zapan pacharanganawa.
Ashiriya, nee kurakaa Jowakasa taárash arangeem yasamaam zandkus, Krónikash kirak yandam taartanda. Israelchich kurakaam kinatarangchina anoo ichingaru kamankiya.
An kurak tsiparamchu, Samariyash mapuranganaya. Ashirangu, anumun yusur wipsha Jowas anush kurakaam kinarangiya. Ashiriya na kamaneena yuwaa Jowakas Israelash tsap kurakaam kinaru taarangu anootsi.
Utaáchchish tsap kurak 37 masach taaramchu, anumun Jowakassha wip Jowas Israelshucheem urkar kinarangiya. Uwshat yaktaa Samariya ksutku, 16 masach taarangiya.
Itaru, anumunsha aranginasha yutaritshishee chinaranganaya. Apanllee kuk izuuru kapeetaranganaya. Yuwaatsitam Jerobowam, Nabatarani wip ungirtarangu anootsitam ungirtaranganaya. Israelchichee yakat tayutaritarangu, ambtam ashiranganaya.
Ashiriya, nee tsiyatssi arangeem yasamaam, misha kurakaa Jowasa taárash ichingaru yasamaam zandkus, undararpa Amasiyaspa waratarangana anootstam yasamaam zandkus, kirak Krónikash ichingaru kamankiya, yuwash Israelchichee urkar kamanku anshu.
Kurak Jowas tsiparamchu, Samariyashtam kurakawaa mapurangana anshutam mapuranganaya. Ashiramchu, Jerobowamsha uwsha kurakaam kinarangiya. Ashiriya na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Jowas tsiparangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, Elisew kizpur tsipamaamari wanguytarangu, anush kuraksha Israelchich Jowas pakatu kuseeru, Elisewaa paxaneeru tanuku, Shiyaa Elisewaa, kizpur chinakina. Shiy sundar tamapari ashirush, Israelshuchee tputs wanasir ksutarangsha, Jowas tárangiya.
Elisewsha, Timbanllizee wasappatari yángcha, tárangu, Jowassha anuritam yarangiya.
Elisewsha, Natu, timbanllzirish tsak ashimaam yarangi, tárangu, Jowassha timbanllizee tsak ashimaam yáyaru, yusur Elisewsha kurakamun uwi putayaru tsiyatarangiya.
Wach tawatangimasi yap zar yaku ambi, tárangu, kuraksha Jowas pangusee wach tawatarangu, Elisewsha, Natunaa timbanllizpa tsak shingcha, tárangiya. Ashiriya, uwsha kurak Jowas timbanllizee tsak ashirangu, Elisewsha, In wasap watacha tapachindampani Apanll wizpuri. Afekash tsap shiyamari Síriyshuchee urkari kachingeerush, kasachsha, tárangiya.
Tárangu, anumun, Yusur wasaparish yángi, tárangiya. Jowassha ayu átu, wasapaa yusur yarangu, Elisew, Natu, yusur wasappa tsapumun xum xum shingi, tárangiya. Kuraksha Jowas tsapumun tuchpari xum ashichu xararangiya.
Elisewsha anoo parangu tsiyantarangiya. Wanariya arangeem zameetpa, nda ashku, arangtach minum matayaru xum ashirangush, Síriyshuchee kurak shiyamaripa ashpaatsiri kasitsha. Itaru, watam na tuchpanandari xum ashirangshawa. Ashiri tuchpamaritampari tapazpa kasitsha, tárangiya.
Tsiyatam iwatsparamchu, anush Elisew tsiparangiya. Ashirangu, anshurisha Samariyash yakat mapuranganaya. Anumunsha zapan masach tushiyramchu, tputs washchireew Mowabshuch tputs zapan kusaranganaya.
Anpur zar tputs Israelshuch tsiparee mapi átu, tsapoo ktsiytu, anoo washchirshitisin tputs parangusin, tsiparee yáyarusin, yuwash Elisewaa mapurangana anush wach kapeeteersin, kasaranganaya. Itaru, tsipar Elisewmun kandanirangu, musásiri támeeru chiyzarangiya.
Yuwapur kurak Jowakas taarangu anpur Síriyshuchsha kurak Asael ashparita Israelchichee putarangiya.
Itaru, Apanllsha Israelchichee tputs kizpur chinarangu, naynirangiya. Yuwamand sirútama Aprahamarinpa, misha Isaakarinpa, misha Akoparinpa kizpur chinarangana anumand Israelchichee tputs kapung chinarangiya. Nda undarar kiyung yachamaam ksutarangiya. Nduntam izuuru arap kapeetamaam zandarangiya. Ashirucha, na in wandaritam Israelchich tputs taakanaya.
Asaelsha kurak Síriyshuch tsiparangu, anumunsha wip Ben-jadad kurakaam kinarangiya.
Jowassha, Jowakas wip, Ben-jadadpa tuchip tapazpa waratarangu, yaktaa zapan itutsirangiya. Sirú yuwapur waparin Jowakas kurakaam kinaru taarangu, anpur Ben-jadad anoo yakta ichingaru wamari kasirangiya. Ashirucha, Jowassha Ben-jadadpa tuchip pachakatanusin, tuchpaatsiri wamari kasiyarusin, Israelchichee yakta waamatam yanpurangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Elisew tsiparangu, anumun Jowassha kurakaam kinarangu anootsi.
Tsimbun masach tushiyramchu, yuwamun Jowakas wip Jowas Israelash kurakaam kinaru taarangu, anumun Utaáchich Amasiyassha, Jowas wip uwsha kurakaam kinarangiya.
Amasiyas 25 masachirini taarangu, kurakaam kinayaru, Irusarinash tsap 29 masach taarangiya. Wanirsha sur Jowadana taarangiya. Ansha kiz Irusarinshuchimuna.
Ashirangu, an kurak Amasiyas wanasir Apanllee kuk tuminurangiya. Itaru, nda kaapa sirútama Dapiyarini Apanllee kuk izuuru payurangu, nda ashirangiya. Apanllputsee yuwaa waparin chinarangu anootstam uwshat chinarangiya.
Ashirangu, nda izuuru apanllputsee kapeetarangiya. Wandaritam apanllputsee ungirtaksin, kzammashee mbutaranganaya. Anush maacheetsi apanllputseem muchirangtamanaya.
Amasiyas kurakaamsha kizpur kinarangu, kapung tsiyantarangu, yuwamand sundar urkar waparina pacharangana anumand uwsha ashparita sundar pacharangiya.
Itaru, undarareetsinaa wip nda pacharangiya. Watam Móysisarini kirakaa yandaranguwa. Ansha yandam tárangiya. Ashiriya, yuw tputs yutaritshishee patatkachu, anumand antaati wipsha tsipamaam wanindaja. Mishat, wipataati yutaritshishee patatkachu anumand waparsha tsipamaam wanindtamtaja. Yuwamari yutaritshishee patatarangu anumari tsipamaam waritariya, tárangiya. Ashirucha, anoo yasarangu, nda wipawaatsina pacharangiya.
Amasiyas kurak Salush tsap ichingaru 10 mil tputsee Edomshuchee pacharangiya. Anoo tsap Sela, misha Joktela atusin, yásamaranganaya. Ansha tsap sur na wandaritam taariya.
Anumunsha tsiyatssee kurakaam Jowasaam zanganirangiya, Jowakasaam wipa Jehúwaam wachinllinu. Ansha kurak tsap Israelash taarangiya. Anoomsha Amasiyas kurak tsiyatssee zanganku, Naani ningeema. Neetsiri tasaseeruni tsipayani, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, kuraksha Jowas uwsha tsiyatssee Amasiyasaam zanganku tárangiya. ¿Antaati shiy tapazpa waritareezish? Mang sirútama yumbas tsiyatssee yanaam zanganku tárangiya. Shiy iparish kiz nuwaam ipari kamuzaam panangi wizanlleema, mang tárangiya. Itaru, pamarsha watar naatarangu, izuuru yumbsaa mang kapcharangiya. Nuwsha shiyaa ashimaam waritaktamta.
Nuw yasakina yuwaa shiy Edomshuchee ashparit pacharangish anootsi. Yuw ashirangish an wanasirinaa wanasircha. Itaru, shiy anumand shaanaatsi kizpureem ínaksha. ¿Mayaamsha shiy nuwapa yachamaam zandaksha? Papcha, tsiparush. Nda ashimaam, pangishiritish mapiyrush taangcha. Ndunnaa ashkush, shaanaatsi kapung tayutaritamaam taariya. ¿Mayaamsha Utaáchchee ashchiri tayutaritamaam zandaksha? tárangiya.
Tárangitaa, itaru Amasiyassha kurakaa kuk nda payurangiya. Ashirucha, Jowassha ashpari wasundururee Amasiyaspa waratamaam tushaneerangiya. Ashirangu, tsap sur Bet-semesash Utaásh watsapuni pachamaam shaniyaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, Israelchichsha kurak Utaáchchee zapan pacharangu, wamari kasirangiya. Utaáchich sundar kizpur puniksin, zapan waanpeetam pangup suwasuwaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, anush tsap Bet-semesish Utaáchchee kurak Amasiyasaa putayarandsin, waptam watsapunip Irusarinap machtarangusin, Irusarinush kuseersin, yaktashsha watandpun 180 metor kapeetarangiya. Efrayinimand washitungashi yáyaru, yuwamunari washitungashi watandpunoo tutsiparatu ashchiri wazuranirini kapeetarangiya.
Ashirangsin, ichingaru maachta oroo, misha kurikeetsitam waamatarisha itutsiranganaya. Mishat, yuwaatstam oroo kurik Apanllish pang' maachi zapan wayakana, anoo waamataritam yarangiya. Ashirangu, anumun ashpatam tputsee undararee putambeerandsin, waanpeesha yaktarin Samariyap machtaranganaya.
Ashiriya, nee tsiyatsis arangeem yasamaam zandkus, kurakaa Jowasa taárash, misha yuwaatsitam Amasiyas Utaáchich kurak waratarangana anoo yasamaam zandkus, yandam taariya, yuwashutam ichingaroo kurak Israelchichee kamanku anshutamta.
Ashiriya, kurak Jowas tsiparangu, yaktash Samariyash mapuranganaya, yuwashtam kurakawaa Israelchichee mapurangana anshutamta. Ashirangu, anumun wipsha Jerobowamsha kurakaam kinarangiya.
Amasiyasanaa Jowas wip Utaáchich kurak wandari taarangiya. Yuwamun kurak Jowas, Jowakas wip Israelchich tsiparangu, anumun 15 masach taarangiya.
Ashiriya, Amasiyasaa taárash arang yasamaam zandkus, yandam kirak Krónikash taariya, yuwash ichingaroo Utaáchchee kuraka kamanku anshu.
Ashiriya, Irusarinashsha yakat Amasiyasaa parangusin, tputs zapan pachamaam tsiyataranganaya. Ashirangsin, anoo Amasiyas mazinarangu, yakat Lakisap suwarangiya. Itaru ashiritaa, sundarsha ambiri tachiteerandsin, kamateersin pacharanganaya.
Ashiriya, pacharangusin, tsiparee kapaachumun ush wayayarandsin, Irusarinpitam yakat yátaranganaya. Yuwashutam zitaminarinee Dapiyarineetsi mapurangana anshutam mapuranganaya.
Ashirangsin, Utaáchich ichingarusin tputs shaniyarangsin, wipaatssha Asariyasaatssha kurakaam ínaranganaya. Waparish uwsha zamurangiya. Asariyas masachirini 16 taarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Amasiyas tsiparangu, wipsha Asariyas kurakaam kinarangu anootsi.



















































































































Yuwash Esikiyas ipunpunar masach Utaáchcheem kurak kinaru taachu, anush Asiriyashuchsha kurak Salmanasarsha, Pachani atusin, Samariyash yakat kusarangsin, taturpiranganaya. Yuwapuritam kurak Israelshuch Ela wip Osiyas, tsimbun matayaru masach urutari kurakaam kinaru taaru anpur Samariyaa taturpiranganaya.
Taturpirangusin, tuchip masach anshuri kachingaranganaya. Ashirangsin, undarar Salmanasar Samariyshuchee izuuru kasiranganaya. Yuwapur Esikiyas 6 mashach kurakaam taarangu anpuru, misha yuwapurtatam Osiyas 9 masach kurakaam kinaru taarangu, anpuritam Samariyshuchee yaktarini kasiranganaya.
Ashiriya, kurak Asiriyashuch Israelchichee wamaritssin kasirangusin, Israelshuchee tputs putayarandsin, Asiriyapsha tsap machtaranganaya. Jalajash tsap Jaborumun kung wing wayaranganaya, Ngusanumunatam wingu Medosshuchish tsapu.
Ashirangana an nda mangutari ashiranganaya. Yuwamand Israelchich Apanllee wamachtash kapeetarangsin, apanllputsingazimarisha zandarangsin, Apanllee kuk Móysisarini yandarangu anoo nda payurangana, anumand Apanllsha waneerangu, kiyung kachiykusin taaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa yakat Samariya tputssha watsapuneem amuytarangu anootsi.
Esikiyas 14 masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, anush Asiriyashush kurak Sinakirip sur Utaáshchee pacharangusin, yakat kámanamaatstaa, wamaritin kasiranganaya.
Esikiysha Utaáchich kurak tsiyatssee Lakisap yakat Sinakiripaam Asiriyshcheem kurak zanganirangiya. Nuw mantsiri chinaranguri, shiyaa kapeetamaam zandarangina. Itaru, nuw shiyaa wanasir tuwapchinllpa. Ashiriya, na in shiy nuwaa tsapuni kasayarush shtungangcha. ¿Wanipamasaja zandaksha yuwamand shitungachish anumandaya? Ashiriya, nuwsha ashparitam tuwapachinllpa, tárangiya. Ashiriya, Asiriyashuch kurak anoo mazinarangu, mangutarisha arang tuwapapanda átu, kamachtarangiya. 9,900 kilo kurik mburshimash, anumunsha oroonandari 990 kilo aship nuwaam panangandama, tárangiya.
Kuraksha Esikiyas ashparitam tatsamooru panarangiya. Ashiriya, anoom tuwapamaam kurikee Apanllish pang' yarangu, misha kurikee pshtashishtam yáyaru, ashpari panarangiya.
Mishat, Apanlleem pang' wach shtandashee yusheeru, oroo taparama ktazeeyaru, kurakaamsha panarangiya. Yuwaa waana shitungasheem wanasir orpa wayarangu anoo panarangiya.
Ashirangu, kurak Asiriyashuch Sinakirip waanaatsi wipunashee Utaáchchip kurak zanganirangiya. Mishat, sundarutam kizpureew sundarpatatin pachamaam zanganirangtamta. Ashirangsin, tsap Lakisash shaniyarangsin, Irusarinapsha yakat naataranganaya. Ashiriya, Irusarinash kusarangsin, mus tashtap taaru annung ngoots chirikoo káchampaneem wayarangana, annungiri ashpartin shaniyaranganaya.
Sheersin, Esikiyasaa Utaáchchee kurak, Eliyakimaatstam Hilkiyasa wipa kurakaa pang' ksutamapanee, Sebnaatstam kirakaa yandampanee, Jowaatstam Asafa wipa kurak wipunashi kuruzeeru, uwshtisin tsiyatamaam yaktamun watandpunu kárirangana, watam anin kurakawanandari taaranganawa. Itaru, Esikiyasanaa pangshuri kutarangiya.
Tandapunizimun káreersin, nap ashkusin, Asiriyashuchsha kurak wipunash tsiyatarangiya. Tsiyatssee kizpur tpuxtamashee tsiyatarangiya. Uwshat, Ashiriya, kurakaa Esikiya kamaningtsa, yuw nuw kurakari kizpur Asiriyashuch kamachtarangu anootsi. ¿Tamasha mangishish táchakush, nuw ichingaroo maachi nuwamari kasimaam waritatana átsha?
Na mangish chinangcha. ¿Antaati yuw tputs wanasiritaatsiri tsiyatku, an wamari tapazpa kasimaam waritatar? Ashiriya, ¿chakamunsha mangis tatkus, iyaa kapeetamaam zandaksha?
Siy Ijiptoshchimun tputs mangis tatuksa. Itaru, an tamapingampancha. Chinganamun pátangammun chaana katkuch, chiyaatssha kapchiya. ¿Chakaja anumun mang' tatuch? Ijiptoshuch tputs ashikpaz ashiriya, anumun mangis tatintspa.
Mishat, siy tsiyatkus, iy Apanllimuncha mangini tatkini atinaareesa, itaru ¿wanip Esikiyas Apanllee ungirtamaam kapeetaranga? Anoo ungirtamaam watsta. Itaru, Irusarinush ungirtakana anootsimari ungirtangtsa, táranguwa.
Amb ashirangus, siy na wizpuriris ndunarshita. Ashiriya, nuwapa kurakari, Asiriyashuchpa kurak yachayani. Nuwsha siyaam kapaach 2 mil panachintspa. ¿Kamaparee shiy ashparitam kapaachpanee tputs pangachsha? Itaru, pakchitaateesha, ¿antaati shiy Asiriyashuchee nlluraatstaa tusuwacheezis? Nda. ¿Antaati Ijiptoshuch siyaam kapaachoo istaku istacheeja? Nduni.
Mishat, ¿mayaamsha siy Ijiptoshcheem kutakus, Ijiptoshuchpari iyaam tapazpaneem kapaachoo panachinllinaya átus, anumunari mangis tatuksa? ¿Antaati anpataja iyashchee sundar puxtachis? ndambaree.
Mishat, ¿antaatiya iy msangareezi nish tsap siyaam pachakatuni kusarangee? Apanll waana iyaa kamachtarangiya, nee tsap kapeetamaama, tárangiya.
Kuraksha Esikiyas wipunash, Eliyakimsha, Na mazinanganlla. Shiy Aramewshuch k'kuz tsiyatangasindama. Hebrewshuchinaa kuk watsta, watam siy Hebrewshuchish k'kuz tsiyatkachush, tputs ichingarusin tandapunuzimun xiyarsin, siyaa mazinakanawa, tárangiya.
Sundarshitisin urkar, Iyaana kurakari Asiriyashuch kamachtarangu, yuw tputs wishchip shaneerana anootstam ichingaroo kamaningcha, tárangiya. ¿Antaati nuw siyaatsimtaja kamankee? nduni. Ndunnaa nuwaa kuki mazinakus, siysa ichingarus marizimun kiyung kachiyatssa. Ashkachus, uru siy chkeetstamtis katungatssa. Mishat, sachitkus, kuseetstamtis waatssa, tárangiya.
Táyaru, Asiriyashuch sundar xiyeeru, Hebrewshuchish k'kuz tsiyatku, kapung tsiyatarangiya. Asiriyashuch kurak átu, anoo mazinangtsa.
Esikiyasaa kuk payurintspa. Siyaa tamapingayantspa. ¿Tamareeja nuwaa kasiyaru, siyaa tapachindayach?
Mangu ngichku, siyaa, Apanllimun mangini taateeni. Ashkachuch, uwsha iyaa tapachindachiya. Asiriyashuch kurak chiyaa ndusha kasichiya, kurak átcha.
Atitaatiya, itaru siysa anoo kuk payurintspa. Itaru, nuw tsiyatki anootsimari k'keetsi payungasindama. Nuwapa kurakari tatsuyayarus, uru kissha taatssa. Saantarisha kizarunaa tatsumeerus, misha kinduratam, mishat saamataritam waasheemis kungureemis payutssa.
Amb ashkachuri, siyaa ashparitaatssis iyaanpeesha macheeruri, nish tsap taakis ashimatam taatssa. Yuwash tirikutam, misha kizarunatam, olivotam zapan taaru, anush siyaa wayachintspa. Ashkachuri, siy ndushat kiyung kachiyatssa. Mishat, ndusha tsipatssa. Itaru, Esikiyasaa kuk payurintspa, yuwaa mangu siyaa ngichku, Apanllpari iyaa taarasheetsini tapachindachiya átu anootsi.
¿Na tamarimta? Minpich apanllputsirimun mang' taturangsin, iyaa tapachindachpari, tárangusin, ¿apanllputsirini tapachindarang? ¿yuwaa iyashuch kurak Asiriyashuch waratarangana anootsee?
¿Na yapeewamta apanllputs Hamat misha Arpad? Mishat, ¿yapinaaree apanllputs Sefarpayim, misha Jenása, misha Iba? Napangi, ¿an tamarangimsinaya? ¿Antaati waanaatsi yaktarini waanpata wizpurirni Samariya Asiriyashuch waratarangana anoo tapachindarang?
¿Tamamsha nish apanllputs waanaatsi yaktarini tapachindaranga, watsapuneetsee yuwaa kurak Asiriyashuch waratarangana anootsee? ¿Mayaamsha mangutish mangishish chinakus, Irusarinaa yakat Apanllpari tapachindachiya átssa? tárangiya.
Ashiriya, tárangu anoo tputsshitisin Utaáchich ichingarusin nda tsiyatkusin, mazinarutar ashiranganaya. Nda minumtiyam tsiyatsis tsiyataranganaya. Watam kurak Utaáchich Esikiyas, Minumtiyam siy yuwaa tsiyatkachu anoo yámeerus tsiyatintspa, táranguwa.
Ashiriya, yuwaa tárangu anoo Eliyakim kurakaa Utaáchchee pang' ksutamapan, misha Sebnaa kirakaa yandampan, misha Jowas kurak wipunash anin mazinarangusin, kizpur mang' mantsaksin, wamaree izichiranganaya. Ashirangsin, kurakapsha Esikiyasap tsiyatssee kamankatssin naataranganaya. Anushsha kuseersin, ichingaru yuwaa mazinarangana, anoo kamaniranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Asiriyashuch wasundururee zanganirangu, uwshtisin tsiyatssee Utaáchcheem kamanirangana anootsi.
Kuraksha Esikiyas yuwaa sundar tsiyatarangu anoo mazinarangu, wamaree izichirangiya. Wamar purussha kamartarangiya. Sheeranllu, Apanllipsha pang' naatarangiya.
Sheeru, pangoo ksutamapaneetssha Eliyakimaa, mishat kirakaa yandampani Sebnaa, Kamaris mantsirimash kamartayarus, Isáysapsha Apanllee kuk kamanimapanip, Amosap wip napashingtsa, tárangu, naataranganaya. Isáysash kuseersin,
kurak Esikiyas ateeja, Na in zar iy kizpur mangini mantsakuni, kiz nlluraa tatsipku wizpur ndunartaru, iysha ashikpaz ashirangtamani, na wizpurini ndunarshita. Tsiyatssee mantsirimash mazinaranguni, kizpur kiyung kachiykiniya.
Yuwaa Asiriyashuch sundar urkar mantsir Apanllee tsiyatarangu, anoo Apanll yasarangpari. Apanll anumand waana uru wanichpari. Ashiriya, na in shiysha iyaam Utaáchcheemani machinaw katuchimini taakini anoomani Apanllpa mashangcha, iyaa tapachindamaama, tárangiya.
Isáyassha, Siysat kurakaa kamanishinints. Apanll ateeja. Asiriyashchee kurak kuk punirintspa, watam mangutari nuwaa tayutaritaranganawa.
<range>
Mazinangtsa. Nat in tsiyatssee mazinakchu, punirustachu, waptam watsapunip mikeeru kanapchinllinaya. Anush kuskachu, tputssha pachachiya, Apanll kamanku átcha, tárangiya.
Ashirucha, Asiriyashuchsha sundar urkar tsiyatssee mazinarangu, Asiriyashuch urkar Sinakirip Lakisap káyaranllu, yaktap Libnap pachakatu naayaranllu, mang tárangusin, puniku, naatarangiya. Libnash kuseeru, yuwaa tputspa pachakaktarana anoo parangiya.
Anush pachaksin, tsiyatsis min kusarangiya. Papcha. Tirjaka Etiyopshuch kurakaa wasundururee zapan tushaneerangiya, shiyapa waratamaama, mang tárangiya. Ashirucha, anoo mazinarangu, yusur tsiyatssee kurakaam Esikiyaam zanganirangiya.
Uwshtisin tsiyatssipan Irusarinush kuseersin, tsiyatkusin, ¿Antaati shiy Apanllimun mangish tatkish an Irusarinaa yakat tapachindacheeja? Mangutish Apanllimun mangish chinarinllpa, watam shiyaa mangutari tamapingakuwa.
¡Waasha nda yasarangish! Sirútamasa Asiriyashuch kurak ichingaroo tsapuranas waamari kasirangu, ¿ashiri natsha ambitam ashkachu, shiyshat kamungcheezish?
Ashirangsin, ¿tamarimta apanllirini waanaatstisin tapachindarang? ¿Yuwaa yashuch ichingaroo tputs pacharangu, Ngusanshuchee, misha Aramshucheetstam, misha Resefshucheetstam, misha tputs ichingaroo Bet-edenshucheetstam tsap Telasarash taarangana anoo ashparita pacharangana anootsi?
¿Na yapeewamta kurak Hamat, misha Arpad, misha Sefarpayim, misha Jená, misha Iwá, na yapimsiniya? Anoo ichingaroo pacharanganaya, tárangiya.
Kuraksha Esikiyas kirak yandama, Asiriyashuch kurak zanganeeru, anoo yarangu natstarangiya. Sheeru, Apanllipsha pang' pshtuyaru, kirakaa íwar imangeeru Apanllpa masharangiya.
Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha. Shaanamuntari kuxinshish kuxinaksha. Sundarurish turipingarana, anush kuxineerush, shiyamari maachtaa ichingaroo, kurakaatsitam tsapurunasshuchee wayarangsha. Mishat, shiyamari kanindaa, misha tsapootsitam tinarangsha.
Ashiriya, Apaa, nuwaa kuki mazinangcha. Napancha, ¿Na tamakanaya? Sinakirip tsiyatssee zanganirangu, shiyaa kapung tayutaritarangiya. Shiyaa Taarashipaneetstaatish, ashiritaa shiyaa mantsir tsiyatarangiya.
Zuramana, zurkanaya, Apaa; kurak Asiriyashuch ichingaroo tsapuranas waratarangsin, waamaritin kasirangusin, watsapuneetssin ichingaroo tayutaritaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, apanllputsirineetsi ichingaroo tirooranganaya. Itaru, an Apanlleeja. Mangutari yasina, mishat patumbcheetstam tputs uwpatari tinarangana. Ashirucha, ashimatseeru wamari kasiranganaya.
Itaru, Apaa, shiynaa kizpurtishcha. ¿Chaka shiyaa kasich? Ashiriya, iyaa kasimaam zandkusin, shiysha iyaa tapachindangcha. Ashkachush, shiyaa ichingarusin tsapurunasshuch yasachinllinaya. Shiy minumaritishcha Apanllish, Esikiyas tárangiya.
Táyaru, Isáyassha tsiyatssee Esikiyasaam zanganeerangiya. In watacha Apanll waana tsiyatarangu, Nuw Israelchichee kapung chinakina. Yuwaa shiy nuwaa masharangish, anoo nuw mazinarangina. Asiriyashuch kurak Sinakirip tputsee kiyung yachaku anoo ichingaru yasakina.
Waana Apanll Sinakiripaa ateeja. Irusarinshuch kiz kamasin tamaparee ashirusin shiyaa kis stachinllinaya, misha sundarureetstamtish. Shiy tsapunpish kanapkachush, kizpur ka ka ka táchinllinaya.
¿Chakaa shiy tayutaritarangsha? ¿Chakaa kapung yutaritaam ínarangsha? ¿Chakpa tsiyatarangush, shaanaatsi kapung ungirtarangsha? ¿Ndusha Apanllee wanasirimshee Israelaa chinarangu anoo tayutaritarangish?
Shiy tsiyatssee zanganirangush, sundarurishish Apanllee kapung tayutaritarangsha. Anushsha tsiyatkush tárangsha. ¿Chakaja nuwapa waritach? Nuwapat tputsiri tapazpanpat, misha kapaachpa pshiyshirini yap tsap tspakatu amb pachakaturi naayaranlluri, nuwamari kasirangina. Libanumun mach káreeruri, anush karipanaa washitannandari katsparangina. Mzatspaz ashiru kizpur wanasiri paranguri, anootssha nuwaamatari yarangina.
Anumunsha arang minup tsap nllitaritash kusaranguri, kungoom ktseeyaruri, anoo waarangina. Mishat, ktsipashti Ijiptoshchee kung kátiranguri, izuuru puzarangiya. Nuwnaa xapoomaam wanindaja, tárangsha.
Itaru, shiy nda nuwaa yasakish. Nuw minumaritana Apanlli. Nuw maacheetsi ichingaroo wayarangi antana. Sirútamasari nuw shiyaa ipusarangina. Itaru, na in zar tatsamooru shitungarangsha. Ashirucha, na in shiy tputsee yakat kámanamawaatstaa, ashpirit kapeeteerush, kasakchush, maachtamarisha anush karut kxunatangat ashtachiya.
Kurakaw tputs kizpureew taarangtaatssin, shiyaa pakchusin, kapung pazichinllinaya. Kizpuritam puniranganaya. Sirú waanaatsi ungirtarangusin, chirichir wanasir kxuntaru ashirangtaatssin, an tputs mangutarisha chirichiree puzash tatsumeeruch, tsipataru ashtachiya. Kambusursha yap zar yaku amb kuskachu, ashparita tpachingchiya.
Nuw shiyaa yasaktana. Shiy yapimasaja xiyksha, misha mayaatsimasa chinaksha, anuwaa ichingaru yasakina. Shiy kizpur tsiyantarangush, nuwaa mantsir tsiyatarangush, anootstam yasakina.
Ashiriya, yuwamand nuwaa mantsir tsiyatarangish anumand nuwsha tas mbammash shipimunish tunashuruchima. Mishat, ngusamb tayurmim k'kishish tutsachima. Ashiramchuri, wapitam tsapunpitamtish nuw shiyaa pshiyrchinllpa, Apanll shiyaa Sinakiripaa, átcha, Isáyas tárangiya.
Mishat, Isáyas kurakaa Esikiyasa tsiyatku tárangiya. Nimun Apanllee kuk zurampatari yasachsha. In masach yuw tirik waanitari wach pantsayaru, kxuneeru, yusiyku, anootsimari katungamaam waritariya. Itaru, tatsumaatssha tuchparini masach tushiyramchu, anush katungamaam waritariya. Anshunaa mapiyshtis ichingaru wanus pusayarus, kizarunaa katungamaam waritachiya.
Ashiriya, yuwshtisin Utaáchich wandari katuchim taakana, anshitisin yasin tamapari ashirusin, kxuneersin, xixpurtayarusin, wanuseemsha yusiychinllinaya.
Anumunsha, nuw Irusarinshuchee tputs katuchimawaa istachima. An tputs ichingarusin tsap Siyonashsha taachinllinaya. Anush nuw wayachintspa, atiya Apanll kchinamshi.
Itaru, kurak Asiriyashucheetssha Apanll atiya. ¿Antaatiya yakat Irusarinash pshtuchazinllinaja? Anush kuseersin, minumtiyam timbanllizpa tsak ashtachazinllinaja. Minumtiyam sundar xanxapshipa waanaatsi kámanayarusin, tputseetssha pachachazinllinaja. Yaktaa watandpun kárimaam káringashee wayachazinllinaja, ndambaree.
Urupa anumandari xarayarusin, paziksin, wapitam kanapchinllina. Watam anush yakat pshtumaam pinasawa. Nuw Apanlleeruri siyaa itsinsari kamankina.
Nuw anoo yakat tapachindachima, yuwamand sirútama zitaminarinpa Dapiyarinpa kizpur chinarangi, anumanda. Piy ashkachuri, tputs ichingarusin, nuwaa yasachinllinaya, tárangiya.
Táyaranllu, natam psaan Apanllsha wasundurur naatarangu, yuwash Asiriyashuch sundar shaneerana anush kuseeru, tputsee 185 mil sundaroo pacharangiya. Putamsha ashparitin tsiparshitisin taraseeranganaya.
Ashirucha, Asiriyashuchsha kurak Sinakirip anuritam watamburee tapureersin, waptam tsap Ninipipsha naatarangiya.
Ambsha naatarangu, apanllirineetssha ungirtapi átu, apanllputsish pang' pshturangiya. Anush apanllputsee Nisroka ungirtaku, wipsha tsimbunari, Adramalek, misha Sareser ashirusin kusaranganaya. Anshat waparish kusateersin, kurakaa pacharanganaya. Sheerandsin, tsap Araratap suwaranganaya. Sheeru, anumun wipsha Esarjadom kurakaam kinarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Apanll Irusarinaa yakat tapachindarangu anootsi.















































Ashiriya, Osiyas nllurari masachirini 8 taaru, anush kurakaam ínaranganaya. Kurakaam kinarangu, Irusarinash washunand 31 masach taarangiya. Wanir sur Jedida, Adayasarini wipa. Ansha kiz Boskatshuchimuna.
Osiyas kurakaam kinarangu, kizpur Apanllee kuk payurangiya. Sirútama zitaminarini Dapiyarini Apanllee kuk payurangu, uwshat ashirangitamta. Apanllee kuk wanasir tatsamooru payurangiya; nda pakchiyam kapeetarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Osiyas wanasir taarangu anootsi.
Kurak Osiyas 18 masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, anush Safanaa Apanllip pang' zanganirangiya. Safan kirakaa yandampanimuncha, Asariyas wipa, Masulama wachinllinu.
Osiyassha, apanllpanip urkar Hilkiyasap tsiyatssee kamanishini. Shiy Hilkiyasaa, anush Apanllish pang' kurik taaru anoo yáyarush, Apanlleem pang' yaramapaneem panangcha. Mishat, yuw tputs pshtumaam tuwaparangana anootstam yáyarush panangtamcha,
anpa kurik Apanlleem pang' yaramaama, yuwaam tputs Apanlleem pang' tarawaztakana anoom tuwapamaama,
misha yuwaamtam tputs táwara wanasir sipichtaku anoomtam tuwapamaama, misha pangupaneemtam tuwapamaama, mishat karipanaatstam paxanxamaama, mishat patumbcheetstam paxanxamaama.
Amb ashkush, nuw nda shiyaa kurikimand tamundachinllpa. Kurikpatari tuwapakush, ¿mayaamaja kirakaa yámandanda, táchee? Watam shiy wanasir chinakush, nda shuchikshawa. Nuw shiyaa mapiykina, átcha, tángcha, kurak tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Safansha Hilkiyasap kamankatu, naatarangiya. Anush kuseeru, apanllpansha urkar Hilkiyas Safanaa tárangiya. Apanlleem pang' tarawaztakuni, nee kirakaa Apanllee kamachtamarini yuwaa Móysisarini yandarangu anoo parangtanicha. Watatcha in kiraka, tárangu, Safanaam panarangiya. Safansha kirakaa yáyaru, ashchiri natstarangiya.
Anoo kiraka natstarangu, kurakaa Oseyasa kamanirangiya. Apanllish pang' ichingaru kurik taarangu anoo yáyarusin, anootssha kchayashtisin, kurik mbammasheem tinayarusin, yuwaamsha tputs pangukana anoomshat tuwaparanganaya.
Apanlleem pang' tarawaztaksin, anush Móysisirinee wirkaree parangana. An neewa. In watacha, Oseyasaa tárangu, Safan anoo kirak natstarangiya.
Ashiriya, anootssha Osiyas Apanllee kamachtamarini mazinarangu, kizpur mang' mantsaku, wamaree putayaru izichirangiya.
Ashiriya, anuritam Hilkiyasa, misha Ahikama Safanarinee wip, mishat Mikaysarinee wip Akbora, misha yandampanee Safana, mishat Asayasaa kuraka wipunash ashpari kamachtarangiya.
Naturi naayarus, Apanllpa mashangints nuwaama, misha tsapuneemtamani, misha Utaáchcheema. Ashiriya, ichingaru Apanllpa mashantsa yuwaari kirak átu anurita. Na in Apanll iyapa kizpur tsiyantakpari, watam sirútama iy zitaminarani nee nda tuminuranganawa, tárangu,
uwshtisin ashpisin Huldap Salumap wizanll pakatssin, naataranganaya. Hulda Apanllee kuk kamanimapani taarangiya. Saluma Tikbarini wipa, Jarjasarini wachinllinu. Salum apanllpanee wamari ichingaroo Apanllish pang' taarangu, anoo ksutarangiya. An Hulda Irusarinash taarangiya. Itaru, minungichich watandaram yakat taarangiya.
Huldash kuseersin, anoo kamanirangsin, uwsha kizsha, Nuw siyaa itsinsaru Apanllee kuk kamanchintspa. Apanll Israelchichee kizpur chinakiya. Ashiriya, kurakaa kamanincha.
Apanll ateeja. Nuw Apanlltana. Nuw anush tsap kuseeruri, tayutariteeruri, kasachima. Yuwari kirakash kamanku anuritam ashtachima. Ichingaroo Utaáchchee tputs kiyung yachachima.
Watam nuwaa kuki kasaranganawa. Ashirangsin, minootsshat apanllputseem kzammashee mucheersin ungirtaranganaya. Anumand nuw kapung tsiyantarangina. ¿Antaatiya anoo tputs tsiyantakachuri, tsiyani ayamtaatiya pastacheeja?
Mishat, siysa Utaáchchee kurak kamaningtsa. Apanll ateeja. Yuwamand shiy nuwaa kuki payurangish anumand shiy mapiyrush tsipachsha.
Shiy nuwaa kuki mazinarangush, kapung mangish mantsarangsha. Kamareetsish izicharangush, tanurangush, nuwaa masharangsha. Shiy nuwaa kuki tuminumaam zandarangsha. Itaru, Utaáchchee zurampatari tayutariteeruri, wanichima, Apanll shiyaa átcha.
Nuw Apanlltana. Nuw shiyaatsinaa wanasir wayachinllpa. Shiy ndushapari kiyung kachiyachsha. Mapiyrush tsipakchush, zitaminap naatsha. Ndatuma yutaritshishee parush, ndaturi Utaáchich tputs kiyung kachiyarusin, shiyma tsipachsha. Ashiramchush, anumunaapari kushimunish yutaritshish kuschiya, Apanll átcha, Hulda Oseyasaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, tárangu anoo mazinarangusin, an yusur kurakap wapitam kanapuranganaya; Apanllee kuk kamankatssina. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Apanllee wirkar kamachtamarini Apanllish pang' yarangana anootsi.
Yusur kurakash kusarangsin, kurakaa Oseyasa kamanirangsin, kuraksha ichingaroo tputs kuruzurangiya.
Ashirangu, ichingarusin Utaáchich wachinanur tputs, mishat Irusarinshuchtam ichingarusin, apanllpaneewtamsin, Apanllee kuk kamanipaneewtamsin, ichingarusin tputs shaniyamaam Apanllish pang' pshturanganaya. Kuraksha anush kirakaa yáyaru, yuwaa Apanllee kuk yandamaa Apanllish pang' yarangana anoo natstarangiya.
Natstam iwatsparamchu, kurak apusanand pangusee wanupish xiyeeru, Apanllpa tsiyatarangiya. Apaa, natunaa nimun shiyaa kukish izuurashapari payuchiniya. Shiyaa kamachtamarish tatsamooru tuminchiniya, tárangu, tputsshitisin ichingarusin zamangarangusin, Na nimun anootsimarishapa tsiyatsis payumaam chinachiniya, tárangusin, anootsimarisha payuranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Apanlleetsimarisha kuk payumaam Apanllpa masharangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, kurak Osiyas Hilkiyasaa, apanllpanee urkari, misha apanllpaneetstam, misha Apanllee pang' ksutamapaneetstam kamachtarangiya. Yuw Apanllish pang' apanllputsee ungirtamaam Baalaa, misha Aseraatstam, misha tsangacheetstam wani ashiru wayarangana, anoo ichingaru yáyarus, ishitungangints, tárangiya. Uwshtisin ashpari wishchip ishitungayarusin, Sedronaa timburanlliz apusanand xanateersin, ashpari muchiranganaya. Sheersin, puzacheetsimarisha Betelap yátaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, yuwaatstam Utaáchich apanllputsee urkar ksutamapanee wayarangana anootstam tputs kapeetaranganaya. Watam uwin machimun íwar kzammashee ichingaru zar muchtaranawa. Anush machimun maacheetsi muchimaam ínarangana, anoo ichingaroo kapeetaranganaya. Utaáchchish watsapun shuneeru, apanllputsee anoo ichingaru kapeetaranganaya. Mishat, Irusarinash chapunguw taarangu, anootsitam ichingaru kapeetarangtamsinaya. Apanllputsee ksutamapan kzammashee mbutarangana anoo izuuru kapeetarangtamanaya. Mishat, Baalaam ungirtamaam zar ashiru, misha tsup ashiritam tinarangana anoo,
mishat Aseraamtam Apanllshuri pang' ungirtamaam tinarangana, anoo ichingaru yusheersin, kungumun wing xanateersin, ashpari muchiranganaya. Puzachimarisha katuchirangiya. Ashiriya, puzachee yáyarusin, tsiparish mapshishish kuruteersin, kasaranganaya.
Mishat, yuwaa apanllputseem ungirtamaama atusin pangurangusin, itaru anushsha tputs kamuzpatatin tayutaritarangana, anootstam pangus kapeetaranganaya. Apanllshuri pang' ashiranganaya. Mishat, kiz apanllputseem Aseraam wamar k'tatarana anootstam ichingaru kapeetaranganaya.
Anumunsha kurak Osiyas ichingaroo apanllputspanee ipazarangiya. Ichingarus Irusarinash kusangtsa, tárangiya. Anush kuseersin, Osiy wasundurur yuwaa machimun íwar apanllputseem ungirtamaam wayarangana, anoo ichingaroo kapeetaranganaya. Tsap Guebamand chtayaranllu, tsap Beersebamun tutsiparu, kapeetaranganaya. Watam anush kzammashee mbuttaritamsinawa. Mishat, Josueynung pangu, Utaáchich gobernadorinshini pshtushini watandaramap mbazinungich yashingoom wayarangana, anoo ashchiritam kapeetarangiya.
Itaru, apanllpansha íwar yuwamun mach pshkuru anumun apanllputseem wayarangana, anootsimsha ungirtarangusin, ndusha Irusarinap Apanllee ungirtamaam naaranganaya. Ashkusin, anshurisha pangaa yuwamshee nda tputtaru anoo wamkurpasha katungkusin, taaranganaya.
Ashiriya, kuraksha Osiyas anoo parangu, ichingaroo tayutaritarangiya. Yuwaa Ben-Jinomash tandsa apanllputseem maacheetsi muchimaam wayarangana, anoo ichingaru yáyaru, kapeetarangiya. Tputs wipaa kamuzaa, misha kizaatstam wayayarusin, apanllputsee Molokaa ungirtamaam muchirangana, anootstam kapeetarangiya, nda ayamtaatiyam yusur nlluraa muchimaama.
Mishat, yuwaa Utaáchich kurak sirú kapaachoo pshiyrshinpa zareem ungirtamaam wayarangana, anootstam ichingaru kapeetarangiya. Ancha ichingaru Apanllinung washitungash Natán-melekanung ksutarangiya. Anuwaa yáyaru, sumaspat muchirangiya.
Mishat, yuwaa kurakash Ajasash pangu íwar apanllputseem muchimaam wayarangu, anootstam kapeetarangitamta. Mishat, Manases Apanllinung pang' apanllputsee wayarangitamta, anoo ichingaru yáyarusin, machimand Sedronash wazaw kapeetaranganaya.
Mishat, yuwaa tputs arapich Irusarinamand yap zar yaku amb apanllputseem kizpur mantsirimash wayarangu, anoo tayutaritarangu, kapeetarangtamta. Mishat, Irusarinaa charapungaru tuwash kurak Saramun apanllputsee Astartee wayarangu anoo, mishat Sidonshuch tputs apanllputsirini Kemos, misha Mowabshuch apanllputsirini Milkom taarangitamta, misha Amónshuchsha apanllputsirini taarangitamta.
Anoo ichingaru yáyarusin, patumbchee misha yasinaatstam ungirtarangana, anoo ichingaru chuweeranganaya. Sheersin, anumunsha yuwash apanllputseem wayarangana, anush tputseetssha wanap yáyarusin, xanateersin kasaranganaya.
Mishat, apanllputsee Betelash tsap Jerobowam, Nabatarini wip tinarangu, yuwapa Israelchichee tayutaritarangu, anoo chuweeyarusin, tirooyarusin, kasaranganaya. Mishat, Aseraatstam anush wayarangana, anootsshat apanllputsee sumaspa tazuyarusin, muchirangtamsinaya.
Ashirangu, kurak Osiyas kanapeeranllu, naantachu machimun iwaz apanllputseem ungirtamaam wayarangana, anush tsipareetssha zapan wayam taaru anoo parangiya. Anootsshat wasundururee kamachtarangu, Natu, wanap ichingaru yángints. Yáyarus, nimun yuwamun apanllputseem maacheetsi muchimaam wayakana anumun wayangints, tárangu, muchchurshitisin, Ayu atusin, ichingaroo wanapoo yáyarusin muchiranganaya. Amb ashirangu, Apanllee kamachtamarini yuwaa kurak kirakaa yáyaru, natstarangu mazinarangana, anooritam tatsamooranganaya.
Ashirangsin, tputseetssha masharangiya. ¿Maya machimun taara? tárangu, tputsshitisin anshuchiri, Utaáchich Apanllee kuk kamanimapan mapurangana ancha. Nish kusarangu, yuwaa shiy Betelash tsap apanllputsee ichingaroo kapeetarangish, iyaa wasina kamanirangiya ancha, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, kuraksha Osiyas wasunduraree, Watsta. Anoo tsipari ptatintspa. Minumtiyam tputs anoo patatamaam watsta, tárangiya. Ashirucha, Apanllee kuk kamanipan yakat Samariyamand kusarangu, anshurisha tsiparangu, mapurangana, anuwaa nda tayutaritaranganaya.
Mishat, yakat Samariyash pangus íwar kapunguw apanllputseem pang' pangurangana. Yuw kurak Israelchich pangurangusin Apanllee kapung tatsiyuntarangana, anootssha kurak Osiyas ashchiri pangus kapeetarangiya. Apanllputsee Betelash yakat tamarangpari sheertam kasarangiya.
Ashirangu, anshuritam ichingaroo apanllputsee urkar pacharangu, yuwashutam apanllputseem ungirtamaam maacheetsi wayayarusin, muchtarana anumuntam tsiparee ashpari wayayaru, muchirangiya. Ashirangu, kurak Osiyas yusur wapitam Irusarinap kanapurangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Osiyas ichingaroo apanllputs kapeetarangu anootsi.
Kuraksha Osiyas ichingaroo anshuchee tputs kamachtarangiya, Apanlleem shambatshisheem wayamaama. Yuwaa Apanll iyaa Ijiptosh tsap tashitungarangu, anoo nda mbizamaam shambatshisheem wayayani, tárangiya. Ashirangsin, yuwartatam Apanll kamachtamarini yandam taarangu, anuritam tatsamooru wayaranganaya.
Minumtiyam Israelchich ksutamapan nda amb ashiru ungirtatarusin, sirútamastaatiya zitamin kurak Israelchich Utaásh nda amb ashtarusin, wamari kurak Osiyas ashiru kizpur kapung shambatshisheem wayarangiya.
Osiyas kurakaam kinaru, 18 masach taachu, anush zar yakat Irusarinash shambatshishee kapung wayayaru, Apanllee ungirtaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Apanllee ungirtarangu anootsi.
Kurak Osiyas ichingaroo apanllputsee kapeetarangiya. Mishat, wazurireetsitam, misha tuwachimapaneetstam, misha apanllputseem tputs pangshuw payukana, anoo ichingaroo kapeetarangiya. Mishat, yuwaatstam Utaásh maachtaw yashingchich mantsir tinamaw taarangu, misha Irusarinshutam taarangu anoo ichingaroo ashpari kapeetarangiya. Apanllee wirkar apanllpan Hilkiyas Apanllish pang' parangu anoo ichingaru tatsamoorangiya.
Nda minumtiyam kurak ashim sirútamastaatiya taarangu, anumari kurak Apanllee mangpatari chinarangiya. Apanllee zurampatari chinarangu, kamachtamarineetsi wanasir tuminurangiya. Móysisarini wirkar kamachtaku anuritam tatsamooru payurangiya.
Itaru, ambitaa ashirangu, ichingaru tatsamoorangitaa, wandaritam Utaáchchee nda Apanll kis naparangiya. Yuwamand ichingarusin tputs Manaseschich Apanllee tayutaritarangana, anumand Apanllsha nda kis naparangiya.
Ashirucha, Apanll Utaáchchee kasamaam zandarangiya. Israelaa tsap kasarangu, ambitam ashimaam zandarangiya. Sheeru, yaktaa Irusarina izuuru kapeetamaam chinarangiya. Yuwaatsitaa waana Apanll ipusarangu, waama pang' pangurangana, anootsitaa kapeetamaam zandarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Apanll Utaáchchee tputs nda kaapa kis naparangu anootsi.
Kurakaa Oseyasa taárash yasamaam zandkus, misha yuwaatsitam taarangu anoo, misha yuwaatsitam tarawaztayaranllu anootsitam yasamaam zandkus, kirak Krónikash taariya, yuwash ichingaru kurak Utaáchchee kamanku anshutamta.
Yuwash waritarangu anush kurak Nekav Ijiptoshuch parawarini shitungeeru, kungup Eufratis naayaranllu, kurakaam Asiriyashcheem istaati táyaranllu, naatarangiya. Ashiriya, kuraksha Osiyas tapazeem shitungeeranllu, anpasha chamayangaranganaya. Itaru, kuraksha Nekav Meguidash tsap parangu, kurakaa Oseyasa pacharanganaya.
Ashirangsin, Oseyasarini wasundurur tsiparee Oseyasarinee kapaachush pshiyrshini wayayarandsin, wapitam watsapunip Irusarinap yátaranganaya. Yushindarangusin, anshurisha mapuranganaya. Sheersin, tputssha ichingarusin shaniyarangsin, wipaatssha Jowakasa kurakaam ínaranganaya. Waparinash zamurangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Osiyas tsiparangu anootsi.














Jowakas wipa, Jowakim masachirini 18 tatsamoochu anush kurakaam kinarangiya. Ashirangu, yakat Irusarinash tuchpamari tsup ksutarangiya. Wanirsha taarangiya sur Nehusta. Elnatan anoo kizaa wipamuna. Ansha kiz Irusarinshuchimuna.
Itaru, Jowakimsha kurakaam kinarangu, Apanllee kuk kapeetarangiya. Nda Apanllee kuk tatsamoorangiya. Waparin Apanllee kuk nda payurangu, uwsha ashirangtamta.
Anpursha zar Nabukodonosor Babiloniyshuch kurak wasundururee kamachtarangu, Irusarinap pachamaam naataranganaya. Anush kuseersin, taturpiranganaya.
Anumunsha zapish kurak Nabukodonosor anshutam kusarangiya.
Ashiriya, Jowakimsha kurak, misha waniritam, misha wasundururitam, misha kurakawatamsin, misha wamkureewtamsin ichingarusin kapung puniksin, kamiyarangusin, Babiloniyshuch ichingaroo putaranganaya. Yuwapur Nabukodonosor 8 masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, anush kurakaa Jowakasa putarangiya.
Ashirangsin, Nabukodonosor ichingaru yuwaa Apanllish pang' maachi wayarana, anoo yarangu, misha kurakshutam pang' pshtuyaru, maachtaa ichingaru yarangiya. Apanll waana kamanirangu, ambiritam ashiru tatsamoorangiya. Yuwaatsitam kurak Saramun Apanllish pang' wayarangu, oroo misha urutam mburshimash taarangu anoo ashpari maachtaa pátangaranganaya.
Ashirangu, ashpari tputsee Irusarinash kurakawaa, mishat kizpureewaatstam sundaru, mishat kurikee táchimapaneetstam, mishat yandampaneetstam, mishat ngusambaa tinamapaneetstam ashpari putarangiya. Washunand 10 mil tputsee putaranganaya. Pukireewaatsinaa tputs, Waani mzatseewaa tarawaztachinllinpa, átu, kasarangiya.
Nabukodonosorsha kurakaa Jowakima, wanirpatari, wizanlleetstam ichingaru wipunashpatari putarangitamta. Sundarootstam urkar ksutamapanee, misha yuwaa kizpureew kurakaw taarangana, anoowaa ashpari putayaranllu, Babiloniyapsha machtarangiya.
Washunand kurakawaa 7 mil yamarangiya. Anumunsha minumtam mil ngusambpa tinamapanee, misha kizpureewaa sundaru ichingaru waanpeetam machtarangiya.
Sheeru, kurak Babiloniyshuch Mataniyasaa, Jowakimaa zoonll wip kurakaam ínarangiya. Kurakaam ínayaru, surootssha Sidikiyasa átu yásamarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurakaa kasiyarusin, Jowakimaa putarangana anootsi.
Sidikiyas masachirini 21 taaru anush kurakaam kinarangiya. Uwsha 11 masach yaktash Irusarinash taarangiya. Wanirsha sur Jamutalamuncha Jeremiyas wipa. An kiz Libnashchimuncha tputsi.
Ansha wip kurakaam kinarangu, aranginasha Apanllee kuk kapeetarangiya. Apanllee aranginasha tayutaritarangiya.
Ashirucha, anumand Apanll kapung tsiyantarangu, Irusarinaa, misha Utaáchcheetstam ashparita izuurumaamarisha kasarangiya. Ndusha pakchiyam istamaam zandarangu, Waani yachambanllina, tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Sidikiyas kurakaam kinarangu anootsi.
Zar diesash, tsupsha octubrishu, Sidikiyas 9 masach kurakaam kinaru taachu, anush Nabukodonosorpa tsiyantarangusin, Nabukodonosorsha wasundururpa ichingaru shitungaranganaya. Irusarinash tsap kuseeruni, yaktaa taturpiyaruni, tasaseeruni, tandapunuzimun kárimaam káringashish wayayaruni, izuuru tputsee pachayaruni, kasiyani, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, Irusarinash kusarangsin, yaktaa taturpiyarusin, tsimbun masach ksutaranganaya. Ashirangsin, Sidikiyas 11 masachsha tatsamoorangu, yuw kurakaam kinarangu,
an tsupsha ipunpunarshini, zar nuevish, yuwariz maringarangiya. Amb ashirangu, ichingarusin tputs watungash pishtarangiya.
Ashirucha, tputsshitisin yaktaa watandpunu wach zangamichsha wayaranganaya. Itaru, Nabukodonosorsha wasundurur nda suwamaam ksutarangtaatssin, ashiritaa psaan kurak Sidikiyas wasundururpa ashparitin suwaranganaya. Minnunguchich tandapunuz watandaram shitungaranaya. Yap chap tatsumim kurak nashamangshini taarangu, annungiri shitungarandsin, Ortagup kung ngoots suwasuwaranganaya.
Itaru, Kaldewshuchsha, Nabukodonosor wasundur tsiyatssee mazinarangusin, Sidikiyasaa tachitaranganaya. Apus Jericoyush watandsash kamatarangsin, kurakaa Sidikiyasa putaranganaya. Sidikiyas wasundurur Kaldewshuchee parangusin, urkaree kasayarusin, suwasuwarangusin, ashpartin pseertaranganaya.
Kaldewshuchsha sundar Sidikiyasaa putayarandsin, Babiloniyashuchipsha kurak Riblap yakat machiranganaya, yap Nabukodonosor Hamatap tsap taarangu ambi. Ashiriya, anush wayayarusin, kuraksha Nabukodonosor, Sidikiyasaa waneengtsa, tárangiya.
Sidikiyas waana paru, wipaa ashparit wayarpunoo ktsupeerus pchangints. Sheerus, wapareetssha Sidikiyasaa ashpari wachoo yuxungints, tárangiya. Ashiriya, wasundurursha ambiritam ashiranganaya. Sheersin, uwee kamuriyarandsin, yakat Babiloniyap machtaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurakaa Sidikiyasa putarangana anootsi.
Tsupsha zameeturinshini, zarsha 7, yuwash kurak Nabukodonosor masach 19 kurakaam kinaru taachu, anush Nebosaradan sundar urkari ichingaroo sundaroo ksutku, an yaktash Irusarinush kusarangiya.
Anush ichingaru Apanllee pang', misha kurakaatsitam pang', misha kurakaw kizpureewatam taarangana anoowa pang' tirooranganaya.
Ashirangsin, sundar Kaldewshuchsha anshutam kusarangsin, anpasha sundar ipunarangsi, uwshtisin Irusarinaa yakat watandpunu ashchiri kapeetaranganaya.
Anumunsha, sundar urkar Nebosaradan ichingaroo Irusarinshuchee katuchimawaatstaa tputs putarangu, ashparita yakat Babiloniyap machirangiya. Ashpatam maachtaa tínamapan taarangana, misha ashpatam Nabukodonosoraa chinarangana, anootsim ichingaru machtarangiya.
Kizpur pukireewaatsinaa tputs kasarangiya. Waani uwnaarsin mzatsee, misha kizarunaatstam tatsumawaa tarawaztaksin taachinllinpa átu kasarangiya.
Anumunsha sundar Kaldewshuch Apanllish pang' pshturangusin, maachee yuw ngusambpa tinarangana anoo ashpari pátangaranganaya. Itaru, patuzinazeewaa, misha ngusamb chumbeepimash wanasirimash kungoom kanapumaam tínam taarangu anootsimsha Babiloniyaam yátaranganaya.
Mishat, yuwaatstam kapung murits ashiru kayatam puzachee xanatarangana anootstam, mishat mbasshisheetstam tinamaa, ichingaru ngusambpat chumbeepimashpa tinarangana anoo Apanllish pang' ichingaru yaranganaya.
Anumunsha, kuraksha sundar urkar ichingaru yuw oroo, misha ortam mburshimashi, mishat yuwatam kapung murits tamapari ashiru anush tazutarana, misha yuwaatstam mangaw kayatam kapungoow zapan taarangu, anoo ichingaru yarangiya.
An ngusamb chumbeepimashi washunand táchimaam pinasamuna. An ichingaru Saramunarini tínamarini.
Patuzinaz tsimbunu íwarini 8 metoroo kánuru taarangiya. Anumun iwaz tsimbun metor wamanirini únambee wayamaam ngusambpa kayatarangana. Anumunsha yamus tamapari ashiru kuripitaraa, kuripitaraa ashiru, munlliy wanus tamapari ashiru kambeerutaru kizpur wanasir chumbichumbtangatu iripcheew tínaranganaya. Anootssha ashpari Babiloniyap itutseerandsin yátaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Apanllee pangus ashchiri kapeetarangana anootsi.
Nebosaradansha, kurak sundar urkar tputsee putarangitamta, apanllpanee urkar Sofoniyasaatsi, misha Sofoniyasaa wipunashee, misha tuchip tputs yuwaa Apanllee pang' washitungash ksutamapan taarangana, anoo ichingaru putayarusin, machtaranganaya.
Anumunsha, Irusarinshuchee sundaru urkari, misha zameetpa kuraka wipunash, misha sundaroom ínampani putarangitamta. Sheersin, 60 tputs kurakaw tsipasawaa putarangitamsinaya.
Kurak Nebosaradan ashparitaa tputs Babiloniyapsha, Ribla yakat, Hamatap kung machtaranganaya. Anushsha kurakash Nabukodonosorash yámandarangusin, kuraksha tputsee parangu, uwsha ashparita pachamaam kamachtarangiya. Sundarsha anuritam ashpari tputsee pacharanganaya. Ashirangsin, Utaáchchee tputs izuuru kachingeersin kasaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa undarar Utaáchchee tputs ashpari kachingarangu anootsi.
<range>
Babiloniyshuch kurak Nabukodonosor, Guedaliyasaa Ahikamarinee wip, Safanarinee wachinllin kurakaam ínarangiya. Kurak Nabukodonosor Utaáchchee tputs pakchimsha kasarangu anoom ksutamaama.
Ashiriya, Utaáchich sundar urkar tiptsirpa anoo tsiyatsis mazinarangusin, yaktap Misap kurakpa Guedaliyaspa tsiyatamaam naataranganaya. Anshitisin tputs yuw naatarangana an sur Ismael, Netaniyas wipa, misha Johanan Karearin wipa, misha Serayas, Tanhumetarini wipa, yakat Netofashchi, anumunsha Maakashuch tputs Jaasaniyas, ashpisin tputs tiptsirpatatam ipunirandsin naataranganaya.
Kuraka Guedaliyas anpa tputs wanasir tsiyatarangiya. Ashiriya, tsiyatku, Nuw siyaa zurampatari táchintspa. Siy Kaldewshuchee sundar urkar punirintspa. Nishurisha yakat taayarus, Babiloniyshuchee kurak kuk payukus, kurakaam istakus, kisshapari taatssa, tárangiya.
Tsup arangtach tsimbun matayaru yakayaru, anush Ismael, Netaniyas wip, Elisam wachinllin, Dapiyarinchich tputs, anshitisin tputsee chung yamayaru, anpa ipuneerandsin naataranganaya. Sheerandsin, anush yakat kusarangsin, anshuchee kurakaa Guedaliyasa pacharanganaya, misha Utaáchcheetstam tputsi, misha Kaldewshucheetstam tputsi, misha tputs nllitaritaw taarana anpatari pacharanganaya.
Itaru, Mispashuch katuchim tputs ichingarusin Kaldewshuchee kapung punirangusin, nllurtam, misha wachinatam, misha sundaruwatam urkar ichingarusin ashparitin Ijiptopsha suwasuwaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Ijiptop tsap suwarangana anootsi.
Utaáchich urkar Jowakim Babiloniyash tsap tumanimash 37 masach taachu, tsupi 12, fecha 27 zar tushiyramchu, anush minsha tputs Evil-merodak sur Babiloniyshucheem kurak kinarangiya. Ansha Jowakimaa kizpur chinarangu, tumanshishish ishitungarangiya.
Ashirangu, Jowakimpa wanasir tsiyatarangsin, kapung chinarangiya. Anush Babiloniyash kurak putamaw zapantaa taarangsin, itaru Jowakimaa kapung chinarangu, wanasir naparangiya.
Amb kurak ashirangu, Jowakimsha anush kissha taarangiya. Tumanamash kamartarangu, anoo yusheeru, nllitarisha wanasir kamartarangu, kurakpasha washunand kuxineersin, katungaranganaya. Amb ashirangu kissha anush taarangiya.
Anumun arangeem kurak Babiloniyshuch Jowakimaam watungasheemsha ichingaru zar katungamaam wayarangiya. Ashirangu, kissha taaku, wachinayaru, anshurisha Babiloniyash tsiparangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Jowakim Babiloniyash tsap tsiparangu anootsi. [Wapparee. Watamcha tsiyatsis yuw Utaáchchee urkar kuzizimun taarangana ano.]





































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Persiyashuch urkar, Síru, sura, waanaatsisha Babiloniyashcheem urkar ínarangiya. Ndatuma minam masach tushiychu, Apanllee kuk tuminumaam tatsamoorangiya, yuwaa Jeremiyasarini tsiyatarangu anootsi. Ashiri Apanllsha Síroo mangu p'tseerangu, Sírsha Utaáchchee waptam wanpeetam watsapun zanganimaam chinarangiya. Ashiri waanaatsi tiptsir kamanirangu, mishat kirakamuntam yandarangu, tiptsireem ztaru tsiyatssee zanganirangiya.
Nuw Persiyashchi kuraki siyaa nuw tputsireetsi atina: Apanll Taarashipan waamari kasiru anu, nuwaa tputsee ztaru ksutamaam kurakaam ínarangiya. Sheeru, nuwaa waama pangu yakat Irusarinush, Utaásh tsap pangumaam kamachtarangiya.
Ashiri siysa Apanllis tiptsiris yuwis Apanlleem pang' pangumaam zandkis anis, Irusarinap, Utaáp tsap, kanapungtsa. Siy Israelchichis Apanllee chinakus, Apanllsha siyash Irusarinush uru taachiya. Ashiriya, siysa Utaáchchis Irusarinap naayarus, anush Apanlleem pangumatssa. Siy Israelchichis uru Apanllee chinaksa. Mishat, Apanll siyash Irusarinush uru taachiya.
Itaru, siy Utaáchchis, yuwshtis Irusarinap kanapumaam ngatkis anis, maachtapa istakus taangtsa. Orootstam, misha katungtseetstam panangtsa. Wakarareetstamtis, opeejaatstam panakus taangtsa. Mishat, kurikpatatam istangtsa, Apanlleem pang' Irusarinush pangumaama, kurak Síru kamachtaku tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Síru Utaáchchee, Irusarinap kanapungints, tárangu anootsi.
Ashiri Apanll tputsee mangu p'tseerangu, Utaáchich tputs, mishat Benjaminchichtam tputs maachiri, mishat apanllpantam, Leviychichpatatam ichingurusin zapan tputs waanpatatin, Pza, kanapeeni, Apanlleem pang' pangumaama, táranganaya.
Ashiri yuwshtisin kanapumaam nda zandarangana anshtisin, Ashiriya, iyshat maachtapa istachinipa, tárangusin, kurikee, orootstam, mishat wakaraatstam, opeejaatstam, maacheewaatstam kizpur wanasiri anuwaatstam panaranganaya. Zapan yuwaam Apanlleem pang' pangukana anoom panaranganaya. Mishat, yuw tputs waana zandarangana, an maacheetsi zapan Apanlleem zanganiranganaya.
Anumunsha, kurak Sírsha, muchchuree kuruzurangu, Siysa maachee ichinguru Apanllish pang' Irusarinush sirútama Nabukodonosor yarangu, anoo ashparit yáyarus, xanateerus, Utaáchcheem tuwanpungtsa. Nabukodonosor waana apanllirinshini pang' Babiloniyash wayarangu, anoo kurak Síru kamachtaku tárangiya.
Ashiri tputssha maacheetsi ichinguru yarangusin, Sírsha, waanaatsi urkir ksutamapanee, Mitridatee sur, kamachtarangu, Shiysha ichinguru tácheerush, tatsamooru Utaáchcheem gobernador, Sesbasaraam panangcha, kurak tárangiya. Ashiri Mitridatissha ichingaru maachee táchirangu,
30 mangaw kapungamash orpa chumbeepimashpa tinam, mishat, 1,000 mangawatam orpa mburshimashpata tinam, anumunsha 29 k'chiru kizpur wanasirimish,
mishat 30 mangawtam waashi orpa chumbeepimashpa tinama, 410 mangawtamta waashi orpa mburshimashpa tinama, anumun arangeem 1,000 maachee zapan nllitaritaw táchirangtamta. Anoo ichinguru táchirangu, Utaáchcheem gobernador tuwanpurangiya.
Ashiri ichinguru washunandari maachi ashpari orpa chumbeepimashpa tinama, misha orpa mburshimashpa tinam maachee ashpirit 5,400 tuwanpurangusin, anoo Sesbasar yarangiya. Utaáchich tputs zapan masach Babiloniyash tsap taarangsin, itaru kuraksha Sírsha, Na kanapungints, tárangu, Babiloniyash tsap shitungeerandsin waptamta Irusarinap kanapuranganaya.
Tputssha tsap Utaáp kanapeeshinusin, ichingarusin yaptam zitaminarini sirútama taarangana ambtam kanapuranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Israelchich waptam Irusarinap kanapumaam chinarangana anootsi.





































































Irusarinash kuseersin, pangurangusin, mazareemsha mzarangitamsin, 7 tsup tarawaztarangusin, iwaparanganaya. Ashirangsin anush, Na pzaya. Irusarinush shaniyeeni, tárangusin, ichingarusin Irusarinap naataranganaya.
Ashiri anush apanllpansha urkar Josuey, Josadak wipa, apanllpanee ichingaru kuruzurangu, Ashiri natu, Apanlleem tazumaam kayateeni chineetsini muchimaama, Josuey tárangiya. Apanllpansha ichingarusin, mishat yakat Irusarinshuch kurak, Sorobabela sura, Sálatiela wipa, maachiritpatatamta, Apanlleem tazumaam kayatamaam chtaranganaya. Yuwaa Móysisarini Apanll wamachtash kamanirangu, anuritam tuminumaam, chinootstam Apanlleem muchimaam zandaranganaya.
Minshuch tputs, nda Utaáchich, Irusarinnung watsirit taarangana, anootssha Utaáchich puniranganaya. Itaru ashiritaa, tarawaztaranganaya. Apanlleem tazumaam yuwashutam sirútama wayarangana anshutam wayaranganaya. Anoo iwaparangusin, Apanlleem muchiranganaya. Puturi, mishat pukamchitam muchiranganaya.
Mishat, zar yuwash masharpa tambtarangana ansha tsup tatsamoorangu, tputssha ichingarusin shambatamaam shaniyaranganaya. Apanllee kamachtamarini tuminurangsin, apanllpansha wakaraa, mishat opeejaatstam puturit pachat, pukamachsha pachat ashiranganaya.
Anumunsha, kaneesich tsup tututkachu anushsha shambatkusin, Apanlleem yusur ashparitam wakaraa pacharanganaya. Mishat, yuwash Apanlleetssha wappari támaam shaniyarangtamsin, anushsha ashparitam wakaraa, misha opeejaatstam pacharanganaya. Tputs waantari zandarangsin, arangeem Apanlleem maachta panaranganaya.
Ashiri ndaturita Apanlleem pang' pangursin, uru Apanlleem tazumaam kayataranganaya. Sheersin, anush chínootssha muchiranganaya. Tsup Octubrish kaneeschiri yáyaru, anush Apanlleem muchimaam chtaranganaya.
Apanlleem pang' pangumaam tatsamoorangu, ashiri pangumpaneetssha, misha karpinterootstam kuruzurangsin, tsiyatarangsin, Tarawuztakchis anoom kurik tuwapchintspa, táranganaya. Mishat, Tirshuchee, mishat Sidonshucheetstam tputs karipanaa yushindamaam kamachtaranganaya, watam kurak Síru, shingints, táranguwa. Katungatspa, vinpa, mishat wayungunpatatam, tuwapchintspa, táranganaya. Ashiri uwshtisin, Ayu, tárangusin, machip Libanup naatarangsin, karipanaa katspayarusin, marish kung yushindaranganaya, patussishu yakat Jopshu. Ashiri Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chtarangusin,
yuwamun tputs Irusarinap kanapurangana, anumun minum masach tushiyramachu, anumunsha tsimbunatam tsup anush Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chtaranganaya. Sorobabela, Sálatiel wipa, mishat Josuey, Josadak wipa, apanllpanpatatam, Leviychichpatatam yuwatamsin tputs Irusarinush shaneerana, anshuchtam ichingarusin tarawaztamaam chtaranganaya.
