Ashiri Leviychich tputs, yuwanandari wachina masachirini veintimunari yaru, an tarawzipanee ksutamaam kamachtaranganaya.
Itaru, kaapaneeritana kurak tuchip taaranganaya. Apanllpan urkar Josuey, mishat Kadmira, Leviychich tputs, mishat Henadad Leviychichtam tputs, ichingurusin wipaptari, zoonllpa, washunanda tarawzipanee ksutaranganaya.
Ashiri pangumpansha tsapoo wantsush ktseeyarusin, patuzinazeem patumbich tinam zapan pashuchuranganaya. Sheersin, iwaparangusin, tputssha mang' ksaksin shambataranganaya. Apanllpansha urkar wamari wanasirimshee kamartarangu, wakaraa wits yáyaru, puu puu tárangana, anoo tputssha mazinayarusin, kusarteersin, ichingarusin Apanllee ungirtarangana. Leviychich, yasimpan Asafarinchich tputs, tamburaa yáyarusin, tamburtaksin, Apanllee mang' kis shambatkusin yaseeranganaya. Yuwaa kurak Dapiyarini Asafarinchichee sirútama yasimaam kamachtarangu, anoo yaseeranganaya.
Tputs ichingarusin Apanllee yaseeranganaya. Yaseeksin, Wappari, Apaa. Shiy kizpur wanasirtishcha. Israelchicheetsini kizpur chinaksha. Nda iyaa mbizaksha. Urutamari chinaksha. Amb yaseeksin, atusin zamamtar ashiranganaya. Apanllee Taarashipani kis ungirtaranganaya, watam Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chtaranganawa.
Kizpur wachinawa tputsi, yuw sirútama nllurtama Apanllee pang' parangana, anshatssin tanuranganaya, watam kaneesichsha pangumaam chtaranganawa. Apanllpan wachina, Leviychichtam, mishat tputs ichingarusin wachinawa tanuranganaya. Anpuritam zar ichingurusin zamangaranganaya, mang' ksaksina.
Wachinaw tputs zapan tanuksin, mishat tputs zapantam mang' ksaksin yasiyastar ashirangsin, zamangarangana. ¿Chak tanuka? ¿Chak yaseeka? tputs tárangitaatssin itaru, yasamaam pinasaranganaya. Washunandari tputs zapan tanuksin, yaseeksin, Jay, jay, atusin, kapung zamangaranganaya. Arapchitaa tputs anoo mazinarangitamsinaya, watam arap kimaranguwa. Apanlleem pang' pangumaam chtarangana anoo kamaneena.
Ashiriya, Utaáchich mishat Benjaminchichtam undarar Utaásh tsap taarangitamta, yuw Asiriyshuch urkar anush tsap wayarangu anu. Uwshtisin tsiyatssee mazinaranganaya. Utaáchich wapitam watsapuni kanapurangsin, yusur Irusarinush Apanlleem pang' pangukanaya, tárangana. Anoo mazinarangusin,
Pza, pangani Irusarinpi, táranganaya. Irusarinush kuseersin, Sorobabelpat, mishat Israelchichpatatam wachin tsiyataranganaya. Apanllee iy ungirtaktamanicha. Yuwapur kurak Isaradon, Asiriyshuch urkar, iyaa nish tsap wayarangu, anpur iysha Apanllee ungirtataritamaniya. Chineetstamani Apanlleem muchtariniya. Ashirucha, iysha Apanlleem pang' pangumaam siyaam istamaam zandkitamaniya, táranganaya.
Itaru, Sorobabelsha, Josueypat, mishat Utaáchchitam urkar ichingarusin yamarangsin, Nduni. Siy iyaam istamaam waritacheeja, ndambaree. Watam kurak Síru, Persiyashuch urkar, iyaatsimari, Siy Israelchichis Apanllireemis Taarashipaneem pangungints, táranguwa. Ashirucha, siy istamaam pinasaksa. Iyamari panguchinipa, tárangusin, tputsee waptam zanganiranganaya.
Ashiri tputssha waptam kanapeerandsin, Utaáchich Apanllee pang' nda pangumaam tamundat tamundat ashirangsin, uwshtisin puniranganaya. Kis tarawaztamaam pinasaranganaya.
Arangeem undararsha urkar waanaa tiptsireem kurikee tuwaparangu, Siysa Irusarinap naakchus, Apanlleem pang' pangukana anoo ksangints táshinints, tárangiya. Ashiriya, Irusarinap naakchusin, mantsir Utaáchchee tsiyataranganaya. Utaáchichsha tputs Apanlleem pang' pangumaam puniksin, kasaranganaya. Washunand 20 masach nda tarawaztarangana. Yuwapur Persiyashuch kurak Sír taarangu, anpur nda tarawaztaksin, Sírsha tsiparangu, anumunsha Artarjerjes kurakaam kinarangu, anushsha nduntam tarawaztarangana. Zapishsha Daríysha Persiyashcheem kurak kinarangu, anshunaa yusur tarawaztamaam chtaranganaya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Utaáchchee undarar xarashish kapung wayarangana anootsi.



















Ashiriya, Apanllee kuk kamanimapansha Haguew, mishat Sakáriyastam Apanllee kuk Utaáchcheem Irusarinush kamanirangana. Mishat, Utaáchichtam tputs yuw arangeem Utaá tsap taarangana, anoomtam kamaniranganaya.
Ashirucha, kurak Sorobabelsha, misha Josueytam Apanllee kuk mazinarangusin, Ashiriya, Apanlleem pang' panguyani, táyarusin, yusur pangumaam chtaranganaya. Haguewtam, Sakáriyastam tputseem istaranganaya.
Itaru, yuwapur Apanlleem pangumaam yusur chtarangana, anpur gobernadorsha Tatenay Irusarinush kusarangiya. Kuraksha Daríy Tatenayaa kung Eufratis arachich, yap zar pshtuku amb taarangana, anoo ksutamapaneem ipusarangiya. Ashiri Tatenaysha, wipunashpata Setar-Bosnayi, mishat istampanpatatam Irusarinush kuseersin, Utaáchcheetssha urkar tsiyatarangu, ¿Chaksha siyaa Apanlleem pang' pangumaam kamachtayaru, siysa panguksa? ¿Chak siyaa shingints, táranga? ¿Siy kurakaris chaka suru? Tatenay tárangiya. Utaáchichsha ichinguru kamaniranganaya.
<range>
Itaru, Apanllsha Utaáchchee urkar ksutarangu, Tatenaysha nda tsiyantarangiya. Ashiri natumasamta tarawaztamaam ksarintspa. Itaru, nuwsha kurak Daríypat yasachimasima. Kirak kurakaam zanganchima. ¿Amcheeja uwa? Ashiriya, kurak nuwaa kamankachu, nuwsha siyaa kamanchintspa, táyaru kasarangiya.
Ashiri Tatenay wipunashpat kirakaa yandaku kurakaam Daríyoom táranganaya.
Kurakaa Daríyoo, ¿tamarimta? ¿Wanasiri taarish? ¿Nda kas yutakish? ¿Tputsirish mapiyrsin taarana?
Ashiri shiyaa kurakaa, tsiyatsis kamanimaam zandkina. Ashiri itsinsaru kamanchinllpa. Nuw ipunshipti Utaáchchip tsap naataranganiya. Irusarinush kusaranguni, Utaáchich tputs Apanlleem pang' panguksin paranginiya. Apanll waamari kasiru anoom pangukanaya. Patumbich kapungumashpat pangukanaya. Tandapunuzeemsha na karipanpata tandapunukchinllina. Ashiri mangpatari tarawaztaksin, mikeeru uru iwapachpasinaya.
Iysha masharanguni, Siy kurakaris, ¿chaka suru? Mishat, ¿tarawzu ksutamapan chaka suru? táranginiya. Shiyaa kamanimaam masharanginiya. ¿Chaksha siyaa Apanlleem pang' yusur pangumaam kamachtayaru, siysa panguksa? ¿Chak siyaa shingints, táranga? tárangitamaniya. Utaáchichsha,
<range>
Iy Apanlleetsimari waamari kasiru anoo chinakuni, Apanlleem pang' yusur kaneesich pangukaniya. Sirútamasa iyashuch kurak, yuw kizpur taarangu an, Apanlleem pang' pangumaam kamachtarangu, kizpur wanasiri panguranganaya.
Itaru, iy zitaminarini Apanllee kapung tatsiyuntarangusin, Apanllsha, Tputs waani kasichpa, táyaru, kurakaa Nabukodonosoraa iyashchee kasimaam zanganirangiya. Nabukodonosorsha wasundururpat Irusarinshuchee kasirangu, Apanllee pang' izuuru kapeetarangiya. Sheeru, iyashchee ichinguroo Babiloniyap tsap machirangiya.
Anush Babiloniyash tsap kapung taaranguni, zapishsha kurak Sírurini Babiloniyshuchee kasirangu, kurakaam kinarangiya. Anumunsha, masach kaneesich yáyaru, anush kurak Sírurini iyaa Utaáchcheetsini Irusarinush Apanlleem pang' kaneesich pangumaama kamachtarangiya.
Sheeru, Sírurinsha Apanllish pang' maachee kizpur wanasireew, orpat tinama yuw Nabukodonosor waanpee watsapun yarangu, anu tuwanpumaam tiptsiree kamachtarangiya. Yanpuyaru, iyashcheem tputs Sesbasaraam, Utaáshcheem gobernador maacheetsi ichingaru tuwanpurangiya.
Kurak Sírurini, Sesbasaraam panarangu, Shiysha ichinguru yáyarush, yuwashtam sirú Apanllush pang' Irusarinush taarangu, anshutam wayashini. Apanlleem pang' panguyarus, anush wayangints, kurak Sírurini iyashchee kamachtaku tárangiya,
Ashiri Sesbasarsha Irusarinush kusarangu, Ashiri panguyani, tárangu, tputssha patuzinazee pashuchirangsin, Sesbasarsha istarangitamta. Tputs tarawaztakana an wand iwapamaam pishtakiya, táranganaya. Utaáchich kurak anoo iyaa kamaniranganaya.
Ashiriya, kurakaa Daríyoo, siyaam wanasiriya, ashiri shiysha tputsireetsish, kurak Sírurini wirkar nachungashinints tángcha, yuw Apanlleem pang' Irusarinush pangumaam kamachtarangu anootsi. Sírurinshini pang' taarparee, yuwash wirkar xanataru anshu. Anush napkachusin, pangachpasinaya. Ashiri shiysha, kurakaa Daríyo, Sírurineetsi kuk natstaramchush, iyaatssha kamaningcha yuw chinakish anootsi, Tatenay kirakaa yandaku, kurakaam Daríyoom táyaru, zanganirangiya.
Ashiriya, kurak Daríy Tatenayaa wirkar natstarangu, tiptsiree tárangiya. Mang kurak Sírurinee Apanlleem pang' Irusarinush yusur pangumaam tputsee kamachtarangiya. Ashiri siysa Sírurinee wirkar nachungashinints. Pangush yuwash kurak wirkar xanattaru anush nachungashinints, tárangiya.
Tiptsirsha kurakap pang', yakat Ekbatanush, Mediyanush tsap nachungarangusin, kirakaa yandama, kuraka Sírurini yandamarini paranganaya. Anoo kiraka natstarangusin, tárangiya.
Síru, Babiloniyashcheem kurak kaneesich kinarangu, tiptsiree kirakaa yandamaam kamachtarangiya. Nuwaa kuki yandayarus, tputsireemi zanganingtsa, tárangiya. Ashiriya, kirak yandam tárangiya. Apanlleem pang' Irusarinush sirú taarangu, anshutam yusur pangungints. Siysa Israelchichis tsapunpitamtis kanapungtsa. Yusur Apanlleem pang' pangumatssa. Patuzinazeem patumbichpat pashucheerus, anumun pangungtsa. Wazuranirini 27 metro, wamanirini 27 metrotam pangungints. Pangum iwaparamchus, wakaraatstam, opeejaatstam Apanlleem muchingtsa.
Patumbich kapungumash wayakatara sheerus, yusur anumunsha tsimbunarinsha patumbchitam wayayarus, tuchparinsha patumbchitamta tushurangayarus ksangtsa. Anumunsha iwaz táwar kaneesich yáyarus, patumbchimun tandapunungtsa. Nuwsha nuwaanaatsi kurikiree ksutamapanee kamachtachima ichinguru tuwapamaama.
Mishat, yuw maachee Apanllish pang' Irusarinush sirú taarangu, orpa tinama, misha ur mburshimashpatatam tinama, anoo Nabukodonosor yátarangu, waanshu watsapun wayarangu, anoo tuwanpungcha. Irusarinpitam, yuwash Apanllish pang' sirútama taarangu anshutam wayangcha. Kurak Sír kirakamun yandaku, Israelchicheem tputs tárangiya.
Ashirucha, kurak Daríysha, anoo natstayaru, gobernadoroom Tatenayaam kirak yandarangiya. Mishat, wipunasheemtam Setar-Bosnayi, mishat tiptsireemtam yuw kung Eufratisa arachich tputsee ksutamapan taarana ambcheemtam tputs, ichingaroom kirakaa yandarangiya. Siysa Irusarinshuchee tamundarintspa.
Utaáchich urkar wipunashpatari waanee Apanlleem pang' panguchpa. Yuwashtam sirú taarangu anshutam yusur panguchpa. Siysa muntarintspa.
Itaru, Utaáchcheem tarawzupaneem kurikpat istangtsa, watam nuw ashiru kamachtakinawa. Siy kung Eufratis arachich taakis anis, yuwapat kurik nuwaam zangankis anpat nuwsha yuwaam Apanlleem pang' pangukana anoom tuwapachima. Kurikee panamaam zapshtarinllpa. Tarawzupaneem kurik nda pshitaku kasamaama.
Mishat, apanllpan siyaa mashkusin, wakaraatstam putam mashta, putam mashta ashkusin, opeejaatstam, Apanlleem muchimaam mashkusin, siysa tatsamooru panangtsa. Mishat, tirikootstam, yumeetstam, vinootstam, wayungunootstam apanllpan mashku, siysa panangtsa.
Ashiri apanllpansha ichingaroo yáyaru, Apanlleem yuw waamari kasiru, kanindush taaku, anoom muchkachu, nuwaam kurakaami, ipareemtamti istamaam Apanllee mashachpa.
Ashiri siysa kurakis tputsireetsis nuwaa kuki kamaningtsa. Tputs nda nuwaa kamachtamari tuminkusin, siysa anoo waansshu pangu yasinaa yusheerus, anpatatam waanaatsi pachayarus, ksangtsa. Pang' waani ichipambayaru pantsachpa, átana.
Apanll waana Irusarinush taarasheem wayarangiya. Ashiriya, nllitarit tputs, kuraktaati, nduntaati ashiru nllitaritpich tsap, Apanlleem pang' Irusarinush pangumaam tayutaritkinaariya, ashiru siysa anoo pachayarus ksangtsa. Nuw kuraki Daríyi anoo kamachtakina. Ashiriya, siysa nuwaa kuki izuuru tuminungtsa, átana, kurak Daríy yandaku, tárangiya. Ashiri na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Daríy tiptsiree Utaáchcheem istamaam kamachtarangu anootsi.
Ashiri gobernador Tatenaysha, yuw kung Eufratis arachich tputseem ksutarangu, mishat istamapantam Setar-Bosnay, wipunashpatatam an ichingurusin kurakaa kuk mazinarangusin, izuuru tuminuranganaya.
Ashiri, Israelchichsha kurak tiptsirpatari Apanllee kuk kamanimapanee Haguew, mishat Sakáriyastam kuk mazinarangusin, kis tarawaztaranganaya. Ashirangsin, musásiri Apanlleem pang' pangumaam iwaparanganaya. Apanllee kuk tuminurangsin, mishat Persiyashcheetstam kurak Sírurini, Daríyootstam, Artarjereetstam kuk payurangusin, wanasir tarawaztarangusin, iwaparanganaya.
Ashiri yuwapur Daríy 6 masach Persiyashcheem kurak taarangu, anpur Apanlleem pang' pangumaam izuuru yuwaparangana. Marsush tsup, zar tuchparinshini ashiranganaya.
Ashiri mang' ksaksin, ashpiritssin Israelchich yuw waanpee watsapun kanapurangana, apanllpantam, Leviychichtam an kis Apanllish pang' shaniyaranganaya. Apanllee mashkusin. Apaa, shaanaatsi pangish iwaparanginiya. Na shaana nish pangusish iyaa ksutamaam urutamari taangcha, tárangusin, shambataranganaya.
Ashirangsin, Apanllee ungirtaksin, wakaraa wip 100 putayarusin, opeejaatssha upapchir 200 putayarusin, anumunsha opeejaatstam wip 400 putayarusin, Apanlleem muchiranganaya. Arangeemsha 12 chipootstam putayarusin, minchicheem tputs minamtawamari chipoo pacharanganaya, yutaritshishirineetsi tachingamaama. Ashpari 12 chip Israelchicheem tputs pacharanganaya.
Sheersin, apanllpani, Aaronarinchichee, Apanlleem pang' ksutamaam wayaranganaya. Minuma tputs wipaptari minamtam siman ksutamaam wayaranganaya. Sheeru, minootssha tputs arangtachsha siman ksutamaam wayat, arangeem mishat tputs wayat ashiranganaya. Anumunsha Leviyarinchicheetstam yasimpaneem, Apanllee ungirtamaam wayaranganaya. Mishat, Apanllish pang' ksutamaam wayarangitamsina. Yuwari Móysisirin sirútama kirakamun yandarangu, anuritam tuminaranganaya.
Anshurtatam tsup katursish zar ashpari tputs, yusur shaniyaranganaya. Apanll zitaminarineetsi Ijiptosh tsap tapachindarangu, an zar tatsamoorangu, uwshtisin anush zar mang' kis shambatamaam shaniyaranganaya.
Apanllpan tputs, mishat Leviyarinchichtam ndatuma tputs kusarusin, Apanllish tachitamaam wasina yutaritshishirineetsini Apanllpat yararanganaya. Ashiri zurampatari mang' yararangsin, opeejaa wip ichingaroom tputs pacharanganaya. Mishat, waanpatatssin, apanllpanpatatssin waanaatsee opeejarini pacharangitamsina. Mang' ksaksin ashirangana, watam waanshu watsapun yusur kusarangsin, anush taaranganawa.
Ashiri ichingaru Israelchich tputs yuw Babiloniyamand kanapurangana an, mishat Utaáchichtam tputs yuw nda Babiloniyap naatarangana, antamsin anshutam washunand shaniyaranganaya. Tputs yutaritshishpaneetssha kasarangusin, waanitaritssin taar ashiranganaya. Ashiri Israelchich tputs ichingarusin Apanllee Taarashipanee, Israelchichee Apanllirini, kis ungirtaranganaya.
Ashiri tsimbun matayaru zar pangaa nda tputaru anoom katungamaam shaniyaranganaya. Shambatkusin, kis shaniyaranganaya. Yuwamand Apanll Persiyashchee urkar mang' p'tseerangu, Siy Israelchichis Apanllireemis pang' pangungints. Nuwsha kurikpat istachintspa, tárangu, anumand Apanllsha tiptsiree mangooz ksashish pshtarangu, kis shambataranganaya. Ashiri na kamaneena yuwaa Israelchich izuuru Apanllimun shambatarangana anootsi.
Ashiri zapishsha 58 masach tushiyramachu anush yuwapur Persiyashuch kurak Artarjeri taarangu, anpur Utaáchich tputs, Esdra sura, Babiloniyash tsap taarangiya. Esdar Aaronarinchichimuncha tputsi, Aaron yuw chtakchuri apanllpaneem kurak kinarangu anu. Esdar wapar Serayamuncha. Serayassha wapar Asariyasamuncha. Asariyassha wapar Hilkiyasamuncha.
Hilkiyassha wapar Salummuncha. Salumsha wapar Sadokamuncha. Sadoksha wapar Ahitubamuncha.
Ahitubsha wapar Amariyasamuncha. Amariyassha wapar Asariyasamuncha. Asariyassha wapar Merayotamuncha.
Merayotsha wapar Serayasamuncha. Serayassha wapar Usimuncha. Ussha wapar Bukimuncha.
Buksha wapar Abisuwamuncha. Abisuwsha wapar Finesamuncha. Finessha wapar Elíyasamuncha. Elíyassha wapar Aaronamuncha, yuw apanllpaneem urkar ichtaru kinarangu anu.
Esdar Apanllee kuk tayapstampani taarangiya. Yuwaa Taarashipan, Israelchich Apanllirini, Móysisarinee kamachtarangu, anoo Esdarsha ichingaru yasarangiya. Ashiri Apanllimun mang' taturangu, Apanllsha uru Esdraa istarangiya. Esdar watsapunip kanapumaam zandku, kurakaa Artarjeree masharangu, uwsha kukoo nda kapeetarangiya. Ashiri waritachparee. Kanapungi tsapunpish, tárangiya,
Ashiri Artarjeri 7 masach Persiyashcheem kurak kinaru taachu, anush Esdar Israelchichpa tputs apanllpantam, mishat Leviychichtam, Apanllee yasimpantam, Apanllee pang' ksutamapanitam, apanllpaneem istamapanitam yápandayarandsin, Babiloniyaa tsap kasayarusin, Irusarinap naataranganaya.
Artarjeri kurakaam kinaru, 7 masachirini, tsup minamarita kaneeschiri yáyaru, anush Esdar Babiloniyaa tsap shitungeerandsin, naarsin, Apanll kapung istarangu, ipunpunar tsup kachingkachu, zameepatarinsha tsup kaneesich yáyaru, anush Irusarinush kusaranganaya. Esdar, Apanllee kizpur chinaku, Apanllee kuk natstakuri uru payukuri taachima. Sheeri, Israelchichee tputs Apanllee kamachtamarinee payumaam tayapstachima, mangush chinarangu, tárangiya.
<range>
<range>
Ashirucha, Kurak Artarjeri; Watam Esdar kizpur Apanllee mangoonkuwa. Yuwaa Apanll Taarashipan, sirú Israelchichee kamachtarangu anoo ichingaru yasakiya, kurak mangush chinaku, átu, Esdar ndatuma naaru, kurak kirakaa yandayarangu panarangiya.
Ashiri kirakamun átu, kurak Artarjeri yandarangiya. Nuw Kuraki Artarjeri shiyaam Esdraa yandakina. Shiy apanllpantishcha. Apanll waamari kasiru anoo shiy mangoonaksha. Kukootstam ichinguru payuksha.
Ashiri nuw shiyaa atina, Shiyachich tputs, Israelchich, yuw nuwash tsapuni taakana an, wandaya Irusarinap kanapumaam zandkusin, shiyapa kanapchinllinpa. Apanllpantam tputs zandkusin, Leviychichtam tputs waana zandkusin, kanapchinllinpa, átana.
Ashiri shiysha kanapkachush, yasangcha. ¿Kamapa Utaáchich tputs Apanllee wamachtash payukanaya? anoo yasangcha. Shiy uru Apanllee kuk payuksha. Ashiri yasangcha. Anoom nuw shiyaa zanganchinllpa. Mishat, yuw tputs nuwaam istakana anu, 7 tputsi yasamaam zandkitamsinaya.
Ashiri nuwsha istampanpatatam oroo chumbeepimashee, mishat oroo mburshimasheetstam shiyaam mangutariti panachinipa. Shiysha anoo Irusarinush kuskachush, Apanllish pang' wayangcha. Ashiri naakchush, kurikee yáyarush payutachcha.
Mishat, Babiloniyashuchtam tputs waana zandkusin, shiyaam mangutari orootstam panachpasinaya. Ashiri shiysha anoo ichinguru yángcha. Mishat, shiyachich tputs, apanllpantamta, Apanlleem pang' Irusarinush kurikee, mishat maachtaatstam mangutari shiyaam panachinllinaya. Ashiri shiysha anoo yáyarush, Apanllish pang' wayangcha.
Ashiri anpa kurik pxanxangcha, wakaraatstam, mishat wakaraatstam wip, mishat opeejaatstam wip, mishat yuw maachta Apanlleem urutari wayakis, tirikoo, vinoo aship paxanxeerush Irusarinush Apanllish pang' muchingcha.
Ashiri yuwaa ur chumbeepimash, misha ortam mburshimashi katuchim taaru, anoo shiysha ipunashpatish Apanllpat yasayarus, yuw siyaam wanasiri anumari shingtsa.
Itaru, shiysha yuwaa tputs maacheetsi Apanlleem kizpur wanasiri wayarangana, anoo shiysha yáyarush, Apanllish pang' izuuru wanasiritam wayangcha, Apanllee ungirtamaama.
Ashiri Apanllireemis pang' maachi pshatakinaariya, ashiriya, nuwaanaatsi kurikiri ksutamapaneem mashangcha. Uwsha shiyaam panachiya.
Mishat, nuw kuraki Artarjeri, ichinguroo kurikee ksutamapani tputs yuw kung Eufratis arachich taakana anoo kamachtakina. Apanllpan Esdar mashku, siysa anoo panangtsa. Zapshtarintspa. Mikeerus panangtsa, atina. Esdraa watam Apanllee waamari kasiru anoo kapung mangoonkiya. Apanllee kamachtamarini ichinguru yasakiya. Apanlleetstam kuk tputseem tayapstakiya. Ashiri siysa istangtsa. Xarashish wayarintspa.
Ashiri uwsha siyaa maacheetsi mashku siysa 3,300 kilo oroo mburshimashee panamaam waritakiya. Mishat, tirikoo mashku 22 mil litro panamaam waritartamta. Anumunsha vinoo mashku, 2,200 litro panamaam waritartamta. Wayungunoo mashku 2,200 litro panamaam waritartamta. Itaru, arangeem panarintspa. Mishat, yumeetstam mashku pchintintspa. Yuwaa siyaa mashku anoo uru panat panat shingtsa.
Ashiri Apanll kanindush taaku anoom waanshu pang' wayamaam kamachtaku, anoo siysa ichinguru yáyarus panangtsa. Mikeerus panangtsa. Ndunnaa ashkus, nuwaa Apanll wanichparee. Ipareetstamti, mishat tputsireetstamti ichingaru wanichtamparee. Ashiri siysa mangiptis taangtsa.
Mishat, siysa kurikee yampanis, apanllpanee tputs kurikee yamaam mashintspa. Mishat, Leviychicheetstam, Apanllish pang' yasimpan taakana, anootstam, mishat Apanllish pang' ksutamapaneetstam, Kurikee pananda, tárintspa.
Ashiri shiyaatssha Esdra atitamana. Apanll shiyaa mangeemish kapung panarangiya waanaatsee mangoonamaama. Ashiri shiysha tputsee ipusangcha, tputspat tsiyatssee wanasiri yaramaama. Mishat, gobernadoroomtam ipusangcha. Tputsee ichinguru istachu, anoom natstayarush, wayangcha, kung Eufratis arachich taakana anoo ksutamaama. Yuw Apanllee kuk mangoonkana anoo ipusangcha. Itaru, shiysha ichinguru tputsee Apanllee kuk tayapstangcha. Nda mangoonkana anoo, misha yuwaatstam mangoonkana anootstam tayaspatangcha.
Ashiri tputssha Apanllee kamachtamarinee payumaam ngatkusin, misha nuwaatstam kuki nda payuksin, shiysha waneengcha. Pachamaam waritariya. Nduniya ashiru arap minup tsap zanganingcha. Nduniya ashiru, Kurik tuwapangi, tángcha. Kurikee tuwapamaam ngatkeesinaya, tumanangtsa. Ashiri Esdraa, nuw kuki watamaricha shiyaa tsiyatamaam zandarangi anu, Kurak Artarjeri kirakash yandaku táyaru, Esdraam panarangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Artarjeri Esdraa kapung chinarangu, kirakaa yandayaru panarangu anootsi.
Esdar Apanllpa tsiyatku, Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha. Shiyaa iycha aparini. Iyaa zitaminarini kapung istarangsha. Na iyaatstam istaktamsha. Kurakaa mangu p'tseerangush, shiyaamtam pangish Irusarinash kizpur wanasir wayamaam iyaa kamachtarangiya.
Mishat, shiy nuwaa istarangush, Persiyashuch kurak, istampantam, ichingarusin nuwaa waanasir naparanganaya. Nuwaa chinampa tsiyatarangsin, Shaana Israelchichee tputs yuw kizpur wanasiri anoo tushaneeyarush, washunand ipuneerus, saanpee tsapunis kanapungtsa, nuwaa táranganaya. Ashiri Apaa, shiyamun mangi ksakina, Esdar Apanllpa tsiyatku ántar ashirangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Esdar Apanllpa tsiyatku tárangu anootsi. [Nuw Esdari siyaam yandarangina. Watamcha nuw koki.]































































































Watacha nuw Nehemiyasi kuki, Akaliyasi wipi. Yuwapur kurak Artarjeri 20 masach Persiyashuch tputs kurakaam kinaru taarangu, anpur nuwsha Nehemiyasi yakat Susash kurakpat taarangina. Nuw kurakaa Artarjereem yásimapan taarangina.
Ashiri nuw Noviembrish tsup yakat Susash taaruri, nuw zuwanlli, sur Hanani, nuwash kusarangiya. Tputspa ipunarusin Utaásh tsap káyashinusin, nuwash kusaranganaya. Ashiri nuwsha zoonlleetsi Irusarinaa masharangina. ¿Yakat Irusarina tamarimta? Mishat, iyashuch tputs, yuw Irusarinap kanapurangana an na ¿tamaru taakanaya? tárangina.
Zuwanllshiti, Babiloniyaa tsap kasarangitaatini, yaanshusha tsap Utaásh taakuni, ashiritaa nda kis taakaniya. Mishat, pazikaniya. Irusarin tandapunuz kapeetamcha. Mishat, shitungashitam wach kawamarisha kawaru taariya. Anoo washtangashee sumasush muchirangsin, na wand ashimashurisha taakaniya, zuwanlli nuwaa kamanku tárangiya.
Ashiri nuwsha anoo tsiyatsis mazinaranguri, kapung mangi mantsakuri, tanurangina. Mangi mantsaranguri, nda katungamaam waritarangina. Amb ashkuri mangurangina. Apanllpasha tsiyatarangina.
Apaa, shiyamari kasirush kanindush taaksha. Shiy kizpurtishcha. Shiy shaanaatsi kukish nda pakchiyam kapeetaksha. Tputs shiyaa chinaksin, shiyaa kamachtamarish tuminkusin, shiysha anoom uru istakush, k'keetsish tatsamooksha.
Ashiri Apaa, nuwaa kuki mazinangcha, watam shiy nuwaa tputsirshawa. Kaschiritam, misha psaantam shiyaa mashkina. Tputsireetsish Israelchichee istamaama mashkina. Iy Israelchichini ichinguruni yutaritshishish pantsaranginiya. Mishat, nuwatam maachiriti ichinguruni ashparitani shiyaa kamachtamarish kapeetaranganiya.
Izuuru shiyaa kapung tatsiyuntaranginiya. Shiy Móysisarineetsi kamachtamareetsish kamanirangush, uwsha iyaa kamanirangtaa, itaru iysha anoo ichingaroo kapeetaranganiya.
Mishat, shiy Móysisarineetsi tárangitamtish. Tputsee kamaningcha; nuwaa kuki kapeetkinaareesinaya, ashiri nuwsha siyaa mapiycheezi. Uru minupsha tsap arap zanganchintspa, tárangsha Móysisarineetsi.
Itaru, Apaa, misha shiy tárangitamsha. Siy yusursha nuwaa chinakchus, misha nuwaa kamachtamari izuurasha payukchus, ashiri siy araptaa taakus minup tsapurunas, yusur siyaa yanpuyaruri, tsapunpitamtis machchintspa. Yuwashtam tsapuneemis ipusarangi, anshutam yusur wayachintspa, tárangsha.
Apaa, Iy Israelchichini ichingaruni shaanacha tputsirish. Shiy shaana iyaa wizpurirpatish tapachindarangsha.
Apaa, shiy yuwaa mashki anoo mazinangcha. Watam shiy nuwaa tputsirshawa. Mishat, nuw shiyaa kapung chinakina. Ashirucha, nuw shiyaa mashkina. Nuw kurakpat, Artarjeripa, tsiyatchima, Irusarinap kanapumaama. Ashiriya, shiysha Apaa, kurakaa mang' p'tseekchush, nuwaa kuki mazinakchu, Ayu, tákchu, kanapchima, nuw Nehemiyasi Apanllpat tsiyatkuri tárangina. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa nuw Nehemiyasi Israelchichee istamaam Apanllpa tsiyatarangi anootsi.
Anpur nuw, Nehemiyasi kurakaam Artarjereem yásimapan taarangina. Ashiriya, minush zari, tsup marsush, kurakaam vinoo yásiranguri, kuraksha yuwaa nuw mangi mantsaki, anoo sirú nda yasarangiya. Itaru, anumunsha nuwaa natstarangu,
¿Shiy mayaamsha mangish mantsaksha? Watam nda wanguytakshawa. Wanasirtishcha. ¿Ndusha shiyaam xarashish taar? kurak nuwaa tárangiya. Tárangu anush, nuwsha kapung punirangitaati, itaru kurakaa tsiyatarangina.
¡Kurakaa, urutamari shiy taachsha! Zurkutishcha nuwaa atatasha. Nuwaam xarashish taariya. Ashirucha, mangi kapung mantsaki, watam nuwaa yaktari, yuwash zitaminarinee mapurangana anoo, izuuru kapeetaranganawa. Mishat, tandapunuzeetstam wach sumasish muchirangtamsinawa, kurakaa tárangina.
Itaru, kuraksha, Ashiri nuwsha shiyaa istamaam ¿tamaycheezee? tárangiya. Ashiri nuwsha mangishiriti, Apanllee tsiyatkuri, Apaa, istanda, táranguri,
kurakaatssha; Shiy nuwaa chinakinaareesha, yakat Irusarinap, Utaáp tsap zanganingandama. Amb naakchuri, yusur yaktaa wanasiri yaramaam zandkina, watam anush nuwaa zitaminarinee mapuranganawa, tárangina.
Ashiri kuraksha, wizanllpa ipunanaw ashirangsin; Naakchush, ¿wanipaja zar apus maachish? Mishat, ¿wanipaja zar yusur ningtam kanapchish? kurak tárangiya. Ashiri nuwsha zaree itsinsaru kamaniranguri, kuraksha zanganimaam izuuru zandarangiya.
Ashiri nuwsha kurakaa, Nuwaa chinakeesha, kirakaa kurakaam yandayarush pananda. Ashiri nuwsha kung Eufratis tushiykchuri, kurakaam kirakaa panachima, nuwaa nda tuxaramaama. Amb ashkachuri, kuraksha nuwaa mapiyru tuzanganichusin, nuwsha Utaáp tsap kuschina.
Mishat, kirakaa, Asafaam manginaa ksutamapaneem yandangtamcha. Ashiri uwsha yasinaa katspamaaw, táwaraptari nuwaam panachiya. Ashkachu, nuwsha anpa yusur patuzinazeem wayachina, yuwash sundar ksutkana Apanllinung pangu. Mishat, tandapunuzeemtam wach washtungasheem kaneesich wayachima. Mishat, pangus yuwash nuw taachi anoomtamta, tárangina. Ashiri yuwaa masharangi anoo kuraksha nuwaam ichingaru istarangiya. Apanllsha waana kurakaa mangu p'tseerangu, kuraksha nuwaam istarangu, nda pakchiyam pachindarangiya.
Ashiri nuw Irusarinap naakchuri, kurak nuwaam ksutamaam sundaroo kapaachurineetstam zanganirangiya. Yap zar puku amb naataranguri, kung Eufratisaa kiteeramchuri, Artarjeree wirkar anshucheem kurak panarangina.
Itaru, tsimbun kurak, Horonshuch urkar, Sambalat suru, misha Amónshuchtam urkar, Tobíyasa suru, anshtisin mazinayarusin, kapung tsiyantaranganaya. Israelchicheetspari tputs istakatssin, ningeem kusaranganaya, atusin, tsiyantaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Artarjeri nuwaa Nehemiyasaatsi Irusarinap zanganirangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, nuw Nehemiyasi Irusarinash kusaranguri, tuchip zar kanusarangina.
Itaru, yuwaa Apanll nuwaa, Irusarinaa yarangcha, tárangu anoo nda tputsee kamanirangina. Ashiri tuchip zar kanusaranguri, anumunsha, psaan schirus nuw ipunshipti chiyzarangina. Minumamari burroo machiranguni, nuwamari anumun kuxinarangina. Itaru, ipunshi utspatari naatarangiya.
Anuritam psaan yaktaa tandapunuma shitungeeranlluri, tándsash naantachuri, tandapunuz kapeetamawa annungiri itsinsaru naaranginiya. Yapsha kung, sur tumuz kázamish, taaru amb naataranguri, anootssha tushiyaranlluni, yapsha chishee kapeetkana ambsha kusaranganiya. Ashiranguni, tandapunuz kapeetamawa naparanguni, mishat wachootstam washtangashee muchima parangitamaniya.
Sheeranlluni, aranginasha naataranguni, yap kung shtungataru, zaw shitaru taaku, amb kusaranganiya, yakta tandapunurangana annung wachu, kurakanung wakunguri. Itaru, anoo burruri tushiymaam pinasarangiya. Ashiri nuwsha wazawa tsapush karuwaranguri, arangeem tashtap tándsap naatarangina.
Sheeranlluni, anush psaanaritam, yakat tandapunuzee kapeetamawaa naparanginiya. Sheeruni, wapitam kanapuranganiya. Yaptam tandapunuzi shitungarangini, ambitam yaktashtam pshturanginiya.
Itaru, tputssha minumtiyam anoo nda yasaranganaya. Gobernadorshitisin yuwaa nuw psaan tandapunuzee napeeshini anoo nda yasarangitamanaya. Mishat, Utaáchchitam kurak, mishat apanllpantam, mishat kurakawtam tiptsir nda minamtiyam yasaranganaya. Watam Utaáchchee nda minamtiyam kamaniranginawa. Nuwaam tarawzu istapanda aturi, chinarangitaati, itaru nda wasina kamanirangina.
Ashiri putamsha tputsee kuruzuranguri, tputssha shaniyarangusin, nuwsha; Nish Irusarinush xarashish kapung taariya. Siy anoo yasaktamsa. Kundararini tandapunuzee ichipambarangusin, kapeetarangana. Mishat, ichinguru washtangasheetstam iwacheersin, sumasish muchirangana anoom nuwaam istanda. Washunand kaxayiruni, ashpartini Irusarinaa tandapunuzeem kaneesichsha, mishat washtangasheemtam kaneesichtam wayayani, átana, kundararini nda iyaa aranginasha tayutaritamaama, táranguri,
anumunsha yuwaatssha Apanll nuwaa istarangu, kurakaa Artarjeree mang' p'tseerangu; Istachintspa, tárangu, anoo ichingaroo tputsee kamanirangitamana. Ashiri tputssha anoo mazinayarusin; Ashiri mikeeruch chtayaruch, yakta tandapunuzeem pangunda átparee, táranganaya. Mang' kis istamaam zandaranganaya.
Itaru, Sambalatsha, mishat Tobíyassha, mishat Arabiyashuchtam tputs, Guersem suru, iyaa yasarangusin, tsiyantaranganaya. Iyash kusarangsin, ¿Tamaksasa siya? ¿Mayaamsha siy ashiksa? Ashiri siy kurakaa izuuru kasimaam zandakpasa, iyaa tárangusin, tayutaritaranganaya.
Itaru, nuwsha yamaranguri; Apanll waamari kanindash kasiru taaku an, waana iyaa istachiya. Iy Apanlltanicha wamachtashini. Ashiri tandapunuzee yusur wanasir wayamaam iyaa waana istachiya. ¿Antaati siy Irusarinshucheezis kurakis? Siy iyaa kamachtamaam wanindaja. Mishat, ¿antaati siy Irusarinshuchis tputsis? Zitaminarinis nda minumtiyam nish taataranaya. ¿Ashiri siy mayaama tsiyatchis? Yaani tarawaztayaruni, tandapunuzee yareeruni kasachiniya, tárangina. Ashiriya, na kamaneena nuw Nehemiyasi tandapunuzee wanasir yaramaam tsiyatarangi anootsi.
































itaru Sambalatsha, yuwaa tandapunuzee yaramaam tarawaztakani anoo mazinarangu, kapung iyaa tsiyantaku, iyash kuseeru, mantsir tsiyatarangiya.
Tsiyantaksin, wipunashpa, mishat Samariyashuchpatatam sundar, iyash shaniyarangsin, tsiyatkusin táranganaya. ¿Ngutis siy Utaáchchis xangitamawis ashishtangatssa? ¿Antaati siy waritareezis? ¿Antaati minamari zar yakta tarawaztakus, iwapcheezis? Sheeru, ¿yusur chineetsis Apanlleem muchcheezis? ¿Chak siyaa piy shingints táranga? Mishat, ¿chakaja patumbich aship pátangam xanaru anoo yusur yáyaru, tandapunuzeem kaneesichsha kayateech? Sambalat tárangiya.
Wipunashsha Tobíyas, Amónshuch tputs, aranginasha starangusin, tsiyatku; Waaj, mangutari ashishtaranaya. Anumun tandapunuzimun xupshitaparee kárkachu, tunupkachu, tpaw támchiya, tárangiya. Mangu iyaa Utaácheetsini natsaksin táranganaya.
Ashiri nuwsha Sambalataa kuk, misha Tobíyasaa kuk mazinaranguri, Apanllpa tsiyataranguri. Shiy Apaa, tputsee kuk na mazinayanllish. Kapung iyaa mantsir tsiyatkanaya. Ashiri shiysha Apaa, watsiyunoo waanshutamsin wayangcha. Ashkachush, undararsha tsiyantayarusin, putayarusin, minupsha tsap machinllinpa.
Mishat, shiysha Apaa, yutaritshishirineetsi tchinginllpa. Mishat, nayanirinllpa. Watam iyaa yaktarineetsi watandpun yarkini, anumand yutarit kapung tsiyataranganawa, nuw Apanllpa tsiyatkuri, tárangina. Ashiri na kamaneena yuwaa iyaa kundararini kapung yutarit tsiyataranganaya.
Ashiri iysha, Utaáchchini, mangini kis tarawaztaranguni, mikeeruni tandapunuzee chawpishtaranginiya.
Ashiri Sambalatsha, Tobíyastam, mishat Amónshuchtam, Asdodshuchtam tputs iyaa mazinayarusin, Irusarinshuch tandapunuzee wandaritam tarawaztaksin, nda sambaytakanaya. Mishat, tandapunuz yuwaa kawakawa anoo wanasir yarkanaya, tputs mang tárangusin, uwshtisin anoo mazinarangusin, kapungsha tsiyantaranganaya.
Ashiri ichingarusin washunand chinayarusin, Irusarinshuchpat warateeni. Ashkachuch; Ashiri watsta tarawaztamaam; táchapsinaya, táranganaya.
Itaru, iyshat anoo mazinayaruni, Apanll iyaa istamaam tsiyataranganiya. Sheeruni, tputsee ksutamapaneem ínayaruni, wayaranginiya. Kaschir, psaantam tsangamaam wayaranginiya.
Amb sheeruni, tarawaztakuni iyashuch tputs pakich sambaytamaam zandaranganaya. Patumbchee kapung chipaptar ashkuni nizirtayaniya. Zapan patumbich xanaru, anoo ndusha arangeem chipamaam waritakaniya. Tandapunuzee izuuru yaramaam xapoochpachi, iyashuch táranganaya.
Iy kundararini iyapat waratamaam zandaranganaya. Waanpatatin tsiyatkusin; Yuwash mapiyrana anush pshtuyaruni, pachayani. ¿Chakaja kamanku, yasachinllina? Ashkachuni, watarawzuree izuuru kasachinlliniya, táranganaya.
Itaru, yuwsha iyashuch tputs, kundaranungiri watsapun watsiri taarana, ansha tsiyatssee mazinayarusin, nuwaa kamaniranganaya. Uru iy kundararini, Pachayani, átssintanda. Paptsa. Mangiptispa, táranganaya.
Ashiri anoo mazinaranguri, nuwsha tputsee; K'chirpunguris, misha timbanlliziris yáyarus, yap ndaturi tandapunuzi yararini annung maachiritpatawaritis shaniyeerus, washunand tsangangtsa, nda iyaa tputs kasimaama, nuw tárangina.
Itaru, tputssha puniranganaya. Ashiri nuwsha anoo paranguri, xiyeeruri, wachinaa, misha gobernadoraa, misha tputsee ichinguru tsiyatkuri; Punirintspa. Apanlleetsimari chinangtsa. Apanll kizpurcha. An uru kundarareetsini tpuxtachiya. Ashiriya, siysa ipareemis, izanlleemtamtis, mishat maachiritamtis, tsapuneemtamtis tapachindamaam waratangints, tárangina.
Ashiri, amb ashiranguni, kundararinsha: Iyaa k'kini mazinayanllsintanda. Watsta. Apanll uwaatssin kapungparee istachiya, tárangusin, nda arangeem tamundaksin, iysha yusur tarawaztamaam chtaranginiya.
Ashiritaa, iysha nda mapiyranginiya. Anumand tputsee chawpishtarangshitiniya. Ashpatam tputs tandapunuzee tarawaztamaam wayaranginiya. Mishat, ashpatam tputs k'chirpungoo, timbanllizeetstam, mishat xanxapsheetam yáyarusin tsangaranganaya. Kurakshtisin ichingaru tputsee istaktamsin ksutaranganaya.
Tputs ichingarusin tarawaztaksin, patumbchee chipaksin, minnungich k'chirpungurineetsi payursin, tarawaztaranganaya. K'chirpungurineetsi nda kasamaam zandaranganaya.
Tputs ichingarusin tarawaztaksin, wachiruree wichpushimun tawanutarandsin tarawaztaranganaya. Nuwanungsha tputs minam wakarapan, puu puu támpan tachitarangiya.
Watam nuwsha kurakaa, mishat tputseetstam tsiyatkuri, Tarawzu iwapamaam kapunguritanda pshitaru, itaru pseertaruni, piyam piyam ashiruni, tarawaztakuni, uru kundararini iyaa kasimaam taariya.
Ashiri kundararini kuskachinaariya, wakar puu puu táyachu, anoo mazinakchus, nuwash kusangtsa. Nuwapa washunand waratamaam shaniypani. Apanll waana iyaa kasimaam istachparee, tárangina.
Tputssha; Ayu. Ashiri tarawaztayani, tárangusin, puturit tarawaztamaam chtayarusin, tapitaranllu kasatariniya. Ichingaru zar amb ashiranganiya. Itaru, chawpitam tputs uru k'chirpungoo yáyarusin tsangaranganaya.
Ashiri nuwsha tputsee tárangitamana; Ichingarus, istampantamtis nishuri Irusarinash psaan ksutamaam istangtamtsa. Pangipis kanapintspa. Sheerus, kaschirsha nishuri tarawaztatssa, nuw tputsee tárangina.
Ashirucha, nuwataa kaapa nda maarangitamana. Mishat, maachiritamti, tputsiritamti, kaapa nda kanusaranganiya. Mishat, sundaruri, yuw nuwaa ksutarangana antam ashirangtamsinaya. Nda kamareetsini tushuranganiya. K'chirpungoo yáyaruni, kundarareemani tsangaranginiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena iy kundararini iyaa pachamaam zandarangana anootsi.














































































































Ashiri ichingaru tputs washunand timburanllizee shaniyaranganaya, kungunung washitungash tasasaru anshu. Ashiri shaniyarangsin, mayistoroo Esdraa tsiyatarangsin; Shiysha, Esdraa, Móysisarinee wirkari yushindangcha, Apanll Israelchicheem kamachtarangu anootsi, táranganaya.
Ashiriya, Esdarsha Apanllee kuk yushindarangiya, Octubar tsup kaneesich yáyaru anshu. Anush tputs ichingarusin kamuz, kizaatam, mishat nllur yuw mangoonamaam waritaru anpatari ichingarusin shaniytaranaya.
Ashirucha, anush Esdarsha puturi zar natstamaam chtayaru, zar wachamareetssha kanusarangiya. Tputs ichingaru shaniyeersin, Apanllee kuk mazinaranganaya.
Ndatuma Esdar kirakaa natstaru; Wanasir Esdraa kuk mazinapani atusin, táwara yáyarusin, íwar taramaranganaya. Ashiri mayistorsha Esdar táwaramun íwar xiyarangiya. Mbutsinungich 6 tputs xiyaranganaya; Matatíyas, Sema, Aniyas, Uriyas, Hilkiyas, mishat Maaseyiyas, aship xiyaranganaya. Mbazinungichsha 7 tputs xiyarangitamsina; Pedayas, Misayel, Malkiyas, Hasun, Hasbatana, Sakáriyas, Mesulam, aship tputs Esdranung xiyaranganaya.
Ashiri mayistorsha Esdar íwar xiyeeru, tputs ichingaru parsin, kirakaa natstamaam tawatarangiya. Tawateeru, tputssha ashparitssin chiyzartaranganaya.
Ashiri Esdarsha Apanllee Taarashipani, ungirtaku; Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha kurakish. Shiyamari tsapurunasshuchee kasiksha, tárangu, tputssha ichingarusin uw íwar paxayartayarusin, Apanllee kapung, Wappari Apaa. Shiy kizpurtishcha, tárangusin, tsapushsha much kizpur timuchurtata sheersin, tsapumun much kandanchinand ashirusin, Apanllee ungirtaranganaya.
Ashiri Leviychich tputs, Josuey, Bani, Serebiyas, Jamin, Akub, Sabtayi, Hodiyas, Maaseyiyas, Kelita, Asariyas, Josabad, Hanan, misha Pelayiyas, uwshtisin Apanllee kuk mazinarangusin, Tputs wanasir mangoonpana, atusin, waanshutarisha kuk kamaniranganaya, watam Móysisarinee kuk nda kaapa mazinaranganawa.
<range>
Ashirucha, amb ashirangsin, Apanllee kuk mazinarangusin, mangoonarangusin, ichingarusin tanuranganaya. Ashiri nuwsha Nehemiyasi ipunishpati, Kapung mangis mantsarintspa, misha tanurintspa, watam Apanllee Taarashipanee ungirtamaam nish zar wayaranginiwa, táranginiya.
Esdarsha tputsee tárangitamta; Ashiri siy naayarus, katungats wanasirimshi ktungashintsa. Mishat, vinoo kama waashinitamtsa. Mishat, tputs yuw watungash ndunari anoo yambingtamtsa. Watam na zar Apanllee Taarashipani shambatamaam wayaranginiwa. Ashiri mangis mantsarintspa. Apanllimun mangis chinayarus, shambatkus kizpur taatssa, Esdar tárangiya.
Mishat, Leviychichtam tputsee tuwizpurtamaam táranganaya; Zamangints. Mangis mantsarintspa. Tanurintspa, watam nee zari Apanlleem shaniyamaam wayaranginiwa, tputsee tsiyatku táranganaya.
Ashiri tputssha katungkatssin, waakatssin, naataranganaya. Washunand shaniyeersin, waanpata yambiyarusin, kissha katungaranganaya. Sheersin, Apanlleetssha ungirtaksin, mang' kis shambataranganaya. Apanllee kuk wazareetsiri mangoonarangsin, anumand kis shambataranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Israelchich tputs Apanllee kuk wazareetsiri mazinarangana anootsi.
Ashiri putamsha zar ichingarusin, kurak, mishat wachinawtam, mishat apanllpantam tputs, mishat Leviychichtam ashirusin washunand mayistorpat Esdarpat shaniyaranganaya. Apanllee kamachtamarinee aranginasha yasapani atusin, ashiranganaya.
Anushsha Móysisarineetsi wirkar, natstaksin; Tsup tsimbun matayaru, octubrish tsup anush Israelchich shaniykusin, masharpat tambtayarusin, taachinllinpa, tárangiya.
Ashirucha, kuraksha ichinguru tputsee Irusarinshuchee, mishat Utaáchchitam minush yakat taarana anoomtam tsiyatssee zanganirangiya. Ashpartis manginap shitungeerus, mashar yashinints tambtamaama. Yasin wapzar, misha yarinlleetstam, olivootstam waru yashinints anpa tambtamaama. Yuwari Apanll waana kamachtarangu anuri izuuru tumineeni, táranganaya.
Ashiri tputssha anoo mazinayarusin, ashpartisin naayarusin, yasinaa wapzar wareeyashinusin, yushindaranganaya, waamatawari watambur tambtamaama. Min tputs íwar pangusimun iwaz kawaru anush tambtaranganaya. Mishat, tputs timburanllizeetsiri pangusinung tambtarangitamsina. Mishat, tputs Apanllinung pangu wishchip tambtarangitamsina. Mishat, kungunung wach tasasaru timburanlliz tambtarangitamsina. Mishat, Efrayinnung wach tasasaru timburanlliz tambtarangitamsina.
Ashiri yuw tputs ichingaru Babiloniyamand kanapurangana, anshitisin watambureemsha tambtayarusin, anush minam siman taaranganaya. Mang' kis shambataranganaya. Yuwapur Josueyarini taarangu, anpur tambtayarusin, mang' kis shambataranganaya. Anumunsha, nda kaapa kis shambataranganaya. Itaru, natsha, tambtayarusin, aranginasha kizpur mang' kis shambataranganaya.
Esdarsha Apanllee kuk putam natstata, putam natstata ashirangu, tsimbun matayaru zari, kachingarangiya. Ashirangu, tuchparinsha matayaru zar ichingarusin Apanllish pang' shaniyaranganaya. Yapiritam iwatspamaam ashtarana ambiritam ashiru shaniyeersin, Apanlleetsimari chinayarusin ungirtaranganaya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Utaáchich masharpa tambtayarusin, Apanllee kis ungirtarangana anootsi.
Anshurtatam tsup octubrish, zar veintikuwatrush, Israelchich washunand shaniyaranganaya, yutaritshishirineetsi Apanllpat yaramaama. Wamar kóstar kamartarangusin, muchumunsha tsarunpa tapararanganaya.
Ashiri nllitaritawaa tputsee tunari kasayarusin, Utaáchchinandarisha shaniyarangana. Xiyeersin, waanaatsi yutaritshishirini Apanllee kamaniranganaya. Zitaminarini yutarit taarangana anootstam Apanllee kamanirangitamsina.
Ashiri anshurisha shaniyeersin, tputs ichingurusin mazinaksin, tuchip ura Apanllee wirkar natstaranganaya. Anamun arangeem tuchpatam ura, anush Apanllpat waanaatsi yutaritshishirini izuuru yararanganaya. Sheersin, ashpartisin Apanlleetssha kis ungirtaranganaya.
Ashiri anumunsha, Leviychich tputs, Josuey, Banuyí, Kadmiel, Sebaniyas, Binuy, Serebiyas, Bani, Kenani, aship tputs káringashimun íwar káreersin, Apanllpat kizpur tsiyatkusin, táranganaya; Apaa, shiy iyaa k'kini mazinakchush, istangcha, táranganaya.
Anamunsha Leviychich urkar tputs, Josuey, mishat Kadmiel, Binuy, Hasabaniyas, Serebiyas, Hodiyas, Sebaniyas, Petahiyas, ashpisin tputs tsiyatarangsin; Ashpartis chiyzartayarus, Apanllee Taarashipani ungirtangints. Mangiptartis ungirtangtsa. Apanll minamari kizpur wamari kasiru urutamari taaku anootsi, táranganaya.
Sheeru, Esdarsha, Apaa, shiyamaricha minamaritish Apanllish. Arangeem Apanll wanindaja. Shiy msasee, mishat arangeem kanindaatstam, tsangacheetstam tinarangsha. Mishat, tsapootstam, tsapurunaseetstam maachiri tinarangitamsha. Mishat, mus kapungu, maree shaana tinayarush, maacheetsisha marish kung wayarangush, shaana ichingaroo ksutaksha. Sheerush, taárasheem shaantatam panaksha. Ashirucha, ichingarusin tsangach shiyaa ungirtakanaya.
Apaa, shiy Taarashipantishcha. Shiy shaana Apramaa chinarangush, tputsireemish ipusirangsha. Apramaa tsiyatarangush: Kaldewshuchee tputs ksangi. Urush yakat shitungeerush, nuwash tachitandama, tárangush, uwsha shiyash tachitarangiya. Sheerush, Apramaa, sur Aprahamsha yásamarangsha.
Shiy Aprahamaa mang' natstarangush; Nuwamun kapung mang' tatkiya. Nuwaa chinakiya, tárangush, ashiriya, Aprahamaa tsiyatarangush; Nee tsap, Kanaanshuchee tsap, shiyachcheem watsapunoom panachima. Hititshucheetstam, Amorrewshucheetstam Feresewshucheetstam, Jebusewshucheetstam, Gergesewshucheetstam, ashparita tputs watsapun shiyachcheem panachima, tárangasha. Tárangush, shaana k'keetsish, Apaa, izuuru tuminurangsha. Shiy urutari k'keetsish tatsamooksha.
Ashiriya, iy zitaminarini Ijiptosh tsap taarangsin, kapung kiyung kachiykana, anoo parangush, shiysha nayanirangush, ichingaroo tapachindarangsha. Mishat, punirustarangusin, mar chumbeepimun wing shiyaa kuruzurangsin, shiysha mazinarangush, istarangsha.
Parawaa, mishat tiptsireetstam ichingaru tsiyantarangush; ¿Wanipaja Israelchichee natsakana? tárangush, Ijiptoshchee kapung waneerangsha. Tputsee kapung tpuxtarangush, shiyaa puniranganaya. Wandari na in zar shiyaa waneeshish nda mbizakanaya.
Mishat, shiy maree kung apusanand tpatangayarush, tsap puzarangu, tsapunumunsha arachich Israelchich kitaranganaya. Itaru, Ijiptoshuchsha wasundurur, yuw Israelchichee pachamaam tachitarangana, anshtisin izuuru anshurisha ashpartisin kungush yangaranganaya. Patumbich tamapari ashirusin, marish kung imurish pantsarangusin, yangaranganaya.
Sheerush, shaana Israelchichee machirangsha. Kaschir naamaam msasee íwar kanindap wayarangush, anoo msasee parangusin, anshuri tachitaranganaya. Mishat, psaansha naamaam msas sumas tamapari ashiru kurakurtaru, ngootsee tuwasineeru wayarangsha.
Mishat, shiy Sinayush mach karuweerush, íwar kanindap tputsee tsiyatarangsha. Itsinsaru taamaam kamachtarangsha. Shaanaatsi chinashish tayaspatarangsha. Kamachtamareetsish wanasirimshee kamachtarangitamsha.
Sábadoshsha zari kanusamaam, misha shiyapa ipunamaam wayarangsha. Sheerush, Móysisarinee; Nuwaa kuki tputseem yandangcha, tárangush, Móysisarinsha shiyaa kamachtamareetsish ichinguru kirakamun yandarangu, tputsee tayapstarangiya.
Mishat, tputs mariz kayatkusin, shaana pangaa kanindamand zanganirangsha, nda marizimun kiyung kachiyamaama. Kungootstam patumbchish wayarangsha, nda sachisimun kiyung kachiymaama. Sheerush, Kanaanush tsap kusarangsin, shiysha; Natu, naangints. Tputsee pachayarus, kasiyarus, watsapunee tsapuneemis yángtsa. Nuw siyaam tsapuneemis panachintspa, tárangsha.
Itaru, iysha zitaminarini, shiyaa kukish payumaam ngataranganaya. Nda shiyamun mang' tatumaam zandarangsin, waanamuntarisha mang' taturanganaya. Izuuru shiyaa kukish kapeetaranganaya.
Shiy zapantaa istarangush, itaru ashiritaa, pakchiyam anoo nda chinamaam zandaranganaya. Waanpatatin tsiyatarangsin; Min kurakaam ipuseeni, iyaa wapitam Ijiptop tsap machimaama, táranganaya. Ijiptoshuch tputs kiyung yacharangitaatssin ashtaa, kanapeeni, táranganaya. Itaru, shiysha Apaa, kchinamsheerush, nda tsiyantarangush, tputsireetsish nda kasarangsha. Kapung chinarangush, nayanirangsha. Nda kapeetamaam zandarangsha.
Wakaraa orpat tinayarusin, In watacha iy apanllirini, yuw iyaa Ijiptosh tsap tashitungarangu anu, tárangitaatssin, shiyaa kapunguri tayutaritarangitaatssin,
shiysha Apaa, kchinamsheerush, upusap ambiri tsipamaam nda wayarangsha. Kaschir naamaam msas ashiru mzeetar ashirangu, mishat psaantam naamaam sumas ashiru kurakurtar ashirangu, ngootsush nda masatamaama wayarangsha.
Arangeem Apaa, uwaatssin kapung chinarangush, shaanaatsi kanish wanasirimshee mangoo p'tsimaam wayarangitamsha. Mishat, watungasheemtam manátam uru zanganirangsha, nda marizimun kiyung kachiymaama. Mishat, kungootstam panarangsha, nda sachisimun kiyung kachiymaama.
Ashirangush, 40 masach upusap xirangana. Anush nda katungats tputseem pishtarangiya. Ichingaru zar katungaranganaya. Mishat, wamartam nda kucharanganaya. Mishat, araptaa xirangusin, nda watsitam manaranganaya.
Ashiri Apaa, shiy tputsireetsish tuwizpurtarangush, kurakaa zapan tiptsirpatari kasirangusin, watsapuneem panarangsha. Ashirangush, tputsireemish waamatawari watsapun panat panat ashirangsha. Mishat, kurakaa Sihona kasirangusin, watsapunee, Hesbona sura, shiy itutsirangsha. Mishat, kurakaa Oga kasirangitamtish anootstam watsapun, Basan sura, itutsirangitamsha.
Ashiri, shiy aranginasha istarangush, wip izapaneeranganaya. Aship tsangachi wip izapaneerangana. Shiy sirútama zitaminarinee; Kanaanaa tsap siyaam tsapuneemis panachintspa, tárangush,
wipsha Kanaanaa tsap waamatam itutsiranganaya. Kanaanshuchsha kurak waanaatsi tapachindamaam, tiptsireetstam tapachindamaam pinasaranganaya. Shiy Apaa, iyashcheem tputs ichingaru waamari kasimaam wayarangsha.
Yakat kapungtaa, wasundurur zapantaa taarangu, iyashuch pshturangusin, waamari kasirangusin, anoo yakat yarangusin, anush uwshtisin ksutaranganaya. Pangusish maachi kizpur wanasireew tatsitama anootstam itutseerangsin, waamatari yaranganaya. Posootstam, kizarunaatstam, olivootstam, mishat tatsumim yuw wanus zapaneewa anootstam waamatari yaranganaya. Ashirangsin, kis katungkusin tazazartaranganaya. Wanuts kapunguranganaya. Shiy kizpur wanasiri istarangush, mang' ksaksin zamangaranganaya.
Itaru, ambtaa ashirangush, shiyaa kukish payumaam nda zandkusin, kapeetaranganaya. Shiy shaanaatsi kukish kamanimapanee zanganirangush, uwshtisin tputsee; ¿Mayaamsha Apanllee kasarangsa? Yusur Apanllee kuk chinayarus, payungints, tárangitaatssin, itaru tputssha mazinamaam nda zandarangsin, kamanimapanee pacharanganaya. Ashirangsin, shiyaa kapunguri tatsiyuntaranganaya.
Ashirucha, shiysha; Waani undarar kiyung yachanll, átush, zanganirangush, tputsireetsish undarar kiyung yacharanganaya. Kiyung kachiykatssin, anush shiyaa, Apaa, Istanda, táranganaya. Ashiri shiysha kchinamsheerush, kanindamand mazinarangush, tputsee tapachindampani zanganirangsha.
Ashiri shiy istarangush, tputssha wanasiritaa taarangsin, yusursha shiyaa tayutaritarangitamsinaya. Ashirucha, shiysha tsiyantarangush yusur; Waani undarar kasipana, átush nda istarangush, undarar waamaritin kasiranganaya. Anush yusursha waantatamsin, shiyaa tapachindamaam masharanganaya. Shiysha nayanimpaneerush, íwartaa kanindamand mazinarangush, tapachindampanee zanganta, yusur zanganta ashirangsha.
Shiy; Nuwaa kuki payupana, átush waneerangitaatish, itaru uwshtisin; Yuw yaana zandkini an wanasircha, atusin, nda shiyaa kukish payumaam zandakusin, ngataranganaya. Apaa, waanari tputs shiyaa kukish payukinaareesinaya, urutamari taachiya. Itaru, uwshtisin shiyaa kapung ngataranganaya.
Ashiri shiy zapan masach yutaritshishirineetsi kasapana, átush, kutarangitaatish, wizpurireetsish tputsireemish mang' p'tsimaam wayarangitaatish, mishat shaanaatsi kukish kamanimapan zanganirangtaatish, ashiritaa shiyaa kukish nda mazinaranganaya. Ashirucha, shiysha tsiyantayarush, undarari izuuru kasimaam wayarangsha. Undararsha tputsireetsish minup tsap machku, minup tsap machku ashiranganaya.
Itaru Apaa, shiy ashirangtaatish, nda watstamari tpachingarangsha. Kchinamsheerush, uru tputsireetsish chinarangush, nda kasarangsha.
Ashiri Apaa, na iy shiyaa yasaktanicha. Shiy kizpurtishcha. Apaa, shiy tsiyantakitaatish, itaru ashiritaa, shaanaatsi kukish nda kapeetkush, uru tatsamooksha. Tputsireetsish urutamari chinaksha. Shiy tputsirish kiyung kachiykusin, shiysha anoo nda mapiyksha. Asiriyshuch kurak iyashchee waanpee watsapun machirangu, iyashuchsha kapung kiyung kachiyarangana. Iy kurakarini, apanllpaneewtam, shiyaa kukish kamanimapaniwtam, zitaminarini ichingarusin kapung kiyung kachiyranganaya. Itaru shiysha Apaa, nda kchimarishtish naparangsha. Uru mangish mantsarangush, iyaa ksutarangsha. Na in zari iy wandaritam kiyung kachiykaniya.
Kiyung kachiykini an, Apaa, iyaanamandari yutaritshishirini ashkiniya. Nda shiy msangeerush waneerangsha. Shiy iyaa uru istamaam zandarangitaatish, k'keetsish uru payurangitaatish, itaru iycha kizpur yutaritarangani.
Iy kurakarini, misha apanllpantam, zitaminatam shiyaa kukish nda payuranganaya. Shiyaa kamachtamarish nda tuminaranganaya. Waneerangitaatish, ashtaa mazinamaam ngataranganaya.
Kurakshitisin, shiyaa ungirtamaam ngatarangitamsinaya. Shiy kapungtaa istarangush, tsapoo kapungootstaa kizpur wanasirimshee panarangush, maachee zapantaa panarangush, ashtaa shiyaa chinamaam nda zandaranganaya. Yutaritshishirineetsini nda kasamaam zandaranganaya.
Na iyaa, Apaa, napangcha. Minshuch tputs kurak muchchur ashiru taakaniya. Shiy nee tsapoo zitaminarineemani panarangush; Siysa nish kis taangtsa, tárangush,
itaru iysha tatsumarini zapantaa yusiku, nllitaritsha tputs urkari katungchinllinaya. Yaanamandari yutaritshishirini kurak iyaa kasimaam wayarangsha. Uwsha yuw waana zandku an iyaa ashkanaya. Wakarareetstamani putayarusin, yamakanaya. Ashirucha, Apaa, iy kiyung kachiykuni taakaniya.
Ashiri na nimun iy ichingaruni shiyaatsimarisha chinamaam zandkiniya. Shiyaa kukish izuuru payuchiniya. Amb ashiru chinaranguni, kirakamun yandaranginiya. Kurak, mishat Leviychichtam, apanllpantam ichingaruni, kirakamun surini yandam chka sheeruni firmashtarangini. Ashiri na shiyaa, Apaa, mbizamaam wanindaja. Ashiriya, na wappari Apaa, Esdar Apanllpat tsiyatku, tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Esdar Israelchicheem Apanllpa tsiyatarangu anootsi. [Nuw Nehemiyasi siyaam yandarangina. Watamcha nuw koki.]
































































































































































































































































































































Sirútama tputs sura Job tsap Usash taarangiya. Apanllee kapung chinarangu, tputsee tayutaritamaam nda pakchiyam chinarangiya. Ashirucha, tputssha waa nda tayutaritaranganaya.
Ashiriya, Job wip washunand 10 taarangiya: kamuz 7, kizsha 3, ashiru taarangiya.
Chinsha zapanimuna. 7 mil opeeja, 3 mil kameechu, mil toro, mishat 500 burru wizari aship chinurangiya. Muchchursha zapanimuntamta. Wamari kizpur kurikpan yap zar yaku amb taarangiya.
Ashiriya, Job wip uru kis shambatshisheem wayataranaya. Zoonlleewaatstam, misha wizaree tuchpari kuruzeeru, washunandari shaniyeersin, katungtaranaya. Minushsha zar uwsha yambiyaru, washunandtam shaniytaranaya. Minushsha zar uwsha yambikatarangu, uwsha yambikatarangu, ashishtangat ashtaranaya.
Yuwash shambatshish iwatsparamchu, anush puturi Jobarinsha wipaa ashpari kuruzeeru, anush shaniyeersin, chinoo pachayaru, wipaam minumtaw, minumtaw ashiru Apanlleem mucheeru ungirtarangiya. Sheeru, wipaam yutaritshishirinee tachingamaam Apanllee masharangiya. Mangush chinarangu; Ipari mangush mantsir chinarangpasinaya. Apanllee tayutaritarangpasinaya, átu, wipaam ichingaroom mang' yaramaam maacheetsi urutari Apanlleem muchtariya. Job uru ashiru chinarangiya.
Ashiriya, yuwash zar Apanlleem shaniymaam waritarangu, anush Apanllsha wasundurur ichingarusin Apanllpa shaniyaranganaya. Itaru, anshutam yashingsha natsampan tputsee tayutaritamapan kusarangitamta.
Apanllsha yashingoo masharangiya: ¿Yapimandsha naatarangsha? tárangiya. Yashingsha natsampan: Nuw ichingaru tsapuranas xikuri taakina. Ichingaru tsapuranas napkuri taakina, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Apanllsha masharangu: ¿Shiy nuwaa tputsireetsi Jobaa parangish? ¿Tamara an tputsi? Kizpurcha wanasiri. Nda minumtiyam tputs ashim waninda. Nuwaa kizpur chinakiya. Nda tputsee pakchiyam tayutaritamaam chinakiya, tárangu,
natsampansha: Zuraksha. Job uru shaanaatsi kukish tuminkiya, watam shaana kizpur wanasir ksutakshawa. Shiy maachta ichingaru panarangsha; anumand shiyaa kizpur chinakiya.
Shiy urutamari ksutkush, yutarit nda pakchiyam uwash tushiykiya. Waana, mishat wizanllitam, wipatam nda pakchiyam kiyung kachiykanaya. Chinutam uru zapan izapaneekiya. Mishat, waanaatstatam kizpur wanasir wayarangsha.
Itaru, na yuwaa maacheetsi ichingaru panarangish, anoo itutsingi. Ashkachinaareesha, shiyaa uru Job natsachiya. Mantsir yuw zandku anoo tsiyatachpari, Yashing tárangiya.
Ashiriya Apanllsha natsampanee: Ashiri yuw zandkish an Jobaa maachirita itutsingi. Itaru, amuyaatsinaa Jobaa tayutaritinllpa. Ksangcha, Apanll tárangiya. Ashiriya Yashingsha, Ayu, tárangu, Apanllee kasayaranllu, Jobapsha kiyung yachamaam naatarangiya.
Ashiriya, minushsha zar Job wip ichingarusin, kiz misha kamuztam, washunand shaneeyeersin, shambatshisheem zoonllish putsisarinshini pang' shaniyaranganaya.
Anush ichingarusin katungkusin, shaneersin, Jobsha waanshu pangush tiptsir yuw taarana, ansha minam tputs punirustaru kusarangiya. Jobaamsha tsiyatssee kamanirangiya: Ichingarus mazinangints. Iysha mzatsish tarawaztakuni, wakarpa upapchir tsapoo ktseekuni, shaneeruni, burrutam chirichiree katungkusin shaneertamsina.
Yap nda chinarani anush tputs Sabewshuch kpachamish kusarangsin, ichingaru wakaraa, burrootstam shuchiranganaya. Sheersin, anumun tputseetstsha ksutamapanee ashpari pacharanganaya. Na nuwamarisha suwarangina siyaa kamanimaama, tárangiya.
Yuwash ántaru, ndaturi kamanimaam iwatsparu, anush yusur misha tputs Jobtam muchchuri kusarangiya. Mazinangints, nuwsha tsiyatsis siyaa kamanchintspa, tárangu. Pastush ichingaruni opeejaa ksutkuni, shaneerani anush, yap nda chinarani amb kapung kariy kariytarangu, mamarutam pantsatarangu ichingaroo opeeja, misha tputseetstam pacharangiya. Nuwamarisha kamungaranguri, na ningeem siyaa kamanimaam kusarangina, tárangiya.
Anshat, ndaturitam kamanim iwatsparu, anush tuchparinshitini tputs tsiyatssee kamanimaam kusarangiya. Mazinangints, nuwsha kamanchintspa. Ashiriya, yuwash pastush chinuz kameechoo ksutkuni, shaneeruni, anush Kaldewshuch kurak tuchip wasundururpatawari kusatarangsin, kameechoo ichingaru shuchiranganaya. Sheersin, m'chachureetstamtish ichingaru ashpari pachayarusin, chingaranganaya. Na nuwamarisha suwayashinina siyaam kamanimaama, tárangu,
anamunsha ndaturitam iwatsparu anush yusur misha tputs kamanimapanitam kusarangiya. Mazinangints. Nuwsha siyaam tsiyatsis kamanchintspa. Ichingaru iparish, kamuztam misha kizatam shambatshisheem wayayarusin, zoonllish putsisanurish pang' shaneerana. Anush yap nda chinarana
kambusursha kapung kumbustarangu, panguseetssha kapeetarangu, ichingaroo ashparta ipareetsish pacharangiya. Nuwamarisha kamungaranguri, na shiyaa kamankina, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Jobsha anoo tsiyatsis ichinguroo mazinarangu, kizpur mang' mantsarangu, wamaree putayaru izichirangiya. Sheeru, muchootstsha kumayaru, tsapush timucheeru, kapung tanuku, anshuri Apanllpa tsiyatarangiya.
Apanllpat tsiyatku tárangiya. Apaa, nuw nish nllurtaranguri, nda minumtiyam maachee payurangina. Ashiritam, nuw maachi ndunitam payuri tsipachina. Shiy Apaa, ichingaroo maachi nuwaam panarangish, anoo natsha ichingarootsitam itutsirangsha. Apaa, ashiritaa shiyaa wand chinakina. Shiy taarashipantishcha. Shiyaamari kasiru taaksha, tárangiya.
Ashiri Job kiyungutaa kachiyarangu, anumand Apanllee nda yutarit tsiyatarangiya. Ashiriya, Yashing Jobaa yacharangu anoo na kamaneena.
Ashiriya, yuwash Apanll wasundurur yusur Apanllpa washunand shaniymaam waritarangu, anush yashingsha tputsee tayutaritamapan kusarangitamta.
Apanllsha yashingu tayutaritamapanee; ¿Yapimandsha káyashinush nish kuskamachsha? tárangu, yashingsha tamundampan; Nuw ichingaru tsapuranas iturpikuri taakina, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Apanllsha anoo mazinayaru, ¿Shiy nuwaa tputsireetsi Jobaa parangish? ¿Tamara an tputsi? Kizpurcha wanasiri. Nda minumtiyam tputs ashim waninda. Nuwaa kizpur chinakiya. Nda tputsee pakchiyam tayutaritamaam zandkiya. Shiysha nuwaa ngutish, yuwaa maacheetsi ichingaru panarangish anoo itutsingi. Ashkachinaareesha, shiyaa uru natsachiya, tárangush, itaru natsha kiyung yachakitaatish, ashtaa nuwaa wand chinakiya,
Apanll tárangiya. Yashingsha tayutaritamapan; Tputs ndatuma wasurimun kiyung kachiyaru, wanasir mapiyrsin taakanaya. Itaru, kiyung kachiykachu, anush ¿tamayareezee kamungchi? átu, yuw zandku an zapan chinamaam yasaritamta.
Wanari shiy Jobaa wanguyash wayayarush, wasurimun kiyung kachiyku, zapan zar kachingatanoo uru shiyaa mantsir tsiyatchiya, tárangiya.
Apanllsha yashingootsi, Ashiriya, shiy tsutashish wayangi. Itaru, Jobaa pchamana pcharinllpa, tárangiya.
Yashingsha natsampan Apanllee kasayaru, arapsha naateeru, tsutashsheetssha Jobaam zanganirangiya. An tsutashish chit tamapari ashiru ashchiri wanuts shuneeru muchpatari tsutayaru, kizpur yutaritamuna.
Amb ashirangu, Job kiyung kachiyku, kapeetshishipsha naateeru, maachi murits pátangam yáyaru, anpasha siraa, siraa ashishtar ashirangiya.
Itaru, wizanllsha anoo pakeeru, wazaranllee tárangiya, ¿Mayaamsha shiy matambishpaz ashirush kiyungutaa kachiykush, Apanllee wand chinaktana, átsha? Watsta. Apanllee mantsir tsiyateerush, izuuru tsipakinaari, tárangiya.
Jobsha wizanllee, ¡Watsta! ¡Yutarit tsiyatinllpa! Wanari Apanll iyaam wanasiri istaku, wanasircha. Itaru, yutarittaati wayaku, ¿mayaamaja yutarit tsiyatchich? Watsta, tárinllpa, tárangiya. Ashiriya, Job amb ashiru chinarangu, kapung yutarit tushiyrangitaa, Apanllee nda mantsir tsiyatarangiya. Ashiri yuwaa Yashing Jobaa tsutashishpat kiyung yacharangu anoo na kamaneena.
Ashiri Job wamkur tuchip taarangiya. Elifas, Timánshuchimuna; Bildadsha, Súwashuchimuna; Sofarsha, Namatshuchimuna. Ashpisin tsiyatssee Jobamun mazinarangusin, Mang, Job chin ashpiri pchingarangiya. Mishat, wipatam ichingaru tsiparanganaya. Kizpur yutarit uwash tushiyrangiya, atana, anoo mazinarangusin, wamkurshitisin, Ashiri pzaya, pangani. Mangoo tuwizpurtaani. Waani kizpurparee mang' mantsakiya, atusin naataranganaya.
Ashiriya, Job pang' watsiritanasha, tputs kuxinxinaw paranganaya. Itaru, nda natstaranganaya. Nllitaritpari, atusin, naantatssin, kaapanirisha napkusin, wamkuree Jobaa natstarangusin, uwshtisin kapung mang' mantsaksin, wamaree izichta, muchushsha puzachpa siritaa sheersin, tanuranganaya.
Anshurisha tsapush Jobanung wamkur kuxinartayarusin, nda pakchiyam tsiyatamaam waritaranganaya. Job kizpur mang' mantsaku, kiyung kachiyrangiya. Anshurisha kuxinataranll ashkusin, 7 zar psaanpatari kuxinaranganaya, watam kapung tanuku nda tsiyatamaam waritaranguwa.









Ashiriya, Job kiyung kachiyku, zapishshat tsiyatku tárangiya. ¿Mayaama nuw nllurtarangee? Ndunnaari nllurtaranguri, na ashireeja kiyung kachiyki.
¿Tamashtaja nda aneershirti chik tsiparangi? Nduntaati ashiru, yuwash nllurtakachi anshurtanaari tsiparanguri wanasirparee.
Mishat, ¿mayaamshta atat nuwaa chinaku, tsipatpa átu, mimiree tumimtarang? Ndunnaari ashirangu tsiparanginaaparina.
Tsiparanginaareena, na ndunnaapari kiyung kachiykina. Wanasirinaapari kanuskuri taakina.
Kurak tsiparangu, na mapshishish taaku, anpatanaapari nuw washunand kanuskurini taakiniya. Kurak anpur na pang' kapung taarangu, maacheetsi zapan kurikee, mishat orootstam xanataru kis taarangu, ashiritaa tsiparangsha pang' wanasirimunataa na yurangarangshita. Anpatanaapari washunand mapshishish taakaniya.
<range>
Mishat, ¿mayaamshtaja kiz nlluraa tsipari tatsipeeru, tsapushsha maptarana, nda aneeri nuwaa ashirang?
Tputs yutaritshishpan tsipakchu, yusur ndusha yutaritshishee chinaku, izuurasha mbizatariya. Tarawzupansha tputs kiyung kachiyku taaku, tsipakachsha mapiysha mapshishish kanusku taatariya.
Tumanamawsha tputs taakana, an tsipakchusin, ndusha sundaroo kuk mazinaksin, zaputarsha mapiysha mapshishish taakanaya.
Anush tputs kurikpan, mishat pukiritam washunand tatsamooshtisin taakanaya. M'chachsha upaturunar ndusha tamundaku, kissha taakanaya.
¿Mayaamshtaja tputs tsapurunasish kizpur kiyung kachiykitaa, itaru Apanllsha taárasheem arangeem wayak? Tputs kapung mang' mantsaktaa, tsipamaam zandkitaa, itaru ndusha tsipamaam waritakiya.
Kapung tsipatsingaz támaraku, maachtangaz zandarich anoo yanurit tsipatsingaz zandku, itaru ¿ndusha tsipamaam waninda?
Ashiri zapish tsipakchu, mang' kisshapari mapshishish taachiya.
¿Mayaamshta Apanll nuwaa tputs wach mchus tamapari ashiru wayakanda? Tsutashshee suwamaam zandkitaati, itaru kámanakpaz ashiru, nda suwamaam waritaki.
Kapung wasurimum kiyung kachiykuri, tanutantar ashkuri, nda pakchiyam katungamaam zandkina. Amb ashkuri, surimunarti kchittakuri taakina.
Sirútama nduntaa kiyung kachiymaam zandaranguri, kizpuritaa kiyung kachiymaa punitaruri, natsha, ashima táchakina.
Matambishti kis kanusamaam zandkitaati, itaru urutari kiyung kachiykina. Mapiyruri taamaam pinasakina. Mangi kapung mantsakuri taakina, Jobarini tárangiya. Ashiriya, yuwaa Job tsutashshimun kizpur kiyung kachiykachu, tsipamaam zandarangu, anoo kamaneena.
Elifassha, Tinamshuch tputs, Jobaa kuk mazinarangu, tárangiya. Ashiriya, na Jobaa shiyaa tsiyatchinllpa. Tsiyatamaam pakich paziktana. Itaru, tsiyantachparee, shiyaa atina. Watam nuw nda tsiyatkuri taamaam pinasakinawa.
<range>
Shiy tputs yuwaa sambaytamaam zandkana, anoo kapungtaa istatarush, Apanllee kuk zapantaa tayaspatatarush,
yuwaatstam tputs pantsakana anoo izuurasha Apanllish tachitamaam istataritaatish, mishat tputsee yuwaa kasamaam zandkana anoo tputs mangoo p'tsitaritaatish,
itaru natsha yuwash kiyung kachiykish anush shaanaatsi tayutaritkush, kapung mangish mantsakush, Apanllimun ndusha mangish tatuksha.
Shiy Apanllee kapungcha mangoonkush, Apanlltishcha tiptsirish; kizpur wanasir taatarsha. ¿Ashiri mayaamsha nda Apanllimunari mangish tatuksha?
Ashiri shiy yasakeesha kamaningandama. ¿Apanll tputsee wanasirimshi wanitar? Nduni, wanimaam wanindaja.
Itaru, nuw wachinari yasakina. Tputs yutaritshishingazimari, misha pachamangaztam chinaku, zapish anuritam yutaritshishiritam uwash tushiychiya.
Apanllsha anumand kizpur tsiyantakchu, waneeshshee zangankachu, urutamari kiyung kachiykusin, taachinllinaya.
Mishat, tumuz kázamash tsiyantaku, pu átar ashtaru ashirusin, itaru Apanllsha wizpurpa wanasee kurumbtakpaz ashkachu zamachiya. ¿Tamari Apanll xapooch?
Tumuzee wanas kurumbtayaruch, ndusha zamaam waritaku marizimun tsipakchu, wipsha arap pseertarsin, taachinllinaya. Tputs yutaritshishpan ashikpaz ashirusin, izuuru watstamari tsipachinllinaya.
Nuw psaan maaramchuri mirinish tputs pakchimari tsiyatstaru mazinarangina. Itaru, nda izuuru mazinarangina. Yuwash tputs ichingaru maarana, anush anoo k'kuz mazinaranlluri, nuw kapung punirangina.
<range>
Kapung puniranlluri, nutsi ashchiri nungtakuri, tatat shitar ashirangina.
Kachizimazpaz tshimuni tapatkamchu ashiru kizpur punikuri, kachizatkuri nutsi purutsingaranguri,
anush tputs ashiru parangina. Itaru, nda natstamaam waritarangina. Nda tsiyatku, xixeew ashirangiya. Itaru, anumunsha tsiyatku k'kuzee mazinarangina.
¿Tputs antaati Apanllpat tatsamooru waninda? Mishat, ¿Apanll tputsee tinarangu, waanpata wanasirimshirini tatsamooreeja taakana?
Apanll waanamuntaa wasundurur mang' tatumaam pinasakiya. Watam wasundurur yutaritshishee chinaktamsinawa.
Ashirucha, iynaasha tsapurunasshuchini aranginasha musásiri yutaritshishish pantsat, pantsat ashkiniya. Musásimashpa sharamungazpaz pangum ashiruni yurangayaru, mikeeruni pantsakaniya.
Tputs watsipunoo nda yasamaam waninda. Puturi wanasiritaa taarangu, itaru pukamachsha tsipayachu, watstamari taárashi kanatsipchiya.
Tputs taárash wasik itintingam tamapari ashiriya. Anoo tputssha k'chirpa tza ashkachu, watstamari mikeeru pantsata ashtaru ashiriya. Ndaturita Apanllee mangoonaru tsipakanaya, ambi ántaru nuw miranish k'kuzee mazinarangina, Elifas Jobaa tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Jobaa, nuw shiyaa tina, Kuruzungcha. Kuruzkinaareesha ¿chakaja shiyaa istach? Apanllee wasundurur, yuwaa waritaru anoo, Istanda, tákchush, ¿Apanllsha wasundururi istachincha?
Kapung mangish mantsakinaareesha, mishat tsiyantakinaareesha, ¿tamari istachinll? Amb ashiru chinakush, nda kasakush uru tsipachsha.
Nuw tputs nda wanasir chinamaa yasaru anoo parangina. Kurikpaneem kinachima, táyaru, yuwaa kurikee putachu anoo tputssha tuxarakchu pantsakiya.
¿Chakshtaja wipaatssha istayach? Istamaam ngatkusin kurakatam istamaam ngatku, yutarit tsiyatku, uwaam tapachindampan ndunarichiya.
Mazarish karut ashchiri puratkachu anushsha tputs mariz kayatkusin, pusayaru katungkatssin, kachingeersin karutanandarisha kasachiya. Maachiritangazsha támaraksin, yat yat ashkatssin kachingeertamsin waanasha watstamari wataruwzuri kasakiya.
Ashirucha nuw, Jobaa, shiyaa, atina: Yutaritshish nda tsapumand shitungkiya. Mishat, tsutashish nda tsapumand shitungkiya.
Tputs ichingarusin waanamandari yutaritshishirini kiyung kachiykanaya. Sumasi chaana taturangakchuch kurataru, ashiritam tputssha yutaritshishirinimun kiyung kachiykanaya.
Ashiri nuwanaari shiy kiyung kachiykish ashtaruri, Apanllee; Shiy, Apaa, nuwaa yasaktishcha. ¿Ashiri nuw mayamanda kiyung kachiykuri taaki? táchtamparina.
Ashirucha, Apanll yuwaa waana zapan ashku, anoo tputs nda minamtiyam izuuru yasamaam wanindaya.







Apanll tputsee chinaku waneekiya. Ashiri shiy ¿mayaamaja kiyung kachiymaam ngatchish? Mishat, ¿Mayaamaja tsiyantachish? Mapiyngcha.
Apanll tputseem tsutashshee zanganeeru, tputs kiyungtaa kachiyku taaku, itaru waantatam yusur yarchiya. Uwpatataati kizpur tpaw sheeru, waantatam izamzamaam waritariya. Apanll minamaricha kchinamshi.








Apanll uru ashtariya. Ashima an uru yachakuni yasakaniya. Ashiri shiysha, Jobaa, nuwaa kuki mazinakinaareesha, zapshita uru ashima yasachtamsha, Elifas Jobaa tárangiya. Ashiriya na yuwaa Elifas mangush chinarangu; Job waanamand yutaritshishirini kiyung kachiykiya, mamarpaku tárangu anoo kamaneena.































































































































































































































































































































Ashiriya, Jobsha wamkuree, ¿Ashinshitaja siy k'kiptis nuwaa kiyung yachakis anoo kasaychis?
<range>
Nuwaa yutarit tsiyat, tsiyat ashiksawa. ¿Nuwaa nda nayanikis? ¿Nda pazikis?
Yuw nuw mantsirimshee chinarangi an nuwaanaatstamari tayutaritarangina. Nda minootssha tputs tayutaritarangina. ¿Ashiri mayamandsha nuwaa ashiru tsiyataksa?
Siy mangishis chinakus; ¿Antaati Job yutarita iy ashireezini? Jobaa waanamandari yutaritshishirini Apanll waneerangu, kiyung kachiyku taakiya, átssa.
Itaru, mazinangtsa; waana Apanll nuwaa kapung yutaritash wayarangu, na kiyung kachiykuri, waneeshish taakina. Itaru, nda nuwaanamandari chayari ashkina.
Anush kiyung kachiykuri, Tputs pacharundama, aturi, kuruztat ashkuri, nda minumtiyam tputs nuwaa istakanaya. Istanda, aturi, nda minumtiyam tputs nuwaa naynikandanaya. Izuuru xapookina.
Apanll waana xarashish kapung wayarangu, ngootspaz kámanaru ashiru nda waneeshee suwamaam waritakuri, anshuri tapishpaz ashiru kiyung kachiykuri taakina.
Sirútama wanasiritaa taaranguri, itaru Apanllsha maachiritaatsi ichinguru tpachingarangiya. Tputs sirútama nuwaa wanasiritaa naparangsin, itaru natsha nuwaa paksin punirustakanaya.
Yasina xixpur shpayarusin, mangutarisha wizpur ndunarsha, tsipamaam kamiransha xiya ashtaru ashiru nuwaa Apanll wayarangunda. Nda nuwaanaatsi tapachindamaam wizpuriri nda waninda.
Undarareetspaz ashiru nuwaa kapung tsiyantaku, waani urutamari kiyung kachiyku taanll, átu ashirangiya.
Nuwaa wizpurpa sundar tputsee putapi átu, ashchiri pangu taturpiyaru, nda tputs suwamaam waritaku, izuuru putataru, ashiru nuw nda kamungamaam waritakina.
Apanll waana nuwaa ashimash wayarangu, waani zoonlltam, wamkurtam kasayarusin, arap naakchusin, waani túnarichinllinpa átu, ashirangiya.
Ashpari maachiriti, amikuritamti, yuwatamsin nuwash pangi taarangana antamsin, misha m'chachuritamti nuwaa nllitaritaatspaz ashiru ndusha natstaranganaya.
<range>
Ashkusin, m'chachureetsi kuruzkuri, sirútama nuwaa kuki kis payutaru, nda ashku uru arangirisha nuwaa niyrkanaya.
Mishat, izanlli nduntam nuwaa watsiri káyamaku, tsutashsheetsi puniku, ngatkiya. Ipartamti, mishat aneertamti wip ashimaatsi paksin, mantsir tsiyatkanaya.
Nllurataa kapung nuwaa yutaritam ínaksin, mantsir tsiyatkanaya, watam kizpur yutaritshtinawa.
Yuwataa kizpur amikurimuni antamsin nuwaa tayutaritkusin, stakanaya. Mishat, yuwatam kizpur chinatarana antamsin nuwaa natsakanaya.
Kizpur xangitamaruri, napurimuni tasi ptsutataru, kapunguri yutaritti tsipamaam waritakina.
Ashiriya, na nuwamun mangoonangtsa, amikuree. Ashiri siy amikuree, nuwaa nayaningasinda. ¿Mayaamshta nuwaa Apanll tsipatspatari waneeshish wayaranganda?
Ashiriya, ¿mayaamsha siysa Apanll tamarangpari ashiritam nuwaa kiyung yáchaksa? Waamunari nuwaa kiyung yachayantsa. Nimunari waparita.
¿Antaati nuw yutaritshishi tsiyatarangee? nduni. Wanari tputs yuwaa tsiyatarangi anoo ichingaru ngusambamun yandaranginaari wanasirpari.
Nduntaatiya ashiru, patumbchimun yandarangu, nda ayamtaati mbizamaam wanasirpari.
Nuwaa yuwamaricha kurak ksutku taaki, anumari taarasheetsi yasariya. An ichingaru kasiru tsapurunasish taaku, watacha nuw kurakarina. Anumari chinasheetsi yasariya, misha tsipaneetstamti.
Nuw tputseeruri tsutashshimun nutsi kizpur kuchar itsuptamawtaati taakuri, tsipaktaateena, zurampatari Apanllee pangchina.
Nuwaantari kchiptarti Apanlli pangchina. Anungazimari kapung pamaam zandkina. Nllitaritaa pamaam zandkeezi.
Siy nuwamun k'kuzee mazinakus, waanamandaricha yutaritshishirini kiyung kachiykasha, ántaruni táchinipa átssa. Siyaa kukis mazinamaam nizeena.
Itaru, kaapaniri mangishis chinayarus, yutaritshishirimandis punikus taangtsa. Siyaa uru Apanll wanichintsa. Tputsee yutaritshishpani Apanll uru wanitariya, Job tárangiya tputseetsi.






































































































































































































































































Nuw antaati machtangaz wazan támarakuri, napaa ashtareezi, nduni. Kizangzitam kamasinangaz mangishi yutarit chinakuri, napaa ashtareezi.
Watam Apanll kizpureeru, kanindshutaa taaku, yuwaa tputs mantsirimshee chinaku anoo yasakuwa.
Yutaritshishpaneetsimari tputs kiyung yachaku, tpazakiya.
Itaru, nuwsha wanasiriri taaki anoo ¿nitaati Apanll nda pak? Ashku, ¿tamareeja taarasheetsi nda yasach?
Ashiriya, nuw zurampatari tina; nuw tputsee minumtiyam mantsir tsiyatareezi. Mishat, ngichzeetstam ngichtareezi.
Apanll nuwaa taarashi zurampatari yasaku, Job wanasircha, táchiya.
Nuw wanari nda izuuru wanasir Apanllee chinakuri, tputsingaz maachiri kapung támarakuri, yuwaa tputs payukana anoo shuchitaruri, Apanll nuwaa wanichapandanaya.
Nuw yutaritanaari ashiranguri, tputs mzareetsi itutseersin, anush katungkusin, tatsumareetsi xpuyashtisin, kapeetchinllinaya.
Wanariya nuw kizaa yutarit tsiyataranguri, tputsingaz wizanll zandkuri, napanapaw ashtaruri, Wazaranll naakchu, tsiyatpi túri, ashtaruri,
izanllshati nllitari tputs muchchur ashiru taachiya. Ashiri washunandsha kirimiz maachinllinaya.
Nuw kizaa yutarit patatarinaareena, tputsshapari nuwaa kapung natsachinllinaya. Nuwaa kapung wanimaam waritachiya.
Anumand nuwaa maachiriti ichingaru sumaspaz ashiru chingamaam waritachinaapari. Itaru, nda nuw minumtiyam mantsirimshi patatarangina.
Wanari nuw m'chachureetsi nda tatsamooru tuwaptaruri, ¿mayaatstaja nuw Apanllee kamanchi? Itaru, nuw tatsamooru tuwaparangina. Mishat, nuwaa, Istanda, tákchusin, nuw uru mazinakuri, istatarina.
Ndunari ashiranguri, Apanll nuwaa, ¿Mayaamsha shiy ashirangsha? tákchu, ¿amcheezi nuwa?
Watam Apanll tatsamooru ichingarootsini tinaranguwa. Nuwaa tinarangu, ashiritam Apanlltam m'chachureetsi tinarangitamta; tatsamooru wanasir taarasheemani panarangiya.
Ashiriya, pukir tputs maachiri pishtarangusin, nuwsha anoo istamaam zandaranguri, nda niyrarangina. Kizsha mashind marizimun kiyung kachiyku, anootstam, Nda; waani marizimun tsipanllina, aturi nda niyrtarina.
Mxaxzeemsha katungtsee panamaam pachindeeri, nuwaanitari katungtareezi. Neewa. Ktungangi, mxaxzee tárangina.
Wapar tamapari ashiruri, kapung chinakuri istatarina. Mashindootssha ashiritam chinakuri, kapungtam istarangitamana.
Yuwaatssha tputs wamar ndunari, kiyung kachiykachu, kachizamun anoomsha iripungash ndunari, anoo pakchuri,
nuwaana opeejari pur kutama tuwapimash payuri, anootssha yáyaruri, wamareem panatarina, nda kachizamun tsipamaama. Ansha kamartarsin, ksansha kis taaksin, anumand nuwaatssha kis chinataranaya.
¿Nitaati nuw mxaxzee kurakap machtayaruri, Shiy nee nlluraa wanimpanish taangcha, tárangeezi? Nda. Minumtiyam amb ashimaam nda zandarangina.
Nuw nda ngichkuri tina. Wanari ngichkuri túri, Apanll nuwaa waneekchu, uru titkurinungi pantsakamchuri, pachtami izuuru chpachiya.
Apanllee wáneesh kapungcha puniki. ¿Tamari nuw Apanllee wizpur kasiyaruri, nuwaanaatsi tapachindachee? Pinasakina.
Orootaa kapung payuranguri, nda anungaz chinatarina. Nda anumun mangi taturangina.
Maachi zapan payuranguri, anoo tupaxanxayaruri kapung kurikee putachina túri, nduntam anungaz chinataritamana.
Kanindap napkuri, zaree kizpuritaa wanasir kurakurtaru paktaati, psaansha tsupee kizpuritam wanasir 'sineeru, kurakurtar ashku anoo paktaati,
itaru nuwsha anuwaa pakuri, In kizpurcha wanasiri, túri, nda anoo Apanlleetspaz ashiruri ungirtamaam pakchiyam nda chinarangina.
Wanari amb ashiru chinaranguri, zari, misha tsupeetstam ungirtaranguri, anumand Apanll nuwaa wanimaam waritarangpari, watam Apanlli wamari kasiru anoo ngatkuri, anootssha ungirtaranginawa.
Yuwash kundarari nuwaa kizpur yutaritash wayarangu, kapung tsutashshimun kiyung kachiykuri taarangi, anush nda mangi kis taarangina.
Ashiritaa, nda nuw mantsir tsiyatkuri, Waani kundarari tsipanll, tárangina.
Mishat, nllitarit tputs iyash kusku, iyashchi tputs istamaam nda zandkuri, nda niyrtarina.
Anoo tputs pakuri, wishchip maamaam nda wayarangina. Uru chinampatari chinakuri, Pangishi pshtuyarus, maangtsa, átarina.
Mishat, nda yuwaa yutarit chinarangi anoo tputs yasatpa, aturi, kamapshirangina. Piyartach tputs kamapshiyarusin, Yutarit taakeezi, atanaya. Itaru, nuwnaa nda tárangina.
Nuw uru itsinsaru taakina. Ashiri tputs, Nuwaa tayutaritarundama, aturi, punikeezi. Nda tsiyatkuri, makukish kuxina ashkeezi, nda. Yuwaatstam maachiriti nuwaa mantsir tsiyatkana anootstam punimaam wanindaja.
Apaa, ¿Mayaamsha nuwaa kuki nda mazinaksha? Wanasirimsheetsimari tsiyatarangina. Na shiysha nuwaa kamaningandama. Yutaritshishireetsi ichingaru kirakamun yandayarush, nuwaam pananda.
Sheerush, nuwaam panayarush, nuwsha kirakareetsish yáyaruri, muchimuni tutayeeruri, tputsee ichingaru tuyamandachima, yuwaa yutaritshishi patatarangi, misha kamapshirangi anootsi.
Yuw yutarit ashirangi anoo shiyaatssha Apaa, tasaseeruri, muchee itsireeruri, Zuraktishcha. Nuw yutarittana, táchinllpa.
Itaru, nuw yutarit ashirangeezi. Tputsee watsapun itutsirangeezi. Mishat, nuwamari mzari kapung taap aturi, yuwaa tatsumpani atusin, tsapu ktseeyarana, anootstam nda shuchirangina.
Nuw wanari tputsish mazar katungtsee shuchitaruri, tarawzupaneetssha mantsir shimbayari kasataruri,
yuwamand yutarit ashirangi, anumand Apanll nuwaa wanichu, mzarshi tirik, misha sebaad tatsumirangi anush kapshapari kxunchiya. Nduniya ashiru, karutanandarisha kxunchiya, atina. Ashiriya, na wappa tsiyatssee, Job tárangiya. Ashiriya na kamaneena yuwaa Job, Apanll nuwaa kiyung yachakiya, tárangu anootsi.





































































































































































Ashiri, yuwash nda chinarana anush kambusur kizpur kambustarangu, anushsha Apanll, Taarashipan Jobaa tsiyatarangiya.
Tsiyatku tárangiya. ¿Chaksha shiya? ¿Mayaamsha shiy ngutaritish ashiru tsiyataksha? ¿Nitaati shiy nuwaa izuuru yasakish? Nda. Ashirucha, ngutaritish tsiyatkish.
Ashiriya, ¿kamapari yasareesha itsinsaru kamanichsha? Nuw shiyaa minam k'kuz mashchinllpa. Ashiri shiysha kamaningandama.
¿Yuwapur tsapurunasee tinarangi anpur shiy yap taarangsha? Izuuru yasakeesha kamaninganda.
Mishat, ¿shiy yasakish? ¿Chakaja tsapoo ashchiri metorpa tácheeru kasarang? Mishat, ¿chakaja, amb ashiru taachpa, átu tsapoo wayarang?
Nuw tsapurunasee tinaranguri, ¿tamayareezi mbam wayarangi? ¿Chak tsapurunasee urutari neetsiri taachiya, átu wayaranga? ¿Ndusha nuw ashirangi?
Nuw ashiranguri, tsangach ichingarusin washunand kis yaseerangusin, nuwapat sundaruri shambatkusin, íwar zamamtar ashiranganaya.
Kungootssha maree tsapurunasish wantsush tashitungayaru, ¿chak kungoo piyam waanitam taachpa; tsapootssha waanitam taachpa, táranga? ¿Ndush nuw tárangi?
Msaseetssha ashchiri maree kámanamaam wayarangina. Sheeri, tapeemsha wayarangitamana.
Anumunsha mar warastakachu, nda arangeem yanumaam tsiyateeri kasarangina. Kizpuritaa warastakchush, nimunari itsipchiya. Arangeem yámcheeja, ndambari, tárangina.
<range>
¿Antaati shiy psaanaa; Natu tarasingi, táyachush, k'keetsish mazinachu, 'sinitara sheeru, zarsha yakatan ashik?
'Sineetssha tsapurunasee tuwasineeyaru, yutaritshishpan tputs parundama atusin, waptam pangup kanapkanaya.
Taraseeramchu, zar manginaa kachingakataraa ashkachu, kizpur wanasir chumbeep tshungatara ashkiya.
Tputs yutaritshishpan 'sinee ngatkusin, ndusha mantsirimshee patatkusin, kasakanaya. Watam tap ndunarshtawa. ¿Shiy anoo antaati kamachtarangish? Nduni. Nuwamari ashirangina. Mishat,
¿antaati shiy yuwaa mar kung chtayashinu, shtungataru, anush wazawash karuweerush naparangish? Nduni. Shiy ashimaam wanindaja.
