Mishat, ¿yuwaa tputs tsipakchusin, wan shitungeeru, pshtuyarusin taakana, anoo tsiparee taarash shiy yasarish? ¿Yapeeja taak? Mishat,
¿tsap waninll kapunguri taara, shiy anoo yasakish? Kamapari zurampatartaya yasarush nuwaa kamanitsha.
¿Zareetssha 'sinee, misha tapeetstam yasarish? ¿Yapee zar káyashinu, 'sin shitungeeshinu, tapeerangitaa tarasitan ashik? Mishat, ¿yapimandtamsha káyashinu yusur tapitan ashka?
¿Antaati shiy zaree, misha tapeetstam tuzanganirush, yuwaa taarangu anoo kasayaru, piyamsha taarangu yusur washtam wayaycheezish? Nduni.
Yuwaa nuwaana maachta ichingaru tinarangi anoo shiy yasarush, ashiru nuwaa ¿tsiyatkish? ¿Antaati shiy urutari nllurtamish nuw tsapurunasi tinarangi?
Mishat, ¿íwarsha kanindash kachizamash wayarangi; sisee iripchimashee anoo shiy parangitamtish?
Nuw anoo yuwapas tputs waanpatatin mantsir chinakchusin, pachakaktangachinllina, anoo wanimaam wayarangina. Amb waneeship zangankachuri, waani kiyung kachiychinllinpa, aturi.
¿Yapimandaja 'sin káyashinu tsapurunasish kusak? Kambusursha yap zar shitungku amb káyashinu, ¿tamayshtaja naanataranllu, nish tsapurunasish kusak? ¿Shiy yasakish?
¿Chakshtaja sinaa tsapurunasip zanganku, kizpurinasha pantsatak? ¿Ndusha nuw ashki?
Nuwaantamari ashkachuri, apusap yap kung ndunar kizpur puzatanu anoom, sinakchu, kachachtamaam wayakchuri ashkiya.
Tsapurunasee kachachtakachu, tsap wanasirsha musáseekchu maachi ichingaru kissha kxunkanaya.
¿Antaati sin, misha sirinatam wapar yuw kamachtaku an taar? nduni. Nuwaantamaricha anoo kamachtakshina.
Mishat, ¿kachizamash tsapumun kuxinanaru, kizpur kachiz mzeetangat ashku, an wanir taaritam? Nduni. Nuwaantamaricha anoo kamachtakina.
Mareetssha, ¿chakaja kizpur kachizakchu kungsha, mbamamaam wayarang? Anoo nuwaantari ashimaam wayakina. Min tputs ashimaam wanindaja.
¿Antaati shiy tsangachee masachee psaan wayayarush, iparxinaru sunlleerutpeeja?
¿Irunlleetssha shiy wayayarush, sunlleeru tarasitaranll sheecheeja? ¿Antaati shiy tsangacheewaa mbam wayarangush, ndusha pantsaku taak?
¿Antaati shiy tsangachee ksutamaam waritarish? Nda. Nuwaantamari kanindaa ksutkuri taakina. Mishat, ¿shiy tsapurunasee ksutamaam waritartamtish? Shiy nda ashimaam waninda. Nuwaantamaricha tsapurunasee, kanindpicheetstam ichingaru ksutkina.
Shiy msasee kuruzkachush, Sinaa sinangi. Tsapoo kachachtangi, táyachush, ¿nitaati shiyaa kukish mazinakchu, sin kapung kanindamand pantsacheeja? Nda.
Kariyaatssha shiy, Piy minup tsap naayarush, kariytashini, tákchush, kariysha, Ayu, átu, ¿anuritandaja, naayaru, minupsha tsap kariytayach? ndambari.
Mishat, ¿chak ktashootstam, zamzeetstam manginshuchi, psaan yusamaam chínasheem wanasir wayaranga? ¿Ndush nuw ashirangi?
¿Tamamaja tputs, mang' kapung taaru nee msasee táchich? Mishat, ¿chakaja msasee, Piy arap naayarush, sin pantsatachpa, tákchu, nduniya ashiru, ningitamsha sinangcha, tákchu, sinsha anuritam sinach?
Sin sinakchu, tsapsha kizpur puz, puyumbu tanxtakachu, wanasirsha musásich.
¿Antaati shiy tumuzeem manginshucheem wip wachush katungtsingaz katungpani atusin, mariztarana anoom watungasheem wanutsee panakush, tazazarsin taakana? Tumuz wachush nguranazish iparinayaru, anshuri maakururtarsin, katungtsingaz katungpani atusin, napatarach anshkanaya.
<range>
Mandarsha wip katungpani atusin, nachungaksin, ¿ndusha maachta watungasheem paku, mariz kayatkusin, tanukana anoom nuwcha watungasheem panakuri kchitakshinllinaya? Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll waana Jobaa tsiyatarangu anootsi.
¿Kaapar wamsan machish taaku anoo yasarish? ¿Ashinooja iparintar? Mishat, ¿manllanus iparinaku anoo parangish?
Ashiri ¿mireeyaru, waniparinshini tsup tatsiptara? ¿Anoo shiy yasarish?
An tatspush tatsamootanu, kanaringash pshtuyaru, iparinayaru, anshuri wipapa kuxinxinaw ashtariya.
Ashku wip narintaramachu, yuwaa tatsipuru taaru, anoo kasayaru, piyamsha naayaru, ambirisha wip kanungkiya. Wipaa manginush yanungayaru, wipsha putsisaramchu, waniree kasayasha, piyamsha waanitam naayaru, nda wanarip kanaptariya.
Mishat, ¿chak burroo kayustanee, arap apusap wayaranga?
Anoo nuwaantamari apuspichimaritam yap mangin ndunar chirichirinandari taaru, anush wayaranguri, arap wanitaritam wanllitarusin taakanaya.
An apuspiri wamsanpiri kis taakiya. Nda yaktash tputs zamamtarana, anoo mazinamaam nda zandkanaya. Mishat, tputsee kuk mazinamaam nduntam zandkitamta.
Anshurtatam machish taaksin, wazawash chirichiringaz wayaw katungpani atusin, nachungayarusin, katungkusin taakanaya.
Mishat, ¿nitaati tor kayustan shiyash kuseeru, kamiranaaja shiyaam tarawzu istach? ¿Nitaati yuwash chinish maaku, anshutam washunand chiniptish ipuneeru maacheeja?
Sheeru, ¿putamsha putayarush, wasikpa kamuriyarush, mzarpish macheerush, shiyaam tsapoo ichuychamaam istaycheeja?
¿Antaati shiy, In tor wizpur kapungcha taaru, neem tarawzureetsi kasachima. Waani chingap átush, kasaycheezish?
Kasayarush, ¿wanus kayanakchu anootssha pusayaru, yuwashtam shaana tirikoo pusama xanatkish, anshutam xanateeru, kasaycheeja? ¿Tamari tor kayustan ashich?
Minootssha mashchinllpa: Nuw maachee kapungumash tinarangi, Apistros sura. ¿Anoo parangish? Wazitpungich wazuraneew, shambatku mang' kis tap, tap ashishtangat ashkiya. Kpurangamash tamapari ashiriya. Itaru, purangamaam pinasakiya.
Nuwaana chínashee tsipas wayaranguri, ngichtaku, yapiri waana zandku ambiri tsapumun ngichtayaru, wayangich wanitarisha zari ituwtakiya.
Nda pakchiyam mangush chinaku, wayangchireetsi, Kachuyarusinapa, nda átu, izuuru watstamari kasakiya.
Ndunpaz waana wipaa ashiru, nda ksutamaam waninda.
Nuw anoo chínasheem tsipas wayaranguri, ambiritam ashku taakiya. Nda wayangchee ksuteeru kanituwamaam waninda.
Itaru, an iripumaatssha kizpur yasariya. Tputs kapaachumuntaa kuxineeru kapaachsha iripuru, anoo waamari kasiriya. Kizpur wamari kasiru iripku, kapaachoo stakiya.
Minootssha, Jobaa, mashchinllpa. ¿Antaati shiy kapaachoom wizpur kapung wayarangish? Mishat, ¿chak kapaachoom watsurarish wiratungaru, wayaranga? ¿Ndusha nuw ashirangi?
Tapazish pshtumaam aturi, ashirangana. ¿Antaati shiy, Natu, taringsi, átush, kapaachsha pchich tamatarpari ashiru kizpur tsinga sheeru, tapazip iripeecheeja? Sheeru, iripuru, yusaku, tputsee tpuxtacheeja.
Kapaach kutamaam pinasakiya. Tsapoo waxizuppat tawang, tawang ashku, nda puniku, tapazish pshtumaam kizpur zandkiya.
Tputssha waanpatatin wachirurpat pachakaktarusin, zamamtarana, anoo kapaachsha pakchiyam nda puniku, anoo suwamaam nda waninda.
Sundar waanpatatin wasappa, misha k'chirpungpa kayungaktangandtaatssin, anoo suwamaam nda waninda.
Tapazeem chtamaam, wakarash wits puu, puu táyachinllina, anoo mazinakchu, nda anootsiri xiyaa ashimaam waninda. Waamasama yap naanllina amb iripunganll ashkiya.
Tputssha yuwaa undarar puu, puu táyarattana anoo yámku, kizpur zunganitara ashku, Natu, taringints, tákchusin, kapaachsha kis tapazish pshtukiya. Araptaa tapazpan urkar tsiyateeratana, wasundururee kamachtaku, anoo mazinakchu, tputsee kayungkusin, Ayi, átangatu, anoo mazinakchu, ashtaa anoo kapaach nda punikiya, watam nuw kapaachoo nda punimaam tinaranginawa. ¿Shiy antaati ashimaam tinarangeezish?
Mishat, arangeem mashchinllpa: ¿Antaati shiy yunganee purangamaam tayaspatarangish, araptaa yap mangin ndunari amb purangamaama?
Mishat, ¿shiy yunganee machip íwar ngichtamaam kamachtarangish? Nduni. Nuw kamachtarangina.
An patumbchish ixateeru anush ngichtakiya. Anshurisha wayangchee nda maachi muntamaam ksutku, wayangchishuri psaan maakiya. Kaschiritam nda kasamaam waninda.
Ashiriya, wixtamarimandarisha maachtam napanapaw ashkiya. Maachi naanatanu anoo pakchu, zayaru, katungkusin taakanaya.
Wipapa wanutsee kaneesaatsiritam katungamaam yasariya. Anumash urutari yuwash maachi zam tsipar tamuru, anush nda kasatariya. Watam nuw yunganee kaneesaatsiri katungamaam wayaranginawa. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll Jobaa maacheetsi manginshuchi ichingaru mashirangu anootsi.
Ashiriya, natuwa Jobaa. ¿Shiy nuwaa wand tsiyanispat tsiyatamaam zandkish? Nuw Apanlltana Taarashipani. ¿Shiy ambiri ántarush támaam zandkish nuwaatsi? Na kamaninda, Apanll tárangiya.
<range>
Ashiriya, Jobsha Apanllee, ¿Mayaatsi shiyaa yámeeri tsiyateechi? Nda arangeem tsiyatamaam waritakina.
<range>
Anuri zapan mantsirimsheetstam tsiyataranguri, na ndusha arangeem tsiyatamaam zandkina, tárangiya.
Itaru, yusursha Apanll yuwashsha kambusur kizpur tap shitaru, anush tsiyatarangiya.
Natunaa wizpurirish nuwaam yámandangi; pangpani. Nuw shiyaa minum k'kuz mashchinllpa. Shiysha nuwaa kamaningandama.
Ashiriya, shiy shaanaatsi wanasirim ínayarush, nuwaatssha yutaritshishpaneetspaz ashirush, mantsir tsiyataksha.
¿Antaati shiy nuwapa wizpuriri tatsamoo? Mishat, ¿shiy tsiyatkush, kariy tamapari ashiru kizpur zunganeekchu, nuwapa tatsameecheezish?
Mangishish chinakush, Nuw tsapurunasee ksutamaam waritatana, atinaareesha, na shingi. Panganee. Ashkachush, kurakaam shiyaa nuwaanpata tatsamooru ínchinllpa.
Shiy yuwaa tputs waanaatstamari kuk payukana anoo natstayarush, yuwaatsiri xiyaru, anootsiri kapchata shingcha.
<range>
Sheerush, mapshishipsha yap tsiparee mapkana ambitam mapungcha, izuuru mbizamamarita.
Ashiramchush, anush nuw shiyaa, Zuraktishcha. Napa shaanpata wizpurirish tputsee natstayarush, pachayanllish, táchinllpa.
Na mazinangcha Jobaa, Nuw maachtaa ichingaru tinarangina. Behemotaa kungushcheem tinarangitamana. Shiy tamapari ashiritamta anumun mangish chinangcha. Wakar tamapari ashiritam chirichiree katungkitamta.
¿An wizpur tamara? Napangi, wizpureeru wanuts ashchiri shungeerutaru, tanxipa wirkar washitaniwa.
Wanishsha karipan tamatarpari ashiru kizpur mbama. Watssha wayanx mbamaw itintingakaru,
wanap maachi ngusamb tamapari ashiru kizpur mbama.
Anumari ichingaru kasiru, wizpur misha watar tinarangina. Ashirucha, anoo nuwaantamaritam pachamaam waritarina.
An machish taakiya. Wazawash, yuwash manginshuch tumuz shaneerana, anush kuseeru, yuwaa chirichir kxunku anoo katungkiya.
Katungtarangu, yasinashsha puch tapishushuwmach ashkiya. Nduniya ashiru, kungumun wing puwarnarush pshtuyaru, tapishkiya.
Anshurisha wayanpish chirichirimun tutunlltayaru, kanusku, maamaw ashku, nda chiyzamaam zandkiya.
Kung Ortag kizpuritaa kumbiyashinu, yuwaa kuxinxinaw anoo puputanitaa, nda puniku chiyzamaam waninda.
¿Chakaja yuwaa kuxinxinaw anoo putayach? Minumtiyam tputs anoo putayaru, wasappa wachoo yuxeeru, shipaatssha tip sheeru kasamaam wanindaja, Apanll Jobaa tsiyatku tárangiya.
Na shanitaa chinangcha. ¿Nitaati shanitaa wanumbimun zangamchimun mangasis xatayaruch yuseecheezich? Mishat, ¿kuku taxipungayaruch, wasikpa tusiseecheezich?
Mishat, ¿kamiranartaja shipaa wasikpa kamuriychich? Yungashishpasha ¿kamirnatamtaja wanutsee tip sheechich? nduni.
¿Antaati shiyaa, kamiyaku, shiysha mangish kis shanitpa wanasir tsiyatstangat ashcheezish? ¿Nayaningandama. Nuwaa kiyung yacharishpa, tsiyatkush, táycheezish?
¿Anoo m'chachureemish ínayarush, yuwaa kamachtakish anoo tuminku, shiyaa urutamari taacheeja?
¿Tsiripichpa michitatar ashtarich shanitpa sheecheezish? Mishat, ¿anoo wats wasikpa kamuriyarush, iparshitish anpa michiteecheeja?
¿Tputssha anoo kamiranartaja pachayarusin, wanutsi pakchiw ktsup, ktsup sheersin, tupaxanxaychinllina?
Anoo tas ¿wasappa kamiranartaja kayungkush tuseech? Mishat, ¿k'chirpungpa muchush kayungkush tuseechtamtaja? nduni.
Ashiriya, shiy anoo putakatush, uwsha kizpur tsiyantakachu, shiyaa waratataru, kiyung yachayaru, kasakchu, ayamtaatiya nda annung yusur káyamamtachsha. Ayamtaati anoo mbizacheezish.
Anoo tputs pakchusin, puniksin, itsipamaam waritachiya. Kapung punichinllinaya, watam wamari ichingaru kasiru wizpuriwa.
Wanari min tputs, Nuwaatsina ashimaam wanindaja, atinaariya, ¿tamari anpa wizpuririni tatsamooch? ¿Chakaja anpa wizpur tatsamooru, waratatarangsin, nda wanguytaku, matambshiritam kasayach? Tsapurunasish tputs minumtiyam anpa tatsamaam wanindaja.
<range>
Ichingaroo wizpur kasiriya. Wats mbamawaru, nda maachi tusamaam waritariya.
¿Chakaja anoo tas ngusamb tamapari ashiru, anoo tuchingayach? K'chirpasha ¿chakaja mangoo kayungeech? Zap tuwapeeru, nda tusamaam waninda.
Mishat, ¿chaka nda punima yasaru, kukoo taxipungayaru, wanas kapunguw taaru anoo napeech?
Ush kireeru pshkurutariya. Patumbich tamapari ashiru kizpur mbama. Nda anoo k'chir tusamaam waninda.
Zap tazumuru, pakchiyam nda karariya. Izuuru tstsutariya.
Tstsutaru pshkurutaru, nda anush maachi tusamaam waninda. ¿Antaati pakchiyam karariwa anush pshtupu?
An ksheetku, kariy tamapari ashiru kizpur zunganeekiya. Wachsha zar puturi yáyashinu, kizpur chumbeep kurakurtar ashtaru ashiriya.
Kukushsha sumas ashiru kurakurtaru, shitungta, shitungta ashishtangat ashkiya.
Shipushsha, msas kpayaruch kaputku, mzeeziztar ashtaru ashiru, msas mzeetar ashkiya.
Kukushsha sumas ashiru kizpur puj shitar ashkiya.
Tputs anoo ichingarusin, punichinllinaya, watam wizpuriwa. Watsurarish wizpur kapung taariya.
Wazturursha yuwash watungamar taaku, an kizpur mbama. Ngusamb tamapari ashiru kayungitaatich, nda tusamaam waninda.
Mangsha wich tamapari ashiru kizpur mbamatamta. Patumbich tushish tamapari ashiru mbama.
Wanari an tsiyantaku, chiyzayachu, tputs yuwataa, Nuwamaricha ichingaru wizpuri taaki átu, antaa puniku, suwachiya.
Wandtaati k'chirpung, m'chittam, wasaptam payukinaariya, nda anpa pachamaam waninda, watam wanuts kizpur mbamawa.
¿Tamaree ngusambpa mbamashpa pachayani, atitaateechi anpata pachachich? Waam ngusamb mbamash tirikpaz zapi ashiru nda ksachiya. Mishat, ngusambaa bronsi karipan kuchar tamapari ashiriya.
Wasappa kayungkitaateechi, wasuree táchakchu, nda suwakiya. Patumbichpasha tpaw ashkitaatich, masharootspaz ashiru nda táchachiya.
Yasinpa tpaw ashkuch, wirupapaz shinambkuch ashiru nda táchachiya. Tputs zapan k'chirpungpa tiyanta, tiyanta ashkusin, shanit k'chirpung yusaku, anoo mazinaku, stachiya.
Tsapumun pshiyrakchu, titkurish mbamaw kitsirutaru, anpasha tsapoo kanutataraa ashkiya.
Musashsha imurish pshtukchu, kpam kaputku tamatarpari ashiru, puz, puz shitaraa ashkiya.
Arangeemsha, uship kung kizpur mburash wir isingungamach ashkiya.
¿Antaati minumtiyam tsapurunasish ashim wanindaja? Anumaritcha ashiru taarsha. ¿Mayaatseeja puniku punich? Punimaam wanindaja.
Anootsimaritcha ichingarumand maachee wizpur kasiru tinarangashina. Yuwaatstaa tputs wizpuri anootstaa wamari kasiriya, Apanll Jobaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa arangeem yusur Apanll Jobaa tsiyatarangu anootsi.
Jobsha, Apanllee kuk ichingaru mazinarangu, Apaa, na shiyaa yasakina. Shiy kizpurtishcha. Shiyaam minumtiyam xarashish wanindaja. Mayaatsimasa shaana ashimaam zandaksha, anoo chinayachush uru anoo shiyamari tatsamooksha.
<range>
Nuw shiyaa yuwaa yacharangish anoo, nda yasaranguri, kapung yutarit tsiyatarangina, watam pakchiyam yuwaa ashirangish anoo nda mangoonaranginawa.
Ashiriya, anush shiy nuwaa, Natu, nuwaa kuki mazinangcha. Minum k'kuz mashchinllpa. Shiysha kamaningandama, tárangush, nuwsha shiyaa nda kamanimaam waritarangina.
Sirú shiyaa kukish mazinaranguri, mangoonamana mangoonarangina. Natta in yuwaatsimari tsiyatkish anootsimari yasakina. Itaru, natunaa shiyaa kchiptarti pakeena.
Ashirucha, shiyaa na kapung paziki, yuwamand mantsir zapan tsiyatarangi anumanda. Na nimun ndusha arangeem mantsirimshee tsiyatkuri, puzachshurisha yamuyaruri kuxinxinaw ashkuri taachima, tárangiya. Apanll yusur Jobaa urkirpaneemtam ínarangiya.
Apanll Jobaa tsiyatamaam iwatsparamchu, anumunsha Elifasaatssha tárangiya: Yuwamand nda wanasir nuwaa tsiyatarangish, anumand shiyaa, amikurpatartish kapung tsiyantakina. Siysa Jobaa, Shiy yutarittishcha. Anumandcha Apanll shiyaa waneeksha, tárangsa. Itaru, Jobanaa zurampatari wanasir tsiyatarangiya.
Ashiriya, siysa na toroo 7, misha opeejaa wip sietitam putayarus, yap nuw tputsiri Job taaru anush yushindayarus, pachayarus, saama yutaritshishiris yaramaam muchintsa. Ashkachus, nuwsha tputsiri Job siyaam nuwaa mashkachu, nuwsha waa kuk mazinakchuri, siyaa wanimaam waritarangitaati, ndusha siyaa wanichina. Nduntaati siy nuwaa wanasir tsiyatarangus, itaru Jobamand wanasirimshirini ashchima, Apanll tárangiya.
Anoo mazinarangusin, Elifas, Bildad, misha Sofar ashparitin naataranganaya. Pangush kuseersin, chinootssha putayarusin, Jobap machtaranganaya. Anushsha kuseersin, pachayarusin, muchirangsin, Jobsha wamkureem yutaritshishirinee tachingamaam Apanllpat tsiyatarangiya. Apanllsha Jobaa kuk mazinarangiya.
Job Apanllpa tsiyatam iwaparamchu, anumunsha Apanll, Jobaa yusur sirútama wanasir taarangu ashimatam wayarangiya. Chinoomsha sirútama chinurangu, anoo kánurinasha panarangiya. Maachiritamta ichingaru, misha muchchureemtam kánurinasha panarangitamta.
Ashirucha, anoo mazinarangusin, zoonll, wizar, wamkurtam yuw ichingarusin waa natsatarana, anin pangani atusin, naataranganaya. Anushsha kuseersin, pangush Jobpa washunand katungaranganaya. Yuwaa Apanll kapung Jobaa kiyung yacharangu, anumand mang' mantsarangusin, tsiyatstar ashiranganaya. Tputs yuw naatana anin minumtawaritssin kurikee, anichootstam, misha orootstam Jobaam panaranganaya.
Apanll Jobaa yachamaam iwatsparamchu, kapung istarangiya. Sirútama taarangu anoo kánurishta istarangiya. 14 mil opeeja, mishat 6 mil kameechu, 1 mil toroo tsimbunaw kintanatanaru, burrootssha miltam panarangiya.
Wipsha pchingarangtaa, anumun yusur iparinarangiya. Kamuz 14, kiz 3 ashiru iparinarangiya.
Kiz minu Jemimá ísamarangiya. Tsimbunarineetssha Kesiyá ísamarangiya. Tuchparineetssha Karenhapok ísamarangiya.
An Job wip kiz kizpur wanasirimuna. Nda minumtiyam tsapurunasish anpa tatsamooru wanindamuna. Job watsipun pakcheemsha pshataru, wipaam maachiritaa wayarangiya. Kizaamtam, kamuzpatatam tatsamooru wayarangiya.
Yuwamun Job kapung kiyung kachiyarangu, anumun iwaz arangeem 140 masach kis taarangiya. Kizpur wachinayaru tsiparangiya. Ndatuma tsiparu, wachinllinoo, mishat wachinllinootstam wip, mishat wachinllinootstam arangeem iparinarangu anoo parangitamta. Ashiriya yuwaa Apanll Jobaa aranginasha istarangu anoo na kamaneena. [Watamcha Jobarini kuku.]
<range>
Tputs Apanllimun mang' tatku, mapiyru kis taakiya. Yutaritshiship nda tachitkiya; Tputs Apanllee kuk tayutaritku, anpat nda kis ipunkiya. Apanllee zarungchaku anoo nda mazinakiya.
Apanlleetsimari kuk payumaam chinakiya. Kaschiritam, psaantam uru Apanllee chinachintar ashkiya.
Yasin wanasirimash tamapari ashiru taamaam waritariya. Napa yasinaam kung nda pishtaku, kchitaru taaku, yuwash zar tatsamkachu, anush kis yusikiya. Warsha nda mawirukiya. Tputsshat Apanllimun wizpur ambitam ashkachu, kchitaru kis taakitamanaya.
Itaru, yashingchichsha tputs nda ashirusin taakanaya. Wayapureetspaz ashiru kambusur arap tpurangangpaz ashkiya.
Apanllshat anoo izuuru waneeship kapeetchiya. Amb ashkachu Apanllchichpat tputs ayamtaati nda washunand yapandchinlliniya.
Watam Apanll waanaatstamari tiptsir uru ksutkuwa. Itaru, tputs yashingup tachitkachu, waneeship naachiya.
¿Mayaamshitaja tputs yashingchich kapung tsiyantaksin zamangakana? Shaniyeeshtisin yuwari zandakana anuri tsiyatkanaya.
Kurakawtamsin, wipunashpat shaniyeersin, Apanllee mishat Apanlleetstam ipusamarini tayutaritkanaya.
Kapung tsiyatkusin, Apanll kuweetsini kateenpapaz ashiru kamurikpaz ashkiya. Na watsta. Iyaanaatsi kateenaa ichipeeruni kapeeteeni, atanaya.
Itaru, Apanllsha waamari kasiru kanindash taaku an, mazinakchu kurakaa kuk stakiya.
Sheeru, kizpur tsiyantakachu, ¿Mayaamsa nuwaa átssa? átu, kurakshitisin punikanaya.
Watam Apanll tsiyatarangu, Nuwaana ipari kurakaa uwamari kasiru taamaam ipuseena. Machi Siyonamand tputsee ztaru ksutku taachiya, Apanll táranguwa.
Apanlltam ipusamarini Apanlleetstam kuk kamanku, tárangiya: Apari nuwapat tsiyatku tárangu; Nuw shiyaa ipartana. Nat in shiyaam taarashish kaneesich panayana.
Shiyshat nuwaa mashangandama. Tsapurunasshuchee nuwamari kasiruri taamaam wayangandama, tángcha. Tákchush, nuwshat shiyamari tsapurunasshuchee ichinguru kasimaam wayachinllpa.
Shiysha tsapurunasshuchee kurak wizpurirpatish izuuru tpachingachsha. Tputs muritsaa yasinpat pátangtaru shiysha, kundarareetsish ambtam ashtachsha. Apari nuwaa tárangiya: Apanll ipusamarini waparee kuk kamanku, tárangiya.
Ashiri siysa tsapurunasshuchis kurakis, mangiptis taangtsa.
Apanllee chinayarus, mangis kis ungirtangtsa. Apanllee waneesh puniyarus, Nuw shiyaa kurakartana, tángtsa.
Ashiriya paptsa. Nduniya siy Apanllish tachitkus, Apanll siyaa tsiyantakachu tpachingayantspa. Watam Apanll musásiri tsiyantamaam yasaruwa. Itaru, tputs Apanllimun mang' tatkusin, mang' kis taachinllinaya.

Apaa, Nuw kundarari zapancha. Tputs zapan nuwaa kasimaam zandkanaya.
Waanpatatin tsiyatkusin, ¿Apanll Dapiyaa tamaree istach? Istacheeja ndambaree, atanaya nuwaatsi.
Itaru shiysha Apaa, nuwaa kámanakush ksutakshawa. Nuwaa kasimaam istaksha, Uru mangeetsi tuwizpurtaksha.
Nuw shiyaa kuruzkuri, Apaa, istanda, tákchuri, Shiyshat Apaa, pangishish, Siyonash mach, nuwaa kuki mazinaksha. Nuwaa istaksha.
Ashirucha nuwshat nda punikuri, mapiyruri maaranguri, yusur chiyzayanll ashkina. Watam shiysha, Apaa, nuwaa ksutakshawa.
Kundarari zapantaa nuwaam pachamaam kuseersin, turipingaktaatsin, nuwsha nda punikina.
¡Apaa, istanda! ¡Nuwaa tapachindangandama! watam shiyamun mangi tatkinawa. Kundarareesti tpazangcha. Tputsee nda arang pachamaam waneeyarush ksangcha. Tumuzee wanas kurumbatarich sheerush ksangcha.
Apaa, shiyamari tapachindampanish taaksha. Ashiri, tputsireetsish istangcha. Ksutangcha, Apaa. Dapiyarini Apanllee, Istangandama, átu, tárangiya




















































Apaa, shiyamari ichingarootsini kasirush taaksha. Shiyaa taarashipaneetsish, tputs ztaru wizpurireetsish pakanaya. Kanindaatstaa arang kasiru taaksha.
Tputs tsapurunasshuch shiyaa natsaktaatssin, itaru nllursha, kanxutaa shiyaa kis yaseeksin, zamangakchusin, kundararshitish anoo mazinakchusin, paziksin zamakanaya.
Apaa, yuwaa shaana tinarangish, anoo psaan kanindap napkuri, tsupeetstam, tsangacheetstam pakuri, napuxtakina.
Ichingaroo pakuri, mangishi Apaa chinakina, ¿Mayaama iy tputsini taakanee? atina. ¿Mayaamsha shiy iyaa tputseetsini chinaksha? ¿Mayaamsha iyapa mapeerush taaksha?
Shiy iyaa tputseetsini tinarangush, shaana tamapari ashtamartam iyaa tinarangsha.
Tínamareetsish ichingaru kasiru iyaatsimari wayarangsha. Ksutamapaneemtam iyaatssha wayarangsha. Sheerush iyaatssha tputseetsini kamachtakush tárangsha:
Siysa opeejaa, wakaraatstam, mishat manginshucheetstam,
íwar mangataru anootstam, mishat kayupcheetstam, maachi ichinguru kungush taataru anootstam siyamari kasirus taatssa, tárangsha Apaa.
Itaru Apaa, shiyamarisha ichingarootsini kasirush taaksha. Shiyaa taarashipaneetsish wizpurireetsish tputs ztaru pakanaya. Dapiyarini wayas átu yandarangiya.





















Apaa, ¿mayaamsha shiy iyaa arap kasaksha? watam kiyung kachiykiniwa. ¿Mayaamsha tapishuksha?
Yutaritshishpan tputs pukiree urutamari kiyung yachaksin taakanaya. Tputseem zapan nazanllish tupantsakpaz ashkanaya, Itaru zapish waantatamsin anush pantsayarusin tsipachinlliniya.
Yutaritshishpan tputs waanaatstamari ungirtaku tsiyatstar ashkiya. Yuwaa waana zandku, anootsimari tsiyatkiya. Itaru, shiyaatsshat, Apaa, mantsir tsiyatkanaya. Nda pakchiyam shiyaa chinamaam zandkanaya.
Waanaatstamari kapung ungirtaku, ¿Chakaja nuwaa wanichinda? Apanll wanindaja, ambimari átu mangush chinaku taakiya.
Waamatamari waana mangush chinaku wanasiri shitungkiya. Itaru shiyaatsshat, Apaa, waneeshish nda pakchiyam punikiya. Tputs waneektaa, anoo nda pakchiyam paziksin, stakanaya.
¿Chaka nuwaa kasichinda? Urutari nuw kis taachina, Nuwaam xarashish ayamtaatiya taacheeja, ndambaree, atanaya.
Uru tputsee mantsir tsiyatkanaya. Ngichzeetsimari tsiyatkusin taakanaya. Tputsee mangutamari tamapingaku wanasir tsiyatkanaya. Itaru mangush kiyung yachamaam chinakanaya.
Tamapingampan washchir tamatarparee ashkanaya. Napa washchir yaktashtaa tapisheeru, tsangayaru, tputsee pachayaru, maachiritaatssha ichingkanaya. Tamapingampani ashkitamanaya.
Mishat, tamapingampan tumuz tamapari ashkitamsina. Tputsee tachitakpaz ashku tsangayaru, tamapingayaru, zata ashkiya. Amb ashkusin, tputsee kasiksin, kiyung yachakanaya. Tputs waanaatsi tapachindamaam pinasakanaya.
Yutaritshishpan tputsee kawashishpapaz ashiru kawakanaya. Tputssha shitungamaam pinasakanaya. Kiyung kachiykanaya. Wamarisha yashingchich kasikanaya.
Mangush chinaku, Yuwaa ashki anoo Apanll mbizachparee, watam wachoo kámanakuri, nuwaa nda pakuwa, atusin, mapiyrsin taakanaya.
Ashiriya, Apaa shiysha, kuwish paxayarush, wizpurirpatish yutaritshishpanee waneengcha. Watam tputsee kiyung yachakanawa. Ashiri shiysha tputsireetsish nayaniyarush istangcha.
Apaa ¿mayaamshta yashingchich shiyaa stakana? Staksin, ¿Mayamandaja nuwaa wanichinda, atanaya?
Itaru, shiysha Apaa, ichingaru paksha. Yuwaa yutarit ashkana anoo napanapaw ashkush, izuuru shiy wanichsha. ¿Chakaja, Apaa, tputs pukiree istach? Wanindaja. Shiyamaricha istampan taaksha. Ashirucha shiyamun mang' tatkanaya. Watam shiy mxaxzeetsta uru nayaniyarush istatarshawa.
Apaa, yashingchichee pachtama chpakpaz sheerush wizpuree tasámbaytangi. Ndusha tputsee kiyung yachamaam izuuru pastamamari waneengcha.
Apaa, shiyamaricha kurakish urutamari kasirush taaktasha. Yashingchich tputs nda minamtiyam shiyash pshtuchinlliniya. Ichingarootssin kapeeteerush kasachsha.
Apaa, shaana tputsirish, shiyaa; Istanda tákchusin, shiysha uru mazinakchush istaksha. Tputsireetsish kapung chinakush, uru tuwizpurtaksha.
Shiy mxaxzeetstam, misha pukireetstam tputs istangcha. Yutaritshishpan nda urutamari taachinllina, watam tsapurunasshuchiwa. Shiysha anoo tpachingangcha, nimun ayamtaati ndusha tputsee kiyung yachamaama. Ashiri Apaa, wapparee.






















Tputs mangshari ashirusin, Apanll wanindaja, atanaya. Ichingarusin mantsir chinaksin, kizpur yutarit taakanaya. Nda minumtiyam wanasir taakanaya.
Apanllsha kanindamanda tsapurunasshuchee napku, ¿Ndush minamtam tputs mang wanasir taaru, nuwaa chinamaam zandak? átu,
Napku, itaru ichingurusin yutarit chinaksin mantsir taakana. Nda minamtiyam Apanllee chinamaam zandakanaya.
Yutaritshishpan nda pakchiyam mazinamaam zandkanaya. Mangsharitssincha. Apanllee tiptsir kiyung yachaksin, urkiree itutskusin waamarishtisin shamangarsin wanuts kapungu taakanaya. Ashkusin, nda pakchiyam Apanllee chinakanaya.
Yuwash zar Apanll tputsee waneekchu anush, puniksin nungtachinlliniya. Itaru, Apanllsha yuwaatsimari waanaatsee kuk payukana anootsimari uru ksutkiya.
Apanll tiptsir wanasir taamaam zandkitaatssin itaru yashingchichsha staksin tayutaritkanaya. Ashkitaatssin Apanllsha waana tiptsiree ksutkiya.
Apanll mikeeru iyaam Israelchicheemani tapachindampaneem zanganichpa, Siyonamand machi. Apanll ashkachu, iysha Israelchichini ichinguruni mapiyshtini taachiniya. Mangini kis shambatkuni Apanlleetsimarisha ungirtakuni taachiniya.
Apaa, ¿chaka shiyash pangish pshtumaam waritak? ¿Chak shiyapat Siyonash mach ipunamaam waritak? Yuwamari tputs itsinsaru taaku, minamari tsiyatssee payuku, anumari shiyash pshtumaam waritariya. Tputs ashku anu uru mangpatari itsinsaru tsiyatkiya.
<range>
Tputsee nda yutaritam ínakiya. Wamkuree nda kiyung yachakiya. Waanpatatin nda waratku taakiya.
Yutaritshishpanee nda kis napku itaru Apanllchicheetssha chinakiya. Uru waanaatsee kuk payukiya, uwaana kiyungutaa kachiyku, itaru ashtaa payukiya.
Urkiree tputseem panaku, nda yanusha tuwapanda, atiya. Anuritam tatsamooru tuwapanda, atiya. Tputsee ngichimaam izuuru ngatkiya. Wanasirimshee tputs, Tayutaritamaam kurik panachintspa, atitaatssin anoo ngatkiya. Apaa, tputs shiyaa ashirinaari chinaku, shiyaa kasacheeja, ndambaree.
Apaa, nuwaa ksutangandama, watam nuw shiyash kamungkina.
Apaa, nuw shiyaa kurakartana. Shiy nuwaa uru istaksha. Shiyapa wizpurirish tatsamoorazinllinaja.
Nishuch tputs zapan apanllputsee ungirtakanaya. Kizpurtanicha, atanaya.
Aranginasha, aranginasha ashkusin, apanllputsee izapaneekchinlliniya. Itaru, nuwsha minamtiyam wakaraa pachayaruri, apanllputsee ungirtacheezee. Apanllputsee sur minamtiyam tsiyatcheezee.
Nuw shiyamunari mangi ksakina. Shiy nuwaa uru istaksha. Nuwaa tapachindaksha. Ichinguru zaree nuwaa ksutaksha
Shiy nuwaam taarashee kizpur wanasiri ipusarangsha. Kapung mangi kisa. Arang taarashish min nuwaam wanindaja.
Apaa, nuw shiyaa kapung chinakina. Shiy uru nuwaa machiksha. Psaantam nuwaa mangi p'tseeksha shiyaa itsinsaru tachitamaama.
Shiy urutari nuwapa ipunarush taaksha. Uru nuwaa napaksha. Shaana nuwaa mbutsinungich wayaksha. Ashiri ¿Chaka nuwaa kasichinda?
Ashirucha, nuw mangi ksakina. Nuw kuki murcha. Nuw mangi punirustacheezi,
watam nuwaa mapumashta nda pakchiyam kasachshawa. Kani kanizeem kinacheeja. Nuw nutsi kuchacheeja, watam shaana nuwaa ipusamarshawa.
Urutamari Apaa, shiyapa kis taachina. Shiyashumari kis shamangkashish taariya. Shiyash taarashish urutamari kizpur wanasir taariya.



































































Kanind iyaam Apanllee wizpur tuyamandakiya. Zari, tsuptam, tsangachtam iyaa; tsiyatakpaz ashku; Apanllimarita kizpurcha, atanaya.
Apanll zaree kanindush wayarangu, uru putam taraseeta, putam taraseeta ashimaam kamachtarangiya. Tapeekchu anush, tsupeetstam, tsangacheetstam wayarangiya.
Tsup nduntaati tsiyatku, zartam nduntaati tsiyatku, tputssha nduntaa kukoo mazinaksin, ashtaa,
Yuwamand Apanll kanindaa tinarangu, anumand tputs ztaru Apanllee yasakanaya. Waamari kasiriya, atanaya.
Apanll zaree kanindush wayarangu, zarsha putam shitungata, putam shitungata ashku, itsinsaru naakiya. Kanungas kizaa yamapi átu, kizapiri itsinsaru naataru, zarsha ambtampaz ashiru shitungachu, itsinsaru naakiya. Mishat, zar, tputs mang' kis iriptaru ashiritam nda nizimaam yasariya.
Zari puturita shitungeeru, itsinsaru naaku, yap pshtuku amb izuuru pshtukiya. Ichingaroom tputs zarish ksaneekanaya. Apanll taarashee kaneesich tputseem panapi átu, waanaatsee kuk iyaam panarangiya.
Apanlli kuk kizpurcha wanasiri. Apanll nda minamtiyam yutarit tsiyatarangiya. Ichinguru tputs Apanllee kuk mangoonamaam taariya. Tputs mang' nduntaa, itaru Apanllee kuk mangoonku, yasampaz ashiru wanasiri chinakiya.
Apanll kuk iyaam itsinsaru taamaam kamankiya. Tputssha payukinaariya, kissha taachiya. Apanll kuk nda minamtiyam yutam kamankiya. Tputsush mang' tuwasineekiya wanasiri chinamaama.
Tputs Apanllee puniku, uru itsinsaru tachitkiya. Apanll; Tputs wanasiri kis taapana, átu, anooma kamachtamarineetsi panarangiya. Nda iyaa kiyung yachamaam zandkiya.
Apaa, shiy kukish kizpur wanasircha. Shiyaa kukish payumaam orootstaa arangeem kasiru wanasiri. Kinduraa wakunguri waakuri kizpur kisa. Itaru, shiyaatssha kukish payukuri, aranginasha mangi ksakina.
Apaa, nuwaa shiycha tputsirish. Shiy kukish nuwaa mangi p'tseeku, shiyaatsimari tuminpi, atina. Tputs shiyaa kukish payuksin, shiysha aranginasha istaksha.
Itaru Apaa, ¿chakaja waanaatsee yutaritshishirini ichingaru yásach? Ichingaru yasamaam pinasakaniya Ashiri Apaa, shiysha nuwaa yutaritshishireetsi ichingaru tchingangandama.
Istangandama Apaa, nda nuwaanaatstamari chinamaama. Watam an yutaritawa. Shiy nuwaa istakush, nuwsha yutaritshishireetsi kasichima.
Ashkachuri, yuwaa wanasir chinaki, mishat wanasir tsiyatki, anoo shiysha kis mazinachsha. Shiy nuwaa tapachindaksha; mishat ksutaksha. Ashiri Apaa, wappari, atina. Dapiyarini Apanllpat tsiyatku tárangiya.

























Apaa, Apaa, ¿mayaamsha nuwaa kasaksha? ¿Mayaamsha shiy nda nuwaa tapachindaksha? Nuw mangi kapung mantsakuri, shiyaa kuruzkina. ¿Tamasha shiy nda mazinaksha?
Apaa, kaschiritam, Psaantam shiyaa kuruzkina. Itaru, shiysha nda nuwaa mazinaksha. Mapiymaam nuw pinasakina.
Itaru Apaa, shiyamari wanasirtishcha. Iy Israelchichini shiyaatsimari ungirtakaniya.
Iy pachirini shiyaatsimaritam chinaranganiya. Shiyaa kapung chinarangusin, shiysha tapachindarangsha.
Shiyaa, Istanda, tárangusin, shiyshat tapachindarangsha. Shiyamun mang' taturangsin, shiysha uwaatsee istamaam nda ngatarangsha. Nda tamapingarangsha. Itsinsaru istarangsha.
Itaru, nuwaatssha tputs, ¿Antaati in tputseeja? Nda. Mbich tamatarpachi ashiru kátimaam waritachcha, nuwaa atusin stakanaya.
Mantsir tsiyateersin, stakanaya. Nuwap napeersin,
¿Tamasha in Apanllimuntaa mang' tatku, Apanll uwaa nda tapachindaka? Apanll uwaa chinakinaariya, taarashee tapachindachinaparee, atanaya nuwaatsi.
Itaru, shiysha Apaa, nuwaa aneershi nllurtamaam wayarangsha. Nllurtaranguri, aneereemi ksutamaam wayarangsha.
Ndatumastaa nllurtachuri, shiy uru nuwaa ksutarangsha. Urutari nuw shiyaa aparimuna.
Ashiri Apaa, shiy nuwaa ksarishpa. Kapung kiyung kachiykuri tsipamaam waritakina. ¿Chakaja nuwaa tapachindachinda? aturi, min tputs nuwaa tapachindampan wanindaja.
Kundarari nuwaa turipingaranaya. Basanshuch wakar upapchir watseenur tamapari ashirusin, nuwaa pachamaam zandkanaya.
Tumuz manginshuch kázamish tamaparee ashirusin, kuksha kapung xipungayarusin, nuwangaz tsipusamamari zandkanaya.
Nuw kung tamapari ashiruri zaw ashkachuri, wizpuriri ndunariritara ashkina. Ichinguru napuri itaximbarangiya. Mangi kungusakpaz ashiru zaw ashkiya.
Sachisimun kuki mazach ashiru puzaku neepuritamti ptsutkiya. Shiy nuwaa wazawash tsipamaama wayarangsha.
Kundarari shaniyeersin, tumuz chinuz watseenur tamapari ashirusin nuwaa turipingaranaya. Nuwaa kuweetsi, k'tseetstamti tshutaranganaya.
Ichingaru napuritaati wasuree táchakiya. Kundarari nuwaa natsaksin, napatara, napatara ashkanaya.
Nuwaatssha ktuniri, ¿Chakaja yach? atusin, waanpata michitaranganaya. Sheersin, waanpatachtisin ashpatam ashpatam sheersin yaranganiya.
Itaru Apaa, shiy nuwaa tuwizpurtaksha. Ashiri nuwaa ksarishpa. Nuwaa mikeerush istanda, Apaa.
Tputs pcharundama. Shiyshat nuwaa tsipani tapachindangandama. Nuwaa ksarishpa
Kundarari nuwaa nda pachamaam tapachindangandama. Kundarari tumuz tamapari ashirusin, nuwaa zamaam zandkana. Wakar upapchir tamapari ashirusin, nuwaa witspa pachamaam zandkana. ¡Istanda Apaa! Shiysha Apaa, nuwaa kuki mazinarangsha.
Ashiri shiyachich tputs shaniykatssin anush, nuwsha, Zuwanllchee, wanip Apanll nuwaa istaranga, Apanll kizpurcha, táchima.
Ashiri siysa Apanllchichis; Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha, tángtsa. Ichingarus Israelchichis, Apanlleetsimari ungirtangtsa. Shiyaa ksumish chinakaniya. Shiy kizpurtishcha, tángtsa.
Tputs kiyung kachiykana anoo Apanll nda niyrkiya. Nda wchumari napkiya, nda waanaatsi pishukiya. Tputs Apanllee; Istanda, tákchu, Apanllshat uru mazinakiya.
Ashiri, Apaa, shiy tputsirish shaniykana, anush nuwsha, Apanll nuwaa kasarangeeja. Kiyung kachiyrangtaati, nuwaa tuwizpurtarangiya, táyaruri, ichingaru kamanchima. Sheeruri, k'keetsi tuminamaam wakaraa shiyaam pachayaruri,
tputs kiyung kachiykana anoo, yambiyaruri, Katungeerus tazazangtsa, táchima. Sheerus Apanllingaz chinakis anis, Apanllee ungirtakus, yaseengtsa. Amb ashkachus, zapan masach siy kis taatssa, táchima.
Ichingaru minshucheewis tsapurunasis, arapcheewtamtis, Apanllee kuk mazinakchus, mangoonkachus, tutunlltayarus, Apanlleetsimarisha ungirtangtsa.
Apanll waatatcha kizpur kuraka. Wamari ichingaru tsapurunasee ksutku taakiya.
Yuwis maacheetsi zapan payukis anis, Apanlleetsimarishat chinayarus ungirtangtsa. Watam siysa uru tsipachtamsawa. Siy saanamuntari wizpuriris urutamari taamaam pinasaksawa.
Nuwashuch nlluranuri uru Apanlleetsimaritam chinaksin taachinlliniya. Ichingaru zari Apanllee tsiyatkusin taachinlliniya.
Nllursha kaneesich nllurtakachu, anootstam kamaningtsa. Apanll iyashchee tputs kapung tapachindarangu, kamankus tángtsa, tárangiya.
Shiy Apaa, opeejpan tputs tamapari ashirush, nuwaa wanasir ksutaksha. Opeejpan chinoo wanasir ksutku, pastush maritachu, kungootstam waamaam wayakchu, kis kanuskanaya. Shiyshat Apaa, ashikpaz ashiritam nuwaa wanasir ksutkush, nuwsha Apaa, shiyamun mangi kis kanuskina. Nuwaam pishtats wanindaja.
<range>
Wizpuriri ndunareekchu, shiysha Apaa, nuwaa arang tuwizpurtaksha. Mangeetsi p'tseekush shiyaa itsinsaru tachitkina. Ashkachuri, nuwamun tputssha shiyaa wanasir napchinllinaya.
Wazawshutaati, tapish tsipamaam waritaktaati, nuw tsipatsee punikeezi, watam shiysha Apaa, nuwaa nda kasakshawa. Chinuzpan tamapari ashirush yungashpatish, mishat tushuwashpatish nuwaa ksuteerush machiksha. Ashiri nuwsha shiyapat mapiyru kis naakina.
Kundarari nuwaa natsaktaatssin, nuwaa napanapaw ashkitaatssin, itaru shiysha Apaa, nuwaa chinakush, katungsheemtamti nuwaam panaksha. Mishat, kzammashee muchimuni taparaksha. Shiysha Apaa, nuwaa kizpur kasiru ksutaksha.
Ashiri nish tsapurunasush taakuri, shiy kizpur nuwaa chinakush, nayanikush, taarasheetsi ichingaru zar ksutaksha. Ashiri tsipakchuri, shiyash urutamari kis taachima, tárangiya Dapiyarini.
Apanll ichingaru tsapurunasee ztaru kasiru taakiya. Tputseetstam, maacheetstam kasiru taakiya.
Watam Apanll waana tsapurunasee tinarangu, kungumun iwaz tsapoo mbamari wayarangiya.
¿Chakaja Apanllip machirini kárimaam waritak? ¿Chakaja Apanllish pang' pshtumaam waritach?
Yuw tputs yutaritshishirini tachingama, nda yutaritshishee chinaku, nda apanllputsee ungirtaku, nda ngicheeru tputsee tayutaritku, anumari pshtumaam waritakiya.
Tputs zurampatari Apanllingaz chinaku anoo Apanllshat tapachindachiya. Kistam napku, Shiy yutaritshishish nduncha, táchiya.
Tputs Akoparini Apanllingaz tamarangparee chinaku Apanllingaz wizpur támaraku izuuru Apanllish pang' pshtumaam waritariya.
Irusarin pstushini wach urutamash izuuru tawatangcha. Urutamari tawatam taachpa. Kurak yuw wamari kasiru anu, wasundururpat pshtumaam naanllpa.
¿Chakshita kurak wamari kasiru anu? An Apanll Taarashipancha. Uw kizpurcha. Nda sambaytaku waamari kasiyanlliya. Apanlliritcha, yuw undararee waamari kasirangu ancha.
Ashiri Irusarinaa pshtushini wach tawatangcha. Urutari tawatam taachpa, Watam Kurak wamari kasirangu anu pshtumaam naanllpa.
¿Tamamshita kurak kizpur kasirangu anu? watacha Apanll Taarashipani, waamari ichingaru kasiru anu. Ichingaru tsapurunasee kanindaatstam waamari kasiru taakiya.


































Apanll nuwaa mangeetsi tuwasineeku, nuwaa taarashi tapachindakiya. ¿Ashiri nuw mayaatsee punichi? Watam Apanll urutamari nuwaa ksutkuwa. ¿Ashirucha nda puniki?
Kundarari, yutaritshishpan, nuwaa pachamaam zandkitaateesinaya, Itaru xapoochinlliniya.
Nuwaa sundartaa kayangayarusin, Nuwsha punicheezi. Nuwaa, Pachayani, atitaatssin, Nuw Apanllimunari mangi tatkuri taachina.
Apaa, yuw kizpur chinaki anootsimari mashchinllpa, Ichingaru zar pangishish pshtukuri, shiyaatsimari uru ungirtakuri taapi atina. Watam shiy kizpur wanasirshawa, anungazimari zandkina.
Ashiri, Apaa, yutaritshish nuwash kuskachu, shiysha nuwaa shaanshu pangish wayakchush, nuwsha anush kamungchina. Ashkachush nuwaa tapachindachsha.
Shiyamun wizpurirish kundarareetsi kasichina. Ashiri shiyaatssha, Wapparee, aturi, chinuzee pachayaruri muchchina. Mucheeruri, kapung mangi ksakuri, yaseessheetssha yasichina.
Apaa, shiyaa kuruzki anoo mazinangandama. Shiysha nuwaa nayanikush, kamaninganda.
Nuw Apanlli mashkuri mangishi; Apaa, nuwaa istanda, atina. Ashirucha nuwsha Apaa, shiyaa, Istanda, áti.
Apaa, shiysha nuwaa tpishishpa. Tsiyantayarush, nuwaa niyrishpa. Watam shiyamari nuwaa istakush taakshawa. Ashiri nuwaa ksarishpa. Istangandama. Tputs nllitari nuwaa istamaam wanindaja. Shiyamari nuwaa tapachindakush taaksha, Apaa.
Wandtaati apari, aneertamti nda nuwaa ksutkusin, itaru shiysha Apaa, urutari nuwaam ksutamapaniri taaksha.
Mishat, Apaa, nda kundarari nuwaa tayutaritamaam, shiysha nungipish machinda. Itsinsaru shiyashumari tachitpi túri, atina.
Yutaritshishpan tputs nuwaa ksirundama. Ksarishpa. Watam nuwaa kapung natsakanawa. Nuwaa mangu ngicheersin, mantsir tsiyatkanaya.
Itaru, Apaa, nuw shiyaa yasaktana. shiy nuwaa chinakush, urutamari istakush taaksha; Ayamtaati kasacheezish, ndambaree.
Ashiri siysa Apanllchichis, Apanllimun mangis tatungtsa. Kizpur taangtsa. Sambaytarintspa, Izuuru Apanllimun mangis tatungtsa, atina.


























































Apanll tputsee yutaritshishirini tachingeeru, izuuru mbizakchu, tputssha mapiyshaparee taachiya. Tputs yutaritshishirineetsi Apanllee kamanku, nda kamapshiku, Apanllsha izuuru tachingeeru, ndusha yusur anoo chinachiya.
<range>
Nuw ndatuma mangeetsi yarchuri, kis taamaam pinasarangina. Putam putam ashiranguri mangi mantsaranguri, nuw wizpuriri ndunareerangiya.
Watam shiysha Apaa, nuwaa waneerangshawa. Psaantam, kaschiritam kis taamaam pinasarangina. Chap zarish mawirtaru ashiru, taarashi taarangina.
Sheeruri, shiyaa Apaa, yutaritshishireetsi ichinguru kamanirangina. Nda minamtiyam kamapshirangina. Ashiranguri, shiysha Apaa, nuwaa mangeetsi tachingarangsha. Izuuru mbizamamari yutaritshishireetsi kapeetarangsha.
Ashiri na, Apaa, shiyshacha iyaa tputsirish yutari tushiykchitaa, iyshat uru shiyaa mashkiniya. Ashkachuni yutaritshish taaktaa, itaru iyaa nda kasichiya.
Apaa, shiyashumari kamungamaam waritakina. Taarasheetstamti shiy nuwaa kámanaksha. Ashirucha Apaa, mangi kis shambatkuri kapung yaseekina. Watam shiy yutaritshishireetsi tachingarangshawa.
Mishat, Apaa, shiysha nuwaa ateezish. Nuw shiyaa uru napkina. Mangeetsish p'tseekina, nuwash itsinsaru tachitamaama.
Nuwash tachitkush, kapaach, mishat burr mang' tamapari ashirush nuwash tchitinllpa. Watam kapaach, mishat burrutam tputsush tachitamaam uru ngatkanawa. Tputssha putayarusin, sukpat tusiseersin, pshiyrkatssin, annaa naaksin tachitkanaya. Itaru, shiysha an tamaparee ashirush shirinllpa. Nuwash itsinsarush tchitangcha, átsha Apaa.
Tputs yutaritshishpan uru kiyung kachiykanaya. Itaru, tputs shiyamun mang' tatkana anootssha shiy ksumish chinakush, uru ksutaksha.
Ashiri siy Apanllchichis, Apanllimun mangis kis taangtsa, átana. Uru mangis kis Apanllimun shambatangtsa, nuw siyaa atashina. Ashiri na wapparee nuw kuki tawatspayana.
Siy Apanllis tiptsiris Apanlleetsimari ungirtangtsa. Ancha Apanlleem kizpur wanasiriya.
Ashiri yaseeyarus, Wappari Apaa, tángtsa. Arpapat, misha kitarpat ashirus, mangis kis yaseengtsa.
Yaseeshish kaneeschee seengtsa. Tputs kitartamaam yasaru, anpat ipuneerus, mangis kis seengtsa.
Apanll yuw ichingaru tsiyatarangu an zurampatari tárangiya. Iyaa chinaku, ¿wanip iyaa istaranga? Uru wamunari mangich tatumaam taariya.
Apanll ngitzipanee natsakiya. Wanasirimsheetsimari tputs chinakiya. Tputsee ztaru chinakiya.
Ichtakachuri Apanll tsiyateeru, kanindaa tinarangiya. Sheeru, Kanindush zar, tsup, tsangach ashiru taachpa, tárangu, ichingaru tinarangiya.
Ichinguru kungunandari taarangu, anoo Apanll, Kungoo waanitam wayachima, tárangu, maree kapungumashee wayarangiya.
Ashirucha, nuw siyaa tsapurunasshucheetsis, Apanlleetsimari chinangtsa, atina.
Watam waana tsiyateeru, maacheetsi ichingaru tinaranguwa. Mishat, ichingaru urutamari taamaam wayarangiya.
Tsapurunasshuch kurak uru yutarit chinaksin, waana zandkana anumari ashimaam chinakanaya. Zandkitaatssin itaru Apanllsha xarashish wayat, wayat ashku, xapookanaya.
Itaru, Apanllinaa waana yuwaa, Ashchima, tákchu anoo, zurampatari tatsamkiya. Tputs ayamtaatiya Apanllee tuxaramaam pinasachinlliniya.
Itaru, Apanll waana iyashchee, Israelchicheetsini tiptsireem ipusarangiya. Iysha Apanll Taarashipani kapung chinakaniya. Ashirucha, kis mapiyruni taakaniya.
Apanll kanindash taaku, anumandari napku, ashpaatsiri tputs ztaru tsapurunasush pakiya.
<range>
Yuwaa tputs mangush chinakana anoo yasakiya. Watam waana mangeetsich tinaranguwa.
Kurak wasundurur zapantaa taaru, itaru, undarar, Kurakaa pachapani, atusin, Apanll nda istaku wasundurur urkareetsi tapachindamaam pinasakanaya. Kizpuritaa kurak waanaatsi tapachindamaam pinasakiya.
Mishat, kapaach tapazpan kizpuritaati, sundaroo tapachindamaam wanindaja; Apanllimari tputsee tapachindamaam taariya.
Itaru, Apanllchich tputs, Apanllimun mang' tatkusin, Apanll iyaa ksumish chinakiya, atusin, Apanllsha urutari waatssin napku ksutkiya.
Tsipamaam waritaktaa, Apanll tapachindakiya. Katungats maringaktaa, Apanll istaku, nda tsipachinlliniya.
Ashiriya, iysha Apanllimun mangini tatkuni, Apanllsha iyaa izuuru ksutkiya; nda kasakiya.
Apanllimunari mangini ksakaniya, watam zurampatari Apanllee mangiptini chinakaniwa.
Apanll, urutamari iyaa chinaku, iyapat ipunakcha. Watam Apanllimunari mangini tatkiniwa, atiniya.

Apaa, nuw shiyaa urutari, Wappari aturi, ichingaru zari taakina. Nuw urutari shiyaa ungirtakuri, mangi kis yaseekuri, taakina.
Nuw shiyaa ungirtakuri, tputs putit tamatarpari ashiruri, mangi kis shambatkuri shiyaa yaseekina, Apaa. Siysa tputsis mazinangtsa yuwaa nuw Apanllee yaseeki anootsi.
Ashiriya, na ichingaruni washunand yaseeyani. Apanlleetsimari wanasirimshee ungirtayani, nuw siyaa atina.
Nuwsha Apanllee, Nuwaam istanganda, táranguri, nuwaa istarangiya. Nuw kapungtaa puniranguri, itaru Apanllsha nuwaa tapachindarangiya.
Yuw tputs Apanllimun mang' tatkana, anin mang' ksakanaya. ¿Ayamtaatiya Apanllee pazichazinllinaja? Urutari mang' kis taachinlliniya.
Nuw kapungtaa puniranguri, itaru nuwsha, Apaa, Nuwaa tapachindanda, táranguri, kapung kuruziranguri, Apanllsha nuwaa kuki mazinarangu, nuwaam mangooz mapiymash panarangiya.
Yuw tputs Apanllimun mang' tatkana anoo Apanll istakiya. Apanll waana tiptsiree ksutkiya.
Apanllee chínash izuuru yasangtsa, watam kizpur chinakuwa. Yuw tputs Apanllee chinakana, an mang' ksakanaya.
Apanllee mangiptis zurampatarit chinangtsa. Ashkachus, Apanllsha siyaa ksutchiya.
Tumuz wip wanir nda katungtsee yaku, marizimunsha kiyung kachiychinlliniya. Itaru, yuwsha tputs Apanllee chinaku, anoomsha nda katungats pishtachiya.
Ashiriya, naanints nlluris. Nuwaa kuki mazinangtsa. Apanllish wanasiri tachitamaam tayaspatachintspa.
Siy zapan masach mapiyrus taamaam zandkinaareesa,
Ashiri nda mantsir tsiyatamaam saanaatsis wanasir ksutangtsa. Ngutis tputsee tamasingarus ngichintspa.
Yutaritshishee kasayarus, wanasir chinangtsa. Mangis kis taamaam taarashish wanasirimsheetsimari chinangtsa. Ashiriya, siysa mangis kis taapi atinaareesa, Apanllee chinangtsa, nuw siyaa atina.
Yuw tputs Apanllee chinakana, anoo Apanllsha urutamari ksutkiya. Yuwaa mashkana anoo Apanll uru mazinakiya.
Itaru, yuw tputs yutaritshisheetsimari chinaku, anoo nduntam Apanll istakiya. Waani yachimbanllina átu, nda pakchiyam istamaam zandkiya; izuuru mapiykiya.
Itaru, yuwsha tputs Apanllee chinaku, ansha kiyung kachiykachu, Apanlleetssha mashku, Apanllsha anoo mazinakchu, tapachindakiya.
Apanll waanaatsi tiptsiri uru kapung istamaam zandkiya. Tputssha kapung mang' mantsaku, waani itamsamaam pinasaku, anoo waana Apanllsha tuwizpurtakiya.
Tputs Apanllee mangpatari chinaku, kapung kiyung kachiykitaa, Apanllsha anoo istaku tapachindakiya.
Apanll waanaa tiptsiri kizpur ksutku, wanap nda minamtiyam ichipchiya.
Yutaritshishpansha tputs waanamandari yutaritshishirini tsipachinlliniya. Apanllee tiptsiri natsaksin, Apanllsha anumand izuuru wanichiya.
Itaru, Apanll urutamari tiptsiree tapachindachiya. Yuw tputs Apanllee chinakana, anoo nda wanichiya. Ayamtaatiya tiptsiree wanicheeja, ndambaree. Ashirucha, nuwaa kuki mazinangtsa. Watam nuw siyaa tayaspatakuri atinawa.









































Tputsimand yutaritshishirini musá tsiyantarinllpa. Tputs yutarit taakana anoo, siysa pakus, Ambtam ashpi átus, támararintspa.
Watam yutaritshishpan mikeeru pchirukpaz ashkuwa. Karut tamatarparee ashiru mikeeru mawirukiya.
Ashiriya, tsapurunasush taakus, Apanllimunari mangis tatungtsa; izuururu yutaritshishee mapiyngtsa. Saanaatsi taarashis wanasir ksutangtsa; wanasir taangtsa.
Apanllimunari mangis tatkus, Yuwaa saana chinakus ashchima, átis anoo Apanllsha uru istachiya.
Ashiriya, Apanll waana uwpa putayaru, wanasiripimari siyaa machchiya. Ashiri Apanllimunamari mangis tatungtsa.
Ashkachus, izuuru wanasiriri taakus, zar wachamureetskachu, tuwasintaru ashikpaz ashitssa.
Ashiri mangiptartis wanasir taakus, izuurus Apanlleem k'tangtsa. Watam Apanll siyaa istachuwa. Ashkus, tputs siyaa tayutaritkitaa, anoo ksatarintspa. Waani taachpa. Watam yutarit chinaksin, atanawa.
Ashiri tsiyanis zambazangtsa. Arangeem tsiyantarintspa. Mishat, tsiyanpatis taarintspa. Watam ashkachus, aranginasha saanaatsi tayutaritatssawa.
Apanll yutaritshishpanee tputs kapeetchiya. Itaru, yuwsha tputs Apanllimunari mang' tatku, an urutamari taachiya.
Nimun ayamtaatiya yutaritshishpanee pangcheezich. Kapungtaa nachungakuch, nda pangachchee. Izuuru pastachiya.
Itaru, yuw tputs Apanllee chinakana, an tsapurunasish wipapat, wachinllinuptatam, wanasirimshinandari taachinlliniya.
Yutaritshishpan tputs Apanllchichee kiyung yachamaam chinakanaya. Natsaksin, kiyung yachamaam zandkanaya.
Itaru, Apanllsha yutaritshishpanee; Waani ashtap, atiya, watam yuwash zari waritakchu, izuuru wanichuwa.
Ashiriya, yutaritshishpan tputs wáchiruree yáyarusin, Apanllchichee tputs tupantsakanaya. Timbanllizeetssha itintangayarusin, tsak ashchinlliniya. Ashkusin, Apanllchichee tputs pachamaam zandchinllinaya.
Itaru, Apanllsha waanpatatam wáchirur waanaatstatam pachachiya. Timbanllzirineetsi izuuru ichipambayaru kasachiya.
Apanllchich maacheetsi pakchitaa payuksin, itaru Apanllimunsha kis taakanaya. Yashingchichsha maacheetsi zapan payuktaa, kis taamaam wanindaja.
Apanllsha yutaritshishpanee izuuru kapeetchiya. Itaru, wanasirimsheetsinaa tputs zurampatari tapachindachiya.
Apanll tputsee wanasirimshi ksutkiya. Taársheetstam tachingkiya. An tputs Apanllush urutari taachinlliniya.
Ashiri yuwash yuwariz maringakchu anush Apanllchichinaa tputs marizimun nda kiyung kachiychinlliniya. Watungasheem nda pshatachiya.
Yashingchich tputs izuuru kurayaru, muchinlliniya. Karutaa puza tirookuch, kurataru ashiru kurachiya. Amb ashkachu, Apanll undarar izuuru pastachiya. Msas ashiru mzeetaru tsípatara ashchinllinaya.
Tputs yashingchich maacheetsi yáyaritaatssin, itaru nda tuwanpukanaya. Itaru, Apanllchichsha maacheetsi yaksin, aranginasha tuwanpukanaya.
Yuwaa Apanll tputsee kis napku, anoo tputs watsapun wanasir ksutkiya. Itaru, yuwaatssha nda kis napku, anoo watstamari kapeetchiya. Nda istachiya.
Ashiri tputs Apanllee chinaku, Apanllee kuk payuku, anoo Apanll machkiya. Wanungish wanasirimshish machkiya.
Yashing xarashshee wayaktaa, nda izuuru pantsakiya. Watam Apanllsha uwpat putayaru, tuxiyzakuwa.
Nuw kanungasimasi taaranguri, itaru natsha wachinayanllina. Apanllee tiptsir uru yasakuri, Apanllsha waanaatsi tiptsir nda minamtiyam kasarangiya. Tiptsireemsha pishtats ndunimuna; tputsish pangaa nda mashtaranaya. Wipaamtamsha katungats nduntam pishtarangiya.
Ashiriya, tputs Apanllee chinaksin, nayanimpatari taaksin, tputseem mangutari maachiritaa istakiya. Ashirucha, wipshtisin ashiritam tputseem mangutaritam istakitamanaya.
Ashiri yutaritshishee mapiyngtsa. Saanaatsi wanasir ksutangtsa. Ashkus, waanasirimshee pangatssa. Yap tsap taakamchis anush uru kis taatssa.
Apanll tputsee tsiyatssee yaramapani chinakiya. Waanaatsee tiptsir nda ayamtaati kasachiya. Itaru, yutaritshishpanee izureeru waneeyaru, kasachiya. Nlluranur izuuru pastachiya.
Itaru, Apanllinaa tiptsir urutamari tsapurunasush kis taachinllinaya.
Ashiri tputs wanasirimish uru mangpatari wanasiri tputsee tsiyatkanaya. Tsiyatssee wanasirimsheetsimari yarkanaya.
Apanllee kuk izuuru chinaksin, nda pantsakanaya. Uru tachitkanaya.
Tputs yutaritshishpan Apanllee tiptsir natsaku, pachapi, átu pachamaam tsangakiya.
Itaru, Apanllsha tiptsiree nda kasakiya. Tputs kurakap tputsee wanasirimshee tupantsamaam tsiyatkitaateesinaya, Apanll waana tapachindachiya. Kurak tputsireetsi tayutarittapa, átu ashkiya.
Ashiri siysa Apanllee chinangtsa. Kukoo tuminungtsa. Ashkachus, tputssha siyamun mang' tatchinlliniya, Ashiri Apanll siyaamanaa tsapuneemis ksutamaam panachiya. Itaru, yutaritshishpani waneekchu, anoo siysa kchiptartis pangatssa.
Nuw tputsee yutaritshishpanee parangina. Nuw kizpurtana. Nuwamari kasirina, tárangiya. Yasin tamatarpari ashiru natumasamaam pzeena, pzeena sheeru, támungayaru, wanasir wayanaptaru ashiru taarangiya.
Amb ashirangtaa, itaru musásiri izuuru tsiparangu, nuwsha nachungaranguri, nda ayamtiyam parangina.
Mazinangtsa. Tputs wanasirimish Apanllee kuk payuksin, urutari Apanllish pang' mang' ksaw wanasir taachinlliniya.
Itaru, Apanllsha yutaritshishpaneetssha tputs ashpaatsiri tpachingachiya. Ayamtaati tputsee mantsirimshee pangcheezich, ndambaree. Ichingaru Apanll wanichiya. Izuuru kachingeeru kasachiya.
Yuwash yutarit tushiychu anush Apanll waanaatstanaa tiptsir tapachindachiya. Apanll watacha tapachindampani.
Apanll waana tiptsiree tapachindakiya. Yutaritshishpan tuxarakchu, anoo suwamaam istakiya. Waana wizpurpa ksutku istakiya. Watam iy Apanllimun mangini tatkiniwa.






































Nuw Apanlleetsimari mangishi chinakuri taakina. Yuwaa nuw kuruzki anoo Apanll mazinarangiya.
Nuw wizpuriri nduneerangu, tsipamaam waritarangitaati, Apanll nuwaa tapachindarangiya. Nuwaa itsipungayaru, yuwash tsap kis taachi anush ndatuma tsiparuri wayarangiya.
Wizpurpa nuwaa kuki murimash wayarangu, nuwsha kaneeschee yaseesshish yaseekuri, Apanllee, Wappari, tárangina. Tputssha nuwaa parangusin, punirustarangusin, Apanllimunarisha mang' taturangtamanaya.
Yuw tputs Apanllee chinaku an mang' kis taachiya. Tputsee yutaritshishpani izuuru mapiykiya. Yuwaa apanllputsee ungirtakana anungaz nda chinachiya, watam Apanllee kapung chinakuwa.
Apaa, nuw shiyaa apartana. Iyashchee istamaam kapung chinarangush, wizpurpatatish istarangsha. Wanip iyaa istarangsha. Tputsee kamanpi, atitaati, pinasakani, watam ichingaru kamanimaam wanindaja. Shiyapat tatsamaam wanindaja.
Tputs chinuzee pachayarusin, muchkusin, anumun shiy nda mangish ksaksha. Shiy anumun yutaritshishee yaramaam nda kapung chinaksha. Mishat, tirikoo pangishish yushindakuni, anumuntam nda mangish ksaksha. Itaru, Apaa, shiy nuwaa tsiyatkush, K'keetsi zurampatari tuminungcha, tárangsha.
Ashirucha, nuwsha shiyaa, Tputsip nuwaa zanganingandama, Shiy nuwaa kirakarishish kamanirangsha. Ashiri nuwsha,
shiyaa kukish tuminumaam mangi kizpur ksakina.
Ashiri shiyashchi tputs shaniykusin, anush shiyaa kamachtamareetsish tatsamooru tayaspatakina. Nda minumtiyam niyrkina. Shiysha anoo yasaksha, Apaa.
Nuw nda zamaruri taakina. Shiyaa kukish tsinsampaneetsish uru tputsee kamankuri taakina, atina. Apanll uru iyaa ksutku taakiya. Iyaa tapachindachiya. Tsipakchuni iyaa waanpee machchiya, nuw tputsee tayaspatakuri atina. Shiysha Apaa, uru iyaa chinakush, istaksha. Ayamtaatiyam shiy chinashish pastacheeja. Shiy kukish urutamari tputsirishish taachiya.
Apaa, shiy nuwaa ksarishpa. Urutamari nuwaa chinakush taangcha. Shiy tsinsampantishcha.
Nuwaanamandari chayari zapan xarashish nuwash tushiykiya. Nuw yutarit zapan ashirangi anoo ichingaru kamanimaam pinasakina. Na nuwaa xarashish kámanakcha. ¿Tamayareezi nuwaana yutarit ashirangi anoo tushiychee? Zapan taaru anoo nuw táchimaam pinasakina. Muchishi zapan kasiru taariya. Ashirucha, mangi tsíparangu, izuuru sambaytarangina.
Apaa, nuwaa nayaningandama. Yutaritshishireetsi tchingangandama. Mikeerush nuwaa istanda. Zapshtarinllpa.
Mishat tputs nuwaa pachamaam zandkitamsinaya. Ashiri shiysha yuwaa tputs nuwaa tayutaritkana anoo ipazangcha. Waani paziksin suwasuwachinllinpa.
Waani kapung pazichinllinpa.
Itaru, yuw tputs shiyaa kukish payukana, anin mang' ksaksin shambatchinlliniya. Mishat, yuw tputs shiyamun mang' tatkana anoomsha, Apaa, shiy wizpurirish urutamari shiyash tachitamaam panangcha.
Apaa, nuw kapung mangi mantsakina, watam kiyung kachiykinawa. Ashiri Apaa, nuwaa mbizarishpa, watam shiy nuwaa istakshawa. Shiy nuwaa tapachindaksha. Itaru Apaa, zapshtarinllpa. Mikeerush istangandama, Apaa, nuw shiyaa apartana, Dapiyarini tárangiya.















Manllanus tsap puzash taaku, sachitku, kungungaz waapi átu, nuwsha ashiritamti shiyangaz Apaa, támarakuri nachungakina.
Nuw shiyangaz sachitakpaz ashkina, Apaa. Watam shiysha taarashipanshawa. ¿Ashinooja nuw shiyash pangish yusur pshtuchee? aturi,
shiyangaz kaschiritam psaantam tanukuri taakina. Amb ashkuri sureemariti taakina. Kundararshiti nuwaa, ¿Apanllirish yuwshta? átangat ashkanaya.
Síru shiyash pangish tputspata kis pshtutarini, anoo chinachintar ashkuri, kapung mangi mantsakina. Watam na ndusha ashkinawa. Yuwataati nuwma tputsee yamazayaruri, shiyash pangish kuseeruri, shambatkuni, washunand mangini kis ungirtakuni, yasiyastar ashtariniya. Yusur tamayareezi ashchi aturi, kapung mangi mantsakuri, tanutantar ashkina. Ashiritaati,
¿Mayaama nuw sambaytachi? ¿Mayaama nuw mangi mantsachee? Nuw Apanllimunari mangi tatkina. Anootsimari ungirtakuri taachima. An watacha nuw Apanlliri, tapachindampani.
Nuw kapungcha sambaytamaam zandki. Ashirucha, shiyaatsimari kapung chinakuri taakina. Araptaa kung Ortagamanda, mach Hermonamanda, Mispamandtamta uru mangishi shiyaatsimari chinakuri taakina.
Íwar machimand kung wazawash pantsaku, zaw shitaru, arap zunganeetar ashtariya. Nuwamun kungpaz ashiru zaw, zaw shitarpaz ashku mangi mantsakuri taakina.
Ashtaa Apaa, shiysha nuwaa nda kasaksha. Kaschiritam nuwaa chinakush istaksha. Psaantam nuw yasiyastar ashkina. Uru shiyapa Apaa, tsiyatkina, watam shiysha uru nuwapat taakshawa.
Apaa, Shiy tapachindampantishcha, atina. ¿Mayaamsha shiy nuwaa mapiyksha? ¿Mayaamaja mangi mantsakuri taachi? ¿Mayaama kundarari nuwaa kiyung yachaku taak?
Nuwaa kiyung yachaksin, napuritamti ichingaru ksukiya. Urutari nuwaa tamundaksin, ¿Yapshata shiy Apanllirish? átangat ashkanaya. Atitaateesinaya,
¿Mayaama nuw sambaytachi? ¿Mayaama nuw mangi mantsachee? Nuw Apanllimunari mangi tatkina. Anootsimari ungirtakuri taachima. An watacha nuw Apanlliri, tapachindampani.
Apaa, nuwaa tapachindangandama. Nishuch tputs shiyaa chinakazinllinaja. Yutaritshishpansincha. Wayangichirirsincha. Ashiri nuwaa tapachindangandama.
Watam nuw shiyaa Aparinawa. Shiy tapachindampantishcha. Nuwaa kundarari kiyungutaa yachaku, ¿Mayaamaja shiy nuwaa kasachish? ¿Mayaamaja nuw mangi mantsakuri taachee?
Ashiriya, Apaa, shaana wizpurirish zanganingi, Nuwaa mangi tuwizpurtamaama. Sheerush, shaanpee pangish machinda yap shiy taarish ambi.
Shiyash pangish yusur kuskachuri, sumeetsish pakchuri, shiyaa kapung ungirtachima. Tamburpa, kitarpa yasichima. Shaana, Apaa, nuwaam mangooz ksashish pshtangandama shiyaa kis yasimaama. Shiyamunari Apaa, mangi kis taakina.
¿Mayaama nuw sambaytachi? ¿Mayaama nuw mangi mantsachee? Nuw shiyamunari mangi tatkina. Shiyaatsimari ungirtakuri taachima. Watam shiy tapachindampancha.














































Apanll iyaa ksutkiya. Iyaam wizpuree panakiya. Apanllish kamungamaam uru taariya. Yuwash xarashish taakchu anush istakiya.
Ashiriya, ¿mayaamaja punichich? Mundaz mundaztakchitaa, misha tsap kizpuritaa zpoozakchu, machsha pátangambachtaa, marush imurish pantsambachtaa, ashiritaa ¿mayaamaja nuw punichee?
Mar kapungtaati warastakchu, mach kizpuritaa zpoozakchu, itaru nda nuw punichina.
Kungsha wanasirimish Apanllish yaktarini taariya. Anush tputs kungumun wip mang' ksachinlliniya. Watam waana Apanll wamari kasiru an anush taakuwa.
Waanaatsi yaktarini uru ksutku, tapachindachiya. Zar taraseetaranllu anush kundararini kuskatssin, Undarsha; Taraseekchu pshtuyani, atitaatssin, ayamamtiyam nda kasachiya. Watam Apanll waana naparu iyaa tapachindakiya.
Kizpuri kuk kimaku, tputs ztaru puniksin zamangachinlliniya. Tsapurunasshuch kurak nungtachinllinaya. Apanll izuuru wizpurpa tsapoo kapeetku pastachiya.
Apanll kizpurcha. Iyachchee Akoparinchicheetsini nlluranurini uru ksutkiya. Apanllimun mangini tatkuni, urutamari iyaa izuuru tapachindaku taachiya. Apanllishumarisha kamungchiniya.
Naapangints. Apanll iyaa tsapurunasshucheetsini ichingarootsini tpuxtayanlliya.
Tapazpaneetsi tsapurunas ztaru; Na Waapa. Zanayangints, tákchu, Tapazpan ztaru zanayanllinaya. K'chirpungoo ichingaru ichip ichip sheersin, Turuwaatstam pátangambeeru kasayanllinaya. Tapazpanee pshiyrshini sumasush mucheenlliya.
Apanll tputsee kamachtaku; Na waapa. Zanayangints, tákchu; Nuw Apanlli Taarashipantana. Tputsee urkar ztaru tiptsirpatatam nuwaatssha; Shiy Apanlltishcha. Shiyamari kasirush taaksha, nuwaa táchinllinaya, átcha Apanlli.
Apanll kizpuri iyash taakiya. Iyachchee Akoparinchicheetsini nlluranurini uru ksutkiya. Uwamun kamungchiniya.

Apanllee shambatkuni ichingaruni zamangayani. Mangis ksaptari shambatkus zamangakus, Jai, jai, tángtsa.
Watam Apanll kizpureeru waamari kasiru tpuxtakiya. Ichingaroom tsapurunas Apanllimari kurak taakiya.
Apanll Kanaanshuchee tputs tpachingarangu watsapunee iyaamshat panarangiya. Tputseetstam m'chachureemani wayarangitamta.
Apanll iyaa kapung chinarangu, iyaam waana tsapoo ipuseeru panarangiya. Anush na iyshat Akoparinchichini kis taakaniya.
Na Apanll ichingaru kurakaam wayarangu, na mapiyshat uxinashimun kuxinkiya. Ashiriya na iyshat mangini kis shambatkuni tamburtakuni, tirucheeni.
Apanllee shambatkuni yaseeyani. Kurakareetsini ungirtakuni yaseeyani.
Apanlleem yaseesshish yandayaruni yaseeyani. Watam wamari tsapurunasshucheetsini kasiru kurak taakuwa. Mangiptis yaseengints.
Apanll uxinashimand kuxinaru tputseetsini ztaru ksutariya. Ichingaroo tsapurunasee napkiya.
Tsapurunasshuch kurak Apanllpat tiptsir, Apramarinchichpa, washunand shaniyeersin, Apanllee ungirtakanaya. Watam Apanllimari tsapurunasshuchee kurak kasiru taakuwa. Ashiriya, ichingaruni Apanllimunari shambateeni.

Apanll taarashipani waamari kasiriya. Waana yaktarinshini, Irusarinush Apanllee ungirtamaam wanasircha, waanpee pangu, machip Siyonshu.
Apanll machirini Siyon kizpurcha wanasiri. Minumari mach ichingaru kasiriya. Tputs ztaru machip Siyonamand mang kis shambtkanaya. Watam anush Apanll, iy kurakarini, wamari kasiru an taakuwa.
Irusarinaa mbamari tandapunurangusin, Undarar pshtumaam pinasakanaya.
Kurak shaneerangusin, Irusarinshuchee kasiyani, tárangitaatssin, Itaru, kuskatssin,
Kizpurcha, táyarusin, napuxtayarusin, suwaranganaya.
Kapung puniksin, nungtaranganaya. Kiz nlluraa tatsipku, wasurimun nungtataru ashiranganaya. Sheeru Apanll undararee kachingarangiya.
Boti marush kung kizpur kambusurush naanatan ashku, mikeeru ichip ichip ashku kachingkachu, ambpaz ashirangu Apanllsha undarareetsi kachingarangiya.
Tputs iyaa: Apanll yaktarini kizpurcha, táranganaya. Natsha iysha anootstam, Apanll yaktarini kizpurcha, atitamaniya. Apanll wamari kasiru waanaatsi yaktarini urutari ksutchiya.
Apaa, shiyash pangish pshtuyaruni, mangini kis shiyaa chinakuni, Apanll urutamari iyaa chinakiya, atiniya.
Tsapurunas ztaru shiyaa ungirtachinlliniya. watam shiy taarashipanshawa. Shiyamari kasiru taakush, tputsee ichingarusin tatsamooru ksutaksha.
Iysha, Irusarinshuchini ichingaruni shiyamun mangini ksakuni, shambatchinlliniya. Zuwanlltamani yuw minush Utaáshuch yaktash taakana antamsin, shiyamuntam Apaa, shambatchinlliniya. Watam iyaa chinarangush, tputsireetsish itsinsaru kamachtarangsha.
Yakat Irusarinap iturpirus, ichinguru napangints. ¿wanipaja tandapunuzush torre pshkurutara? ¡Tandapunuzi wamaneewa! Sundar ksutamapan pang' zapanitamta. Yakat Irusarin kizpurcha. Ashiri napeerus, yasayarus ipareetsis ichingaroo kamaningtsa. Yuwaa kaneesich nllurtachinllina anootstamta kamaningtsa. Apanll yaktarini kizpurcha, tángcha.
<range>
Iy Aparini urutamari wamari kasiru taarashipan taakiya. ¡An watacha iyaa itsinsaru urutamari machkiya!














































Apaa, shiy uru chinampanish taaksha. Ashiri nuwaa nayaninganda. Yutaritshishireetsi tachingandama.
Mangeetsi izuuru tachingeerush, mburish wayangandama.
Nuw kizpur yutarit ashirangina, Apaa. Anoo mbizamaam pinasakina.
Nuw shiyaa tayutaritarangina; Nuw ashirangi anoo, shiy, Izuuru watsta, tárangsha. Nuwaa wanimaam waritarangsha. Shiy tsinastishcha. Shiy tputsee waneekchush, ¿Chaka shiyaa, yutarittishcha tách?
Itaru, nuw aneershi nllurtarangi anumandari yutarittana.
Itaru, shiysha tputsee mang' izuuru natstaksha. Tputs shiyaa itsinsaru chinaku, shiysha wanasiri napaksha. Anush Apaa, nuwaa mangi p'tseeksha mangoonamaama.
Ashiri Apaa, mangeetsi tchinganda. Izuuru tachingeerush, mangi mburshinandarisha wayangandama, Apaa.
Nuwaa waneerangush, mangi kapung mantsakina. Yusur shiyamun mangi tatkuri, mapiyri kis taapi, átana. Istanda, Apaa.
Ashiri, yutaritshishireetsi mbizamamari izuuru kpitangcha, Apaa.
Nuwaa mangeetsi mburish tsarun ndunar ksangandama. Sheerush, tuwizpurtangandama, shiyaa itsinsaru chinamaama.
Apaa, nuwaa iwanlltarinllpa. Kanish wanasirimshee nuwaa itutsinllpa, Apaa.
Síru yutaritshishireetsi ichinguru tachingarangush, mangi kis taarangina. Ashiri na ashiritam mangeetsi yusur isichinda. Wizpurirpatish chinasheemi wanasir panangandama.
Ashkachush, nuwsha tputsee yutaritshishpanee shiyaa itsinsaru chinamaam tayaspatachima. Ashkachuri, uwsha yusur shiyash itsinsartam tachitchitamtaya.
Nda tputsee pachamaam izuuru watsta aturi, Apaa, nuwaa istangandama. Apaa, shiy nuwaa tapachindarangsha. Ashiri shiy nuwaa itsinsaru chinamaam istakush, nuwsha yaseesshpati, shiyaa; Apanll itsinsampancha, tputsee kamankuri táchima.
Apaa, shiy nuwaa kuki mureem wayangandama. Sheerush, nuwsha shiyaa ungirtakuri, k'kipti shiyaa yasichima.
Shiyaam chineetsi muchamaam pangipish wayapi tina. Itaru, anpa yutaritshishee yaramaam nda shiy kis napachsha.
Tputsee yutaritshishimand mang' kapung mantsaku, anoo shiysha izuuru mangoo yaraksha. Tputsee yutaritshshimand izuuru mang' mantsaku shiysha Apaa, mangoo yaramaam nda watsta átsha. Uru yaraksha.
Apaa, tputsireetsish shaana yaktarinish Siyonash shaniykusin, wanasir napaksha. Irusarinaa watandpunu yusur mbammash wanasir wayamaama istangcha.
Wanasiri napkachush, tputsirish shiyaam wakaraatstam, opeejaatstam shiyaam muchkusin, shiy tputsireetsish chinachpasha. Yutaritshishirineetsi yarachsha.
















































































































































Apaa, shiyaa nuwcha Apari. Nuw Shiyangaz támarakina. Tputs tsap mazachinandari taaru, amb naayaru, sachittaru, ashiritamti nuw shiyangaz kizpur sachitakpaz ashkuri támarakina.
Shiyash pangish pshtupi tina. Shiyaa pangasi, atitamana. Anush shiyaatsimari chinamaam zandkina. Shiy kizpurtishcha, wanasirish.
Shiyamari kasiru nuwaa chinakush, tsipaneetstaati nda pachindkina. Ashirucha shiyaa mangi kis ungirtakina.
Urutari nish tsapurunasush taakuri, shiyaa ungirtakuri taachina. Kuwee íwar paxayeeruri shiyapat tsiyatchina
Shiyamun mangi kisa. Tputs kapung katungeeru, tazazayaru, mang kis taaku, nuwsha shiyaa ungirtakuri ambtam ashchina. shiyaa kis yasichina.
Psaantam Apaa, maamaw ashkuri, shiyaatsimari mangishi chinachintar ashkina.
Waninll nuwaa istakush ksutakshawa. Ashirucha, mangi kis nda punikuri taakina.
Shiyash izuuru tachitpi tina. Shiyaa kasamaam zandkeezi. Kuwish mbutsanungich nuwaa mbam patsisakush, nda kasaksha.
Tputs nuwaa pachamaam zandkitaatssin, waantatamsin k'chirpungamun tsipachinlliniya Wazawash waantsush tputs tsiparpat wan washunand taachinlliniya. Wanutseetsina tumuz manginshuch katungchinlliniya.
<range>
Itaru, nuwsha shiyamun Apaa, mangi kis taachina Shiy nuwaa tputsireetseerush kurakaam ínarangsha. Ashiri siysa Apanllis tiptsiris, Apanllee mangis kis yaseekus ungirtangtsa. Itaru, wayangichirirsha tputs izuuru zamayarusin taachinlliniya. Ashiriya, Apaa, wapparee.














































Shiy Apaa, uru iyaa nayaniyarush, istangcha. Iyaa wanasiri napangcha.
Ashkachush, tputs ztaru, Apanllee mangooneeni. Iyaa tapachindachtamparee, táchinlliniya.
Apaa, tsapurunas ztaru shiyaa ungirtachinllinpa. Shiyamun mang' kis shambatchinllinpa.
Tputs ztaru ichingurusin shiyamun mang' kis yaseeksin, zamangachinllinpa. Shiysha, Apaa, kurakish tputsee ichingarootssin ksutkush k'kuzee yaramapan taaksha. Tatsamooru tputsireetsish chinaksha.
Ashiri Apaa, tsapurunas ztaru shiyaa ungirtachinllinpa. Shiyamun mang' kis shambatchinllinpa.
Apanllirini iyaam kapung istarangu, na tsapurunasish waanaatsee kuk wanus pzapaneerangiya.
Apanll uru iyaa chinachiya. Tputs ztaru Apanllee chinachinllinpa. Mang' kis Apanllimun shambatchinllinpa.





































Apaa, nuwaa tapachindanda. Papcha, nuwaa pachamaam kapung zandeenllinpa. Tputs kungush imurish yangakchu, tamatarpari ashiru itamsamaam pinasakina. Kung wizpur nuwaa kapeetamaam zandkiya.
<range>
Apaa, shiyaa, Istanda, aturi, kapung kuruztat ashkuri, yarpuni ksukshita. Shiyaam kutakuri, kapung tanukuri, kachi manamawshita.
Tputs zapan msangarusin, nuwaa natsakanaya. Mucheetsich kasiru tputs nuwaa zapan natsakanaya. Mangutari nuwaa tayutaritkanaya. Maacheetsi shuchitarpazi ashiru, nuwaa taxiyrsin; Tuwanpunda, átangat ashkanaya.
Itaru Apaa, shiy nuwaa yasaktishcha. Nuw yutarit ashiranginaareena, anoo shiy izuuru yasaksha. ¿Tamayareezi yutaritshishireetsi pishuchi?
Apaa, shiyamaricha kizpurish. Iy shiyaa Israelchichini Apanllirtanicha. Iyashuch zapan shiyamun mang' tatkanaya. Ashiriya, tputsirish nuwamand yutaritshishiri pazirusinapa. Kundarari nuwamand tputsireetsish tpazarusinapa, átana.
Shiyaa kapung chinaki, anumand tputs nuwaa yutari tsiyatkanaya. Nuwaa tpazakanaya. Kizpur pazirsa.
Zuwanlli tunar tamapari ashirusin nuwaa niyrkanaya.
Itaru nuwsha, pangimandaritish wamin tsiyanis nuwaa kasichiya. Tputs shiyaa tpazamaam zandkusin, nuwaatssha tpazaktamsinaya.
Nuw mangi kapung mantsakuri, tanukuri, mishat mangukuri, nuwaa yutarit tsiyatkanaya.
Mangi mantsakuri, kamari kuchar kamartakuri, nuwaa paksin, ichingarusin stakanaya.
Tputs yaktaa washitungash shaniyeersin, nuwaa tsiyatstangat ashkusin taakanaya. Karusamapantaatssin nuwaa tayutaritkusin yaseekanaya.
Itaru Apaa, nuw shiyaa kapung tsiyatkina. Ashiri yuwash shaana zandkachish, anush istangandama. Shiy kapung chinampantishcha. Nuwaa kapung chinaksha. Ashiri tapachindangandama.
Nuwaa imurish yangamaam ksarishpa. Tputs zapan nuwaa natsakanaya. Itaru, shiysha nuwaa tapachindangandama.
Mureenush nuwaa ksarinllpa. Nda nuwaa mureen pumaam izuuru istanda.
Apaa, shiy nuwaa istangandama. Shiy wanasiri chinaksha. Shiy kchinamishtishcha. Ashiri nuwaa nayanikush, wanasiri napangandama.
Apaa, shiy watam nuwaa tputsirshawa. Ashiri Apaa, nuwaa mapiyrinllpa. Tputs pacharundama, átana. Ashiri mikeerush nuwaa istanganda.
Nuwanung kayumayarush, nuwaa tapachindanda. Kundarareetsi arap zanganingcha.
¿Waninll nuwaa natsakanawa? Nuwaa tpazakanaya. Mangutari nuwaa mantsir tsiyatkanaya. Shiy anoo ichinguru yasaksha. Nuwaa kundarari paksha.
Nuwaa uru yutarit tsiyatkusin, kapung natsaksin, mangi kapung mantsakina. Mangi mantsakuri wizpuriri ndunareekina. Nuwaa mangeetsi tuwizpurtapanda, atitaati, itaru tputs nda minumtiyam nuwaa istamaam zandaranganaya.
Nuwaamsha katungtsee tspaspa íseersin panakanaya. Kapung sachitaranguri, kapizsha nuwaam panakanaya.
Ashiri, Apaa, uwsha shiyaam katungamaam shaniykusin, shiysha waneengcha.
Wach mchus tamapari ashiru mangu masaru taachinllinpa. Uru kiyung kachiychinllpa. Urutamari puniksin, wanumb nungtachinllinpa.
Shiy kapung tsiyantayarush, waneengcha. Tsiyanish zambazarinllpa. Izuuru waneengcha. Pakchiyam nayanirinllpa.
Mishat, kundarareetsi pang' kapeeteerush ksangcha. Anush minumtiyam taarusinapa.
Shiy nuwaa kiyung yacharangish, anoo kasiranasha uwshtisin nuwaa kiyung yachakanaya. Nuwaa stakanaya.
Ashiri shiysha Apaa, aranginasha waneengcha. Nayanirinllpa. Izuuru waneeyarush ksangcha.
Kirakarishish yuwash shaanaa tputsirish sur yandam taaru, anush kundarareetsi sur izuuru tchingangcha. Watam nda urutamari shiyapat taachinllinawa. Ashiri tputsiriptish sur washunand kundarareetsi sur yandarinllpa.
Apaa, Nuw kapung kiyung kachiykina. Istanda. Nuwaa tuwizpurtanda. Tapachindanda.
Ashkachush, nuwsha shiyaa ungirtakuri, yaseesshish yasichima. Mangipti itsinsaru shiyaa ungirtachima, atina.
Ashiriya, chiy tputsich chinuzee toro pachayaruch, nduntaati ashiru karupanaa witspatari, wachizuppatari muchkachuch, anoo Apanll kispari napchiya. Itaru, chiy tputsich mangiptartich itsinsaru Apanllee ungirtakuch, Apanllsha aranginasha chiyaa kis napkiya.
Anoo Apanll pakchu, mang' ksaku, chiyaatssha mangeemich ksashish wayachiya. Apanllingaz támarakuch, tuwizpurtachiya.
Watam tputs kiyung kachiyku, Apanllee istapanda átu, mashku, Apanllsha uru mazinakuwa. Tputs tumanamaw taakana, anootstam nda niyrkiya.
Ashiri kanindshuchis, mishat tsapurunasshuchis, mishat marshuchis, ichingarus, Apanllee ungirtangtsa, nuw siyaa atina.
Apanll waana Siyonshuchee tapachindachiya. Yusursha Utaáchchee yaktarin yapungachiya. Sheeru, Apanll tiptsir anush taachinllinaya. Amuytachinllinaya. Wipshitisin izapaneeyarusin, kapungushsha yakat taachinllinaya. Apanllchichinandarishtisin anush taachinllinaya. Ashiri na kamaneena Dapiy kiyung kachiyku, Sitatsti, tárangu anootsi.
<range>






























Apaa, shiy ipusamareetsish kurakaam ínakchush, wizpureetsish tputsee itsinsaru ksutamaam, panangcha,
Ashkachush, kuraksha chinampa tputsireetsish ksutku, tsiyatssee wanasir yarku, pukireetstam wanasiri istachiya.
Yuw tputs machip taakana, antamsin wanasirsha mapiyrsin taachinllinaya.
Kurak pukiree tputs istakchu, wanasirsha tsiyatssee yarku taachiya. Wipawaatstam istakchu mapiyrtamsin taachinllinaya. Watam tamundampanee tputs tununumbayaru kasachuwa.
Urutamari an kurak taachpa. Zar, misha tsup tamaparee ashiru urutamari taachpa.
Kurak ashkachu, tputsee kapung istachiya. Sin sinakchu, mzats tatsumim kis kxuntaru, kuraksha ambtam ashiru tiptsiree istakchu, kis taachinllinaya.
Nduma tsup pastachu, kurak tiptsir waanpatatin wanasir tsiyatkusin, mapiyrsin kis taachinllinaya.
Kurak tputsee ztaru ksutku, wamari kasiru taachiya. Kung Eufratismand yaru, ichingaru tputsee wamari kasiru taachiya.
Undararshitisin, tsap puzap taaksin, waantatamsin, tutunlltayarusin, Kurakaa, Shiyaa kukish payuchinipa, puniksin táchinllinaya.
Tarisshuch tputs urkar, Sambashuchtam urkar, Sibashuchtam urkar, arapcheewtamsin minpich tputs urkari, ichingarusin kurakaam maacheetsi wanasirimshee yushindayarusin, mangutari kurakaamsha panachinllinaya.
Ashiri tsapurunasshuchsha kurak ichingarusin waatsimarisha tutunlltaksin taachinllinaya. Tputsee ztaru kurakaa wamachtasheetssha payuksin taachinllinaya.
Pukirsha tputs, Kurakaa istanda. Tpachindanda, tákchu, kuraksha tputsee taárash tapachindachiya, Watam wamin istamaama ndunariwa. ¿Chakaja pukiree istach?
Kuraksha waanaatsi tiptsir chinampatari tuwizpurtachiya. Pukireetstam tputs taárasheetstam tapachindachiya.
Tputs Kurakaa tiptsiri kiyung yachamaam zandkitaatssin, uwsha tiptsiree tapachindachiya, watam kapung chinakuwa.
Urutari kurak kasiru taachiya. Sambashuch tputs orootsee kurakaam panachinllinaya. Kurakaam Apanllee urutamari mashkusin taachinllinpa. Sheeru, Apanll urutamari istaku taachiya.
Ashkachu, wanus zapan iyash tsapuni taachiya. Machpitam wanus zapantam tatsumim paratungachiya. Libanush tsap tamapari ashiru wanusi tsapurunasush izuuru tatsitchiya. Chirichir tamaparee ashiru izapanichiya.
Tputs urutamari kurakaa sur yasachinllinpa. Urutamari zar tamapari ashiru kurakaa taachpa. Ashkachu, ztaru tputs kissha taachinllinaya. Wamachtashee wanasirimshi uru payuchinllinaya. Tsapurunasshuch tputs ichingurusin kurakaa ungirtaksin, Shiyamari kasirush taaksha, táchinllinaya.
Apanll Taarashipani iyamari Israelchichini Apanllirini taakiya. Wamari kasiru wanasircha. Waamari iyaa kizpur istakiya.
Shiysha Apaa, urutamari Taarashipanish taaksha. Shiyamari wanasirtishcha. Shiyamari tapachindampantishcha. Apaa, tputs ztaru shiyaa wanasirimshireetsish yasachinllinpa, atina. Ashiri Apaa, Wappari.
Anumari apap Dapiyarini mangush chinarangu, shiyapat tsiyatku tárangitamta.
Apanll iyashchee Israelchicheetsini kis istakiya. Tputs mang' yaramaw taaku anoo Apanll kis istakiya.
Itaru, nuwsha Apanllee chinaktaati, sambarchishpaz ashiru pakchim pantsamaam pishtarangina. Apanllee kasamaam pakchim pishtarangina
Watam mangishi yutarit chinaranguri, ¿Tamashta tputs yashingchich yutarittaa taaksin, shamangarsin kis taakana? Nuwsha ashingasi, mangishi tárangina.
Uwshtisin tsipatsee nda punikanaya, watam nda kas yutakanawa. Nda kiyung kachiykanawa. Itaru, pukir tputs urkir ndunar, ¿Maypataja maacheetsi paxanxchi? atusin, kiyung kachiykanaya. Yashingchichshat, kurikpan, mapiyrsin kis taakanaya.
<range>
Waanaatsi kis tuwaraksin, wayarangashirini xanumba ashkanaya. Pukireetssha natsaksin, kiyung yachakanaya.
Kapung katungkusin, wanuts kapungu, tash kapukpuru wach shunlleew ashkanaya. Mantsir chinaksin, tputsee tamapingaksin, waamaritssin kasimaam zandkanaya.
Sheersin, tputsee kasiyarusin stakanaya. In tputs mang' ndunparee, atusin, aranginasha kiyung yachakanaya. Pukireewaa wintsareem wayakanaya.
Apanllee natsaksin yutarit tsiyatkanaya. Ichinguroom tputs ngitzee wayakanaya.
Ashkusin, tputssha, ¿Ndusha zurku át? atusin, yutaritshishpanip tachitamaam zandkanaya.
Waanpatatin tsiyatkusin, ¿Kaapaneeja Apanll kurikpanee kuk mazinak? ¿Apanll kaapaneeja pak? Ndunparee, atanaya.
¡Pa, in urkirpan tamara! nduntaa tarawaztaksin, aranginasha kurikee putakanaya.
Nuwsha, ngutparina wanasir taakina. Mangi yaram taaktaati, itaru ichinguru zari Apanll nuwaa waneekpaz ashku, kiyung kachiykuri taakinawa, átssincha tputsi.
<range>
Itaru, nuwsha anumashee chinarangeezi. Anumashee tsiyataranginaareena ashiru, Apanllee tiptsir tayutaritaranginaaparina.
Nuw nda tsiyatarangtaati, itaru mangishi chinaranguri, ¿Tamari yashingchich kis taakana? táranguri, yasamaam zandaranguri, xapoorangina.
Minush zari shiyash pangish, Apaa, pshturanguri, shiysha mangeetsi mangoonamaam p'tseerangsha.
Yashingchich kurikpaneew sambarchimunpaz ashirusin naakanaya. Yuwash nda chinarana anush, shiysha Apaa, tununukpaz ashkachush wazawush pantsachinllinaya.
Ayamtaati nda kis taachinllinaya. Napuxtayarusin, sitatstee táchapsinaya.
Taárashee tputs pamazukpaz ashku musásiri pastachinllinaya.
Apaa, nuw nduma mangoonchuri, mangishi kapung tsiyantarangina. Nuw wanipa yutarit chinarangi.
Mangshari ashirangina. Nda mangoonarangina. Manginshuch ashiruri, nda mangoonkuri tárangina.
Itaru Apaa, yutarit chinarangitaati, shiysha kuwiptish nuwaa mbam patsisakush, nda kasaksha.
Shiyash itsinsaru tachitamaam nuwaa mangi p'tseeksha, Shiyash kuskachuri, shiysha nuwaa mangish ksaptari, Naani, táchsha.
Kanindap shiyangzimari nuw kusamaam zandkina. Nuw shiyapa ipuneeruri taakuri, ¿mayangazeeja nuw nish tsapurunasush tamarachee?
Nuw nutsi mizpurishtaati, itaru shiysha Apaa, nuwaa nda kasakush arang tuwizpurtaksha.
Itaru, yuwaatssha tputs shiyaa tuwanlltakana, anoo shiysha tpachingayarush kasachsha.
Itaru, nuwsha shiyaa nda kasakina. Nuw shiyangzimari ipunamaam chinakina. Shiyamunari Apaa, kamungkina. Tputsee kamankuri ¿Wanip nuwaa Apari istaka? táchina. Ashiri, Apaa, wapparee.


























































































































































Apaa, shiyamari Osiyarinchichee ksutarangsha. Opeejaa ksutamapan tamapari ashirush machtarangsha. Shiy kanindush kurakish kuxinshishimunish kuxineerush, sundarurish shiyaa ksutkanaya. Ashiri Apaa, iyaa k'kini mazinangcha.
Iyashchee tputs, Osiyarin nlluranuri Efrayinchichee, Manaseschicheetstam wanasiri napangcha, Apaa. Mishat Benjaminchicheetstam wanasiritam napangcha. ¡Támangi, Apaa! Wizpurpatatish tputsee tapachindangcha.
Apaa, yusur iyaa ichingarootsini wanasir taamaam wayangcha. Iyaa wanasiri napkush, tapachindangcha, atiniya.
Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha. Shiyamari kasirush taaksha. ¿Ashiri mayaamsha tputsireetsish nda istaksha? Iy shiyaa, Istapanda atuni, mashkuni, itaru shiysha tsiyantakush nda iyaa istaksha. ¿Ashinooja tsiyanis zambazachish?
Iyaa kapung kiyung yacharangush, nda katungkuni, nduntam waakuni, ichingaru zar tanukuni taakiniya.
Minshuch tputs iyanung watsiri taakana, anin iyaa tsapunee itutsimaam zandkanaya. Kundararini iyaa kasirangusin, iyaa stakanaya.
Apaa, shiyamari kasirush taaksha. Yusur iyaa wanasir taamaam wayangcha. Iyaa chinakush tapachindangcha.
Iyaa zitaminarineetsini Ijiptomand tsap kizarunaatspaz ashirush, xpuyarush, nish Kanaanushsha tsap yushindarangsha. Kanaanshuchee tputsee kasirangush, tpachingarangsha. Sheerush iyashcheetssha kizarunaatspaz ashirush anush tsap tatsumirangsha.
Karutaatssha wanasir puyakpaz, sheerush, kizarunsha zapan kxunarangiya. Izuuru ashchiri tsapoo tatsitarangiya.
Macheetstam íwar izuuru ashchiri yambutarangu, wapzar zapan pzeeneeru, wanasinarsha wazurantam kanungarangiya.
Zapan izapaneerangu, marshutam kusaranganaya. Mishat, kung Eufratisshutam kusaranganaya. Iyashcheetssha tputs ashikpaz ashirush iyaa izapaneerangsha.
