¿Ashiri natsha mayaamsha tandapunuzeetspaz ashiru tunuparangush, iyaa nda wanasir ksutaksha? Tputs iyaa kiyung yachakanaya. Na tputs ngootsip naakchusin, kizarunaa wanus pusayarusin, kapeeta kapeeta ashkanaya.
Mishat, manginshuch kazum, kázamzitam kizarunapaz wanus ashirusin katungkusin, iyaa kiyung yachaksin taakanaya. Wapzareetspaz ashirusin iyashchee ichip ichip ashkusin pamuxakaniya.
Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha. ¿Mayaamsha nda iyaa nayaniksha? Apaa, tputsireetsish kanindamandari napangcha. Iyaatssha kizarunareetspazish ashiru yusur ksutangcha. Izuuru wanasir iyaa napangcha.
Watam shaana tatsumarangshawa. Shiy iyaa nish yushindarangush, tatsumikpaz ashirangush kis ksutarangsha.
Itaru, kundararini tzayarusin, tirooranganaya. Ashiri, Apaa, shiysha kundarareetsini tpachingayarush ksangcha.
Itaru, tputsireetsinaarish, yuwaa kapung chinakish ipusirangish, anootsinaa tuwizpurtangcha.
Ashkachush, iysha ayamtaatiyam shiyaa kasacheezini. Taarasheemani kaneesich iyaam panangcha. Ashkachush, iysha Apaa, yusur shiyaatsimari tsiyatkuni taachinipa.
Apaa, yusur iyaa wanasir taamaam wayangcha. Iyaa chinakush tapachindangcha.













































Apaa, shiy kizpurtishcha. ¿Tamara shiy pangish wanasiree?
Nuw shiyash pangish tipuranllizshumari napamaam kapung támarakina. Pshtuyaruri, mangi ksakuri shiyaa ungirtakuri yaseekina, Apaa Taarashipani.
Tsiripchitaa shiyash pangish mapiyru kis taakanaya. Suminungish mapiyrsin ngichtakanaya. Zangatatam ixateersin, anushsha iparinayarusin, kis taakanaya. Ashiri nuwsha tsiripich ashiritam ashingasinda aturi, támarakina. Apaa, nuwcha shiyaa kurakari. Shiy tsapurunasee kanindaatstam shiyamari kasiru taaksha.
Tputs shiyash pangish taaksin, mang' kis taakanaya. Shiyaa uru yasiyastar ashkusin, ungirtakanaya.
Tputsirish shiyamun mang' kis taakanaya. Ashiri shiysha tuwizpurtangcha. Uru mang' kis, Apanllip pang' naapani, atusin, shiyap pangish, machip Siyonap naakanaya.
Naakchusin, tsap sur Tanushinung tushiykchusin, shiysha istakush, nda sambaytakanaya. Sin sinakchu, tsapoo kachachtakchu, kissha aranginasha naakanaya.
Ashiri mang' ksaptari nda sambaytakusin, shiyap pangish machip kárkanaya. Siyonash kuseersin, shiyash pshtukanaya. Shiy kizpurtishcha Apaa.
Apaa Taarashipani, shiyamari kasiru taaksha. Iy Israelchichini shiyaa Apanllirtanicha. Ashiriya, nuw shiyaa mashki anoo mazinangcha.
Apaa, shiy iyaa kurakarini ipusarangush, wanasiri napangcha. Ksutangcha.
Shiyash pangish pshtumaam kizpurcha wanasiri. Zapantaa zari arap taakuri nda mapiykina. Itaru, shiyash pangish minamaritaatiya zar taakuri, mapiyruri kis taakina. Mangi kis mapiyruri taachina. M'chachtaati, shiyash pangish tuchinamapan taakuri, kisshapari taachina. Itaru, tputs yutaritshishpanpa taakuri, ¿antaati ksaja taachi?
Shiy Apaa Taarashipani, zar tamapari ashiru iyaa tuwasineekush, iyaa ksutaksha. Yuw tputs itsinsaru taaku, anoo kapung chinakush, shaanshu pangish tapshtukush, Uru wanasiri ksutaksha.
Apaa, shiyamari kasiksha. Tsapurunaseetstam, kanindaatstam ichinguru kasiru taaksha. Shiy tputsirish shiyamun mang' tatkusin, mang' kis taakanaya.































Apanll machee Siyona yaktarineema ipusarangu, anush patuzinazee mbam pashuchirangusin pangurangana.
Apanll Israelchichinee yaktarini ichingaru kis napkiya, itaru Irusarinaa aranginasha kasiru kis napkiya.
Tputs Irusarinaa tsiyatkusin; Kizpur wanasiri. Apanllcha yaktarini átssincha. [Apanll anush waana panguseem ipusarangu, na uru ksutku taachiya, atanaya.]
Apanllsha tsapurunasshuchee napkachu; Ijiptshuch tputs, Mishat Babiloniyashuchtam, Filistewshuchtam, Tírshuchtam, Etiyopshuchtam anshuch tputs zapan nuwamun nllurtarangana. Ashiri nuwsha, Irusarinshuchtam tputsee, táchima.
Tputs ztaru nuwaa mangoonkusin, nuwsha, Irusarinshuch tputsi, táchima, tárangiya Apanlli. Apanll waana yaktarinish tiptsirpata urutamari kizpur taachiya.
Tiptsiree sur kirakamun yandakchu; Nee nuwamun nllurtarangu, ashiri Irusarinshuch tputsi, yandayaru táchiya.
Sheeru Irusarinush ichingarusin, mang kis yaseeksin, michitkusin, Apanllimun nllurtaranguni Irusarinshuchtanicha tputsini, yaseeksin táchinllinaya.




















Apanllee nuw uru yaseekuri, Shiy Apaa, nayanimpantishcha. Shiy k'keetsish minamari payuksha; nda ayamamtiyam kapeetaksha. Ashirucha, nuwsha uru yaseekuri tputsee anoo kamanimantar ashkina.
Apaa, nuw tputsee kamankuri, Apanll chínash ayamtaatiya pastacheeja, atina. Apanll waanaatsi kuk urutamari payukiya. Apanlli kuk kanind tamaparee ashiru urutamari taachiya, atina.
Apaa, sirútama shiy minam mangooz chinayarush, Dapiyarineetsi wanasir tsiyatarangsha. Tsiyatarangush amikurtarangsha. Shiy Dapiyarineetsi tsiyatarangush;
Shiyachich nlluranur uru kushimunish kurakaam kinataranllu taachinlliniya, tárangsha Apaa.
Apaa, shiy sundarurish shiyaa ungirtaksin; Apanll uru waanaatsee kuk payukiya. Apanlleem xapoomaam wanindaja, atanaya shiyaatsee.
Apaa, ¿Antaati apanllputs minamtiyam shiyapa waritarazinllinaja? Arutamatam ¿antaati shiyapa tatsamooreeja? Nduni, wanindaja.
Shiyamari kapung kasirush kizpur taaksha Kanindpich sundarurish ztaru anu shiyaa taturpiranaya.
Shiy kizpurtishcha kurakish. Wizpurireetsish shaana payuksha. Shiyamari itsinsaru tsiyataksha. Nish tsapurunasish ¿yapeeja ashima pangchich? Shiyapa tatsamooru wanindaja.
Shiyamari kasiksha. Mus kapungumash mar warastakachu, anoo shiysha wizpurirpatish tuzanaksha.
Shiyamari kungushchee watarimashee kapunguwaa kamiran kasiksha. Maachee tsipama ashiru kamiran kachingaksha. Wizpurirpatish kundarareetstamtish kasiksha. Tusuwambeerush, arap kapeetambayarush, kasaksha.
Kanindaatstam, misha tsapurunaseetstam shaana urutamari taamaam tinarangsha. Tsapurunasee tinarangush ichingaru maacheetsi tinayarush wayarangsha.
Shiyamari ichingaru ashpiri tsapurunasee tinarangsha. Macheetstam íwar tinarangush, mach Taborshuchtam, mach Hebronshuchtam tinarangush, mang' kis shiyamun shambatkusin; Apanll kizpurcha wanasir, atanaya.
Apaa, pachtamishish wizpurish kapung taariya. Kuwish mbutsinungich wizpurirpatish shiyamari kasiksha.
Shiy kurakarush, shaana tputsee mangoo yasayarush, wanasiri wayaksha. Misha, urutamari kurak wanasirimash watsinas taaksha. Uru iyaa tputseetsini chinaksha, iyaa nda kasaksha.
Ashiri Apaa, Tputs shiyaa kis shambatkusin, ungirtaksin, uru mang' kis taakanaya. Shiyash nungish tachitkusin, 'sinish kis taakanaya.
Shiyamunatam mang' ksakanaya. Watam shiyamari itsinsaru tputsee yasakush itsinsaru tsiyatakshawa.
Apaa, Iy tputsini shiyamun wizpurirish kchitaruni wanasir taakaniya. Shaana zandkush, iyaam wizpureetsish aranginasha panaksha.
Shiy wizpurirpatish xanxapishpapaz ashiru iyaa kámanaksha. Iysha Israelchichini Apanllee iycha kurakarini. Kizpur wanasircha, atiniya. Ashiri, Apaa, mazinangcha:
Apaa, sirútama shiysha miranish tputsireetsish tsiyatarangush, Nuwsha tputsee, yuw nda puniku anu, kurakaam ipusarangina. Kizpur putit nda puniku, anoo ipusaranguri istarangina. Tputs sur Dapiyaa. Nuwtanda tputsiri. Ashiri nuwsha Israelchichee ksutamaam wayarangina, Wamari kasiru tsapurunasshuchee kánuru taachiya,
Nuw Dapiyaa wayungunpa wanasirimashpa tapararanguri, Israelchicheem ksutamaam kurakaam ínarangina.
Ayamtaati Dapiyaa istamaam mbizcheezi. Nuwaanpata wizpuriri tuwizpurtataw ashkuri kizpur taachiya,
Undararshitisin, Kasiyani, tusin, pinasachinllinaya. Natsampansha tputs kasichazinllinaja.
Nuwsha Dapiyaa undararee wizpurirpati kátimbayaruri kasachima. Ayamtaati Dapiya undarareetsi yusur pangcheeja. Undararee zurampatari kachingeeruri, kasachima. shiy shaana Dapiyaatsee tárangsha Apaa. Mishat Apaa, shiy Dapiyarineetsi tárangitamtish
Nuw urutari Dapiyaa chinakuri, uwsha nuwamun mang' tatchiya. Nuwamunatam wizpuriri aranginasha wizpur kapung taachiya.
Dapiy wamari tputsee kasikchu, ashchiri Mediterranewshucheetstam, misha Eufratisshucheetstam shuneerusin kasichiya.
Dapiya nuwapat tsiyatku. Apaa, shiyaa nuwcha Apari. Mishat, shiyaa nuwcha Apanlliri. Watam nuwaa tapachindakush, ksutakshawa, Dapiya nuwaa táchiya.
Nuwaa tákchu, nuwsha Dapiyaa, ipareetspazi iwachiztamaa ashiruri aranginasha istachima. Tsapurunasshuchee kurak wamari kasichiya.
Nuw nuwaana Dapiyaa kapung kasiru chinakuri, yuwaa nuw Dapiyaa tárangi anu urutamari taachiya. Nllitaritaa chinacheezi, shiysha Apaa Dapiyaa tárangsha, Mishat Apaa, shiy Dapiyaa wachinllinootsi tárangitamtish,
Dapiyaa wachinllinur tputs pzapaneekchusin, kanind nduma pastachu, uru kurakaamtam kinachinlliniya.
Itaru, uwshtisin nuwaa kuki kapeetkinaareesinaya, yuw nuw kamachtarangi, anoo nda ambi ashirusin taaksin, nuwsha wanichima.
Wandaya nuwaa kuki nda payuksin, kamachtamareetsi kapeetkusin,
waneeshshipasha wanichima. Anumandtam pzkooshishpa pzkookpaz ashtachima.
Ashiritaati, ayamtaati Dapiychichee tputs kasacheezi. Chinakuri, urutamari uwapa taarataraw ashtachina.
Nuwaanaatsi kuki kapeetcheezi. Urutamari payuchima.
Nuw kuki ayamamtiyam pastacheeja, tárangi, an zurampataricha tárangi. Nuwaanamuntari suri tárangina. Nuwaanaatsi ngichcheezi.
Ndatuma sitarunas pastachu, Dapiychichtisin tputs kurakawtam taachinlliniya.
Ndatuma kanind íwari pastachu, tsup tamatarparee ashiru urutamari taachinllinaya, shiy Apaa, shaana tárangshawa.
Itaru Apaa, shiy ambtaa tárangush, ashiritaa Dapiyarinchichee nlluranur kasarangsha. Kushtarangsha. Tayutaritarangsha. Shaantataa kurakaam ipusarangush, ashiritaa shiy tsiyantarangush, na kapeetarangsha.
Yuwaa sirú Dapiyaa tárangish anoo kapeetarangsha. Dapiyarinchichee nlluranur ngatarangush, na zurampatari kasarangsha.
Shiysha Undarareetsi zanganirangush Utaáchchee yaktarini ichingaroo kapeetaranganaya. Watandpunoo pátang, pátang, tawata, tawata ashimbaranganaya.
Watam shaana tputsireetsish kanasarangshawa. Minshuchtisin tputs anoo parangusin, yaktash pshtuyarusin, maacheetsi shuchiranganaya. Sheeru iyashcheetsi napeersin staranganaya.
Shiy iyaa kasarangush, kundararshitini iyaa kasirangusin, mang' ksaksin; Iyamari kasiyani, atusin, uw paxayarusin shambatkanaya.
Shiy Dapiyarinee machtari itutsirangush, tamuramach ashirangu, ndusha tapazish iyaa tapachindarangiya.
Dapiyarini pangusee, maacheetstam zapan wanasiri wayarangu, itaru ichingaroo shiysha Apaa, tayutaritarangsha. Dapiyarineetsi wizpuririni, izuuru tsapush kapeetarangsha.
Mishat, shiy iyaa musásiri tsipatsiptamaam wayarangitamsha. Iyachchee kapungsha ipazarangsha.
Apaa, nuwaa mazinangandama. ¿Ashinooja Apaa, yusur iyaa kis napchish? Tsiyanish musákchush, kapung tashish ksaneekpaz ashichsha.
Apaa, nuw taarashi pakichcha; tsipasa. Nuw tputstana. Shaana iyaa tputseetsini tinarangush, nish tsapurunasish ningat masach taachini.
¿Chakaja nda tsipach? Ichingarupariniya tsipachiniya. Tputs waanaatsi watsipun tapachindamaam wanindaja.
¡Apaa! chtakchuri shiy Dapiyarinee chinarangush, tsiyatarangush: Ayamtaati shiyashchee kasacheezi, tárangsha. Ashiri ¿tamasha natsha Dapiyarinchichee nlluranur istamaam ngataksha?
Apaa, napangasindaniya. Tputs wanip shiyaa tputsirish natsakanaya. Nda achim kamaskanaya; stakanaya iyaatsi. Nuwsha tsiyani tanukuri, zansimun tsipamaam waritakina. ¡Apaa, iyaa nayaningcha!
Apaa, nuwaa mazinangandama. ¡Iyaa kundararini mundakanaya! ¡Kukush mantsir tsiyatkusin, shiyaa ipusamarinish ichinguru zar natsakanaya!
Ashtaa Apaa, shiyamari kurakish kasirush, na wandari kizpur kurak taaksha. Apaa, wapparee.
Apaa, shiycha iyaa kapung tapachindampanish. Iyashchi tputs uru shiyash kamunganiya.
Ndatumastaa macheewa, mishat tsapurunaseetstam tinchush, shiy urutari taarangsha. Mishat, tsapurunasee uru tinayarush shiy wand urutari Apanllish kurakish taarangsha. Shiy urutamari Apanllish taaratartanllsha.
Apaa, shiy tputseetsich, Waani tsipachpa; tsapoomtam puyumboom kinachpa, tákchush, tputssha tsipakanaya.
Shiyaamanaa Apaa, minam mil masach minampaz zar ashiru tushiykiya. Shiyaam minampaz maats ashiru nda táchaksha.
Apaa, shiy shaana zandkush wizpurpatish tputseetsich machiksha. Iy taarasheetsini pamazukpazich ashiru mikeeru kanatsipkiniya.
Iy tputsini chirichirpaz ashiruni musásiri tsipakaniya. Napa chirichir wanasir kxuneeru, puturit wanasiri chaptayaru, itaru zar pukamachsha mawiruyaru, tsipatariya. Chy tputsich ashkitamchi.
Shiy tsiyantakachush, musásiri iyaa tpachingamaam waritaksha. Ashkachush, iysha mangini tsípataraa ashchiniya.
Shiy iyaa yutaritshishiri ichingaru yasaksha. ¿Yapeeja chiy kamungchich?
Shiy tsiyantakchush, uru taarashini tsípchiya. Tputsich masachirich kambusurpaz ashiru tushiyshtar ashkiya.
70 masach tputs taakiya. Itaru, tputs kizpur putit 80 masach taamaam waritakiya. Kapungtaa taakuch, itaru xarashish uru iyaam tachitarpaz ashkiya. Mikeeru tushiyshtar ashku, chiy mikeeru tsipachich.
¿Chakaja shiyaa tsiyanish yasach? ¿Tamayari shiyaa tsiyanish kamungchich?
Ashirucha Apaa, putam putam ashiru mangeetsini p'tseengcha nda mangutaritini taamaama. Mangiptartanaariniya taakuni, shiyaa aranginasha mangoonachshapariniya.
Apaa, iyaatssha yusur wanasir chinangcha. ¿Ashinooja iyaa istachish? Iyaa nayaningcha. Watam iyaa shaana tputsirshawa.
Uru zar taraseekchu anush, chinasheetsish iyaam panangcha. Mangishini tatsitangcha. Ashkachush, iysha uru shiyaa mangini kis yasichinipa.
Apaa, ¿wanip masach na kiyung kachiykuni taakaniya? Itaru, Apaa, shiy ashpirittam masachee tatsamooru kis taamaam iyaam wayangcha.
Ashkachush, iysha mishat iy ipartamani shiyaa wanasirimshirish pangchinlliniya. Shiy iyaa kizpur istakush, anoo kis pangchiniya.
Ashiriya Apaa, shiy kchinamsheerush, iyaa kapung istangcha. Iyaa tarawazirini, shiysha Apaa, wanasiri napangcha. Zurkuri tina, Apaa. Iyaa istangcha.
Iy Apanllirini waamari kasiru kizpur taariya. Ashiri yuw tputs Apanllimun mang' tatku, anoo Apanllsha uru kámanaku ksutkiya.
Ashiri uwsha Apanllee tsiyatku; Apaa, shiyamari nuwaa ksutaksha. Nuwaa tapachindaksha. Ashiri Apaa, nuwsha shiyashumari kamunguri taakina. Watam shiyamunari mangi tatkuri taakinawa, táchiya.
Ashiri siy, Apanllis tiptsiris nuwaa kuki mazinangtsa. Yashing siyash tsutashish tsipatsimash wayaktaatiya, Itaru, Apanllimari siyaa tapachindamaam waritariya.
Wazitpungachpapaz ashiru siyaa kámananaw ashku, siysa punicheezis, ndambari. Siyaa uru istachintspa, tárangu, waanaatsee kuk kapeetcheeja, ndambaree. Xanxapishpapaz ashiru siyaa imanta imanta ashku, kámanaku tapachindakiya.
Psaantaatiya naakchus, tunimshutaatiya, ¿antaati siy kanizee punicheezis? ndambaree. Kaschiritam kundarareetsish punichtamtazis. Xarasheetstam punichtamtazis.
<range>
Zapantaa tputs siyanung tsipatsiptar ashkusin, itaru siysa matambshis taatssa.
Apanll tputsee mantsirimshee waanamandari chayarini waneekchu, anoo siysa kchiptis pangatssa. Itaru, siyaa nda wanichiya.
Yuwamand siy Apanllimunari mangis taturangis, anumand Apanll siyaa ksutchiya.
Maachi yutamash siyash kusamaam pinasachiya. Wanguytam tsutashish siyash pangis tsutacheeja, ndambari.
Watam Apanllsha waana wasundururee siyaa ksutamaam zangankuwa. Yaptaa naakis ambtaa wasundurursha uru siyaa ksutchiya.
Uwpat siyaa pazurangpaz ashtachiya, nda siy patumbchimun pazis tpuu ashimaama.
Kázamshiptaati, isariyap, mkaptam naakinaareesa, Apanllsha siyaa wanasir naamaam istachiya.
Apanll átcha; Siy nuwaa mangoonkus, nuwaa chinakus, nuwsha siyaa tapachindachintspa. Ashiri yutamashi siyaa kasicheeja.
Nuwaa mashkus, nuwsha uru yámchintspa. Nuwaana siyapa washunand taachima. Mangis kapung mantsakus, mangeetsis tuwizpurtachintspa. Tputssha siyaa yasaksin, Apanll waa kapung chinaku istakiya, táchinllinaya.
Zapantam masach taamaam wayachintspa. Sheeruri, izuuru nuwaanpee machchintspa, Apanll tárangcha, nuw siyaa atina.
















Apanll Taarashipan waamari kasiru taakiya. Kizpur wamar kurakurtaru, 'sinish taakiya. Wizpur wamari kasiriya. Tsapurunasee tinarangu, nda zpuzamaam mbam wayayaru kasarangiya.
Ashirucha, atashiniya; Apaa, shiy tsapurunasee wayarangush, urutamari ksutaksha. Shiy urutamari kizpur kurak taaksha.
Apaa, mar kung kapungumash warastakchu, zaw, zaw, zaw, ántaru, kizpur zungantaru,
anoo shiy wizpurish kasirinashta. Watam shiy kanindush íwar taakshawa.
Apaa, shiy kamachtamarish urutamari taaratartachiya. Shiy nllitarit chinacheezish, ndambaree. Ashiriya, tputsirish uru shiyash pangish pshtukchusin, Shiyaa Apaa, Kizpur wanasirtishcha. Nda pakchiyam yutarit chinaksha, atusin, shiyaa ungirtachinllinaya, nuw shiyaa Apaa, atina.























Naanints. Mangooz ksaptari Apareetsich yaseeyani; watam iyaa ksutataw ashku, tapachindakuwa.
Ashiri Apanllish pang' pshtuyaruni, Apanlleem yaseeyani. Ungirtayani.
Watam Apanll Taarashipan minamaritawa. Uwamari kapung kasiriya. Apanllputsee ichingaru kasiru, kizpur kurak taakiya.
Tsapurunasee ichingaru ksutkiya. Tsapoo wantsshuchee ksutku, Íwaree machee ksutkitamta. Tsapurunasee ztaru waana amuytakiya.
Kung mar kapungumashee Apanll waana tinarangiya. Tsapoomtam uwpatari patateeru tinarangiya.
Ashirucha, naanints. Ungirtayani Apareetsich. Tuchimtayaruni, wánungeetari ungirtayani Apareetsich. Watam iyaamtam tinaranguwa, atina.
Apanll watacha kaapaniritana yaana Aparini. Iysha Apanlltanicha tiptsirini. Apanll opeej ksutamapan ashiru iyaa wanasiri ksutkiya. Ashiri siysa waanaatsee kuk kitsis mazinangtsa. Watam Apanll siyaa atuwa:
Sirútama zitaminaris tsap apusash Meribash taarangsin, nuwamun mang' tatumaam ngataranganaya.
Nuwaatssha michitaranganaya. Nuw wizpurirpati tapachindarangitaati, nuwaa wizpurireetsi parangitaatssin, itaru nuwamun mang' tatumaam ngataranganaya.
Ashiri nuwsha kapung tsiyantaranguri, 40 masach apusap masatarusin naamaam wayarangina. In tputs nda mangpa chinakanaya; kizpur yutarit ashkanaya. Nuwaa kamachtamari wits nda mazinakana.
Ashirucha, nee zurampatari wanichima. Yuwash tsap taamaam wayarangi anush pshtuchazinllinaja, ndambaree. Anush kanuschazinllinaja, ndambaree, atina, Apanll tárangiya.
Apareetsich yaseengints. Tputs ztaru yaseesshish kaneeschee Apanllee yaseengints.
Apareetsich yaseeyani. Taarashipanee, shiy kizpurtishcha, táyani. Putam, putam, tputsee kamankus, Apanll iyaam tapachndampaneem taakiya, tángtsa.
Tputsee ztaru Apanllee kamaningtsa; Apanll tsinsampancha. Wamari kasiru, ¿waninll wizpurpat iyaa istakuwa? tángints.
Watam Apanll uwamari kizpur kurakawa. Ashiriya, uru ungirtakuch yasimaam kizpurcha wanasiri. Apanllputsee ichinguru uwamari kasiriya.
Minshuch tputs apanllputsirini wizpur nda pakchiyam taariya. Itaru, Apanllsha kizpureeru kanindaa tinarangiya.
Shiy Apaa, kizpur wanasirtishcha. Pangish kurakurtaru anush, 'sinish kizpur taaksha.
Ashiri siysa ichingarus tputsis, maachiritpatawis Apanllee ungirtangints. Apaa, wappari wizpuririmandish. Shiyamari urutamari kasiksha, tángints.
Sheerus, pangup naakchus, maacheetsi, yuwaa waana kamachtarangu anoo yáyarus, ungirtangints.
Apanll pang' kizpurcha wanasiri. Ashiri anushsha ungirtangints. Tputsis ichingarus, Nuw shiyaa kurakartana, Apanllee tángtsa.
Apanll uwamari kizpur kurakcha, kamankus tángtsa. Tsapurunasee tinayaru, wayarangu, na anootsiri taakiya. Nda shpukiya. Amb ashirangu, tputsee ichingaru tatsamooru chinaku taakiya.
Ashiriya, siysa Apanll tínarangu anis, misha yuwis kanindush taakis antamtis, misha yuwis tsapurunasush taakis antamtis, misha yuwis marush taakis antamtis, ichingarus Aparimuni mangis kis shambatangtsa.
Yuwis mzatsish tatsumis taakis, mishat manginshuchtamtis, yasinawtamtis, Apanllimun kis shambatangtsa.
Watam waana tsapurunasshuchee ichingaru ksutamaam kuschima, táranguwa. Tputsee natstayaru, wanasiri zurampatari tsiyatku, anoo ksutchiya.






























Kayanu, ichingaruni ztaru Apanllee mangini kis yaseeyani.
Ichinguruni Apanllee ungirtayani. Mangini kis Apanllish pang' pshtuyaruni yaseeyani.
Apanll taarashipancha anoo yasangtsa. Iyaa tinarangu, ichingurootsini wipaam ínarangiya. Ashiri iy na Apanllshatanicha tiptsiri taakiniya. Apanll iyaam opeejapaz ashiru ksutamapan taakiya. Iyaa uru ksutku taakiya.
Ashiri Apanllush pang' pshtuyaruni, mangini kis, Wapparee, Apaa, táyani. Apanllee yaseeyani, ungirtayani.
Watam shiysha Apaa kizpurshawa. Shiy kchinamishtishcha. Urutamari tputsee chinakush taaksha. Nlluranureetstam kasachtamtazish, ndambaree. Ashirucha, shiyaa, Apaa, Wapparee atiniya.





































Nuw shiyaatsimari Apaa, izuuru mangiptarti ungirtachima. Shiy wanasirimshiri chinaksha. Ashiriya, mangi kis urutamari shiyaa
Apaa, ungirtakuri taachima. Wanip nuwaa istarangsha. Kapung istarangsha. Nuw anoo ayamamtiyam nda mbizachina.
Apanll nuwaa yutaritshishireetsi ichinguru tachingarangiya. Kas yutaki anootstam yararangu,
tsipaneetsi tapachindarangiya. Urutari nuwaa chinaku, ksutku taakiya.
Ashirucha nuwaam pishtats ndunari. Mangi kis taakina. Nuwaa tuwizpurtaku, nuwsha kanungas tamapari ashiruri taakina. Yungan tamapari ashiruri kizpur taakina.
Natsampan tputs tputsee kiyung yachaku, Apanllsha anoo yasakiya. Natsampanee izuuru waneekchu, yuw tputs kiyung kachiykana anoo mapiyrsin taamaam wayakiya.
Iyaa zitaminarini Israelchichee waanpata wizpur tapachindarangiya. Sheeru, Móysisarinee waanaatsi kuk kamanirangu, Móysissha tputsee tayaspatarangiya.
Apanll chinampancha. Nayanimpancha. Tputseetsi chinaku nda mikeeru tsiyantamaam yasariya.
Nda iyaa yutaritshishirini chinaru taakiya. Nda urutari tsiyantataw nda ashku taakiya.
Iy zapantaa mantsir taakuni, nda anumand iyaa tatsamooru waneekiya.
Apanll iyaa chinaku, kanindaa arangpaz kánaru ashiru kapung iyaa chinakiya.
Yutaritshishirineetsini arap yap tsapurunas tspakatu amb kapeetarangiya.
Tputs wipaa kizpur chinaku tamatarparee ashiru, Apanll waanaatsi tiptsir chinakiya.
Iyaa tsapupa tinarangu anoo nda mbizakiya. Yuwaa sambaytakani anoo yasariya.
Chiy tputsich taarashich karut tamapari ashicha. Karut natuma kizpur wanasir chaptayaru, kis napamaam waritakiya.
Itaru, kambusursha kizpur kambustakchu, chapoo izuuru turambatkachu, ndunarshat ashtariya. Mbizamamari tsípakiya. Ashiritamcha, iy tputsini taarashini.
Itaru, Apanllsha Taarashipan waanaatsee tiptsir nda ayamamtiyam mbizachiya. Tputs Apanllimun mang' tatku, wamachtashee payuku, Apanllsha anoo tputs urutari kapung chinakiya. Wipaatstamta, misha ichingaru nlluranureewaatstam kasacheeja ndambaree. Izuuru ksutchiya.
<range>
Apanll waanaa uxinashimun kanindash wayarangu, anumandari tsapurunasee ashchiri ksutkiya.
Ashiriya, siysa Apanllis wasundururis, Apanllee ungirtangints. Watam siy kizpur taaksawa. Uru Apanlleetsimari wamachtash izuuru tuminuksa. Mangiptis uru waanaatsee kuk zurampatari payuksa. Ashiri siysa, ichingarus Apanllee ungirtakus taangtsa.
<range>
Mishat siysa, yuwis Apanll tinarangants anis, maachtawtamtis, kanindshuchtamtis, tsapurunashutamtis taakis anis ichingarus Apanlleetsimari Taarashipani ungirtakus taangtsa. Nuwsha ashiritam zurampatari mangiptarti Apanllee ungirtakuri taachima.
Apanllimun mangini kis shambateeni. Apaa, shiyamari taarashipantishcha. Shiyaatsimari mangiptini kis shambatkiniya. Shiyamari kasirush taaksha. Shiyaatsimari ungirtakaniya, táchiniya. Shaana 'sinee kamartapzish ashiru taaksha. Kanindap íwar kawambananandari wayarangush,
<range>
Anumunsha, kungumun iwaz pangeemish wayarangitamsha. Mishat, Apaa, shiy psaseem kinakataraa sheerush, pshirshishushpaz ashirush psasish naaksha. Kambusurpaz ashirush wizpurirpatish naaksha.
Kambusur watacha shiy tsiyatsipaneem k'kuz zanganikpaz ashiksha. Shiy mamarootssha zangankush wizpureetsish tuyamandakiya.
Tsapurunaseetssha wanasir tinarangush, nda ayamamtiyam piyam naata, piyamsha shpuzata nda ashishtamaam mbam wayarangsha.
Mar kung tsapurunasimun iwaz ashchiri kamispapaz ashiru purangsha.
Itaru, shiysha Apaa, kungoo kamachtarangush; Tsapush naangcha, tárangush, kungsha k'keetsish kariyaatspaz ashiru mazinarangu, mikeeru karuwataraa ashirangiya.
Machimun naanaataraa ashirangu, karuwataraa, yuwash shaana; Neetsiri taangcha, tárangish, anush tsap watandsush kusarangu, zanayarangiya.
Nda piyam pseertaku anshuri wanasir wayarangsha. Nda tsapoo yusur pumaam amb ashiru wayarangsha.
Shiy ichinguru zar kungoo wir zangankush, zaw ashkachu, manginapsha naanaataraa ashkiya.
Zamizsha manginshuch anootssha kung waakanaya. Burrutam kayustan waaksin, wasachee imayungakanaya.
Kpurangamash kungumun wing kachuteersin, ixateersin, ngichtayarusin, iparinakanaya. Sheersin, mang' ksaksin yusakanaya. Yasinamunaw piz waziweeru kis yusakanaya.
Apaa, shaana shiy sinapat maacheetsi kchitamaam istaksha. Íwar taakush, anumandari shiy msasish kariytakchu, sin sinakchu, anpasha tsapoo kachachtaksha.
Pastootssha wakaraam, zamzeem watungash wanasir chirichiree yanungaksha. Mishat, chiy tputsich tatsumtarich, ansha tsapurunasish pzapaneechiya.
Yuw chiy tputsich katungkuch, wizpurireemich panaku kchitatarich, misha kizarun wakunguree waakuch, mangich kis taatarich. Mishat kizarun wakungur wayungunoo kasiru tsheetsich kapasarumcheekpaz ashkiya.
Libanush tsap shiy yasin washitanimash tatsumarangish, anshat xixpurish kungoo waaktamsinaya. Ashkusin, yasinsha kis taakanaya.
Anushsha yasin tsiripcheew pakcheew wipaam pzapanimaam ixatkanaya. Mishat, karsa yasinash pinosh sura taakanaya.
Machish íwar kaaparaw kayustan kis taakanaya. Mishat, patumbchish maachi pakchimash anshutam taakanaya.
Iyaam zareetstam, tsupeetstam táchimaam wayarangsha. Zarsha waana puku anoo yasariya.
Zar pshtuyaru, tapeeramchu, anushsha manginshuch shitungartakanaya.
Manginshuch tumuz yusaku, Apanllee tsiyatku atanaya. Zapan katungpani atusin, Apaa, Pananda, shiyaa atusin atanaya.
Itaru, zar sitataranllu, wapitam kanapkanaya. Wachushtam pshtuyarusin, wantsush maakanaya.
Anushsha tputs tarawaztamaam shitungartakanaya. Tapeekachsha tárawziree kasayarusin, kanuskanaya.
¿Wanip maacheetsi wanasir tinarangsha? Apaa. Yuw ichinguru wayarangish an shaana wizpurirpatish, misha yasashpatish, tinarangsha. Tsapurunasee tinarangish, anush tatsitarangsha.
Mishat, maree kung kapungu, waman, imur wayarangish an taariya. Maachi zapan kapungumash, pakchimashtam anush taakana. Táchimaam pinasa.
Anushsha marish bot naaktamanaya. Misha, anshutam maachi kapungumash puraw kis taakiya. Kis kungush michitku anootssha shiy kis napaksha.
Anshitisin, Apanll nuwaam katungsheemi panapanda, atusin, Apaa, shiyaam kutakanaya.
Shiy shaana, Neewa, tákchush, anootssha katungkanaya. Shiy kuwish paxayakpaz ashkush, anoo mang' ksakanaya. Kapung tazaz taakanaya.
Itaru Apaa, shaana zandkush, wizpurireetsish kanasakchush, uwshtisin kapung punikanaya. Shiy taárashee kasakchush, tsipakanaya. Sheersin, wanuts tsapoomtam kinakanaya.
Itaru, Apaa, shiy wizpuririrpatish taárasheem tapus ashkachush, wipsha kis kanungartakanaya. Ambi ashkush, tsapurunasee maachirit uru tanischichtar ashiksha, nuw shiyaa atina.
Ashiriya, Apanll wizpur ayamtaati pastacheeja; urutamari taachiya. Apanll waanaa tinamarineetsi napku, mang' kis ashkiya.
Apanll wizpurpa tsapurunasee napkachu, tsapsha shpuzakiya. Machee íwar patatkachu, machush psas tuwapeew shitungkiya.
Ashirucha, nuw ndatuma tsiparuri, kchitariti, Apanllireemi Taarashipaneem urutari yaseekuri taachima.
Ashiri yuw nuwaana chinaki anoo, shiysha, Apaa, nuwaa kis napanda, atina. Watam nuw shiyamunari wizpurirish mangi kis taakina.
Yutaritshishpani waani tsipachpa; pastachpa. Ayamamtiyam an ndusha taamaam izuuru pastachpa, Apaa, nuw shiyaa tina. Itaru nuwsha shiyaa, Taarashipanee, mangipti kis ungirtachima. Shiy kizpurtishcha. Apaa, ¡Yungpaktishcha! shiyaa atina.
Israelchichis, Apanllee, Wapparee tángints, atina. Apanllee ungirtakus, kukootstam tsapurunas ztaru tputsee kamaningtsa.
Apanllee ungirtakus seengtsa. Iyashchee istamaam ¿waninll Apanll wizpuree yámandaranguwa? Ashiriya, siysa tputsee kaman kaman shingints.
Tputsee kamankus, Iy Apanllirini Apanlliritcha kiki. Min Apanll wanindaja. Ashiri yuwis Apanllee chinakis anis, Apanllimunari mangini kis taayani, nuw siyaa atina.
Iy Apanllirini kizpurcha. Ashiriya, Apanllee masheeni. Ashkachuni, iyaa wanasiri napchiya.
¿Wanip iyashchee istaranga? ¿Tamaru iyashchee tapachindaranga? Mishat, waanaatsi kuk iyaam zanganirangu, ichinguru anoo mbizamaam wanindaja.
Iy Aprahamarinchichtanicha. Akoparinchichtamanicha. Apanll iyaa waama tiptsireem ipusarangu, iysha Apanllinandarishtini tiptsir taakaniya. Ashiriya, siysa nuwaa kuki mazinangtsa:
Apanll Taarashipani iyaana Aparini waanpatatari wizpur tsapurunasee ksutkiya.
Zitaminarineetsini tsiyatarangu; Nuwaa kuki payukinaareesa, nuwsha izuuru istachintspa. Siyaa ayamtaatiya kasacheezee, tárangu, anoo mbizcheeja, ndambaree.
Aprahamarinpa tsiyatarangu, kuk nda pastamaam zurampatari tsiyatarangiya. Anumunsha Isaakarineetstam tsiyatarangiya.
Sheeru, Israelarineetstam tsiyatarangu, Nuw shiyaam Kanaanaa tsap panachintspa, shiyachich tputs anush urutari taamaama, Apanll tárangiya.
<range>
Zitaminarini Israelchich tputs machin anush taaranganaya. Kanaanaa tsap nda amuytaranganaya.
Uru xitangat ashkuni, minup tputs watsapun taarangsin, minupsha tputs watsapun taaratarshin ashtaranaya. Min kurak iyashchee istaku, minshat kurak istaku, ashtaranaya.
Itaru, xitangat ashirangtaatani, Apanll iyachchee tputs kapung ksutarangiya, tputs nda natsamaama. Watam Apanll waana kurakaa,
Nuwaa tputsiri mantsir tsiyatintspa. Nuwaa kuki kamanimapanee kiyung yacharintspa, táranguwa.
Apanll anpur Kanaanush tsap maringamaam wayarangiya. Izuurumamari iwariz maringarangiya.
Itaru, Apanllsha wasina Osiyarinee iyashchee tapachindamaam ipusarangiya. Israelarini wip zoonllee Osiyaa natsayarusin, tputseem muchchur kurikpa tupaxanxarangana.
Osiyarini Ijiptosh tsap taarangu, anpur tputs Osiyarinee kiyung yacharanganaya. Tumanshishush wantsush tumanaranganaya.
Itaru, Apanll Osiyarinee ambtaa ashirangu, yuwartatam Osiyarini nllurtama pamazurangu, zoonllee kamanirangu, anuritam tatsamoorangiya.
Osiy wand tumanshishush taarangu, Ijiptshuch tputs kurak, yuw zapan tputsee ksutarangu, an wasundururee Osiyaa tashitungamaam kamachtarangiya.
Ashiri kuraksha Osiyaa waama istamaam ínarangiya. Shiysha nuwaa tputsiri ksutangcha. Mishat, maacheewaatstatam ksutangcha, tárangiya.
Ashiri Osiysha kurakaa wipunashee, istampaneetstam ichingaroo yasashee zapan yapstarangiya.
Anumunsha iwaz zitaminarini, Israel wipapat Ijiptop tsap naataranganaya. Anush tunarish Ijiptosh watsapun kuseersin taaranganaya.
Ambtaa ashirangu, itaru Apanllsha iyashchee istarangu, wip izapaneeranganaya. Kizpureew taaranganaya. Ijiptoshchee tputs kasiru taaranganaya.
Ashirucha, Ijiptoshuchsha tputs; Iyaa kasiruneepa, atusin, iyashchee natsaksin, kiyung yacharanganaya.
Ashiriya, Apanllsha Móysisarinee, Aaronarineetstam tapachindampaneem ipusarangu, tiptsiree tapachindamaam zanganirangiya.
Móysissha, zoonllpa Aaronpa, Ijiptosh tsap Apanllee wizpur tuyamandarangusin, tputsee tpuxtaranganaya.
Apanllsha Ijiptosh tsap zaree kzatarangu, tuneeramach ashirangtaa, itaru Ijiptoshuchsha tputs Apanllee kuk payumaam ngataranganaya.
Apanll kungoo zángana kuraseem ínarangu, anumun kayupichsha pchingarangiya.
Ashiri Apanllsha yusur purumburoo zanganirangu, ashchiri yaktash tatsitarangiya. Kurakshutam pang' tatsitarangiya.
Anumunsha, Apanll yusur yáyanlleetssha, mishat manxootstam zanganirangu, ashchiri Ijiptosh tsap shuneeranganaya.
Anumunsha, sinaatssha pachindarangu, itaru siseetssha ashcheew patumbich kapungumash zanganirangiya. Sheeru, mamarootstam zanganirangu, mamarshat kizpur mamartarangu, puuj ashirangu, tsapoo muchirangiya.
Amb ashirangu, Ijiptoshuch mazar tatsumma tpachingarangiya. Mishat, yasinaatssha ichipeeru muchirangtamta.
Anumunsha, yusur putindaree zanganirangu, putindarsha zapan parat ashirangu,
wanusee tatsumma, manginawaatstam war, chirichireewaatstam war kapzingta, kapzingta ashirangu, waroo kachingaranganaya.
Anumunsha, yusur tsipatsimasheetssha Ijiptoshchee wip iwachiztamaw tsipamaam wayarangiya. Ashchiri tsap shuneerangiya.
Aship ashirangu, Ijiptoshchee zapan yachayaranllu, sheeru wizpurpa tiptsireetssha Ijiptoo tsap tashitungayaranllu, machtarangiya. Ijiptoshchee urkir, oroo mburshimasheetstam, oroo chumbeepimasheetstam zapan yáyarusin, naataranganaya. Nda pakchiyam xararanganaya. Mapiyrsin ksanandari naataranganaya.
Naatarangsin, Ijiptoshuch tputs mang' ksarangusin, napataranll ashirangana, watam iyashchee puniranganawa.
Zitaminarinsha tsap puzap naatarangsin, kaschir naamaam Apanll psaspa zaree kámanarangiya. Psaansha naamaam sumas kizpur tuwasineemaam wayarangitamta.
Katungtseemsha Apanllee masharangsin, katamsheetssha zamzee panarangitamta. Katungats íwarpichee kis katungkusin, tazaz taaranganaya.
Kungsha pishtarangu, Móysisarinsha tushuwshishpa patumbchee tuw ashirangu, Apanllsha kungoo patumbchish tashitungarangu, zaw wir ashirangu, kungsha tsap puzawpitaa naantangatamach ashirangiya.
Mishat, Apanll yuwaa tiptsirpa Aprahamarinpa piy ashtachima, tárangu anoo nda pakchiyam mbizarangiya. Izuuru tuminurangiya.
Waana tiptsiree Ijiptosh tsap tapachindarangu, tashitungarangu, tputssha shitungeerandsin, zamangakatarat, ashiranganaya. Mang' ksaksin shambataranganaya.
Apanll waana tiptsireem nllitaritaa tputs watsapun panarangu, uwshtisin anoo itutseersin, mazareewaatstam, tatsumawaatstam, wanuseewaa ichinguru zitaminarineem panarangiya.
Itaru, Apanll ashkachu; Papcha, Waneeyantspa. Nuwaa kuki izuuru payungtsa. Mishat, nuwaa tayaspatamaree tuminungtsa, tárangu, watsapuneem panarangiya. Apaa, ¿shiy wizpurish tamara? Apaa, ¡Yungpaktishcha! shiyaa atiniya.
















































Apanllee, wapparee, tángints, watam minamari wanasiriwa. Urutamari iyaa chinaku taakiya.
Apanllpa tsiyatkuni, amb táyani. Watam kundararini iyaa kasirangitaateesinaya, pseertartaatini taaranguni, Apanll iyaa yanpuyaru, iyaamshutam tsapunni wayarangiya. Yap zar yaku ambtam, yap zar puku ambtam, yap zar puwachingarattu ambtam taaranguni, Waana Apanll yanpuyaru, tsapunishtam wayarangiya.
<range>
Iyashuch tputs ashpatam masarsin, Tsap puzap tputs ndunarip xixtarashin, ashiranganaya. Yap ngoots ndunarip, yaktatam ndunari ambtam naataranganaya.
Mariz kayatarangsin, sachitarangtamsin, Marizimun pakchim tsipamaam pshataranganaya.
Kapung puniksin, tsipatureema, atusin, Apanllee kuruzuranganaya. Apaa, Istanda, táranganaya. Apanllsha mazinarangu, kapung istarangiya.
Yapsha ngoots wanasiri ambsha machtarangiya.
Ashiriya Apanllee, Wapparee, táyani, yuwamand iyaa kapung istarangu anumanda. Watam iyaa uru istaranguwa.
Tputs sachitkusin, wasachee imayungakiya. Katungtsee kapung panarangitamta.
Mishat, iyashchi tputs tunimushpaz taaksina, ashirusin kiyung kachiyaranganaya. Putám kateenpa kamurim tamaparee ashirusin, mang' kapung kiyung kachiyaranganaya.
Apanllee kuk kapung ngatkusin, nda mazinarangana. Taarashipan wamaritaa kasiku, anootstaa kuk ngatarangsin, Watsta. ¿Chak ashishtapa? tárangana.
Ashiri Apanllsha tsiyantarangu, Israelshuchee tputs tumuchchurtamaam wayarangiya. Taárashee yutari wayarangiya. Ashirangu, zarnasimun pakchim tsipamaam pishtarangana, ¿Watam tputs istampan ndunarimunawa?
Itamsamaam pinasaksin, ¿Chakaja iyaa istach? atusin, Apanllee kuruzuranganaya. Apaa, Istanda, táranganaya. Apanllsha mazinarangu, iyaa nayaniku, tapachindarangiya.
Sheeru, iyaanpee tsapunni kanapumaam ngoots wanasiripsha yámandarangiya.
Ashiriya Apanllee, Wapparee, táyani, yuwamand iyaa kapung istarangu anumanda. Watam iyaa uru istaranguwa.
Iy tumanampaz ashiruni taarangtaatini, tumanshish wach ngusambpapaz tinama ashiru, anoo Apanll ichipambayaru, iyaa tashitungarangiya.
Mishat, iy zitaminarini ashpatam Apanllee kuk kapeetarangsin, waanamandari yutaritshishirini, mang' ndunpaz ashiranganaya. Kizpur wanguytarangusin, kiyung kachiyarangsin,
tsipamaam zandakusin, katungtsee tsachiyaksin, kataranganaya.
Waanaatsee tapachindamaam pinasarangana. Tsipataruneepa atusin, Apanlleetssha, Apaa, shiyamari istamaam waritaksha. Istangcha iyaatsi, táranganaya. Apanllsha nayanirangu,
tsiyatarangu, Yarchintspa, tárangiya. Tárangu, wánguyar tsipatsimasheetstaa arap kapeetarangiya.
Ashiriya Apanllee, Wapparee, táyani, yuwamand iyaa kapung istarangu anumanda. Watam iyaa uru istaranguwa.
Ashiri chineetsis putayarus, Apanllip pang' machtayarus, muchingints. Sheerus, Apanllee Wapparee, tángints. Mangis ksanandari tputsee, ¿Apanll wanip iyaa istaka? Uru kapung istakiya, tángtsa.
Mishat, iy zitaminarini ashpatam marip mus kapungumaship xiyranganaya. Maachiritaa tupaxanxangatu, minup tsap naatarangsin,
Mus apusanand Apanllee tínamarini parangusin, kapung puniranganaya.
Apanll kambusuroo kamachtaku, tárangiya. Kizpur kambustangcha. Ashkachush, kungsha kizpur warastachpa, tárangiya. Tárangu, mussha kapung kizpur warastarangu, íwar manginaa káchingkaru, zaw zaw ántaru, pzachtataru, íwar kárirataraa, yusursha wantsush imurip karuwataraa, yusursha kárirataraa ashtar ashirangiya. Anoo tputs parangusin, kapung napuxtaranganaya. Tsipachpachee, tárangana.
<range>
Watam mus kizpur warastarangu, bot tawinintara, tawinintara ashirangu, naamam wanasir pinasaranganawa. Tputs karusam naaku tamartarpari ashirusin naataranganaya.
Itaru, amb ashku anoo parangusin, kapung puniksin, Apanllee tsiyatkusin, táranganaya. Apaa, iyaa istangcha. Tapachindangcha, tárangusin, Apanllsha istarangiya.
Kapungtaa warastarangu, kambusursha zanayataramach ashirangu, warassha achtamarisha maras, maras, ashishtaramach ashirangiya.
Waras zanaramchu, anoo parangusin, mang' ksaranganaya. Apanll ashirangu, waana tputsee machtarangu, yap patusis wanasiri paramashtaru annung matayaranganaya.
Ashiriya Apanllee, Wapparee, táyani, yuwamand iyaa kapung istarangu anumanda. Watam iyaa uru istaranguwa.
Shaniyeeruni, Apanllee kurakareetsini ungirtayani.
Yuwamand tputs yutarit taarangana, anumand Apanll waana kamachtaku, yuwaatstaa kung shungshungtaru anootstaa puzarangiya. Tsapootstam tayutariteeyaru, tatsumirangsin, nda pakchiyam wanasir kxoonarangiya.
<range>
Itaru, yuwshat tputs Apanllee kuk payurangana, anshitisin tsap puzamunaatstaa, wanasireemsha wayarangiya. Anumunsha, kungoots wanasir shungshungtaru wayarangitamta.
Tputs ichtaru marizimun kiyung kachiyarangana, anshitisin pangoo kapung pangupangu ashirangsin, yaktaamsha kinarangiya.
Sheeru, mazareemsha kizarunaa wanusi tatsumeersin, pzapaneerangusin, zapan wanusee pusaranganaya.
Waana Apanll istaku, ashirangiya. Wipaatstamsin pzapaneeranganaya. Anumunsha, chinuzee wakaraatstam pzapaneeranganaya.
Wandtaatiya tputs chawap tsipakchusin, misha wakararinitam tsipakchu, pakchimsha katuchkachu, anootssha tputs natsampansha kiyung yachakchu, yuwamand tputs mang' mantsaksin, tanukana, anumand
Apanllsha natsampanee wanichiya. Tsap puzap, ngoots ndunarip, apusap zanganchiya. Ambiri yutaritshishpan masataru izuuru pastachiya.
Tputs pukir kiyung kachiyku, anoo Apanll pakchu, kapung istachiya. Yap nda chinaru amb Apanll wipaamsha pzapanimaam, misha maachiritam pzapanimaam istachiya. Opeej ashiru wip zapan turutut, turutut ashtachiya.
Anootssha pakchusin, yuw tputs Apanllee kuk payuku, tuminku, anshtisin mang' ksachinllinaya. Yutaritshishpansha tputs anoo pakchusin, paziksin, kuk mbamatakpaz ashtachpasinaya.
Manguriri tputs anoo pakchusin, mangush chinaku, uru yuwaa Apanll tputsee chinaku anoo yasachpasinaya.













































Apanll Taarashipan nuwaa kurakari, waanaatsi ipusamarini, tárangiya; Shiy ningich mbutsunungich k'xinangcha. Nuwsha kundarareetsish kasiyeeruri, tpachingachima, tárangiya.
Ashiriya kurakaa, Apanll shiyaam waanaatsi wizpur kundarareetsish kasimaam panachu, shiysha mach Siyonamand kizpur kurak shiyamari kasiru taangcha. Ashiriya, kundarareetsish ksingcha, atina.
Tapazeemsha waritakchu, Siyonash mach shiysha, Kasiyeeni, tákchush, tputsirishtish, Ayu, táchinllinaya; Anush kanungas wizpur ashirush nizcheezish, ndambaree.
Apanll waana zurampatari shiyaa kasimaam wayarangu, nllitari ndusha chinachiya. Shiy Melkisarin tamapari ashirush urutamari apanllpan urkar taachsha, ayamamtiyam nda pastamaama, Apanll shiyaa tárangiya.
Apanll shiyaam tuwizpurtamaam washunand mbutsinungich naachiya. Ashkachu, kundarareetsish waneeyarush, kurakaatstam ichingaru kasiyarush tpachingachsha.
Tsapurunasee kurak ztaru, tpachingayarush, tputseetssha, minchichee tputs, minchichee tputs ashiru ichinguroo waneeyarush tsiparee washunand xanatatsha.
Sheerush, arangeem tapazeem naakchush, ngootsush kungoo waakchush, yusur wizpurireetsish tuwizpurtachiya, Dapiyarini yaseeku, Apanllee ipusamarini tárangiya.





































Apaa, tputs nda iyaa ungirtachinllinpa; shiyaatsimari ungirtachinllinpa. Watam shiyamari tputsee izuuru chinakshawa. Shiyamari shaanaatsi kukish tatsamooksha.
Min tputs iyaa staksin, ¿Siy Apanlliris yapeeja? Iy pakeezini, atanaya.
Itaru, shiysha Apaa, kanindush shiyamari kasiru taaksha. Shiy yuwaa shaana zandkish anoo tinaksha.
Minshuch tputs waama apanllirini tinakanaya. Ur chumbeepimashpa, misha ur mburshimashpatatam tinakanaya. Uwpatari tinakanaya.
Kuk taaritaa, itaru nda tsiyatkanaya. Wach taaritaa, itaru nda pakanaya.
Wits taaritaa, itaru nda mazinakanaya. Ship taaritaa, itaru nda ishingkanaya.
Uw taaritaa, itaru nda patatkanaya. Wats taaritaa, itaru nda naakanaya. Wayarpunush nda pakchiyam zunganeekiya.
Tputs waama apanllirini tinayarusin, anumun mang' tatkanaya. Itaru, tinam tamapari ashirusin, mangsharitssincha, nuw shiyaa Apaa, atina.
Ashiri siynaa Israelchichis, Apanllimunari mangis tatungtsa. Apanlltanda iyaa istaku, ksutku.
Siy apanllpanis, Apanllimunari mangis tatungtsa. Apanllcha iyaa istaku, ksutkiya.
Siysa ichingurus yuwis Apanllee chinakis anis, Apanllimunari mangis tatungtsa. Apanllcha siyaa istaku, ksutkasha, atina.
Apanll iyaa chinakiya. Iyaa mbizamaam wanindaja. Uru istachiya. Iyaa Israelchichineetsini ichingaru ksutkiya. Apanllpaneetstam ksutkiya.
Wachinawaatstam, nllurawaatstam ichingaru tputs yuwaa Apanllee chinakana anoo, Apanll uru istachiya.
Ipartamtis, mishat chinllinitamtis uru izapanichiya.
Apanll Taarashipan yuw waana kaninda, misha tsapootstam tinarangu an siyaam uru istachintsa.
Apanll kanindap taakiya. Itaru, iyaamsha tputseemani tsapoo ksutamaam wayarangiya.
Yuw tputs tsiparangana an nda Apanllee ungirtakanaya. Izuuru zaputar ashkanaya.
Itaru, yuwshtini nda tsiparini, anshtini Uru Apanllee kis ungirtakuni taakaniya. Apaa, ¡Yungpaktishcha! shiyaa atiniya.
Apanllee nuw chinakina, watam, Apaa, istanda aturi, nuwaa mazinakchu istakuwa.
Nuw urutari Apanllee mashkuri taachina. Watam nuwaa mazinakuwa.
Tsipats nuwaa izuuru kasimaam waritarangu, kapung puniranguri; Tsipatureema, táranguri, itamsamaam pinasarangina.
Ashiranguri, nuwsha, Apaa, shiy taarashipantishcha. Nuwaa taarashi tapachindandama, táranguri, Apanllsha nuwaa tapachindarangiya.
Apanll iyaa taarasheetsini itsinsartaa yasaku, itaru iyaa nayanikiya. Apanll Taarashipan chinampancha.
Tputs waanaatsi tapachindamaam pinasakitaa, itaru Apanllsha uru ksutkiya. Nuw wizpuriri ndunnaar taarangi Apanllsha nuwaa tapachindarangiya.
Apanll nuwaa kapung istarangu, ashirucha, nuwsha yusur nda punikuri, mapiyruri taakina.
Nuwaa tsipani tapachindarangiya. Tsipamaam punikuri, kapung tanuranguri, itaru Apanllsha nuwaa istarangu yararangiya.
Ashiriya, nuwsha urutari nish tsapurunasush taakuri, Apanllee kuk tuminchima.
Nuwaam xarashish kapung taarangtaa, itaru Apanllimun mangi taturangina.
Tputsimun mangich tatumaam wanindaja. Ichingurusin tputs wayangichirirsincha.
Itaru, Apanll ¿wanip nuwaa istaranga? ¿Maypata nuw Apanllee tuwapachi? Tuwapamaam pinasakina.
Itaru, itsinsaru Apanllee tachitkuri, misha, Wappari Apaa, aturi, tuwapakpaz ashkina.
Mishat, yuwaa, Apanllee; Shiyaam ashtachparina, tárangi, anoo tiptsirpata shaniykuni, itsinsaru k'keetsi tatsamchima.
Apanll waana tiptsir tsipakchu, kiyung kachiyku, anungaz kapung mangu mantsakiya.
Shiyaa chinakina, Apaa. Nuw shiycha kamachtashish. Aneeri shiyaa kapung chinaku, ashiritam nuw shiyaa chinakina. Nuw tsipamaam pakich pishtaranguri, shiysha nuwaa tapachindarangsha.
Ashiri shiyaam, Apaa, chinuzee pachayaruri, shiyash sumish muchima. Sheeruri, shiyaatsimari ungirtachima.
Shiyashchi tputs shiyash pangish tipuranllizush shaniykatssin, anush nuw izuuru k'keetsi, yuw shiyaa tsiyatarangi, anoo tuminchima. Uru Irusarinush shiyaa ungirtakuri taachima. Apaa, ¡Yungpaktishcha! atiniya shiyaatsi.
<range>


Apanllee, Apaa, Wapparee, táyani, watam Apanll wanasirimshiwa. Urutamari iyaa chinakiya.
Siy Israelchichis, Apanll iyaa urutamari chinakiya, tángtsa.
Mishat, siy apanllpanis, Apanll iyaa urutamari chinakiya, tángtamtsa.
Mishat, siy tputsis yuwis Apanllee chinakis anis, Apanll iyaa urutamari chinakiya, tángtamtsa. Ichingarus Apanllimun shambatangtsa.
Nuwaam xarashish kapung taarangu, Apanllee, Apaa, istanda, táranguri, Apanllsha nuwaa mazinarangu, tapachindarangiya.
Apanll uru nuwash taakiya. Ashirucha, nuwsha tputsee nda puniki. ¿Chakaja nuwaa kasiku kasich? Pinasakanaya.
Apanll nuwapa ipunkiya. Uru nuwaa istakiya, Tputs nuwaa natsaktaa, Pachayani, atitaatssin, Apanllsha nuwamari kasimaam wayachiya.
Apanllimunari mangich tatumaam waritariya. ¿Mayaamaja tputsimun mangich tatchich?
Apanllimunari mangich tatumaam waritariya, atina. Tputs kizpuritaa taaksin, ¿mayaamaja uwamun mangich tatchich?
Minchich tputs nuwaa pachamaam turipungarangusin, Pachapani tárangitaatssin, Itaru, nuwsha Apanllimun wizpur nuwamarisha kasirangina.
Izuuru zapan nuwaa turipungarangusin, itaru Apanllimun wizpur nuwamari ichingaroo kasirangina.
Zan ashirusin, zapan nuwaa turipingarangana. Itaru, sumas kpaa muchtaru ashiruri, Apanllimun wizpur nuwamari ichingaroo kasirangina.
Wizpurpa nuwaa kasimaam, izuuru tupantsamaam zandarangtaatssin, itaru Apanllsha waanpata wizpur nuwaa tapachindarangiya.
Apanll nuwaa kasimaam tuwizpurtarangiya. Ashirucha, nuwsha na Apanllee yaseekuri, ungirtakuri taakina. Apanll watacha tapachindampani.
Apanll tiptsir waanshu pang' Apanllimun shamangaksin, Apaa, shaanpata wizpurirish iyaa tapachindarangush, iyamari kasiranginiya. Shiy, Apaa, kizpurtishcha, atanaya.
Apanll waanpata wizpur wamari kasikiya. Minamtiyam tputs ashimaam wanindaja.
Ashiriya, nuw nda tsipachina. Izuuri taachina. Tputsee, ¿Wanip Apanll nuwaa istaranga? tákchuri, tputsee ichinguru kamanchina.
Apanll nuwaa kapung waneerangitaa, itaru nda tsipamaam wayarangiya.
Ashiri nuwaam Apanll pang' wach tawatangcha. Nuwsha pshtuyaruri Apanllee, Wappari tápi, atina.
Iy Apanllchichini Apanllish pang' pshtuyaruni, anush Apanllpat ipunchiniya.
Ashirucha, nuwsha shiyaa, Apaa, wappari, atina, watam shiy nuwaa kuki mazinarangush, nuwaa tapachindarangshawa.
Siyaa Apanllchicheetsis k'kuzee napuxtamashee kamanchintspa. Panguspan tputs panguksin, patumbchee wanasiriwaatstaa yaksin, itaru; Annaa wanasireeja, tárangusin, kapeetaranganaya. Ashiritaa, Apanllsha patumbchee ipuseeru, zurampatari wanasir wayarangiya. Natunaa kizpur wanasiri pashuchima, Apanll tárangiya.
Apanlltanda ashirangu atuni, ¿Tamaru Apanll kizpur wanasir ashiranga? táchiniya.
Apanllsha ashirangu, na in zar iyaa tapachindayanlliya. Ashiri iysha shiyamun Apaa, mangini kis shambatkiniya.
Apaa, iyaa izuuru tapachindangcha. Iyaam wanasiri taamaam istangcha, atiniya.
Shaana ipusamarineetsish iyaam zangankush wanasiri napangcha. Sheerush, iysha shiyash pangish shaniyeeruni, iyaatstam wanasiri napangcha, atina.
Apanll Taarashipan wamari kasiru taakiya. Iyaa mangeetsini tuwasinichiya. Ashiri Apanllimun shambateeni. Masharoo war kuyaruni, Apanllish pangu pshtuyaruni, Apanllip suma wakara witsip xanatchinipa, atina.
Apaa, shiyaa, Wappari, atina. Shiyamari kasiksha, Shiyaa nuw Apareetseeruri, ungirtakina.
Shiy Apaa, kizpur wanasirtishcha. Shiy urutamari iyaa chinaksha. Ashiri ichinguruni, shiyaa Apaa, Wappari, atiniya.
































































































Tamaru nuw shiyaa kukish chinakina, Apaa. Ichinguru zar shiyaa kukish chinakuri taakina.
Uru shiyaa kamachtamarish kis payukina. Kamachtamareetsish kapung yasakuri, mangiptarti itsinsaru chinakina. Kundarari nda ashkanaya. Ashiriya, kundarareetsi kasiru mangoonkina.
Kamachtamareetish uru chinachintar ashkuri, mayistorootstaa kasiru mangoonkitamana.
Tputsee wachinawaatstaa, kasiru mangoonkitamana, watam shiyaa kukish tuminkinawa.
Shiyaa kukish izuuru mangipti payupi aturi, yutaritshishireetsi izuuru kasarangina.
Shiy shaana Apaa nuwaa tayaspataksha. Ashiriya, shiyaa kukish kasacheezi, ndambaree.
Watam shiy chinashish kizpur wanasircha. Mishat, kama kinduraa wayar waakuch, kizpur kisa an tamapari ashiriya nuwaama shiy kukish. Shiyamun kukish mangi kisa.
Shiy kukish nuwaa itsinsaru chinamaam tayapstakiya. Ashiri tputs yutarit taaku an nuwaam kizpur yutarita.
Shiy kukish mbarinpaz ashiru shiyaa itsinsaru tachitamaam ktsishtamti naamaam tuwasineekiya.
Shiyaa Apaa, sirú tárangina: Shiy kukish wanasirimishcha. Ashiri izuuru payuchima, táranguri, anoomari chinakina.
Apaa, kapung kiyung kachiykina. Itaru shiysha, Nuw uru ksutchinllpa, tárangsha. Ashiri taarasheetsi ksutanda, Apaa.
Shiyaa ungirtakuri, shiysha nuwaa kuki kis mazinangcha. Shiy uru nuwaa itsinsaru tayaspataksha. Ashiri mangeetsi p'tseengcha, mangipti taamaama.
Yutaritshishpan tputs nuwaa pachamaam zandkusin, uru nuwash xarashish wayakanaya. Itaru, nuwsha shiyamun kukish mangi tatkina. Kasacheezi, ndambaree.
<range>
Shiy shaanaatsi kukish uru nuwaam istamaam panarangsha. Ashiri mangishi payukuri, mangi ksakina.
Ashiriya, urutamari izuuru tsipatspatari shiyaa kukish chinapi atina. Kasacheezi, ndambaree.
















Shiy kukish Apaa, kizpur wanasircha. Ashirucha, nuw shiyaa kukish izuuru payukina.
Shiyaa kukish tputs tayaspataku, wazareetsiri tputsee mang' p'tseekiya. Tputs sirú nduntaa mazinarangu, mangoonamaam kamiranshita.
Nuwsha anungazimari mazinamaam zandkina. Uru kis mazinakina.
Shiysha Apaa, uru tputsireetsish chinaksha. Ashiri nuwaa nayanikush istanda.
Shiyaa kukish uru payumaam nda kapeetamaam istanda. Yutaritshish nuwaa kasirundama, átana.
Tputs nuwaa, Pachayani, atusin, ashiri shiysha Apaa tapachindanda. Nuw shiyaa kukish izuuru tuminpi atina.
Nuwaa chinampa wanasiri napangandama. Shaanaatsi kukish aranginasha nuwaa tayaspatangandama.
















































Apaa, íwar machip napkuri, ¿chakaja nuwaa istachinda? atina.
Itaru, shiysha Apaa, nuwaa istaksha, watam shiy kanindaa mishat tsapootstam tinarangshawa, atina.
Ashiri siysa Apanllchichis, mazinangantsa nuwaa kuki; Yuwash naakish anush Apap siyaa pantsatpa átu, patsisakiya. Siyaa uru ksutkiya. Psaantam, kaschiritam uru ksutkiya. Watam Apanll maamaam nda yasaruwa. Uru iyaa Israelchicheetsini ksutataw ashku taakiya. Kaschir kizpuritaa zar zatku, ksaneeku nda siyaa kasikiya. Psaansha tsup tuwasineektaa, nda siyaa tayutaritkiya.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Apanll Taarasheetsis uru ksutkiya. Yutaritshish tushiyku anootstam tapachindakiya.
Shitungachus, Apap uru napkitamta. Kanapkachus uru napkitamta. Ashku, siyaa urutamari ksutkiya. Ayamtaati kasacheeja, ndambaree, átana nuwaya.
Tputs nuwaa, Natu, pzaya. Apanllip pang' naayani, atusin, nuw mangi kis, Ayu, pzaya, tárangina.
Yakat Irusarinush pshtukamchuni; Na kuseenicha, mangini kis atiniya.
Iyaam Israelchicheemani shaniymaam Irusarinaa panguranganaya.
Sirútama Apanll iyashchee kamachtarangu, Uru shaniykus, nuwaa ungirtangtsa, tárangu, anush iysha Israelchichini ichingaruni shaniyeeruni, Apanllee ungirtakaniya.
Kurak Dapiyash pang' k'kuzee yaramaam shaniykanaya, tputsee itsinsaru istamaama.
Ashiri siysa, yuwis nish shaniykis anis, zurampatari mangiptis Apanllee tsiyatkus, Irusarinush uru mapiyshish taachpa. Apaa, shiy tputsirish uru nish kis taachinllinpa, tángcha.
Nimun tputs kisshapari tandapunuzish taachiya. Tputs izuurasha mapiyrsin kurakush pang' taachinllinpa. Undarar kasitpa, Apanllee tsiyatkus tángtsa.
Nuw nimun zuwanlleetsi, misha amikureetsi táchima; Na nimun mangis kisshapari mapiyrus taatssa.
Pangusimun yaanamuni Apanllirini pang' anumunari mapiyrus taangtsa, atina. Anuri chinangtsa, átana.




Iyaa Israelchicheetsini Apanll ndunnaari istarangu, iy ndunnaarpariniya. Anoo siy ichingarus yasaksa.
Apanll iyashchee ndunnaari istarangu, kundararini iyaa tpachingayarinaapsinaya, kasaranganaya.
Iyaa kapung natsarangusin, izuurinaapari watstamari iyaa ashpaatsiritini kachingaranganaya.
Kung ashirinaapsinaya iyamun kushini zaw sheersin, izuuru iyaa arap kapeetaranganaya.
Kungushpaz imurish ashiruni iy yangaranginiya.
Ashiri, Apaa, Wappari, atiniya. Watam iyaa ndunnaari istarangush, kundararini izuurinaapari iyaa nutsini tachuwiyarusin, watsiyunpa kasaranganaya.
Itaru, shiy iyaa istarangush, xarashee kamungaranganiya. Maachi zamiz mirpanzee izicheeru, kamungtaru ashiruni, iy xarashee kamungaranganiya.
Apanll Taarashipani, yuw kanindaa tinarangu, mishat tsapootstam tinarangu, an iyaa tapachindarangiya. Ashiri Apanllimunari mangini tatkiniya.





Apanll iyaa; Waptam Irusarinap kanapungints, tárangu, iysha, Pamazookpariniya, táranguni, mangini ksaranginiya.
Mangini kizpur ksaranguni, siriptini kis yasiyastar ashiranganiya. Minshuchtisin tputs iyaa naparangsin; Apanllpari kapung istarangiya, táranganaya.
Zurkusin táranganaya. Apanll iyaa kizpur wanasiri istarangu, waana iyaam mangooz ksashish panarangiya. Ashirucha, mangini ksaranginiya.
Apaa, iyaa tsapuni kizpur wanasir yusur yánischingi, tsapunshi wanasir kxunamaama. Yusur sin sinakchu, ichinguru wanasir kxunchiya.
Tputs kiyung kachiykusin, tanuktaatssin, mazarish tatsumirangana, anootssha mang' kissha pusachinlliniya. Mang' kis pusayarusin, yasimpatari pangup kanapchinllinaya.
<range>
Apanll tputsee tarawzupani ndunnaar tuwizpurtaku, tputssha waanpata wizpurini nda pangumaam waritakiya. Apanll yaktaa nda ksutamaam istaku, tsangampansha tputs mangutari ksutkanaya.
Mishat, Apanll ndunnaar tputsee mzatspani istaku, mangutari kiyung kachiykiya. ¿Mayaamsa punirustayarus, Marizpa, átus, zar wazuran tarawaztakus, tapitaranllu kasaksa? Ngutaritis saanaatsee kiyung yachakus ashiksa. Watam Apanll tiptsiree chinaku, ksutku, kanusshisheem wayaranguwa.
Apanll tputseem wipaa zapan panaku, an kizpur wanasiricha.
Kanungas wipaa iparinaku, wipsha kanungaseeyarusin, wásap tamapari ashiru waparee tapazeem tapachindachinllinaya.
An tputs wip zapan taaru, mang' kis mapiyru taachiya. Undararsha yutarit tsiyatku, tputssha wipapat tasaskachu, punicheeja, ndambaree. Kurakaa nda paziku, itsinsaru tsiyatchiya.














Zurampatari mangipti Apaa, shiyaa kuruzkina. Mangi kapung mantsakina.
Apaa, nuwaa kuki mazinangandama. Nayaningandama. Yutaritshishireetsi tchingangandama.
Apaa, shiy iyaa yutaritshishirineetsini kirakarishish yandaranginaareesha, nda mbizakush, ¿chakaja shiyash pshtuch?
Itaru, shiyamaricha yutaritshishirineetsini yaramaam waritaksha. Shiyaatsimari chinakaniya.
Ashiri Apaa, shiyangzimari mangiptarti kutakina. Apaa, yaranganda, watam shiy, Mangeetsish tachingchinllpa, tárangshawa.
Ashirucha, nuwsha shiyaam kutakina. Yaktashuch ksutamapan psaan kutaksin, uru tarasitan ashkana, nuwsha ashiritamti shiyaam kutakina, nuw atina.
Ashiri siysa Israelchichis, Apanllimun mangis tatkus k'tangtamtsa, nuw tamakparina shingtamtsa. Watam Apanllimari iyaa chinaku, izuuru tapachindakuwa. Ashkachu, izuuru Apanllpatarisha kis taatssa.
Iyaa Israelchicheetsini yutaritshishirinee ichinguru yarchiya, nuw siyaa atina.










































































Babiloniyash tsap kungumun wing washunand kuxineeruni, Apanllingaz pang' mach Siyonangaz chinayaruni, tanuranginiya.
Yasinamunsha wapzar kitararineetsini kayxuranguni, kasaranginiya.
Babiloniyashuchsha wasundurur, yuw iyaa putayarusin machirangsin, muchchureem ínarangana an iyaatssha: Natu, siy Siyonshuchis, Apanllireetsis yaseengints. Mangis kis yaseengints, iyaa táranganaya.
Itaru, iysha ¿nitaati nish tputsish watsapun Apanllee kis yasicheezini? Pinasakaniya.
¿Tamaree Irusarinaa mbizachini? Mbizakinaareeniya, shiysha Apaa, iyaa waneengcha. Kuweetsini mbutsunungich mayapshingcha, ayamtaati nda kitartamaama, misha neepureetsini tpatstangtamcha, ayamtaati nda mangini kis yasimaama.
<range>
Babiloniyashuch wasundurur Irusarinush pshturangusin, misha Edomshuchsha tputs pshturangitamsina. Iyaa natsaksin, Babiloniyashchee; Natu, pangoo ichingaru pátang pátang sheerus, ksangtsa, táranganaya. Ashiri shiysha Apaa, anoo mbizarinllpa. Izuuru Edomshuchee waneengcha, átana.
Mishat, siyaa Babiloniyashcheetsis, Apanll izuuru wanichiya. Kundararis siyash kuskatssin, siyaa watstamari kasichinllinaya. ¿Siy waninll iyaa kiyung yacharangsawa? Ashiri kundararis siyash kuskachusin, tatsamooru siyaatstam kiyung yachachtamsinaya.
Ipareetstamtis putayarusin, patumbchimun tpuw tpuw shimbayarusin, pachambeersin kasachinllinaya. Yungpari ashchinllinaya.








Apaa, shiy nuwaa mangi yasaksha. Shiy nuwaa taarashi yasaktamsha.
Ichinguru ashki anoo yasaktamsha; Ichinguru chinaki anoo yasaktamsha.
Yuwaa naaki anoo yasaktamsha, Aship ashki anoo paksha, Apaa.
Ndatumastaa tsiyataruri, nuwaa kuki uru wasina yasaksha.
Shiy Apaa, nuwaa ichingaru zar ksutaksha.
¿Tamaru shiy ashiksha, Apaa? Nuw anoo mangoonamaam pinasakina.
Shiyaa kasamaam zandkitaati, itaru ¿yapeeja suwaychi? Yaptaa naaki amb shiy kanish urutari nuwash tachitkiya.
Íwar kanindap kárkitaateena, itaru shiysha anshutamtishcha. Tsapush waantsush pshtukitaateena, shiy anshutamtishcha.
Kambusurush arap naakitaateena, yap zari shitungku amb naakuri, shiy anshutamtishcha.
Mus kapungumashee kitkitaateena, yap zar pshtuku amb naakuri, shiysha Apaa, anshutamtishcha. Shiy uru nuwash taaksha. Nuwaa patsisakush, nda kasaksha.
Tapish ipishungachima, aturi, shiysha, Apaa, nuwaa pakshawa. 'Sinee kzateetaateena taakuri, Apaa, shiysha nuwaa paktamsha; Watam shiy nuwaa tuwasineekshawa.
Shiy tapshutaa nuwaa pamaam waritaksha. Nuwaa kaschiritam paksha. Shiyaam ichinguru kaschir tamapari ashiriya.
Shiy, Apaa, aneershi waxangan nutseemi tínarangsha. Nutseetsi wanasiri tínarangsha.
Ashiri, Apaa, nuw wappari atina shiyaatsi. Nuw mangishi chinakuri, ¿Tamaru Apanll ashiranga? aturi, napuxtakina, watam nda mangoonkinawa. Iyaa tputseetsini nutseemani kizpur wanasiri tínaksha. Nuw aneershimasi waxangan taaruri, shiysha Apaa, uru nuwaa yasarangsha.
<range>
Nuw ndatuma nllurtachuri, waantsshu tapish taaruri, shiysha Apaa, nuwaa taarashi wasina kirakarimunish yandarangsha. Ndatuma minamtiyam zari 'sinee paruri, shiysha nuwaa taarashi ichingaru yasarangsha.
¿Tamaru Apaa, nuwaa chinakush ashiksha? Urutari nuwaa chinachintar ashkush taaksha. Nuw maakuri, taraseekchuri, uru anshutam nuwapat taaksha. Nuwaa ksutaksha.
<range>
Ashiriya, shiy Apaa, pachampanee tputs nuwaa kasimaam zandkusin, anoo arap zanganingcha. Tpachingangcha.
Shiyaa mantsir tsiyatkitaa, itaru shiyaa kasimaam pinasakanaya, watam shiyamari kasikshawa.
Shiyaa undararsincha. Shiyaa natsakana anumand nuwsha uwaa natsakuri, niyrkina.
<range>
Ashiri Apaa, nuwaa mangeetsi yasangandama. Yachangandama. Mantsir naakinaareena, shiysha Apaa, nuwaa mangeetsi p'tseengandama. Shiyap izuuru kusamaam nungipiritish machingandama, urutamari taamaama. Ashiri Apaa, wapparee, Dapiyarini tárangiya.




























































Shiyaa kurakareetseeruri urutamari ungirtakina. Shiyaa chinakina. Ayamtaati shiyaa mbizcheezi. Apaa Taarashipanee, shiyaatsimari ungirtakina. Putam putam shiyaa kis yaseekina.
<range>
Taarashipanee, shiyaatsimari tputs ztaru ungirtamaam waritariya. Shiyapat min tatsamooru wanindaja. Shiyaa izuuru yasamaam wanindtamtaja. Shiyamari kasiksha.
¿Wanipa Apaa, shiy wizpurirpatish iyaa Israelchicheetsini istarangsha? Iyaa tapachindarangsha. Ashiri ipartamani, chinllinitamani uru shiyaa tputsee kamanimantar ashchinllinaya.
Nuwsha urutamari shiyaa chinachintar ashkuri taachina. Shiy kizpur wanasir 'sinish taaksha. Mishat, iyaa uru ksutkush kizpur taaksha.
Tputs ztaru shiyaa uru ungirtaksin, waanpataatssin kamanimantar ashchinllinaya. Nuwsha ashchitamana. Apanll ¿wanip wizpurpa iyashchee istaranga? nuwsha uru táchtamana.
Mishat, tputssha, Apanll iyaa ksumish chinakiya. Iyaa ichingurootsini tatsamooru ksutkiya, yaseeksin táchinllinaya.
Watam Taarashipanee, shiy kchinamishshawa. Nayanimpantishcha. Nda musá tsiyantakush, uru iyaa nayaniksha.
Tputsee ichinguru tatsamooru chinaksha. Ichinguroo istaksha. Tínamareetsish ichinguru ksutkush taaksha.
Yuw shiy tínarangish an ichinguru shiyamun kis taakanaya. Mishat, tputsiritamtish, shiyamun shambatchinllinaya.
Iy kurakarini kizpur wanasircha. Waamari kasiru taakiya, táchinllinaya
Tsapurunasshuchee tputs yasashpatish mangoo p'tseekush, mang' ksachinllinaya. ¡Apanll wizpurpa wanasir tuwasineerangu, atusin mang' ksachpasinaya!
Shiyamari Apaa, kizpur kurak kasirush, tsapurunasish urutamari taaratartachsha. Shiyachich ayamamtiyam pastacheeja, ndambaree.
Tputsirish kiyung kachiykitaatssin, waanaatsee tapachindamaam pinasaku, shiysha Apaa, nayanikush istaksha. Undarar kiyung yachaksin, shiysha Apaa, tapachindaksha.
Tsapurunasshuch ichingarusin, katungpani atusin, watungasheem shiyaam kutakanaya. Watam shiy uru panakshawa. Yuwash zari waritakchu, maachi kayanakchu, pusayarusin, katungkanaya.
Watam shiy Apaa, kuwiptish tputseem kchitamaam panakshawa.
Apaa, uru itsinsaru tputsee natstayarush, ksutaksha. Nayanimpatari tputsee istaksha.
Tputs shiyaa itsinsaru mashku, Istanda, tákchu, shiysha uru mazinaksha. Watam nda arap taakshawa.
Shiyamun Apaa, mang' tatkusin, shiysha uru istakush, mapiyrsin taakanaya. Apaa, istangandama; sitatstee. Maachee yutamash kasikchindama, tákchusin, shiysha mazinakchush, tapachindaksha.
Apaa Taarashipanee, yuw tputs mangpatari shiyaa itsinsaru chinakana anoo tputs uru ksutaksha. Itaru, tputs shiyaa chinamaam ngatkusin, natsampan taaksin, anumashee tputs shiysha izuuru tpachingayarush kasaksha.
Apaa Taarashipanee, nuw urutari shiyaa yaseekuri ungirtachima. Tputs ztaru urutamari shiyaa wanasireem ínaksin, ungirtaksin taachinllinpa.






























¡Apanllee yaseengints! ¡Ichingarus yuwis íwar taakis anis, kanindamand zunganeengints! Ungirtangints.
¡Siysa Apanllis wasundururis kurakareetsis seengints; ungirtangints!
¡Zartamtis, tsupitamtis, Apanllee seengints, ungirtangints! Siy ichingarus yuwis íwar sunlleerutarus kurakurtangatis, tsangachis, irunlltamtis anis, Apanllee ungirtangints. Seengints.
Kanindawtamtis kawambanaris kungutamtis yuwis kanindap iwaz taakis anis, ¡Apanllee ungirtangints; seengints!
Apanllee Taarashipanee ¡Seengints; ungirtangints! Watam siyaa amb ashichpa átu, kamachtambeeru, íwar waana tinambayaru, mbam wayambaranguwa.
Urutamari taachpa, tárangu, ¿Waa kuk chakaja michitach tayutaritach?
Mishat, ichingarus yuwis tsapurunasis taakis anis ¡Apanlleetsi seengints; ungirtangints! Marshuchis kapungumashis, yuwis kungush watareewis imurishuw taakis anis, Apanllee ungirtangints.
Siysa mamartamtis, sin kachizamashtamtis, Sírinuwtamtis, Apanllee ungirtangints. Kambusurutam, yuw Apanll kamachtaku, kukoo tuminkis anuwis, Apanllee ungirtangtsa.
Macheew íwaritamtis, manginawtamtis, yasinawis, Ichingarus karipanawis, yasinawtamtis wanuseewtamtis. Apanllee ungirtangints.
Wakarawtam, chinuzeewtamtis, manginshuchitamtis, kpurangamasheewis, pshiyrataru anuwtamtis, Apanllee ungirtangints.
Mishat, siysa tsapurunastamtis urkaris tiptsirpatatis anis, yaktashtam urkaris, misha yaktashucheewis tputsis,
kamuzini, kizawtamtis, kanungaseewtamtis, kamasinawtamtis, wachinawtamtis, ichingaru ztaru tsapurunasshuchis,
¡Apanllee Taarashipanee yaseengints; shambatangtsa! ¡Uwamari kasiru kanindaatstam, mishat tsapurunaseetstam ksutkiya! Taarashipan nllitarita arang wanindaja.
Iyaa Israelchichini waana tiptsireem ipusarangu, iyaatssha uru tuwizpurtakiya. Ashiri iysha uru Apanllee chinakuni ungirtakuri taachiniya. ¡Apaa Taarashipani shiy kizpurtishcha!









¡Apanllee waanshu pang' shambatkus, seengtsa! ¡Yuwash kizpur wanasir kanindush taaku, anush shambatkus seengtsa!
Wanip iyaa istaranga, ashiri shambatkus seengtsa. Wizpur ayamtaati nda kachingtaru, Ashiri ungirtayarus, shambatkus seengtsa.
Uru trumpetaa tiruchkus, Apanllee shambatkus seengtsa. Uru kis kitarpa kitartakus shambatkus seengtsa.
Mangis ksakus tamburpat michitkus, shambatkus, seengtsa. Tiruchzipta tiruchingtsa, shambatkus seengtsa.
Ngusambpa tsireen, tsireen átus, zungan zungan shambatkus seengtsa. Ngusambpa tushurangayarus arap zunganeerus shambatkus seengtsa.
¡Yuwamun kanusis itsiparu, wizpuris anumun xipungayarus, Kizpur yaseengtsa! ¡Shambatangtsa Apanlleetsi! [Watamcha yuw Israelchich Apanlleem yaseerangana anu.]






































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Nuw Isáysi Apanllee kuk kamanchintspa. Nuw apari Amoscha. Apanll nuwaa yámandarangiya yuwaa Utaáchchee wanichu anootsi. Yuwapur Osiyas, Jotantam, Ajastam, Esikiyastam kurak taarangana anpur Apanll nuwaa tsiyatarangu, anoo kamanchintspa.
Tsapurunasshuchis, kanindshuchtamtis ichingurus, Apanllee kuk mazinangtsa. Apanll ateeja: Nuw tputsireetsi ipareepzi ashiru yanungakuri, siy kis kanungarangsa. Ashiritaa, tputsirshti nuwaa natsarangusin, nuwaa kasaranganaya.
¿Antaati wakar wamkuree kuk nda mazinak? ¿Antaati burr minush tputs pang' watungasheem nachungak? Nda. Chinuz mang' ndunaritaa, mangoonkiya. Itaru, nuw tputsiri mangsharitssincha. Nuwaa nda pakchiyam chinakana; nda mangoonkana.
¿Nuw siyaa yutaritshishpaneetsis tamaycheezi? Siy yutaritshisheetsimari uru chinaksa. ¡Siy shuchitampazis wipis ashirus yutaritshisheetsim kis chinaksa! Nuwaatssha Taarashipaneetsi arap kasarangsa. Nuw Apanlli siyaam Israelaamis taaritaati, ashiritaa siy nuwaa wanllitarangsa. Nuw siyaa kizpur chinarangitaati, ashiritaa siysa nuwaa natsaksa.
¡Mangishis nuwaa kapeetamaam chinachintar ashiksa! Nuw siyaa kapungtaa pzkookpaz ashiruri, siyaa waniwantar ashkitaati, ashiritaa, nda siy kitsis mazinaksa. Muchis chuwimpaz ashiksa. Kapung tanukus, wizpuris ndunnaar taaksa.
Nutsis kpumawpaz ashirus ashchiri shuneekiya. Nda pakchiyam matambish taaksa. K'tsimandis káyaru, muchipis wásur shuneekiya. Kpumaris, kuchakpaz ashiru kpuneekiya. Minamtiyam tputs siyaa nda istaku, irimiyapat taparat, taparat nda ashkiya, wásuree mayungamaama. Ashikpaz ashkitaatis, nda kitsis mazinakus, yutaritshishee kis chinaksa.
Nuw siyaa waneektaati, itaru siysa nuwaa kuki nda payukus, kundararis siyaa kachingeersin, tsapuneetsis itutskachu, Mzarshitis mangutarisha taakiya. Ashkus, tatsumaris mangutarit itsankiya. Siyaa pangis tirooksin, yaktaris mzeeztar ashkiya. Saanasha anoo ngutis napataranll ashiksa. Kundararis tatsumareetsis kis shamangayarusin, katungkusin, kaching, kaching ashkanaya. Sodomshuch tamarangpari ashiritam tsapunis mangu kuree ashkiya.
Kundararis siyaa pacharangusin, Siyonshuchis minamaritis katuchim taaksa. Na kundararis siyaam tsangakanaya. Siyonshuchis yakat tambpaz ashiru mzatsip upusanand xiyaa ashkiya. Sundarshat kachingamamari iturpipitaraa, iturpipitaraa ashishtangat ashkanaya.
Kundararis ashirangtaa, nuw wizpurirpati, nuwamari kasiyeeruri, siyaa Utaáchcheetsis nayaniranguri, nda siy musá tsiparangsa. Ndunnaari siyaa istaranguri, Sodomaa, Gomorshuchee tamarangpari sheernapsinaya siyaa izuuru kachingaranganaya. Apanll áttanda tángcha, tárangiya nuwaatsi. Ashiriya, yutaritshishirimandis Apanllsha siyaa kapung waneekiya, nuw siyaa atina.
Siy kurakis Sodomshuch tamapari ashirus mantsir taakis anis, Apanllee kuk kaapaniri mazinangtsa. Siy tputsis Gomorshuch tamapari ashirus yutarit taakis anis, kitsis zurampatari mazinangtsa. Apanll siyaa tayaspataku, anoo ngatintspa.
Apanll Taarashipan ateeja: ¿Mayaamsa nuwaam maachee zapan wayaksa? Opeejaa, wakaraatstam karupana, nuwaam wayayarus, muchkis, anoo nuw kapung tsachiktana. ¿Antaati wayungunoo muchkis, anoo nuw ksaja ishingchee? ¿Maacheetsi ursir ksatamtaja napkee?
Siy nuwash pangi kuseerus, maacheetsi nuwaam yushindaktaateesa, itaru, ¿chak siyaa, ngutis Apanllish pang' xitangtsa, táranlla?
Nuwaam maachee ngutis wayarintspa. Watam an msas nuwaam nda wanasiriwa. Tputsee tushaneeyarus, Tsup kaneeschish shambateeni, atitaateesa, Zar kanusishush tushiyani, atitaateesa, itaru wand yutaritshishee kis payuksa. ¿Antaati nuw piy shingtsa, tárangee? Anoo pamaam zandkeezi.
Tsup kaneeschish yakchu anush shaniykis, anoo nuw ksaja napkee. ¿Wanip ngutis ashiksa? ¡Wappa! Anoo zandkeezi.
Siy nuwaa mashamaam kuweetsis íwar itsirkachis, anoo nuw pamaam zandkeezi. Zapantaa nuwaa mashkus, ashiritaa siyaa nda mazinakina. Watam kuwis tputs ursir paxatasawa.
¡Watsta! Yutaritshishireetsis ksangtsa. ¿Antaati siyaa yutaritshishireetsis nuw kis napkee? ¡Yutaritshishireetsis zurampatari ksangtsa!
Wanasiriri taangtsa. Anoori chinangtsa. Itsinsaru taangtsa. Tputsee chinangtsa. Saanpatatis istangtsa. Mxaxzeewaa nayaningtsa. Mashindoo tayutaritarinllpa, Apanlli siyaa Utaáchcheetsis tárangiya.
Apanll átcha: Mazinangandama. Na tsiyatssee wanasir yareeni. Wandaya siy yutaritshishiris kuraspaz ashiru kizpur chumbeep paxataru, ashiritaa nuw tachingkachuri, kizpur mburash taatssa. Kachizamash tamapari ashiru mburash taatssa. Mishat, kamis kizpur kawambanataa, itaru opeej pur tamapari ashirisha mburash taachiya. Nuw siyaa yutaritshishireetsis tachingkachuri, amb ashikpaz ashtatssa.
Wandaya siy nuwaa kuki payukchus, yusur mzarshis yuwariz kisshaparee kanungchiya.
Wandaya kitsis nda mazinakus, kundararis waani shamangayarusin, siyaa kiyung yachachintsa. Nuw Apanlli siyaa atina, Apanll waana nuwaa tárangiya. Ashirucha, Apanllee zurumpatari chinangtsa, nuw Isáysi siyaa atashina.
Siy Irusarinshuchis, sirú Apanllee chinarangitaatis, itaru natsha ¿tamaysha kiz mshipan tamaparee ashirus nuwaa kasarangus, kis apanllputsush tachitaksa? Sirútari siy tputsis ashparitis itsinsaru taarangus, tputsee zurampatari tatsamooru istarangsa. Ashirangtaatis, itaru natsha pachampaniri taaksa.
Sirú siy ur tamapari ashirus wanasir taarangsa. Itaru, natsha chkaz tamapari ashirus kinarangsa. Kapusis kam ashirus taarangtaatis, itaru na kizpur misingapishpaz ashirus kinarangsa.
Siy kurakaris na wits nda mazinaksin, washchirpat tputsi kis amikurtakanaya. Kurikingazim chinaksin, tputsee nda itsinsaru chinakanaya. Maachtangazimari támaraksin, mantsir chinakanaya. Mxaxzee nda nayaniksin, Mashindootstam nduntam pakchiyam istakanaya.
Yuwamand siy Utaáchchis yutarit taakis anumand, Apanll Taarashipan, yuw wamari kasiru an atiya. ¡Wapparita! Na siyaa kundartaranguri, wanichintspa, Yuwaa tumashtakis anoo tuwapamaama.
Nuw kuwipti wizpurirpati, siyaa wanichima. Chkazeetspaz ashiru izuuru kapeetchintspa. Yutaritshishireetsis ashparit kachingchima.
Ashkachuri, yusur shiyashuchsha yasampan tputsee tatsamooru chinachinllinaya. Kuraksha wipunash yusur wanasir kamanchinllinaya. Amb ashkachuri, tputssha siyaa wanasir ínachinllinaya. Siyaa Irusarinshucheetsis, Yakat itsinsampancha; apanllpancha, siyaa táchinllinaya.
Nuw siyaa itsinsari yasayaruri, tapachindakchuri, siysa yusur kis taatssa. Siy Siyonshuchis, yusur nuwash kis tachitatssa.
Itaru, yutaritshishpan tputs nuwaa nda chinaku, nuwsha anoo tputs toro, toro sheeruri kapeetchima. Nuwaa kuki kapeetkusin, zurampatari tsipachinllinaya.
Ashirucha, nuw siyaa atashina: Siy apanllputseem zapan kis nashamangamaam chapoom yanungarangsa. Anush kis apanllputsee ungirtarangsa. Itaru, anumand kapung pazichpasa.
Pazikchus, tatsumimpaz ashirus mawirutssa. Kung ndunpaz ashirus puzataraa ashitssa.
Tputs kizpurimuntaa taarangu, itaru mashar puz ashiru kurachiya. An tputs wanasirimshingaz nazandku, yuw tarawztarangu an, mikeeru kurakchu machingchiya. ¿Tamareeja anoo ztazchich? ¿Chakaja anoo tputs istach? Apanll átcha tángcha, nuwaa tárangiya. Ashirucha, waana Apanll Taarashipan Irusarinshucheetsis izuuru yarachshapari, nuw Isáysi siyaa atashina.
Nuw Isáysi Apanllee kuk kamanchintspa. Nuw apari Amoscha. Apanll waana nuwaa yámandarangiya. Yuwaa Utaáchchee, Irusarinshucheetstam tputs ashtachu anoo kamanchintspa. Apanll waana tárangiya:
Yap tsapurunas tspakattu amb, nuwsha Irusarinaa yakat mbamari wayachima. Anush nuw pangi kizpur taachiya. Anu mach íwar pshkurutar ashku taachiya. Minup mach ningich taachiya. Amb ashkachuri, tsapurunasshuchsha tputs ichingarusin anush kuschinllinaya.
Tputs amb naakchusin, shurungakataraa sheersin, waanpatatin táchinllinaya: Pzaya. Apanllip machip káreeruni, Akoparinshini Apanllirini pang' pshtuyani. Amb ashkachuni, waana Apanll iyaa tayaspatachiya. Waa kuk mazinaruni, Apanllish kissha tachiteeni, táchinllinaya. Anushsha Siyonamand Apanllee Taarashipanee kuk tayaspatachinllinaya. Irusarinamand Apanllee kuk mazinachtamanaya.
Apanllsha Taarashipan tsapurunasee tputs itsinsar yasachiya. Tputs waanpatatin tsiyatssee mantsir payukinaareesinaya, Taarashipansha waana tsiyatssee yarchiya. Anpur, ayamtaatiya tputs waanpatatin waratchazinllinaja. Tapazeetstam waanpatatin nda tayaspatachinllinaya. K'chirpungoo mangutarisha payuchinllinaya. M'chitaatssha waratamapani mázareemsha tatsummapaneem ínachinllinaya. Turuwaatssha wareemsha ínachinllinaya.
Akoparinchichis, ¿mayaamsha kiyung kachiyatssa? ¡Wanasir itsinsar taayani! Waana Apanll Taarashipan iyaa 'sineekpaz ashkachu, kis taapani, atina. Ashiriya, Apanll Taarashipansha ayam iyaa istakachu, tsapurunasush ztaru tputs mapiyrshtisin taachinllinaya, nuw siyaa atina.

















































Nuw Isáysi kizarunaa tatsumma yasichima. Nuw amikuri yuw kizpur taaku an wamin yasichima. Nuw amikuri kizarunaa tatsumma ksutarangiya. Mázarush kizarun kizpur wanasir tatsumarangiya.
Wanasir puyayaru, Maachtaa patumbchee ichingaru kapeetarangiya. Kizarunaa ipus ipus sheeru, wanasirimsheetsimari tatsumarangiya. Mázarish apusanand torre napamaam kayatarangiya. Sheeru, Vinoo wayar waapi átu, kamiyamaam wayarangitamta. Iwaparangu, wanuseemsha kutarangiya. Kam waapi, tárangitaa, waaj, kizarunsha kizpur kapiz yusirangiya.
Anumandsha amikuri Apanll, Yutaritischa, siy Irusarinshuchis. Na pindanaru k'kuz mangeetsis p'tsimaam kamanchintspa, tárangiya. Utaáchchis, na nuwaa mangiptis kamaningandama. ¿Chakamandaja chayarini mzats mantsir yusirang? ¿Antaati nuwamand ashirang? ¿Ndush mzats waanamandari ashirang?
¿Mayaaja mzatseem pishtarang wanasir yanungamaama? Nuw siyaa, Kam yusichpa aturi, itaru, siysa nuwaa tamapingarangus, kapizsha yusirangsa.
Ashiriya, nuwaa kuki mazinangtsa. Yuw nuw mangishi chinaki anoo kamanchintspa. Mzareetsi watandpun kapeetkachuri, waani arapich tputs, Mzatsee kachingpana, atina. Ashkachuri, watspat kat, kat ashchinllinaya.
Nuw mzareetsi ndusha pakchiyam ktsutchima. ¿Chakaja karutaa púyach? Kpanandarishaparee kxuneeru, karutamunaam kinachiya. Msaseetssha, Amb sinatpa, táchima. Pakchiyam mzarimuni sinacheeja.
Nuwamari kasiruri, siyaa Utaáchcheetsis atashina. Nuw mzari watacha siyaya. Nuw tatsumareetspazi ashiruri kizpur siyaa chinarangina. Siy Israelchichis nuwpaz mzari ashirus taaksa. Itaru, nuw siyaa, Nuwaa kuki payuchinllinpa, tárangitaati, Siysa pachampaneemarisha kinarangsa. Waanpatatin wanasir napchinllinpa; itsinsaru chinachinllinpa, tárangitaati, itaru, siysa tputsee kiyung yachakus, siyamun tputs kiyung kachiykusin, wasureemun, Ay átangat ashkanaya. Amb ashirangus, kizarun wanus kapiz tamaparee ashirangsa. Ashirucha, anumand siyaa zurampatari kasachintspa, nuw atashina, Apanll siyaa Utaáchcheetsis tárangiya. Utaáchich kizarun tatsumim tamapari ashirusin taakanaya, atiya.























Yuwapur kurak Usiyas tsiparangu, anpur nuw Apanllee parangina. Taarashipan kizpur 'sineerangu, wamari kasiru, waanamun watsirar kuxinarangiya. Watunir wazuraneeru, waanaatsi pang' purangiya.
Waana tiptsir sumas ashiru Apanllimun iwaz itureeranganaya. Ichingaru wazitpungach 6 taarangiya. Wazitpungachpa tsimbun waanaatsi wach kámanarangiya. Tsimbunatam wanutsee watspatari kámanarangitamta. Itaru, tsimbunatam mangaktangat ashiranganaya. Waanpatatin tsiyatkusin, táranganaya:
Apanll Taarashipan wamari kasiriya. Wanasiriri chinakiya. Wanasiriri taakiya. Kizpur wanasir 'sineekiya. Tsapurunas shuneeriya wanasirimshirini, ántar ashiranganaya.
Kizpur zunganeerangusin, Apanll pang' washitungash zpuzarangiya. Pangush wantsush msas tuwap mzeezarangiya.
Anoo paranguri, nuwsha, Sitatstee. Nishuripa tsipachina, watam kchipti Apanllee nuw pakeenawa. Kurakari wamari kasiru anoo pakeenawa. ¿Tamari nuw mantsirimshee tsiyatkuri taaki? Nuw tputspa yutaritamashpa taakina. Sitatstee, tárangina.
Amb táranguri, Apanllsha tiptsir sumas ashiru nuwanung mangarangiya. Kucharash masunll Apanllish wasum yáyaru,
nuwash kuki chka' ashirangiya. Nuwaatssha, Masunll k'keetsish kandanirangu, na yutaritshishireetsish ichingaru tachingarangiya. Apanll shiyaa yutaritshishireetsish zurampatari mbizayanlliya, nuwaa tárangiya.
Tárangu, Apanllsha waana tsiyatku kímarangu, nuwaa tárangiya. ¿Chakaatseeja nuw zangankachee? ¿Chakaatseeja nuwaa kuki kamanipaneem ínachee? tárangu, nuwsha, Apaa, nuwaa kamanipaneem ínayarush, zanganingandama, tárangina.
Apanllsha, Nuw shiyaa zanganchinllpa. Naayarush, tputsi yutaritaa Israelchichee kamanishini. Apanll ateeja, tángcha. Nuwaa kuki zapantaa mazinakus, ashiritaa nda mangoonaksa. Nuw kizpur istaktaati, anoo pakitaateesa, nduntam mangeetsis p'tsichima.
Siyaa mangeetsis tamiroosinlltakchuri, kitseetstamtis tamirkachuri, kcheetstamtis kámanakchuri, siysa ¿tamareeja mangoonchis? ¿Antaati mazinacheezis? ¿Nitaati pangcheezis? Ndambaree. Mangoontapa, siyaa aturi, nda siyaa yaramaam zurampatari zandkina. Apanll átcha tángcha, tárangiya nuwaatsi.
Nuwsha, Apaa, ¿ashinooja amb ashchinllina? táranguri, Apanllsha, Anoo tputs izuuru kachiykachuri, pakchimarisha katuchkachu, anootsimsha ayam zapish yusur tputsireetsi chinachima. Israelchichee yaktarini izuuru pátangachinllinaya. Ashkatssin, tputs ndunichparee. Pangush minamtiyam tputs nda taachinllinaya. Mázarish mangu kuree ashtachinllinaya.
Nuw anoo tputs arap minup tsap tuzanganeekchuri, Utaáchchish watsapun tputs izuuru ndunichiya.
Wandaya chungaa arangeem tputs minam taarinaariya, anootstam kapeetchima. Yasinaa washitanee tuwayaruch, izuuru kapeetkachuch, Puchimsha pshkoorutar ashtaru ashtachiya. Itaru, xixpurootspaz ashiru tputsireemi yusur katuchimaa wayachima. Annaa tputs nuwaa kuki mazinachinllinaya. Anush tputsireetsi yusur chinachima, tárangiya Apanlli nuwaatsi. Ashirucha, Apanll nuwaa Israelchichee tputsee kamanimaam nuwaa zanganirangiya.
Síriyshuch kurak, Resín Israelshuchpat urkar tsiyatarangu, Zuwaa Pékaa, Irusarinshuchpat warateeni. Yamari kasiyeeruni, kasayani, tárangitaatssin, xapooranganaya. Anpur kurak Ajas Irusarinshuchee ksutarangiya. Ajas watacha Jotamarini wipa.
Síriyshuch urkar tsiyatssipanee tputs Ajasap zanganirangu, kusarangiya. Iy Síriyshuchini Efrayinchichpa amikurtaranguni, siyapa waratamaam zandkiniya, tárangiya. Ajassha anoo k'kuz mazinarangu, kapung punirangu, kizpur kambustaku yasin shpu shpu shitangat ashtaru, ashiru kizpur puniku, ta ta shitar ashirangiya. Sitatstee. ¿Tamachina? tárangiya.
Itaru, Apanllsha nuwaa tsiyatarangu, Isáysaa, shiy iparpatish, Sear-yasubpa ipuneerush, kurakap Ajasap napashincha. Ajas tsap kpimash kung tashtap taariya. Ngootsip yap chirikoo káchakana amb naangcha. Ajasaa anush chamayangayarush, nuwaa kuki kamaningcha.
Papcha, ichee, kurak Resínpa, min Pékpa amikurtarangitaatssin, anoo tputsi punirinllpa. Itaru, shiynaa kizpurtangcha. Kizpuritaa tsiyantaksin, itaru mangu ashtachinllinaya. Sumas mangu mzeetar ashtaru ashtachinllinaya. Kurak Resín wamkurpat kurakpat Pékpa mangu nllur tamaparee ashirusin taakanaya.
Síriyshuch Efrayinshuchpat washunand shiyaa kiyung yachamaam zandkanaya. Uwshtisin shiyaa táranganaya:
