...Ashiriya, nuwaatssha, Jeremiyasaa, shiy yuwaa táyari anoo ichingaru kamanishincha. Wandtaati shiyaa kukish nda mazinamaam zandkusin, ashiritaa kizpurtayarush kamaningcha.
Ashiri táncha. Nuw siyaa tputsiritaati, ashiritaa siy nda nuwaa Taarashipaneetsi kuki payumaam zandaksa. Mishat, nda yuwaa waneeki anoo mangoonaksa. Ashkus, zurampatari nda yuwaa tsiyatkis anoo mazinakuri mbizarangina, átcha tángcha, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, nuw Jeremiyasi yuwaa Apanll Utaáchchee izuuru kapeetchu anoo kamaneena.
Apanll siyaa Irusarinshucheetsis ateeja. Mucheetsis ktureerus, machip puzap naangints. Anush kuseerus, mangis mantsakus, tanungtsa. Watam Apanll siyashchee kapung tsiyantayanlluwa. Zurampatari uru siyaa kapeetchiya.
Ashiriya, Apanll siyaa átcha. Siy yuwaa nda nuw zandki anoo ashirangsa. Apanllputsiris mantsirimshee yuwash nuwaam pangurangis anush wayarangus, nuwaatssha kapung tayutaritarangsa.
Sheerus, Ben-jinomashsha wazaw muchimaam Tofet kayatarangsa, anush ipareetsis kamuza, misha kizaatstam muchimaama. Nuw nduntaa anoo kamachtaranguri, misha nduntaa pakchiyam mangishi chinaranguri, saantarishat ashirangsa.
Ashirucha, nuw atashina. Yuwash zar tatsamkachu anush ndusha anoo Tofet, misha Ben-jinom átus ttsurtatssa. Uru wazaw pachashshi átus ttsurtatssa. Yuwash Tofet átis, anush uru tsipareetssha maputssa. Watam piyari mapumaam tsap ndunarshtawa.
Amb ashkachus, mangu tsipar tamurutaru, anoo yap misha tumuztam katungkusin, taachinllinaya. Watam tputs anoo tachiyamaam ndunarshtawa.
Ashiri nuw siyaa Utaáchcheetsis yaktaris kapeetchima. Mishat, Irusarinaatstam ngoots ashchiri kapeetchitamana. Yuw siy mangis kis shaniyeerus, michitkus, zamamtar ashtaris an, misha katungkus, zamamtar ashtaris antam, misha kizaa yamakus, karusataris, antam ndusha ashkus, zaputar ashtachparee. Yaktaris izuuru puripuritasha taachiya, Apanll siyaa Irusarinshucheetsis átcha, nuw Jeremiyasi atina. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll Irusarinshuchee wanimaam zandarangu anootsi.












































































































































Apanll yuwapur kizpur zar zatarangu, nda sin sinarangu, anpur nuwaa tárangiya.
Na Utaáchich ichingarusin kapung mang' mantsaksin tanukanaya. Tsapush kuxinatarach ashkanaya. Watam yaktarinshini nda sin sinaku kapung yutaritshtawa. Irusarinashsha wasurimun kiyung kachiykusin, tanuktamsinaya.
Kurakawshitisin muchchuree kungoo tipamaam kamachtaksin, uwshtisin, Kungoo tipapani, atusin, nachungaksin, itaru ndusha kungoo paksin, naxpuyachusin, mangu pázirpa muchumun uw putarsin, murtsur kurimunaz kuktangatanll ashkanaya.
Tarawzupansha tputs kapung mang' mantsaksin, muchumunsha uw putayarusin, tanuktamsinaya. Watam nda sin sinaku, watsapun kizpur puztawa.
Mangu chirichir ndusha kxunku, ¿mashtaja manllanus katungeech? Wipaa ambirisha manginash kasaku, wip marizimun waanitarisha tsipakanaya.
Burrsha kayustan, machimun káreersin, maninung tamaparee ashirusin, kambusurootsimsha mangu kachizangaksin, shanee ashkanaya. Wachsha ndusha yakanaya. Watam chirichir ndunareeru kapung mariz kayatkanawa, Apanll Utaáchchee tárangiya.
Anoo mazinaranguri, nuw Jeremiyasi Apanlleetssha, Apaa, shiy wandtaati iyamand yutaritshishirinimand tsiyantakush, ashiritaa nayaniyarush, tapachindangi. Watam kchinamishawa. Iy nda wanasir shiyash tachitamaam waritakaniya. Shiyaa zapancha tayutaritkini.
Watam shiy iyaa Israelchicheetsini, yuwash kiyung kachiykachini anush uru tapachindakshawa. Ashiri ¿mayaamsha iyaa tunari ashirush natsakush, iyashchee niyraksha? Shiy tputs naayaranllu, yaktash psaanamari maarangu, arangiri naataru ashikpaz ashiru iyaa niyrakshawa.
Mishat, shiy tapazpan urkar mamarpayaru, nda tiptsiri tapachindamaam waritataru ashiksha. Itaru, Apaa Taarashipanee, shiy iyaa tputsirtishcha. Iyash urutari taaksha. Piyartach tputs ichingarusin anoo yasakanaya. Ashiriya, nuw shiyaa atina. Ksarishpa. Iyaa tapachindangi, nuw Apanllee táranguri,
Apanllsha Israelchichee nuwaa kamanku tárangiya. Israelchich piyari chinat chinat ashkusin, apanllputsee tínayarusin, ungirtakanaya. Ashirucha, nuwsha anoo nda kis napki. Yuwamand kizpur yutari ashkana anumand, ¿Mayaamsha ashirangsa? táyaruri, wanichima.
Ashiriya, shiy Jeremiyasaa, anshuch tputs ashkana anoo naynimaam tsiyatishpa.
Wandtaati zapan zar mangooksin, misha yutaritshishirineetsi tachingamaam chinoo muchkitaateesinaya, misha zapantaati maachi nuwaam wayaksin, nda anoo zandkina. Uru anshuchee kachingamaam tapazee, misha marizeetstam, misha tsutasheetstam wayachima, Apanll Israelchichee tárangiya.
Ashiriya, nuwsha tárangina. Apaa Taarashipanee, tayaspatampansha. ¿Antaati nish yakat pachashish wanindacheeja, misha iwarzitam maringacheeja? Apanll waana neetsiri kis taamaam wayarangiya, atanawa, táranguri,
Apanllsha, Tayaspatampan nuwaa, mangu ngichkusin, nuwamun suri atanaya. Nuw nda anoo tsiyatsis pakchiyam kamachtarangina. Mishat, nda nuw anoo tsiyatarangina. Yuw aship tsiyatkana an ngichizcha. Waana wayashingur tuchinaku, mangutari pamazookana, anoo tayaspatampan kamankanaya.
Ashirucha, nuwsha Apanlli Taarashipani atashina. Yuwamand tayaspatampan nuwamun suri ngichkusin, nuw nduntaa kamachtaranguri, wandarishtisin ngichkusin, ¿Antaati iyash pachashish, misha marizitam nda tushiychiya? atana, anumand tayaspatampan tapazish, misha marizimuntam tsipachinllinaya.
Tputstisin yuw mazinarangana, anshitisin uru tapazimuntam, misha marizimuntam ichingarusin wizanll, wipatam, kamuz, misha kizatam tsipachinllinaya. Ashkachu, mangu tsipar Irusarinash ngoots tamutamur ashtachiya. Nda anoo tsipari mapchinllinaya, watam tputs ndunarshtawa. Amb sheeruri, kasachima yutaritshishirinee tuwapamaama.
Ashiriya, Jeremiyasaa, arangeem nuwaa kuki kamaningcha. Nuw tputsiri kizpur kiyung kachiychinllinaya. Tsipatspatari nuw wanichima. Ashirucha, kapung mangi mantsakuri, kaschir psaantam tanukuri taakina.
Ashiri anush piyam chapung shitungeeruri, napkuri, tsipar k'chipungpa kayungamaw tamutamuru uru pangchina. Yaktashsha pshtuyaruri, napkuri, tputs marizimun tsipakchusin, yurartangatu, anoo pangchina. Tayaspatampansha, misha apanllpantam urkar uru minupsha tsap yaptaa nda yasarana, ambtaa naachinllinaya, Apanll siyaa Israelchicheetsis átcha, nuw Jeremiyasi atina. Ashiriya, yuwaa Israelchicheem Apanllee tsiyatarangi anoo kamaneena.




Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Wandtaati zitamin Móysisarini, misha Samuelarini, nuwash kuseersin, tsiyatkusin, nuw nda Israelchichee nayanichima. Ashiri Utaáchchee yuwaa áti anoo kamanincha. Nuwaa wanasirimshiri shitungkatssin, waana yachchinllinaya.
Wandaya shiyaa, ¿Tamaycheezini? ateesinaya. Shiysha amb táncha. Tputs yuw tsutashimun tsipamaam wayama, an tsutashimunaritam tsipachinlliniya. Mishat, yuw tputs tapazish tsipamaam wayama, ansha uru tapazshuritam tsipachinllinaya. Mishat, yuw marizimun tsipamaam wayama, ansha marizimunaritam tsipachinllinaya. Mishat, yuw tputs putamaam wayama, anootssha uru putachinllinaya.
Nuw Apanlli Taarashipani atina. Waneeshshee ipunpunar zanganchima. Pachampan tputsee pachamaama, tumuzsha tsiparee pshiyramaama, yapsha anoo katungamaama, misha kázamishsha anoo izuuru kachingamaama.
Irusarinash Manasesamand Esekiyasarinimand wip yutaritshishirini ichingaru Israelchichee amb ashtachima. Ashkachuri, tsapurunas ztaru yuwaa nuw kizpur waneeki anoo yasakchusin, kizpur punirustachinllinaya, Apanll tárangiya.





...Ashiri nuwsha, Apaa, nuwaa waneerishpa. ¡Sitatstee! ¿Mayaamshta aneeri nuwaa tatsipurang? Watam natsha kizpur kiyung kachiykinawa. Natsha nuw tputspa nambaptangat ashkina. Nduntaa tputsee tumashtakuri, nuwaatssha mantsir tsiyatkanaya. Nuw tputsee urkir nda minumtiyam piristatarina. Uwshtisin nduntam piristaksin, ashiritaa mantsir nuwaa tsiyatkanaya.
Wandaya nuw shiyaa kukish nda payuranguri, nuwaa wanimaam waritakiya. Itaru, shiy yasaksha, yuwaa nuw shiyaa kukish tatsamoorangi, misha kundarari kiyung kachiykatssin, nuwsha shiyaa, Nayaningi, tárangi anootsi. Ashiriya Apaa, nuwaa nayaninganda, nuw Jeremiyasi Apanllee tárangina. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll Utaáchchee zurampatari wanichima, tárangu anootsi.
Apanll Israelchichee ateeja. ¿Chakaja Asiriyashchee, misha Babiloniyashchee kasiku kásich? Pinascha. Ngusamb mbammash, misha ngusamb mburshimash, zari charapungaru tashtap taaru an tamaparee ashiru ichipamaam nda waninda.
Ashiriya, yuwamand Israelchichis kapung yutari taarangis, anumand siyaa maachiritis itutseeruri, kundarareemshtis panachima. Yuw yaktarishis payukis, anoo waani mangutari yachinllinaya.
Amb ashkachuri, kundararis siyaa tumuchchurtachinllinaya. Yap nda tsapoo yasaris ambsha uru taatssa. Watam nuw kapung tsiyantayaruri, sumas ashiru siyaa muchimaam zandkinawa, Apanll Israelchichee tárangiya. Nuwsha Apanllee,
Apaa, shiy ichingaru yasaksha. Nuwaa tapachindanda. Shiyamand kaminish nuwaa kiyung yachakanaya. Ashiri waneengi. Anoo naynikush, ksarinllpa, nda nuwaa pachamaama.
Shiy nuwaa tsiyatkachush, anuritam mangi kis mazinakina. An tsiyatsis nuwaam wanasircha. Mishat, kizpur mangi ksakina, watam nuw shiyamun mangi tatkinawa. Apaa, shiyamaritcha Apanllish.
Yuw tputs yutaritshisheetsimari chinaku, michitatangat ashkana, anpat nda kis washunand taakina. Yuwamandari shiy nuwaa nuwaanitari taamaam wayarangish, anumandari nuw piyam nuwaanitari taakina. Watam shiy nuwaa tsiyantakush, amb ashiru wayarangshawa.
Ashiriya, ¿tamashta Apaa, kiyung kachiykuri, mangi mantsaki an nda pastak? ¿Tamashtaja yaramaam nda waritak? Shiy nuwaa nda pakchiyam istakush, kungoo wazangan puzaa tamatarparchi ashirush, nuwaa ngutish tamapingaksha, nuw Apanllee tárangina.
Apanllsha nuwaa, ¿Mayaamsha ngutish tsiyatstar ashiksha? Anoo watsta. Yusur nuwaa kuki mangiptish tsiyatkinaareesha, nuwsha mangeetsish yarchinllpa. Yusur nuwaa k'keetsi tputsireemi kamanitsha. Ashkachush, tputs shiyaa yusur mazinachinllinaya. Itaru, shiynaa tputsush tachitinllpa, nuw shiyaa atashina.
Sheeruri, nuw shiyaa nee yakat ksutamaam ngusamb chumbeepimashpapaz tandapunooma ashiru wayakchuri, nda shiyaa tputs kasichinllinaya. Pachampan kuskitaati, itaru shiyaa nda kasichinllinaya. Nuw anushtana shiyaa tapachindamaama. Nuw Apanlli Taarashipani shiyaa zurampatari atina.
Yutaritshishpani wizpur nuwamari kasiyaruri, shiyaa tapachindachinllpa. Mishat, yuwaa shiyaam kapung xarashish taaku anootstam, tapachindachinllpa, Apanll nuwaa Jeremiyasaatsi tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll, Israelchicheetssha zurampatari wanichima, tárangu anootsi.
















































Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Jeremiyasaa, spiraa kayatamapanip pang' naangi. Nuw anush shiyaa tsiyatamaam zandkina, tárangu,
<range>
nuwsha shitungeeranlluri, kayatamapanip naantachuri, kayatamapansha spirpa murtsureem kayatku parangina.
Itaru, ansha murits mantsir kinarangu, anoo ichuychayaru, yusur anuritam spir waana zandku, ashim kayatpi átu, kayatayataru parangina.
Anush Apanllsha nuwaa tárangiya. ¿Antaati nuw siyaa Israelchicheetsis yusur tínamaam pinasacheezi? Nda. Nuw uru spiraa kayatamapan tsapoo ichuychayaru, yusur tínaku, nuwsha siyaa ashtachtamana. Spiraa kayatamapan tsapoo uwish payuru, nuw siyaa ashitana, nuw Apanllee Taarashipani atina.
<range>
Nuw natumasamari tputsee ichingaru, misha kurakaatstam izuuru kapeetamaam zandkuri, ichuychakpaz ashimaam waritakina.
Wanari an tputs yutaritshishee kasakchusin, nda yuwaa waneeshshee zanganimaam zandarangi, anoo ndushapari zanganchina.
Nuwaana zandkuri, tputsee izapanimaam waritakitamana.
Itaru, uwshtisin yutaritshisheetsimari chinaksin, nda yuwaa tsiyatki anoo zandkusin, yuwaa istamaam zandki anoo watsta atina.
Ashiriya, nuw Apanlli Taarashipani atina. Utaáchchee, misha Irusarinshucheetstam kamaningcha. Wanimaam chinarangi an na iwapamtanda. Ashiri yutaritshishirineetsi kasayarusin, wanasirsha taachinllinpa, átcha tángcha.
Itaru, Utaáchichsha shiyaa táchpasinaya. Mangutish ántar ashkush, maararush; iyaana yuwari chinakani anuri ashkuni taachinipa. Watam mangishini chinakuni, yutaritshishingaz kapung zandkiniwa, shiyaa táchpasinaya, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, nuwaa kuki zurampatari mangoonangtsa, nuw siyaa Utaáchcheetsis atina.





Ashiri tputstisin nuwaa táranganaya. Jeremiyasaa pachamaam pza, iwapayani. Iyash apanllpan zapan taariya. Ashiriya, ¿mayaama uw Jeremiyas taach? Waani tsipap. Watam tayaspatampan zapantam taaruwa. Apanllee kuk kamanimapan pishtatareeja. Ashiriya, yutaritaam ínakchuch, tputssha kamiran Jeremiyasaa pachachinllinaya. Yuwaa tputs tsiyatkana anoo nda pakchiyam mazinachinipa, nuwaa táranganaya. Tárangusin, nuwsha Jeremiyasi Apanllpa tsiyatarangina.
Apaa, na mazinancha, yuwaa kundarari tsiyatkana anootsi.
Nuw yuwamand zapan istaki anumand ¿antaati tsipamaam waritak? nduni. Itaru, uwshtisin nuwaa anush pshtamaam tsapu kseeranganaya. Ashiriya, na mangish chinancha. Shiy waatssin tsiyantarangush, nuwsha watsiyun zambazap aturi, shiyaa kapung tsiyatarangina.
Ashirucha, natunaa ichingaru wip marizimun, misha k'chirpungumuntam tsipachinllinpa. Kamuzsha wanguymun tsipachinllinpa. Ashkatssin, kiz mashindunandarisha wip ndunar taachinllinaya. Kanungassha tapazish tsipamaam wayancha.
Wandaya ashiru, washchir wazapan zanganingi. Washchir kiyung yachakchu, zamamtarana anoo tputs mazinapana. Watam nuwaa pachapani atusin, tsapoo ktseeyaranawa. Yap naachi amb tsangayaranaya.
Itaru Apaa Taarashipanee, shiy yuwaa pachamaam iwapayarana, anoo uru yasaksha. Ashiri yutaritshishirineetsi tchinginllpa, yuwaa mantsir chinarangana anoo mbizarinllpa, Tsiyanpatish waneerush ksangi. Izuuru tpachingangcha, nuw Apanllee tárangina. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa tputs nuwaa pachamaam zandarangana anootsi.













































































Apanll Taarashipan siyaa ksutamapaneetsis atiya. Siy ksutamapanis, opeejareetsi nda wanasir ksutkus, tusuwakus, tsípamawshta, atiya.
Ashirucha, Apanll Taarashipan, yuw Israelchichee ksutku an, siyaa Israelchichee ksutamapan taakis anootsis, átcha. Siy nuwaa opeejari nda wanasir ksutkus, tusuwambeeris, anumand nuw zurampatari wanichintspa, nuw Apanlleeruri atina.
Ashiriya, yuw katuchimaw minupsha tsap nuwaana tusuwambarangi, anoo ichingaru yamayaruri, yusur waptam Israelap tsap wayachima. Anush kis taaksin, wip zapan izapanichinllinaya.
Ksutamapan misha wanasir wayachima. An wanasir ksutku, nda puniksin, nduntam arap tsípachinllinaya, nuw Apanlli Taarashipani atina.
Nuw Taarashipani siyaa atina. Ashiri yuwash zar tatsamkachu anush, Dapiyarinchich nlluranuree kurakaam wayachima. An mang' kapunguru, tputsee itsinsaru yasaru, tatsamooru chinaku taachiya.
An kurakaam kínaru, uru Utaáchchee wanasir ksutku, kamungamsin taachinllinaya. Israelchichsha ksatam taaksin, anoo kuraka, Iy Apanllirini tapachindampani, atusin ísamachinllinaya.
Ashiriya, nuw Taarashipani siyaa atina. Yuwash zar tatsamkachu, anush ndusha nuwaa, Apanll Israelchichee Ijiptosh tsap tashitungarangiya, tátssa, nda.
Apanll iyaa Israelchicheetsini zar charapungaru tashtap suwasuwaruni taaruni, anush iyaa tashitungayaru, yaanshusha yusur tsapunni wayarangiya, uru nuwaa tátssa, Apanll siyaa atiya, nuw Jeremiyasi atina. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll ksutamapanee wanasirsha yusur wayachima, tárangu anootsi.










































Jowakim Josiyasaarinee wip Utaásh tsap kurakaam kínaru, ipunpunar masach taachu, Nabukodonosorsha Babiloniyash kurakaamtam kínaru, minum masach taachu, anush Apanll nuwaa Jeremiyasaatsi, Utaáshuchee nuwaa kuki ichingaru kamanishini, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, nuwsha Utaáchchee, misha Irusarinshucheetstam tputs ichingaru Apanllee kuk kamanirangina.
Amónarini wip Josiyasaarini Utaásh tsap kurakaam kínaru, 13 masach taachu anush, Apanll nuwaa chtakchuri kamachtarangiya. Nuwsha zapan kamanta kamanta ashkuri, veintitres masach tatsamoorangtaati, itaru siysa nuwaa kuki nda payumaam zandarangsa.
Apanll tiptsiree min tayaspatamaam siyap zanganirangitaa, itaru siysa anootstam kuk nda payukus, mazinamaam nda zandarangsa.
Taarasheetsis mantsirimshee, misha yuwaatstam mantsir chinakis anoo ksangints. Ashkachus, uru Apanll siyaam, misha zitaminareemtamtis tsapoo panarangu, anush urutamari taatssa.
Apanllputsee pakchiyam chinayarus, ungirtarintspa. Anumun mangis taatintspa. Ashiri saana apanllputseem tínarangis anoo ungirtakus, Apanllee tayutaritintspa, nda siyaam waneeshish zanganimaama, tárangitaatssin,
itaru siysa nda anoo mazinamaam zandarangus, Apanll wamari ichingaru kasiru an siya atiya. Ashiriya, apanllputsireemis saana tínayarus, anootsimarisha ungirtakus, saanaatstatam tayutaritarangsa. Ashirangis anumand waneeshish kizpur yutari wayachima. Siy yuwaa waneeki anoo nda mangoonkis, anumand
<range>
zar charapungaru tashtap taakana ambchee ichingaru kuruzchima. Mishat, nuwaanaa kamachtakchuri, Babiloniyashchee urkar Nabukodonosora kuruzkachuri, kuseersin, siyashchee tputs, misha siyannung yakat taararutaru anpatari tputs ichingaru pachamaam kamachtachima. Amb ashkatssin, izuuru tputsee tpachingakchusin, yakat urutamari puripuritaru taachiya. Zaputaru taachiya.
Yuw waanpata shaniyeersin, michitkusin, zamamtar ashtarana anoo, misha yuw kizaa yamakchusin, shambatarana anoo, misha yuw patumbichpa toksin zunganeetaru, anootstam ndusha mazinachinllinaya. Nambarinaatssha tirooyarusin, 'sineeru kurakurtar ashtaru, anootstam ndusha pangchinllinaya.
Ashchiri nee yakat tunupeersin, kapeetkatssin, zaputarsha taachiya. Amb ashkachu, 70 masach Babiloniyashchimari kurak siyashchee tputs kasiru taachiya.
Ashiri 70 masach tatsamooramchu, anush Babiloniyashchee, misha Kaldewshucheetstam yutaritshishirini natstayaruri, wanichima. Ashkachuri, watstamamari pastachiya. Nuw Taarashipaneeruri zurampatari atina.
Yuwaa nee yakat ashtachima tárangi anoo tatsamchina. Kizpur wanichima. Yuw ichingaru kamanirangi an nish kirakash yandam taariya, yuw Jeremiyasaa ashpari kamachtarangi anu.
Min yakat kapunguw, misha kurak kizpureew, izuuru Babiloniyashchee kasichinllinaya. Amb ashkachuri, yutaritshishirini tuwapchiya, Apanll atiya, nuw Jeremiyasi atina. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll, yuwamand Utaáchich nuwaa kuki ngatarangana anumand nuwsha pachampanee tputsi zanganchima, tárangu anootsi.
























Josiyasaarini wip Jowakim Utaásh kaneeschiri kurakaam kínaru, anush nuwaa Apanll kamachtarangiya.
Nuwaa tárangiya. Panginungi watipuranll xiyeerush, Utaáchchee yuwaa kamachtakchi anoo ichinguroo kamanishini, anshuch yakat ichingarusin nuwash pangi kuseersin, nuwaatsimarisha ungirtamaama. Kamankush, nuwaa kuki minamtiyam ksarinllpa.
Apaz shiyaa kukish mazinakchusin, yutaritshishirineetsi kasakchusina, ashkatssin, nuwsha yuwaa wanimaam chinarangi anoo ndusha ashtachima.
Ashiri yuwaa nuw Apanlli Taarashipani áti anoo kamanincha. Wandaya nuwaa kuki nda mazinamaam zandkusin, nduntam payuksin,
misha yuwaatstam tputsireetsi tayaspatampani zangan zangan ashiranguri, zapan waneekana, anootstam nda mazinamaam zandkusin,
ashiri nee nuwaam pangurangana anoo Silósh tamarangparina, ashtachtamma. Ashkachuri, arapich tputs ichingarusin nee yakat pakchusin, Paja. Apanll yutaritshishimand waneeku, uru ashtariya, siyaa Utaáchcheetsis táchpasinaya, Apanll nuwaa tárangu, nuwsha Apanllip pang' naataranguri, anoo tputsee kamanirangina.
Apanllpansha urkar, misha tayaspatampantam ichingarusin anshuch yakat, yuwaa nuw Apanllee kuk kamanirangi anoo mazinanataranll ashirangsin,
kamanim iwatsparamchuri, nuwaatssha putayarusin, táranganaya. ¿Tsipatsee zandkish?
¿Tamarinaa Apanllee kuk kamankush, in Apanll pang' Silósh Apanlltam pang' tamarangpari ashtachtampari. Mishat, neetssha yakat izuuru Apanll kapeetkachu, tputs ndunarichshapari? átsha, tárangusin, nuwaa taturpiyeerusin, putayarusin, mantsir tsiyataranganaya.
Utaáshuchsha kurak anoo mazinarangu, waanaatsi pang' kasayaranllu, ambsha Apanllipsha pang' kusarangu, shítungash kaneeschiri wayama annung kuxineeramchusin,
apanllpansha urkar ichingarusin anush shaneerana, anshtisin, Kurakaa, nee tputs pachayaruch, ksanda átcha. Watam nee yakat mantsir tsiyatku, anoo siy ichingarus kitsis mazinarangitamsawa, tárangusin,
nuwsha kurakaa, misha tputsee ichingaru tsiyatkuri tárangina. Nuwaa waana Apanll ningeem siyaam kamanimaam kamachtarangu, anuritam nee Apanllee pang', misha yaktaatstam yuwaa waana Apanll tárangu, anoo kamankuri, siysa mazinarangsa.
Ashiri siy taarashis yarangints. Sheerus, Apanlleetssha kuk payungints. Ashkachus, yuwaa nuw siyaa kamanirangi, anoo ndusha waneeshshee zanganchiya.
Itaru, siynaa nuwaa yuwari zandkis anuri shingandama, watam nuwaa putayandsawa.
Itaru, nuw siyaa zurampatari atina. Siy wanari nuwaa wanasirimsheetstaati pachakchus, yuwamand ashkachis anumand siy kapung tumashiris taachiya. Watam waana Apanll nee tsiyatsis kamanimaam nuwaa zanganiranguwa, táranguri,
kuraksha, misha tputsi ichingarusin apanllpanee urkar táranganaya. ¿Mayaamaja nee tputs pachachich? Watam Apanllimun Taarashipanimun tsiyatkuwa, táranganaya.
Mishat, wachinsha chiyzayaru, tsiyatarangiya.
Mazinangtsa. Mangeetsis p'tsichintspa. Yuwapur Esekiyasarini kurakaam kínaru, Utaásh taarangu anpur, Mikiyas, Moresetshuch Utaáshcheem Apanlleetstam kuk kamanku, Apanll ichingaru wamari kasiru an Siyonaa mzatsish tatsumaam tsapoo ichuychatarana uru ashtachiya. Mishat, Irusarinaa yakat kapeetkachu, maachi ichingaru pátangamaw xanaa ashtachiya, misha Apanllsha pang' mach karutachiya, tárangu,
kuraksha Esekiyasarini, misha Utaáchich tputs ichingarusin anoo mazinarangusin, ¿antaati anumand Mikiyasarineetsi pacharangana? nda. Kurak kizpur punirangu, Apanllpasha tsiyatku, Apaa, amb shirinllpa. Iyaa nayaningcha, tárangiya. Anumandsha Apanll waneeshshee yuwaa wanimaam chinarangu anoo nda zanganirangiya. Ashirucha, iy wanasirimshee tputs Jeremiyasaa pachakchuni, ¿ndusha Apanll aranginash iyaa waniyach? tárangiya.
Mishat, tsiyatsis mangeetsis p'tsichintspa. Apanllee kuk kamanimapan Uriyasarini, Semayasarini wip, Kiriyat-Jeyarimshuch tputsi, iyashchee Apanllee kuk kamanirangitamta. Jeremiyas amarangparee yaktarineetsi mantsir tsiyatarangu ashirangtam,
anumandsha kurak Jowakim, misha kurak tsipasawtam ichingaru tputs anush shaniyrana antamsin yuwaa tsiyatarangu anoo mazinarangusin, Uriyasaa pachamaam chinarangusin, itaru Uriyassha anoo yasarangu, puniku, Ijiptop suwarangiya.
Kurak Jowakim Ijiptop Elnatanaa Akbora wip, misha arangeem min tputs zanganirangiya.
Ashiriya, anshtisin tputs Ijiptop Uriyasaa putayashinusin, kurakaam Jowakimaam panarangusin, uwsha, Pachayarus, wachush yuwash tsipari pshtakana anush pshtayarus, ksangints, tárangiya.
Ashirucha, nuwsha Ahikami, Safanarini wipi, Jeremiyasaa kasapana aturi, siyaa mangeetsis p'tseekuri tsiyatkina, tárangiya. Ashirucha, kuraksha nuwaa Jeremiyasaatsi nda pachamaam tputsee kamachtaku, watsta tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Jeremiyasaa pachayaruni kasayani, tputs tárangana anootsi.































































































Ashiri Apanll Israelchichee tárangiya; Minush zar Israelchich ichingarusin nuwaa Apanllirineem ínakchusin, nuwsha Israelchichee tputsireemi ínchima, tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Apanll átcha. Nuw siyaa zurampatari atina. Na apusap, mangin ndunarip siy taakus, nuw siyaa nayanikuri, nda tsipamaam machchintspa. Siy ¿yapee naayaruch, wanasirsha taachich? átus, kanusamaam zandkus, nuwsha siyaa tsapunpitamtis wayachintspa.
Nuw siyaa sirú Israelchicheetsis tsiyatarangi an zapan zar nda pakuri, tushiyanlliya. Nuw siyaa chinarangi, an urutamaricha ashirangshina. Na wandaritam wanasirpa chinakina.
Ashiri na yusur siyaa wanasir wayakchuri, sirú tamatarupsa taarangsa ashiritam taakus, charchar ántar ashkus, mangis kis michitatssa.
Samariyamun mach yusur kizarun tatsumeerus, kanungkachu, zapan wanus yusiykchu, kisshapa waatssa.
Ashiri ksutamapansha anush machish Efrayinash pakatu, punirustayaru, kuruzchiya. Naanints. Pza, Siyonash kuseeruni, yaanaatsi Apanllirini chinayaruni, ungirtayani, táchiya.
Taarashipan siyaa atiya. Siysa Israelchichis, mangis kis yaseengtsa, watam siyamari ichingarumand tputs kizpur wanasirsawa. Yuwaa yaseekis anoo mazinamaam kizpur yaseengtsa. Ashiri yaseekus, Apanll Taarashipan iyaa tiptsireetseeru katuchimini taarini anootsini tapachindayanlliya, tántsa.
Nuw siyaa nurtip yakat yap tsapurunas tspakamchu, amb yamayachuri, ichingarootsis tsapunpitamtis wayachintspa. Zapanis kanapeeshinus, ashpatamtis kachis mchusaw, misha kzimawtamtis, kiz ipanamaw naatambarangana, an tatsipamawshtisin zapanis táchimaam pinasshat, tsapunpitamtis kanaputssa.
Yutaritshishireetsis kasamaam nuwaa suriptartis tsiyatkus, nuwsha siyaa ngoots wanasirip nda pakchiyam tutumaam waninda, amb machkachuri, kung kizpur zaw ashitaru ashiruri, mikeeruri machintspa. Nuw watatana siy Israelchichis aparis. Nuw ipari iwachiztam watacha Efrayinaya, Apanll tárangiya.
Ashiri Apanllee kuk ichingarus minshucheewis tsap mazinantsa. Apanllee kuk arapeewtaa kamanintsa. Apanll Israelchichee arapeewtaa tusuwambarangitaa, itaru natsha yusur kuruzurangu, washunandsha na ksutkiya. Chinuzee ksutamapan opeejarineetsi ksutaru, ashiritam na ksutchiya.
Watam waana Apanll Akoparinchichee tapachindachuwa. Arapich tputs Israelchichee wamaritssin kasiktaatssin, ashiritaa Apanllsha tapachindachiya.
Ashkachu, mangis kissha Siyonamun íwar yuwaa Apanll istarangu anoo mangis chinakus, shambatkus, zamamtar ashtatssa. Apanllsha tirikoo, vinootstam, wayunganootstam, opeejaatstam, wakaraatstam izapaneekchu, anumand mangis ksakus, michitamaam Siyonash shaniyatssa. Apanll siyaa Israelchicheetsis wanasir ksutkachu, siysa nda ayamtaatiyam kiyung kachiyatssa. Israelchichis mzatsee kung kachachtaku, kizpur wanasirtaru, ashikpaz ashiru kissha taatssa.
Mishat, mangis mantstaris anoo wanasirsha wayakchu, mangis ksakus, zamamtarus, michitatssa. Kamasinawtam, kanungaseewtam, misha wachinawtam michitatssa. Síru kizpuritaa mangis mantsakus taarangus, itaru na in aranginasha mangis kis taatssa, Apanll siyaa atiya.
Tputsiri aship taakana an maacheetsi katungtsee paksin, mang' ksachinllinaya. Nuwap pangi katungats zapan wayakchusin, apanllpansha katungtsee wanasiri katungchinllinaya. Nuw Apanlli Taarashipani zurampatari atina.
Mishat, táchintspa. Ramush tputs tanukinaari, an Rakeltanda wip tsipayaru, anungaz mang' mantsaku, tanuku, anoo mazinachis. Wip tsipayaru, nda kis taamaam waritakiya.
Itaru, nuwsha Rakelaa; Arangeem tanurinllpa. Watsta. Shiy ashiru mangish mantsakish, an mbizangcha. Iparingazish kapung mangish mantsarangitaateesha, natsha mangish kisshaparee taachsha. Iparish kundararimandis watsapun káyashinusin, kuschinllinaya, nuw shiyaa atina.
Zapish wanasirshatanda taachish. Uru iparish kanapeechu, shaanshutam tsapunish kuschiya, nuw Apanlli Taarashipani atina.
Mishat, na mazinayanllina, Efrayinash tputs mang' mantsaksin tanukanaya. Iy kapaach karupan kayustan tamaparini ashiruni taariniya, Itaru Apaa, shiy iyaa yasamaam waritaksha. Ashirucha, shiyaa Taarashipaneetsis, yusur chinamaam zandkiniya, watam shiyaa apariniwa.
Shiyaa yutaritshishirinimandini tuwanlltakpaz ashirangtaatini, itaru natunaa yusur shiyaa chinakaniya. Shiyaa kapung tayutaritarangini, anumand titkurineetsini tiyum tiyum ashkiniya. Kanungastamini yutari chinatarini anoo chinakuni, kapung pazikaniya, táchinllinaya, Apanll tárangiya.
Ashiriya, Apanllsha zurampatari átcha. Nuw Efrayinchichee ichingarumand ipari kasiru kizpur chinakina. Wandtaati kizpur waneeranguri, itaru nuw nda mbizakina. Urutari waa mangishi chinakuri taakina; misha urutamari nayanikina.
Israelchichis, kaapa mangishis chinangtsa. ¿Yapi masatarangus, nuwaa kasarangis? Ngootsish sírangantsa kamiranaari natstamaama. Ashiriya, ngootsi kaapaniri natstayarus naatatssa. Ashikpaz ashkus, yusur nuwash nungi tuzamutssa.
Kiz suwayaru, xiytat ashku, nda yusur wanasirsha chinayaru, wazaranllip kanaptariya. Itaru, siysa nda ashitssa. Nuw siyaa mangeetsis p'tseekchuri, nuwaa yusur chinakchus, kanaputssa. Ashkachu, tsapurunasshuchsha tputs anoo yasayarusin, ¿Tamashta Apanll ashik? táchinllinaya, Apanll tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Israelchich wanpeetam watsapun yusur kanapchinllina anootsi.
Apanll Taarashipan, Israelchich Apanllirini, wamari kasiru taaku an, siyaa átcha. Nuw Utaáshchee tputs taárashi wanasirsha wayamaam zandkachuri, uru watsapuniptam kanapeersin, yaktarinshitam yusur taachinllinaya. Ashkachuri, tputssha, ¡Apanll tamara! Nee machi kapung chinakiya, watam nish yaanpatatini tatsamoorini chinakaniwa, táchinllinaya.
Anushsha watsapunish Utaáchich tputs tarawzupantam, chinuzee opeeja ktsutamapanitam ichingarusin taachinllinaya.
Ashiriya, tputs mariztaksin, nuwsha katungats kapung panachima, misha waashineemtamta. Katungkusin kizpur nizirangsin, wizpur ndunareewshta, anoo tuwizpurtamaama, Apanll nuwaa miranish tárangiya.
Ántaru, támaranlluri, napa ashirangina. Kapung mangi ksarangina. Watam wanasir pamazooranginawa.
Apanll Taarashipan zurampatari átcha. Yuwash zar tatsamkachu anush nuw uru tputsee, misha maachtaatstam chinuzi izapaneekchuri, Utaásh Israelchich zapanichiya. Chinuzsha zapantam taachiya.
Anuri tputsireetsi tsiyantayaruri, tachiyamaam, misha pachayaruri, kapeetamaam kizpur chinarangitaati, itaru natsha izapaneeyaruri, anoo ksutkuri taachina, Apanll siyaa átcha.
Anush zar tputs, Wapar kizarun kapzimashee katungkusin, wipsha wanas tstsatkusin, tsipakanaya, ndusha táchinllinaya.
Watam ¿chakamasa kizarunaa tsipatsimashi katungkachiya? waanamandari yutaritshishirini tsipachuwa.
Apanll zurampatari siyaa atiya. Nuw uru Utaáchichpa, misha Israelchichpatatam yusur tatsuyakchuri, kaneesichsha wanasir chinachi. An zar uru tatsamchima.
Na tatsuyashish kaneesich wayakchuri, yuwaa sirútama zitaminarpatis tsiyatarangani anoo kasiriya. Anpur zitaminarineetsis uw patsisayaruri, Ijiptosh tsap tashitungayaruri, nuw wanasiritaa tsiyataranguri, itaru uwshtisin nuwaa tayutaritarangsin, nuwaa kuki kapeetaranganaya. Nuw wanasiritaa ksutaranguri, ashiritaa nuwaa ngataranganaya.
Ndusha ashimaam na in yusur wanasir chinamaam tatsuyakchuri, nuwaanaatsi kamachtamari mangshuwarisha pshtachima. Mishat, nuwaa urutamari chinamaam chínashshutam nuwaanaatsi kuki yandakpaz ashtachima. Ashkachuri, nuwaa Apanllirineemi ínakchusin, nuwsha tputsireemi ínchima. Nuw Taarashipaneeruri zurampatari atina.
Ashkachuri, ndusha tayaspatampaningaz nuwaa kuki yasapani atusin zandchinllinaya. Watam ashparitaa nllur, wachinaatstam nuwaa izuuru mangoonamaam yutaritshishirineetsi tachingachuri, nda yusur anootstam chinachinllinawa, nuw Taarashipani zurampatari atina, Apanll Israelchichee tárangiya. Ashiri na kamaneena yuwaa zapshinaa Apanll Israelchichpa tatsuyakchusin, Apanlleetsimarisha chinachinllinaya anootsi.





















































































































Ashiriya, Jowakim Josiyasaarini wip, Utaásh yakat kurakaam kínaru, ipunpunar masach taachu, anush Apanll nuwaa Jeremiyasaatsi tárangiya:
Jeremiyasaa, nimun kirakamun yandangi. Israelchich taarana, misha Utaáchich taarana, minpicheewaatstam tsap sirú tsiyatarangi, anoo ashpari yandangi. Yuwamandari Josiyasaarini kurakaam kínaru tsiyatarangi, anumandari yandam chtayarush, naturisha tsiyateertamti, anumun tutsípancha.
Wandaya Utaáshuch yuwaa waneeshshee zanganimaam zandki, anoo mazinayarusin, puniksin, yutaritshishirineetsi kasakchusin, nuwsha yutaritshishireetsi tachingeeruri, mapiychshitina, Apanll tárangu,
nuwsha Barukaa, Neriyasa wip, kuruzeeruri, yuwaa Apanll tsiyatarangu anoo ichingaru kamaniranguri, kirakamun uwsha yandarangiya.
Ashirangu anumunsha, nuw Barukaa tárangina: Nuwaa Apanllip pang' naamaam tuxarakanawa.
Ashiri shiynaa Apanllip pang' naayarush, napashini. Yuwash Apanlleem mangumaam shaniykana, anush kuseerush, kirakareetsi natstangcha. Anshuch yakat ichingarusin shaneerana, misha Utaáshuch tputs anshutam shaneerana, antamsin Apanllee kuk mazinachinllinaya.
Apaz anoo mazinakchusin, yutaritshishirineetsi kasayarusin, Apanllish yusur tachitkatssina. Watam Apanll yutaritshishirimandini tsiyantaku, waneeshshee zanganimaam zandku, an kapung yutaritawa, táranguri,
Baruksha, yuwaa nuw kamachtaki, anoo ashpari yandayaranllu, Apanllip pang' naayaru, anushsha Apanllee kuk kirakamun yandarangu, anoo natstarangiya.
Jowakim, Josiyasaarini wip Utaásh kurakaam kínaru, zameetpa masach tsupsha 9 taachu, anush ichingarusin Irusarinshuch, misha Utaáshchitam tputs, anush kusatarusin, Apanlleem mangumaam shaniykana anush,
Baruksha Apanllinung watimburanll wanasir wayarana, misha shtandashini kaneeschiri wayarana annung, misha annungitam Safanarini wip Guemariyas yuwash kirakaa yandaku anoom tandapunurana, annung Baruk xiyeeru, kirakareetsi ichingaru natstarangiya.
Ashiri Mikayassha, Guemariyas wip, Safanarini wachinllinu, yuwaa Baruk Apanllee kuk natstaku, anoo ichingaru mazinarangu,
kurakap pang' mikeeru naatarangu, yandampanip Elisamap watandpun kuseeru pshturangu, anush yandampani Elisam suru, kurakatam istampan zapan shaneerana anoo parangiya. Delayas, Semayas wip, misha Elnatan, Akborarini wip, misha Guemariyas, Safanarini wip, misha Sedekiyas, Hananiyas wip, arangeem kurak tsipastam shaneerana,
anush Mikayassha yuwaa Baruk Apanllee kuk natstarangu, anoo ichingaru kurakaatssha kamanirangiya.
Kurakshitisin anoo mazinayarusin, Jehudí, Netaniyasa wip, Selemiyasa wachinllinu, Kustam wachinllinu, táranganaya: Shiysha Barukaa kamanishini. Yuw tputs wazapanish naatstarangish, an kirak pananda tángcha, tárangusin, Jehudísha Apanllip pang' naatarangu, Barukaatssha kurakaa kuk kamanirangiya. Baruksha, Ayu tárangu, kirakaa yáyaranllu, yuwash kurak istampan shaneerana anush kusarangiya.
Ashiri uwshtisin, Naani, k'xinangi. Sheerush, Barukaa, kirak payurish an natstangi, tárangusin, uwsha natstarangiya.
Kuraksha istamapan anoo mazinayarusin, kapung punirangusin, waanpatatin tsiyatkusin, Nee k'kuz kurak kapungu kamaninda atiya, táranganaya.
Anumunsha Barukaa táranganaya; Kamaninda. ¿Tamayarush nee yandarangsha? táranganaya.
Baruksha, Jeremiyas nuwaa kamanirangu, nuwsha anoo kirakamun yandarangina, tárangiya.
Kuraksha istampan; Shiy, misha Jeremiyas ashirus piyam naayarus tapishumatssa, nda tputs siyaa pamaama, táranganaya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Baruk Apanllish pang' Jeremiyasaa yandamarini natstarangu anootsi.
Ashiri kurak tsipasaw Barukaa wirkar Elisamash watandpun kasayarandsin, kurakapsha Jowakimap pang' yuwaa Baruk natstarangu, anoo kamanini atusin, naatarangsin, anush kuseersin, kamaniranganaya.
Kuraksha anoo mazinayaru, Jehudí kamachtarangiya. Kirakaa, yuw Elisamash watandpun wayarangana, an yashini, tárangiya. Jehudí kirakaa yáyashinu, anush kurak, mishat kuraktam istamapan ichingarusin, mazinarsin, natstarangiya.
Tsup Noviembrish kachizpasash shaniyarangsin, kurak pangush sumasinung kuxinxinaw ashirangiya.
Ashiriya, Jehudí yandamaa ipunpunarparee kshurangam natstachu, anootsiri kuraksha kirakaa yáyaru, k'chirpa ktureeru sumasush pshtataa, yusur natstayaru pshtataa ashirangu, izuuru kirakaa ashpiri muchiramchu, kasarangiya.
Kurak Jowakim, misha kurakawtam tsipasaw anoo k'kuz mazinarangitaatssin, nda pakchiyam puniranganaya. Mishat, nda mang' mantsaksin wamari izichiranganaya.
Ashirucha, Elnatan, Delayas, misha Guemariyas ashirusin, Kurakaa, kirakaa muchinllpa, tárangitaatssin, itaru Jowakimsha nda anoo kuk payumaam zandarangiya.
Itaru, wipaatssha Jerahmeela pachampanee urkar, misha Serayasa, Asriyela wip, misha Selemiyasa Abdeela wip, Siysa Jeremiyasaa, misha Barukaa putashinints, tárangu, itaru Apanllsha waatssin pishurangu, nda putaranganaya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa kurak Jowakim, Apanllee kuk sumasush muchirangu anootsi.
Yuwaa nuw, Barukaa Apanllee kuk kamaneeruri, uwsha kirakamun yandarangu, anoo kuraksha Jowakim tiroorangu, anumun iwaz yusur Apanll nuwaa tsiyatku tárangiya.
Yusur kirak turpim yáyarush, anush ichingaru yuwaa tachtaru yandayarush, Utaáshuchsha kurak Jowakim tiroorangu, anutam ashpari yandangi.
Sheerush, Jowakimaa táncha: Apanll Taarashipan shiyaa átcha. Shiy kirakaa yandama tirooyarush, Jeremiyasaatssha mantsir tsiyatarangsha, yuwamand kirakaa yandarangu anumanda. Babiloniyashchee kurak shiy tuxaraksha. Itaru, zurampatari nee yakat nuw kapeetkachuri, uru tputs, misha chinuztam nda minumtiyam taachiya.
Ashirucha, nuw Apanlli Taarashipani Utaáshchee kurak Jowakimaa atina; Shiyachich nlluranur ayamtaati nda kurakaam kinakintachinllinaya. Mishat, shiy tsipakchush, nda mapkusin, mangu wishchip zareetsiri tamuw ashtachsha. Psaansha kachizaatsiritam tamuw ashtachsha.
Yutaritshishirimandis shiyaa, misha maachiritaatsish ashpari, misha shiyaa ksutkana, yandampani, kurak tsipasawtam taarana anpatari ichingaru wanichintsa. Yuwaa waneeshshee kamanirangi an tuzanganeekchuri, siyaa ichingarootsis Utaásh taakis anootsis kiyung yachachiya. Watam siy nuwaa kuki nda mangoonamaam zandaksawa, táncha, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya.
Ashiri nuwsha yusur kirakaa yáyaruri, Barukaamsha yandampaneem panarangina, yusur yandap aturi. Ashiranguri, nuw yusur kamanirangina yuwatam tachtaru yandayaru, kuraksha Jowakim tiroorangu anootstamta. Itaru, arangeem nuw yandamaam kamanirangina. Ashiri yuwaa Apanll Jeremiyasaa yusur yandamaam kamachtarangu anoo kamaneena.
Babiloniyshuch kurak, Nabukodonosor Utaáshchee kasiyaru, Sedekiyasaatssha, Josiyasaa wip, Utaáshcheem kurak ínarangiya. Jowakimaa wip kurakaam ínamaam nda zandku, Josiyasaaa wip Sedekiyasaatssha kurakaam ínarangiya.
Itaru, Sedekiyassha, misha istampantam, misha anshuchirisha tputs ichingarusin Apanllee kuk nuw kamanirangi anoo, pakchiyam mazinamaam nda zandaranganaya.
Ashiritaa, ndaturi nuwaa tumanarusin, nuw kamiran tputsish xiyrangina. Mishat, anpuritam Ijiptoshuch kurak wasundururpat Ijiptomand tsap káyarandsin, Irusarinap Utaáchchee tapachindamaam naataranganaya. Itaru, Kaldewshuchsha Irusarinshuchee iturpirangana anoo mazinarangusin, waanpeetam watsapun kanapuranganaya. Anumand kurak Sedekiyas tputsee Jukala sur, Seremiyasa wip, mishat apanllpanee Sofoniyasa, Maseyasa wip, kamachtarangiya. Jeremiyasap naapashinints. Anush kuseerus, Iyamari kundarareetsini kasimaam Apanllpa tsiyatancha, tángcha, tárangiya.
<range>
<range>
Tárangu, Sedekiyassha tiptsir nuwash kusarangsin, itaru Apanllsha nuwaa kamachtaku tárangiya.
Jeremiyasaa, shiy kurakaa Sedekiyasa tiptsir táncha, tárangu, nuwsha kurakaa Sedekiyasa tiptsir, Kurakareetsis, Apanll mang átcha, tángtsa. Paraw wasundurur shiyaa istamaam naatarangu, an yusur na Ijiptoptam kanapumawa.
Mishat, Kaldewshuchsha iyashchee pachamaam yusur kanapkattamsinaya. Kanapeechusin, tputsee pachayarusin, Irusarinaa sumaspasha tirooyarusin, kasachinllinaya.
Ashiri kurakaa, nuw Taarashipani shiyaa táchinllpa. Watstamaritand kanapeeranll tárinllpa, nda ashipa. Kaldewshuch urutanda siyaa pachamaam kuschinllinaya.
Wandtaati siy yuwaa Kaldewshuch pachamaam naanllina, anoo kasiykchus, itaru yuwsha ixambeerus kasarangis anshatanda tsapunshis kuskatssin, yaktareetsis sumaspa tirooyaru kasachu, Apanll átcha, tángtsa, nuw tárangina.
Ashiri Kaldewshuch sundar Irusarinaa kasayarusin naakchusin, an parawtanda wasundurur watsiritatanu ashchinllina.
Anpur, nuwsha yakat Irusarinaa shitungamaam zandarangina. Benjaminap watsapun wanasirsha napati, aturi, nuwaam tsapuni kaneeschi panarangana anoo napatama, tárangina.
Itaru, Irusarin watandpun wach shtandshini sur Benjaminnung kusaranguri, kapitansha Iriyas sur, Selemiyas wip, Hananiyas wachinllinu, nuwaa tuxarayaru, tárangiya. ¿Mayaamsha shiy iyashchee tamapingakush, Kaldewshuchee istamaam naatatsha? tárangiya.
Nuwsha, ¿Antaati nuw Kaldewshuchee istakee? Ngutariti yap nlluratarangi amb pangati aturi, naatina, tárangina. Táranguri, Selemiyassha nda mazinamaam zandku, nuwaa putayaru, kurakapsha machtarangiya.
Nuwaa kapung tsiyantarangusin, yasinpa pzkuyarusin, Jonatanash watandpun, yuwash tumanamaam wayarangana, anush tumanamaam kamachtaranganaya.
Ashiri nuwsha tumanshishish wantsush kachutamash taaruri, anush zapan zar taarangina.
Ashiri anush tumanshishish taaruri, zapish Sedekiyassha kurak tiptsiree; Jeremiyas yamashinints, tárangu, uwshtisin nuwaa yamayashinusin, kurakash pang' yushindarangusin, kuraksha, Tputs mazinarusinapa, átu, apinlliri nuwaa masharangiya; ¿Shiy Apanllee kuk nuwaa kamanimaam kamachtarangu an payurish? tárangu, nuwsha; Kurakaa Apanll siyaa ateeja, Uru Babiloniyashuch siyaa kurakaa, tayutaritchiya, tárangina.
Anshurtatam nuw kurakaa masharangina, Kurakaa, ¿may yutari shiyaa ashiranguri, nuwaa shiy tumanaksha? Mishat, ¿mayaaja tputsireetsish yutarit ashirangi? Mishat, ¿mayaa Irusarinshuchee yutarit ashirangi? ¿Antaati nuw mangutariti tumanshish taamaam zandkeezi?
Mishat kurakaa, ¿yuwshta siy tayaspatampaniris? ¿Antaati Babiloniyashuch kurak iyaa Utaáshcheetsini pachacheeja? atana, anoo kamaninganda.
Ashiriya, kurakaa, nuw shiyaa mashkuri, shiysha mazinangandama. Nuwaa nayaninda. Yusur Jonatanap watandpun tumaneerush, anshuri pcharishpa, nuw tárangina.
Ashiri kuraksha Sedekiyas, guardiyanungirisha watipuranll tumanamaam kamachtarangu; anootsirisha tumaneersin, pangaa tupaxanxampan kuskusin, anush pangaa yáyarusin, ichingaru zar nuwaam panataranaya. Ndatuma Irusarinash yakat pang kachingchu, uru nuwaam pangaa maritaranganaya. Ashirucha, nuwaa ndusha tumanshishish tumankusin, sundarunungirisha watipuranll taarangina. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Jeremiyasaa tumanarangana anootsi.





























































































































































































































































































































































































Ashiriya, Sedekiyas 21 masachirini taachu, anush Irusarinash kurakaam kínayaru, onsi masach taarangiya. Wanir Libnashchimuncha tputsi, sur Jamutalamuna, Jeremiyasarini wipa.
Sedekiyas Jowakim tamarangpari ashiritam nda Apanllee kuk payumaam zandku, mantsir taarangiya.
Ashirucha, Apanllsha kizpur Irusarinshuchee, misha Utaáchcheetstam tsiyantarangu, nda pakchiyam istamaam zandku. Watsta, tárangiya. Sedekiyas Babiloniyashchipa kurak kapungtam tsiyantarangu, kurakaa kuk kapeetarangiya.
Sedekiyas kurakaam kinaru taaru, diesash zar, chungash tsup, nuevish masach, anush zar kurak Nabukodonosor wasundurarpa Irusarinshuchee pachamaam naataranganaya. Anush kuseersin, yaktaa ashchiri kátiripeersin, Irusarinash yakat pshtuyaruni, watandpunumun káreeruni, tputsee tpachingayani, atusin, káringashee tínaranganaya.
Ashiri yaktaa katiriparusin, yuw Sedekiyas kurakaam kínarangu, an onsi masachsha tatsamoochu,
tsup ipunpunarsha, zar nuevish, Irusarinash katungats nduneerangu, ¿Mashta katungeechinllina?
Psaan Babiloniyshuchsha sundar tandapunuzee zpeeyarusin, Irusarinash pshtututanana, anoo Sedekiyassha ichingaru wasundurupa arangeemari suwaranganaya. Wapshtu tsimbun tawazindaru tandapunarangana, yuwanung kurak mazaree taarangu, tipuranllizeemsha wayarangana annung suwaranganaya. Suwayarusin, Ortagap kung tit ashiranganaya.
Itaru, Kaldewshuchsha sundar kurakangaz Sedekiyasangaz tachitarangsin, Jericoyanung yakat kamatarangsin, putaranganaya. Sedekiyassha wasundurur ichingarusin urkaree kasayarusin, suwaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, kurakaa Sedekiyasa, misha tsipasawaatstam kurak putarangusin, Babiloniyashchipsha kurak Nabukodonosorup machtaranganaya. An kurak Hamatash watsapun, Riblash yakat taaru, anush yushindayarusin, kurak Nabukodonosor Sedekiyasaa wanimaam wasundururee kamachtarangiya.
Ichtaru, Sedekiyas waana paru, wipaatsima wayarpunoo ktsuparanganaya. Mishat, Utaáshuch tputs kizpureew taarana anootstam wayarpunoo ktsupamaam kamachtarangitamta.
Sheeru, anumunsha amuyaatsirisha Sedekiyasa kateenpa kamuriyarusin, wachootssha yuxeersin, Babiloniyap macheersin, tumaneersin, anushurisha tsiparangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa Babiloniyashuch tputs kurakaa Sedekiyasarini putayarusin, kiyung yacharangana anootsi.
Nabukodonosor Babiloniyash kurakaam kínaru, masach 19, tsupsha zameetpa, zarsha dies taachu, anush guardiya urkar Nabusaradan sur Irusarinush kusarangu,
Apanllee pang', misha kurakaatstam pang' kizpur wanasiri, ichingaru Irusarinash pangus taaru, misha kurak tsipasawaa pangu ichingaru tiroorangiya.
Babiloniyshuchsha sundar Irusarinaa watandpun tunupeeru kapeetarangitamta.
Sheersin, anumunsha Nabusaradan, Irusarinshuchee tputs ichingaru putayarusin, Babiloniyap machtaranganaya. Ashpatam tputs Nabukodonosoraa chinarangitaatssin, anootstaa putarangusin, misha tputsee maachtaa tínamapaneewa putayaritamsin, Babiloniyapsha machtaranganaya.
Ashirangsin, yuwaatsimarisha tputs pukir kiyung kachiykusin taakana, anootsimsha mázaree puyaksin, kizarun kanungamaam, atusin, kasaranganaya.
Kaldewshuch Apanllish pang' maachee tínamaw taarangu, ngusamb chumbeepimashi anoo, misha tsimbun kshurangam uxinashpatari taarangu, misha kungoom wayarangana maachi kapungu anpatari pátangaranganaya. Sheersin, ichingaru ngusamb chumbeepimashi Babiloniyapsha yátaranganaya.
Masunll kapeetamapaneetstam, paalaatstam, mbarin tzatamapanee, misha mangawaatstam, kucharunatam kapungumashi, ichingaru ngusamb chumbeepimashee Apanlleem ungirtamaam payukana anoo yaranganaya.
Anumunsha, guardiysha urkar oroo chumbeepimashee, mishat urutam mburshimashee, mangawaatstam pakchimashi, mangawaatstam masunllpani, mangawaatstam kapungumashi, mbarinaatstam uxinash, misha kucharunaatstam kapungumashi, misha mangawaatstam yuwash vinoo Apanlleem muchkana anootstam,
mishat yuwaatstam Apanllish pang' tsimbun shurangaru, ngusamb chumbeepimash wayarangana, wakaraam upapchireem ngusamb chumbeepimashpa 12 tínanarangusin, anumunsha ush wayamaam kungoom kapung ksheewamaam kayatarangana, anootstam, misha kurak Salomon Apanlleem pang' tínamaam kamachtarangu, kizpur kayakamuna nda kiloo táchimaam waritaru taarangu.
Minamtawari shurangam íwaririni uchu metoro kánuru taaratarangu, anootssha kshurangama 5 metro anumun chawap taturpiru wantsush kurimunaz taarangu, an ngusamb chumbeepimash 7 sentimetru tuwapirini taarangiya.
Tsimbunari kshurangam ashimanandari taarangiya. Kshurangamun iwaz ngusamb chumbeepish iripcheew kapunguw minamtawmunari pshkum wayaw wayaw ashirangana. An iripich íwaririni tsimbuna metor kánurangiya. Anumunsha ktam ashchiri iturpiru ngusamb munlliy tamapari ashiru kurakurtaru wanasir taarangiya.
Pshkurutaru anumun ktam iturpirangitamta. Minumtawmunari pshkum 96 munlliy tamapari ashiru taarangiya. Anumunsha iwaz 100 munlliy tamapari ashiru taarangtamta. Anpatari ashpiri yaranganaya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanllish pang' maachtawaa yarangusin, sumaspa muchirangana anootsi.
Guardiy urkar, Nabusaradan Irusarinshuchee tputs zapan putarangiya. Apanllpanee urkar, Serayasaa putarangiya. Sofoniyasaatstam, apanllpanee urkar istampanee putarangitamta. Mishat, Apanllee pang' ksutamapaneetstam tuchip tputsee putarangitamta.
Sheeru anumunsha, yaktashurisha sundaru urkar, misha 7 tputs kurakaa mang' p'tsimpan taarangana anootstam, misha sundarootstam putampanee sheeru, arangeem 60 tputs putarangiya.
Sheeranllu, Nabusaradan, kurakap Nabukodonosorap, Hamatap tsap, yakat Riblap ashpari machtarangiya. Anush kurak Nabukodonosor pachamaam wasundururee kamachtarangiya. Amb ashirangsin, Utaáchich watsapun kurimunaz taarangiya. Tputs ichingarusin shitungaranganaya.
<range>
Utaáchchee putayarusin, yusursha putata, putata ashirangsin, zapan putaranganaya. Nabukodonosor kurakaam kinaru, 7 masach taachu, anush Utaáshchee tputs 3,023 putayaru waanpee watsapun machtarangiya.
18 masachsha taachu, anushsha 832 Irusarinshucheetssha putayaru machtarangitamta.
23 masach taachu, anushsha guardiysha urkar, Nabusaradan 745 tputsee putayaru, washunand Utaáshuchpa 4,600 tputs kurak Nabukodonosor Babiloniyap machtarangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Utaáshchee Babiloniyap machtarangana anootsi.
Utaáchich urkar Jowakim Babiloniyash tsap tumanimash 37 masach taachu, tsupsha 12, zarsha 25 anush minsha tputs Evil-merodak sur Babiloniyshucheem kurak kinarangiya. Ansha Jowakimaa kizpur chinarangu, tumanshishish ishitungarangiya.
Ashirangu, Jowakimpa wanasir tsiyatarangsin, kapung chinaranganaya. Anush Babiloniyash kurak putamaw zapantaa taarangsin, itaru Jowakimaatsimari kapung chinarangu, wanasir naparangiya.
Amb kurak ashirangu, Jowakimsha anush kissha taarangiya. Tumanamash kamartarangu, anoo yusheeru, nllitarisha wanasir kamartarangu, kurakpasha washunand kuxineersin, katungaranganaya. Amb ashirangu kissha anush taarangiya.
Anumun arangeem kurak Babiloniyashuch Jowakimaam watungasheem ichingaru zar katungamaam wayarangiya. Ashirangu, kissha taaku, wachinayaru, anshurisha Babiloniyash tsiparangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa kurak Jowakim Babiloniyash tsap tsiparangu anootsi. [Watamari nuw Jeremiyasi kuki.]


























































































































































Nuw Esekiyeltana Apanllee kuk kamanimapani, Busi wipa. Minush zar nuw Babiloniyash kungumun wingu Kebaramun Apanllee parangina. Washunand ichinguruni anush putamanandani apusap tsap puzap taaranganiya. Yuw Israelchichee kurak Jowakimarini putayarusin, arap apusap tsap machtarangana, an zameetpa masach tushiychu, zarsha zameetpatash, tsupsha ipunpunaru, anush kanind tawatarangu, Apanllee pamazukpazi ashiruri parangina. Anush zar Apanllsha nuwamun uwee wayayaru, tuwizpurtangiya.
<range>
<range>
Amb ashirangu, yap zar puwachingarattu ambeem kambusur kizpur kambustarangu, psassha yakarangitamta. Sumassha watsam kurakurtaru patarich, misha mamar tamatarparee ashiru mamartarangiya. Ashirangu, annungirisha kizpur kuraa ashirangu, kachich ksimunamaam waritarangiya. Ipusanandsha sumas ashiru tuwasineeru, kurakurtaru, maachi ngusamb chumbeepimash ksaneeyaruch tamatarparee ashiru parangina.
Anushsha ipusanand tputs ashtamaru ipunpunar parangitamana.
Ansha tputs ashiru minamtashuri nutsas ipunpunar tash taaru parangina. Itaru, wazitpungachsha ipunpunartam taarangitamta.
Upazsha, misha wanumbitam waj itsinsaru zúkikiru, wanashirsha wakar karupan waxizup ashiru kurakurtaru tuwasineerangiya. Maachi ngusamb kizpur wanasir kapasirumchichtaru kurakurtar ashtaru ashirangiya.
Ansha ipunpunar tshiz, misha wach ipunpunartam, misha wazitpungach ipunpunartam taaru, ansha tputsich ashtamaru taarangiya. Ansha wazitpungach yuwaptartatam tasasaru anpatari kandanirangiya. Naamaam zandkachu, yapiri tasasaru ambiri naarangiya.
<range>
Yuwsha tash ipunpunar taarangu, ambiritam tasasaru, tputsich tashich tamaparee ashtamarangiya. Uputsitsinungichsha tash tumuz ashtamarangiya. Mbazinungichsha tash wakar toro tamaparee ashtamaru taarangiya. Anumunsha, ushipsha yungan ashtamaru taarangiya.
Pursha wazitpungach íwar itsiraru izandararu taarangiya. Anshitisin tsimbunari wazitpungachpatatin kandanirangitamta. Minpasha wazitpungach tsimbunatam waanaatsi irpungarangiya.
Washunandari wanandari tsinisaru naanataraa ashirangiya. Nda kanapku, yapiri tasasaru ambiri naatarangiya. Yapiri tsinisaru Apanll wizpur kamachtarangu ambiri naarangiya.
Anshacha, yuw tputs ashtamaru kinarangu, ansha sumas watsam ashtamaru, misha maachi tuzaz sunlleerutaru patarich ashirangiya. Naanatara, piyamsha naanatara, ipusanand ashishtar ashirangiya. Sumas tamaparee ashiru kurakurtaru anushsha shitungarangitamta. Mamarsha kizpur mamartarangiya.
Yuw tputs ashiru anshat naanat, kanapta, yusur naanat, tsípat ashirangiya. Mamar ashiru ansha tsípatara ashirangtamta.
Nap ashiranguri, tputsinungiri tsapush wanungeetari pshiyrshish iripich parangina.
Ashpari ipunpunari iripich waanandari tatsamooru, wayarutaru, kurakurtaru, tuwasineerangiya. Wich patumbich wanasirimash tamatarparee ashirangiya. Pshiyrshish tamaparee ashtamaru, anush wachush washunand tapamta tapamta ashiru, wanasireew parangina.
Anpasha mikeeru purangamaam waritarangiya. An yuw ipunpunar taaru anpata wapitam kanapta ashishtamaam nda waritarangiya.
Mishat, nap ashkuri, parangitamana, yuw ipunpunaru iripich anich tamatarparee ashiru, kapung iripich torreezaru kurakurtaru, annungirisha tuwasineerangu, isping tamaparee ashirangiya.
Ansha Apanllsha wan tputs ashiru, mikeeru naakchu, uwma kárkachu, iripichsha naarangitamta. Ansha chiyzata ashkachu, uwsha chiyzata, naata ashkitamta.
Apanllsha tputs ashtamaru, yapiri waana kamachtaku, wizpur Apanll tuyamzakachu, iripichsha washunandari tatsamooru naaktamta. Watam minamari waanandari washunand tapatstakpaz ashiru nuw parangina.
Tputssha chiyzata, naanatara ashkachu, uwsha iripich chiyzata, naanatara ashkitamta. Tputs ashiru an zanaykachu, uwsha zanayta ashkitamta. Wandaya tputs Apanll wani chiyzayaru, naakchu, uwsha washunandarit naata ashkitamta. Watatam iripchimash washunandari tapatstarangiya.
Muchumunsha iwaz ispingu ashiru kurakurtaru, wiriwirtaru, taarangiya.
Tsapushoomsha tputs ashiru waanpatatin wazitpungachpatartin kandaninir ashirangiya. Tsimbunartisin waanaatsi irpungapaz ashiranganaya.
Mishat, zunganeerangu, kitsishi mazinarangitamana. Wazindpungachsha íwar itsirataraa, naanataraa ashkachu, kung tawangur kumbiykchu, amtarparee ashiru zunganeerangiya. Itaru, an waana Apanll kizpureeru, wizpur zunganeeku tárangiya. Sundar marchaku, zapan zunganeeku amtarparee ashirangiya. Nuw anoo mazinarangina. Itaru, wanuts xiykamchu, wazitpungachsha yaruwawataraa, zanayta ashirangiya.
Shitungeeshinu, kapung zunganeerangiya. Yuwamun ispingu ashiru kurakurtaru, anumun iwaz yusarangiya, yuwashtam much itsiparu anshutam zunganeerangitamta.
Muchimun iwaz wanasir ispingu ashtamaru wayarangu anumun iwaz Apanll uxinash ashiru parangina. Anushsha patumbich wanasirimish kawamban kizpur mbamash parangina. Anushsha uxinashish tputs ashiru kuxinarangiya.
Yuw tputs ashiru parangi, ansha waturtumand káru íwar kizpur kurakurtar ksimunamaam waritarangiya. Ngusamb chumbeepimash ashiru kawapshitaru anamunsha taturpiru, sumas ashiru kurakurtar ashirangiya. Waturta tsapushoomsha sumas ashiritam kinarangu, waanaatsim ashchiri tuwasineerangiya.
Tsung sinash tamatarparee ashiru tureezaru íwar kanindap Apanll nuwaa waanaatsi wizpur tuyamandarangiya. Anootssha paranguri, nuwsha timuchta, tsapumun muchi tuw ashirangina. Na kamaneena yuwaa pamazukpazi ashiruri Apanllee watsirar parangi anootsi.
Anumunsha, nuw k'kuzee mazinarangina. Nuwaa tárangiya; Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, chiyzangi. Nuw shiyapa tsiyatpi, atina tárangu.
Apanll nuwaa tsiyatku, zunganeekchinandari, anush wizpur nuwash pshturangu, nuwaa ichiyzataraa ashirangiya. Ashkachinandari, k'kuzee zunganeekchu, kitsiptarti mazinarangina.
Aranginasha k'kuz tsiyatku tárangiya. Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa shiyash na tsiyatsis zanganchima. Shiysha Israelchichpatatis nuwaa kuki kamaningcha, yuw tputs nuwaa ngatarangusin, wits nda mazinarangana anootsi. Anchichtam zitaminarini nuwaa ngatarangitamsinaya. Na in zari wandaritam nlluranursha ashiritam ngatkusin taakanaya.
Wipshitisin ashiritam yutaritaw, mangshartawana. Chínash mangoonamaam mbama. Ashirucha, shiyaa zanganimaam zandkina. Shiysha nuwaa kuki kamaningcha; Ambtanda siyaa Apanll átu, tángcha nuwaa kuki.
Amb átush, mazinamana mazinachpasinaya. Witsi nduntaatiya, kaapa mazinaksinaya. Itaru, an tputs Israelchich yutaritawsincha. Itaru, anush mangush chinachpasinaya; Nish iyash Apanllee kuk kamanipan taarparee, táchpasinaya.
Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa mangish punirustarinllpa. Mishat, yuwaa mantsir tsiyatkana, anoo punirinllpa. Wandtaatiya punikush, kpapapaz taturpiru, misha ztunllpaz shiyamun matarutaru ashipaz ashiritaati, anoo punirinllpa. Shiyaa mantsir tsiyatkitaateesinaya, misha shiyanung tsiyanuspa tash napkitaateesinaya, yuwamand nda wits mazinakana anumand punirinllpa.
Shiysha mapiyrush nuwaa kuki tsiyatangcha. Yuw mazinamaam zandkana an mazinachinllinaya. Mishat, nduntaatiya mazinamaam zandkusin, waani ashtachinllinaya. Watam uwin mang' yutaritsincha; nda k'kuzee wits mazinakanaya.
Yuwaa nuw kamachtaki anoo payungcha. Shiynaa mangsheerinllpa. Uwin tamakpasinaya shirinllpa. Natu kukish xipungangee. Yuw nuw shiyaam panayanllee anoo ktungangee, tárangiya.
Tárangu, uw paxayeeru, nuwanungi uwish minam kirak yandam turpiru payu ashirangiya.
Anootssha kirakaa ipursarangu, yandam ashchiri minungichich kirak yandam, arangichsha tash yandamatam ashiru, mangooz mantsashish, waneeshish tanumaam tsiyatsis yandam taarangiya.
Ashiriya, nuwaa tárangiya. Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa nee yandam tsiyatssee ktungangi. Sheerush, Israelchichee tputs tsiyatashincha, tárangiya.
Tárangu, nuw kuki xipungaranguri, uwsha nuwaam tsiyatssee yandama tapshturangiya.
Sheeru, Na pishayarush, tzazangee, tárangu, nuwsha, Ayu aturi, katungarangina. Káchakuri, kindur wakungur ashiru kam kácharangina.
Ashiranguri, nuwaatssha tárangiya. Israelchichip tputs napashini. Nuwaa kuki kamanishincha.
Yap tputs k'kuzee mbam tsiyatkana amb, nda nuw shiyaa zangankina. Itaru, saanpatatis Israelchichpatatis kamanimaam zanganchima.
Nuw nda shiyaa piyam tsapurunas yap tputs zapan taarusin, min k'kuz tsiyatkusin, nda anoo kuk shiy mangoonamaam waninda. Amb nda shiyaa zangankina. Itaru, ashiritaa arapichsha tputs shiyaa kukish mazinachpasinaya.
Itaru, Israelchichinaa tputs shiyaa kukish mazinamaam ngatchinllinaya. Watam nuwaa kuki payumaam nda zandkanawa. Ashpari Israelchich tputs mang' ndunareewcha. Nda tputs mangurir tamatarparee ashiranaya.
Itaru, na nuwsha shiyaa kamachtakchuri, shiyaatssha tumangshartakpaz sheerunll, shiysha mangish mbampaz ashirush, waantin tamapsinaya ashiritam kasachinllpa.
Nuw shiyaa mbammash ashiru maachi patumbich tamatarparee ashtachinllpa. Shiysha anoo tputs punirinllpa. Waantaatiya tputs tsiyanuspa shiyaa napkusin, nda zandkusin, anoo punirinllpa, tárangiya.
Anumunsha, nuwaa tárangitamta. Kaapa mazinangcha. Zurampatarta yuw shiyaa kamachtakchi, anoo mangiptish mazinangcha.
Amb sheerush, yap Israelchich tputs arap pseertambarangana amb naayarush, napashincha. Wandtaatiya mazinamaam nda zandkusin, Waana Apanll nuwaa atuwa, tángcha, nuwaa tárangiya.
Apanllsha nuwaa tuwizpurtarangu, tuchiyzarangiya. Sheeru, Taarashipan kizpur wanasirimash, Naamachima, táyaranllu, kushinungshiti kizpur zunganeerangu, mundaz tamaparee ashiru mazinarangina.
Yuw zunganitaru, an wazitpungach tputs pur ashiru, anush yusarangiya. Waanpatatin kitatsingarangusin, yusarangiya. Iripichpa washunand yusarangana. Mundaz amtarparee ashiru zunganeerangiya.
Apanllsha wizpurpa nuwaa tuchiyzarangu, nuwaa uwpa itsirarangu, arapiri minup tsap wayarangiya. Naayaranlluri, tsiyantakuri, kapung mangi mantsarangina.
Yuwash Israelchich tashitungam taarangana, annung yakat Tel-abib, kungumun Kebaramun wing nuw kusarangina. Anushsha Israelchichpa taar ashirangina. Tsimbun kuwiz matayaru maats nguti taaranguri, ¿Amcheezi? tárangina. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll nuwaa Esekiyelaatsi kamachtarangu anootsi.
Tsimbun kuwiz matayaru maats kachingaranllu, Apanllsha nuwaa yusur tsiyatku tárangiya.
Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa nuw shiyaa tputsee wanimpaneem wayayana, sundar tsangampan ashirush Israelchichee tputs ksutamaama. Nuwsha shiyaa tsiyatkachuri, shiysha nuwaa kuki kamanimantar shingcha. Amb ashkush, uwshtisin nuwaa kuki intsinsaru mazinachinllinaya.
Wandaya nuw, Nee tputsee yutaritshisimand tsipatspatari wanichima, aturi, itaru shiysha nda anoo tputs mangoo p'tseekush, yutaritshishee nda kasaku, uru waanamandari yutaritshishirini tsipachinllinaya. Ashkatssin, nuwsha shiyaa yutaritam ínachtamparina, watam nda waneerangshawa.
Shiy yutaritamapanee tputs mangoo p'tseektaatish, itaru nda mangoonkusin, waanamandari yutaritshishirini tsipachinllinaya. Itaru, shiynaa tsipatsee kamungachpasha.
Wandaya tputs wanasirimash piyari chinakchusin, yutaritshish pshtukchusin, uru tsipachinllinaya. Watam sirú wanasir taarangana anoo ndusha chinakuri mapiychtinawa. Ashkatssin, waanamandari yutaritshishirini tsipachinllinaya. Itaru, shiysha anoo tputs nda mangoo p'tseerangush, waanamandari tumshiri tsiparangana anumand nuwsha shiyaatstam yutaritam ínchinllpa, watam nda waneerangshawa.
Shiy nda yutaritshishush pantsamaam mangoo p'tseekush, uwsha mazinakchusin, mangush wanasir chinakchusin, tsipachazinllinaja. Watam k'kuzee payuranganawa. Ashkachu, shiysha tsipatsee kamungchitamsha, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll nuwaa wanimpaneem wayarangu anootsi.
Apanll nuwamun uwi putayaru tsiyatarangiya. Chiyzayarush naangee. Tsap paramashtaru anush nuw shiyaa tsiyatchinllpa, tárangiya.
Nuwsha chiyzaranguri, yapiri waana tárangu ambiritam shitungeeranlluri naatarangina. Watandsash nuw Apanllee wanasirimshirini yusur parangina. Síru parangi ashiritam kungumun Kebaramun wing paranguri, timuchta, tsapumun tuw charipti ashirangina.
Itaru, Apanllsha wizpur nuwash pshturangu, nuwaatssha tuchiyzarangiya. Tsiyatku tárangiya, Pangipish kanapungcha. Anush pangishish pshtuyarush shtandayarush ksangcha.
Papcha. Tputs shiyaa wanumpa kamuriruch. Ashkatssin, shiysha ndusha shitungamaam waritakush, yaktashuchpa tputs nduntam ipunachsha.
Amb ashkatssin, nuwsha shiyaa k'keetsish mbam tapatstachima. Ashkachuri, kukish tsiyatamaam mbamatachsha. Ndusha kukish tsiyatamaam waritachsha. Nduntam tputs kizpur yutaritawaa wanimaam waritachsha. Muxareemsha kinachsha.
Itaru, nuwaana zandkachuri, yuwash ashkachi, anush yusur shiyaa tutsiyachtachinllpa. Ashkachuri, shiysha yusur tsiyachtachsha. Shiysha tputsee, Apanll nuwaa amb tárangiya, táchsha. Wandaya tputs mazinamaam wits zandku, mazinachinllinpa. Itaru, nduniya mazinamaam zandkusin, mazinamaam nda waritachinllinaya. Watam uwin tputs yutaritanawa; mangshartawanawa, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa nuw kuki makuksheerangi anootsi.
































































































































































































































































































































Apanll nuwaa kamachtaku, tárangiya.
Israelshuchish tsiyatsis uru taariya. Wapar wachin kapzee katungkachu, wipsha wanas kapzimun chtay ashchiya, atanaya. ¿Mayaamsha Israelchich anoo tsiyatsis tayus tayus ashkanaya?
Nuw Taarashipaneeruri siyaa atina. Nuwaanamuni suri zurampatari atina. Ayamtaati siysa anoo yusur tsiyatcheezis.
Yuw tputs yutaritshishee chinakana, anootsiri waneekchuri, tsipachinllinaya. ¿Antaati nuw waparimand yutaritshishiri wipaa wanicheezi? nda. Nuw tputsee ichingaru amuytakina. Ashirucha, itsinsaru natstayaruri, amuyaatsiri waneekina.
Tputs wanasirimash taarash watacha wanasir taatarasha.
An tputs apanllputsip machip íwar kárkachu, anush nda apanllputseem shambatshisheem pshtukiya. Mishat, nduntam ngichzimun apanllputsimun Israelchichimun mang' tatkiya. Mishat, nduntam wamkuree wizanll itutskitamta. Ashiritam, wizanll yuwash kurasee mantsaru anush nda ipunkiya.
Mishat, minamtiyam tputsee nda kiyung yachakiya. Wandtaati tputseem urkirpa istarangu, Arangiri suwatpa, átu, maachiritaa púnlluree yarangu, anoo yusur kachizpazsha púnlluree tuwanpukiya. Mishat, minamtiyam nda tputsee maachiri shuchikiya. Tputsee nayaniku, mariz kayatku anoom katungtsee istakiya. Yuwaatssha tputs zapeeku anoomtam wamareem panakiya.
Urkirpa tputseem istaku, nda anumand, Arangeem tuwapangandama, atiya. Mishat, tputs waanpatatin tsiyatssee yaramaam zandkusin, ichingaru mazinayaru, itsinsaru yasayaru, yuwaatsiri yutarit tsiyatarangu anootsiri waneeku, tputsee wanasirimsheetssha kis napkiya.
Yuw nuwaana kamachtarangi anoo tatsamaru, wanasir waanaatsi yámandaku, taarash wanasiriri taaku, kamachtamareetsi payuku, an tputs zurumarpataricha tsinsa. An urutamari taaratartachiya. Nuwsha Apanlleeruri anumashee tputs kis napchima, Apanll tárangiya.
Itaru, insha tputs wip tayutaritamapan pachampan xarashee wayampaniri taaku,
itaru waparsha anumashee nda chinarangu, wipamarisha mantsir taaku, apanllputsip machip íwar kárkachu, anush apanllputsish shambatshishush pshtuku, kis apanllputseem tínarana anumun mang' tatku, misha wamkureetstaa wizanll itutseeru yamaku,
tputsee pukiri kiyung yachaku, misha tputseetssha maachiree shuchikitam, misha urkiree tputseem istaku, anumand maachiritaa yaku, itaru ayamtaa anoo nda tuwanpuku, ashiritam apanllputsimun mang' tatku, ngichzimunari apanllputsimun yuwaa nuw kizpur tsiyantakuri, ksimun musáki, anoo kis chinaku,
tputseem kurikee nayanikina, mangu átu, itaru yusursha tamundaku, arangitamanasha kurikirish tuwanpungandama táta, táta ashku, anumash tputs zapan masach taacheeja. Ichinguru ashpari yuw mantsir ashkana anoo, nuw kizpur tsiyantakina. Nuwsha waneekchuri, izuuru watstamamari watsipunpatari pastachiya. Waanamand yutaritshishirini tsipachiya.
Mishat, apaz wapar yutaritshishush tachitku, itaru wipsha nda mantsirimshee chinaku,
misha apanllputsip machip íwar kárkachu, anush nda apanllputseem shambatshisheem pshtuku, misha nduntam ngichzimun apanllputsimun Israelchichimun mang' tatku, misha nduntam tputsee wamkuree wizanll itutsku,
nduntam minamtiyam tputsee kiyung yachaku, misha nda tamundaku, yuwaa kachiz tushiykchu anush maachiritaa yusur tuwanpuku, misha nduntam minamtiyam tputsee maachiri shuchiku, yuw tputs mariz kayatku anoom katungtsee istaku, yuw tputs zapeeku anoom wamareem panaku,
nda tputsee natsaku, mantsir tayutaritku, urkirpa tputsee istaku, ndusha, Arangeem tuwapangandama, átu, misha tputs waanpatatin tsiyatssee yaramaam zandkusin, ichingaru mazinayaru, itsinsaru yasayaru, yuwaatsiri yutarit taarangu anootsiri waneeku, wanasirimsheetssha tputs kis napku, misha nuwaanaa kamachtarangi anootsiritam tatsamku, wanasir waanaatsi yámandaku, an tputs waparimand yutaritshishirini nda tsipachiya. Itaru, zurampatari kis taachiya.
Itaru, waparsha mantsir taarangu, misha tputsee maachirita shuchirangitam, tputspatatin mantsirimash ashirangu; waanamandari yutaritshishirini waneeshimun tsipachparee.
Siy saanpatataa tsiyatkus, táchpasa, ¿Tamashtaja nda waparimand yutaritshishirini, wipsha nda tsipamaam waritak tuwapamaama? táchpasa. Itaru, nuwsha siyaa atina. Watam wipsha nda mantsir yutaritshishee patataranguwa. Tputspatatin wanasir chinarangiya. K'kuzee tuminurangiya. Nuwaa kamachtamari kapung mangoonarangiya. Ashirucha, amb ashirangu, zurumpatari kis taachiya.
Yuwamarisha mantsir tputs ashkana anumari tsipachinllinaya. Wipatam waparimand tumshir tuwapamaam pinasa, misha waparitam wipamand tumshir tuwapamaam pinasa. Tputs wanasirimash wanasirimsheetsimaritam taarash yachiya. Yutaritshishpansha tputs mantsirimsheetsiritam waneeshish pshtuchiya, Apanll tárangiya. Ashiriya, na kamaneena yuwaa chaanaatsi ksutchich anootsi.
Apanll tárangiya; Yutaritshishpan tputs mantsirimshee kasakchinaareesinaya, nuwaatssha kuki payukchusin, wanasirsha taakchusin, tputsee wanasir tatsamooru chinakchusin, zurampatari an tputs tsipachazinllinaja.
Nuwsha yuwaa mantsir ashirangana anoo yusur ayamtaati chinacheezi. Yuwamand wanasirsha taakchinllina, anumand kisshaparee taachinllinaya.
Tputs mantsirimash msangaru tsipamaam nuw nda zandkina. Itaru, nuw tínatana; Taárashee mantsirimshee kasayarusin, wanasirsha taapana átana, nuw Apanlli zurampatari atina.
Itaru, tputs wanasirimshee kasayarusin, mantsirimshishsha yusur pshtukchusin, yuwash tputs mantsirimish ashkana, anush ¿antaati an tputs arangiri taacheeja? nda. Ichtarima wanasir nuwash tachitarangsin, itaru anumunsha nuwaa kasakchusin, nuw anoo pakchiyam nayanikuri, tácheezi, ndambaree. Yutaritshishingaz chinarangusin, nuwaa kasaranganaya. Ashirucha, waanamandari chayarini waneekchuri, tsipachinllinaya, Apanll tárangiya.
Itaru, siy nuwaa; Apanll mangu tputsee waneekiya, táchpasa. Itaru, mazinangints, Israelchichis. Siy; ¿Mayaamsa anoo chinakus, nuwaa yutaritam ínaksa? Saantari sáricheeru mantsir chinaksa. Watam siy mantsir taarasheetsis yámandaksawa.
Tputs taarashish wanasirimshee kasayaru, mantsirimshishsha pshtukchu, tputsee nda tatsamooru chinaku, tsipatshaparee, yuwamand mantsir patatku anumandarita.
Itaru, tputs yutaritshishee izuuru kasayaru, wanasirsha taakchu, kamungachshaparee.
Waanaatsi mangoo p'tseeku, Xam; ¿nuw tamakuri ashkina? átu, ichingaru mantsir ashku anoo kapeetkachu, zurampatari an tputs zapan masach kis taachiya, atina; waneeshshee ndusha taachachiya.
Itaru, siy Israelchichis nuwaa; Apanll mangu tputsee waneekiya, átpasa. Siy; ¿Mayaamsa anoo chinakus, nuwaa yutaritam ínaksa? Saantari sáricheeru mantsir chinaksa. Nda itsinsaru mangoonaksa.
Nuw siyaa minamtawaatsiritis natstayaruri, Israelchicheetsis yuwamand mantsir ashirangis, anumand wanichintspa. Nuw Apanlleeruri atina; Nda ashishtamaam yutaritshisheetsis ksangints, zurampatari atina.
Yuw ichinguru yutaritshishee mantsir patatarangis anoo ksangtsa. Nuw ashkis anoo nda kis naparangina. Ksimun musárangina. Mangooz kaneesichsha chinangints, watam ndunnaa ashkus, Israelchichis uru tsipatssawa.
Nuw tina; Siyaa nda waani tsipapana, atina. Yutaritshishireetsis ksangtsa. Ashkachus, kis taachpasa, nuw Apanlli zurampatari atina, Apanll tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll, Yutaritshishee kasakchus, ndusha siyaa wanichintspa, tárangu anootsi.















































































































































































































































































































































































































Apanll Taarashipan nuwaa tárangiya.
Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa shiy saanpatatis tsiyatashincha. Amb tángcha; Nuw yaktashchee wanimaam undararee zangankachuri, yaktashuchsha minam sundar tsangampaneem wayachinllinaya.
Ansha sundar ksutamapan undarar kayumatanu anoo pakchu, uwsha kukunkachu, tputsee, Papcha, kundararini naanllpa, táchiya.
Wandaya tputs anoo mapiyksin, nda wits mazinaksin, undararsha kuskachu, pachakchu, waanamandari chayarini tsipachinllinaya.
Watam mazinarangitaatssin, itaru ndusha k'kuzee payuranganawa. Wanaree wits mazinarangusin, tsipatsee kamungchinaapsinaya.
Itaru, sundarsha ksutamapan undararee pakeertaa, itaru uwsha tputs nda mangoonamaam puu puu átu, undararsha kuseeru, tputsee minamtaati pachakchu, nuwsha ksutamapanee, Na, nishuri shiy tsipanlltampasha, watam tputsee nda nayanirangush, puu puu tárangshawa, táchima.
Ashiriya, nuw siyaa Esekiyelaatsis atina. Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa nuw shiyaa tsangampaneempaz ashiru wayarangina. Israelchichee tputs ksutkush, sundar tamatarparee shingcha. Shiy nuwaa kuki payungcha. Yuwaa aship kamaneenlli anoo kamanimantar shingcha.
Wanari nuw, Tputs mantsirimshee tsipatspatari wanichima, atinaareena, itaru shiysha nda anoo tsiyatkush, yutaritshishee kasamaam nda mangoo p'tseerangush, an tputs yutaritshishimandarit tsipachpasinaya. Itaru, nuwsha shiyaa, Na, nishuri tsipanlltamcha, watam tputsee nda nayanirangush, nda waneerangshawa, táchparina.
Itaru, shiy wanasir chinakush, tputsee istarangitaatish, yutaritshishpanee tputs, Ksangtsa; yutaritshishee kpitangtsa, tárangitaatish, itaru uwshtisin nda ayu tárangusin, uru waanamuntari tumshiri tsipachpachinllinaya. Itaru, shiynaa sitarunasee pangachsha, Apanll nuwaa tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll, Zurampatari nuwaa kuki kamaningcha Israelchicheetsi, tárangu anootsi.
Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa Israelchichee tputs tsiyatashincha. Ashiriya, tángcha. Siy átssa; Yutaritshishee zapan pataranguni, anumand kizpur kiyung kachiykiniya. Ashirucha, ngutini tsipatsiptar ashkiniya. Ashiriya, ¿tamayareezich wanasir taaychich? átischa siya.
Nuw Taarashipaneeruri nuwaanamuni suri zurampatari atina. Yutaritshishpaneetstaatiya tputs nuw, Waani tsipap, ateezi, nda. Itaru, waani yutaritshishirineetsi kasayarusin, nuwashsha tachitap, Israelchicheetsis atina. Ashkachus, uru wanasirsha taatssa. Ashiriya, Israelchichis mazinangtsa. Yutaritshishireetsis ksangtsa. ¿Mayaam tsipatsee zandaksa? Apanll Israelchichee tárangiya.
Shiy Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa saanpata tputsee tsiyatashincha. Tputs wanasirimshish tachitarangsin, itaru yutaritshishushsha pantsakchusin, yuw sirútama wanasir taarangana, anumand waanaatsi tapachindamaam wanindaja. Mishat, tputs yutaritshishpan mantsirimshee kasakchinaareesinaya, yuwamand sirútama yutaritshishee mantsir patatarangana, anumand nda tsipachinllinaya. Mishat, tputs wanasirimshishtaatiya tachitarangsin, itaru yutaritshishushsha pantsakchusin, yuw sirútama wanasir taarangana, an ¿taárasheem istacheeja? nda.
Nuw tputs wanasirimshee, Siyaam kis taamaam panachintspa, aturi, itaru uwsha yuwaa áti anoo mapiyksin, yusursha mantsirish pantsakchusin, anoo tputs ndusha kis napchima, atina. Anumashee tputs tsipatspatari wanichima.
Nuw tputsee mantsirimshee, Nuw siyaa wanichintspa, tákchuri, itaru uwsha yusur taarshee wanasir yámandakchusin,
yuw chirikoo iripungashee yarangana anoo, nduntaati ashiru shuchirangana anoo tuwanpukchusin, misha nuwaa kamachtamari izuuru tuminkatssin, tputsee wanasir tatsamooru chinakchusin, mantsirimshee taarashish izuuru kapeetkatssin, zurampatari zapan masach taachinllinaya. Waneeshshee ndusha wayachina. Watam nuw kamachtamari taarashipaniwa.
Waanari tputs wanasirimshee chinakchusin, tputspatatin wanasirsha tatsamooru chinakchusin, wanasirshaparee taachinllinaya. Nuwsha yuwaa sirú mantsir taarangana anoo ndushapari chinachina.
Shiyashuch Israelshuch tputs táchinllinaya. Apanll mangu tputsee waneekiya, atitaateesinaya, itaru zurumari waanasincha nda wanasir taarash taaksin, tputsee nda tatsamooru chinakshinllinaya.
Tputs wanasirimash taárshee wanasirimshee kasakchusin, mantsirimashsha yusur chinakchusin, waanaamandari chayarini tsipachinllinaya.
Yutaritshishpan tputs yuw mantsir taakana anoo kasayarusin, yusursha wanasirsha taakchusin, tputsee wanasir tatsamooru chinakchusin, anumand wanasir kis taachinllinaya.
Siy tsiyatkus, tayus, tayus ashiksa; ¿Apanll iyaa wanasiree chinak? Mangu tputsee waneekiya, ántangat ashiksa. Yuwamand átis, misha mantsir patatkis anumand minamtawaatsiritis Israelchicheetsis wanichintspa, Apanll tárangiya. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Apanll chiyaa tputseetsich taarashich yasaku anootsi.













Apanll nuwaa Esekiyelaatsi tárangiya.
Esekiyelaa, nutsish musásimashtaati, ashiritaa nuwaa kuki Israelchichee kurak kamanishini. Ashiri tángcha. Paptsa. Apanll siyaa kurakaatsis waneerunts. Siy Israelchichee wanasir ksutangtsa. Opeeja ksutamapan tamatarparee shingtsa. Itaru, siy nda ashkus saanaatstamari ksutaksa.
Nduntaa opeeja siy ksutkus, itaru mimireetsimsha kis waaksa. Mishat, purootstam kamareemis k'tayarus, kamartaksa. Yuwaatssha yungantataru anoo pachaksa.
Ashkitaatis, nda yuwaa opeej wanguytaku anoo nda yaramaam zandaksa. Mishat, yuwaatstam kuchakcharu anoo nda irimiypa puntayarus yaraksa. Mishat, yuwaa suwakana anungaz nda nachungayarus, yamayarus waashtam watandpunush wayaksa. Itaru, siysa opeejareetsis mangu kiyung yachaksa, nuw siyaa ksutamapaneetsis atina.
Ashiri nuw tputsiri opeej tamapari ashiriya. Kurak nuwaa tputsiri nda ksutkusin, opeeja ksutamapan ndunar, yapsha waritaku ambsha masatumbachusin, tumuzsha anoo katungtariya, nuw tputsiri ashikpaz ashkanaya.
Ashiriya, opeej manginap, misha machpitam suwasuwarangana, anungaz ¿chakshtaja nayaniku nachungayach? watam tputs anoo ksutamapan ndunariwa.
Ashiri na ksutamapanis nuwaa kuki kaapaniri mazinangtsa.
Nuw Apanlli Taarashipani zurampatari siyaa ksutamapaneetsis atina. Ngichkinaareena, tsipatspatari tuwapchima. Siy nda tputsireetsi wanasir ksutkus, saanaatstamari ksutarangus, nuw tputsiri opeej tamatarpari ashirusin masatambarangusin, siy nda nachungakus, tumuzeewsha anoo zayarusin katungaranganaya.
Ashirucha, nuw Taarashipani siyaa ksutamapaneetsis atashina. Yuwaa nuw tsiyatkachi anoo kaapaniri mazinangtsa.
Nuw Apanlli Taarashipani siyaa atina. Nuw siyaa kundartaktana, watam tputsireetsi istamaam nda zandaksawa. Nuwaa tputsiri ¿tamareeja ksutarangis? anoo mashchintspa. Ashiri yuwaa ashirangis anoo yasayaruri, siyaa tashitungakchuri, ndusha nuwaa tputsiri ksutatssa. Watam nda wanasir ksutkus, kiyung yachaksawa. Ashkachuri, nuwaanasha tputsireetsi ksutchima, Apanll átcha, nuw Esekiyeli siyaa atina.
Apanll Taarashipan átcha. Nuwaanasha tputsireetsi ksutkuri taachima.
Ksutamapan wanasirimish opeejarini tsípakchu, anungaz urutari nachungtaru, nuwsha ashiritam tputsiri tsípachusin, anungaz uru nachungakuri taachima. Ashiri masatkatssin, tapishpaz ashiru kiyung kachiykachinllina. Anoo uru tapachindachima.
Minupsha tsap naatambarangana, anoo yamayaruri, yusur waanshutam watsapun wayachima. Sheeruri, Israelap mach machima. Mishat, wazawpitam kungup machima. Ichingaru yakat yámandachima.
Anush wanasirsha katungats katungchinllinaya. Sheersin, Israelamun mach taachinllinaya. Anush nuwaana katungtsee panakuri, katungkusin, anshurisha kanuskusin taachinllinaya.
Nuwaantari opeejaa ksutamapan ashiruri, ksutkuri taachina. Ashkuri, tputsiri nizichinllina, anoo wanasirsha wayakchuri, uru kanuschinllinaya, nuw Apanll Taarashipani atina.
Tputsireetsi nuwaana wanasir ksutchima. Ksutamapan wanasir opeejarineetsi ksutaru ashtachima. Tputsiri masatkatssin nuwaanasha anungaz uru nachungayaruri, yusur anshutam wayachima. Wandtaati wats chpamawsha yamayachuri, nuwaanasha anoo tapatstashipa tapatstayaruri, uru yarchima. Nuw wanguyawaa, misha matambsheetam, wanuts kapunguwaatstam tatsamooru ksutchima.
Nuw Apanlli Taarashipani siyaa atina; mazinangtsa. Ashpatamtis opeej tamapari ashirus taaksa. Itaru, ashpatamtis kaapar tamapari ashirus taaksa. Opeejaa, misha kaaparaatstam tatsamooru nuw wanichima.
Ashpatamtis pastoo wanasirimshee kis katungeerus, tazazarus, anootstam pastoo ktsiptis tayutaritamaam kapchaksa. Wakunguree wiree kis waayarus, itaru anootstam kapchayarus kasaksa.
Ashiriya, yuwaa pastoo siy kapcharangis anoo nuwsha opeejari nda kis katungkanaya. Yuwaatssha kungoo kaptsayarus, shshutaramchu kasarangis, anootstam nduntam kis waakanaya.
Ashirucha, nuw Apanlli Taarashipani atina. Opeej yungatataru an xangitamaa kiyung yachaksin, nuw tatsamooru yasayaruri, wanichima, atina.
Siy matambsheewis wizpureerus wanguyawaa kitsiptis kayungambayarus, tununeerus tuzanganiksa. Ashkus, suwasuwakanaya.
Itaru, ashkitaatis, nuwaanasha kiyung kachiykana anoo tapachindachima. Antaati anoo opeejareetsi shuchichtarusin, taamaam zandkeezi. Nuwaana opeejareetsi tatsamooru wanasir wayachima.
Dapiyaa nuwaanaatsi tputsiri amb zanganchima. Uwsha anush ksutamapan taachiya. An kizpurcha wanasiri. Uwaatssin ksutku taachiya.
Nuwaa Apanlleetsi Apanllirineem ínachinllinaya. Tputsireetsshiti Dapiyaa urkareem ínachinllinaya, nuw Apanlli atina.
Ashiri nuwsha Israelchichpa tputs wanasir tatsuyakchuri, kissha taachinllinaya. Kpachamsheetssha arap zanganchima. Tputsiri mapiyshtisin kis taaksin, mzatsish, misha manginshutam kis maachinllinaya.
Nuw tputsireetsi nuwaanshu pangi tipuranllizee machish wayachima. Nuwaana istakuri sinaatssha zangankachuri, yuwash waritakchu anush sin sinaku taachiya.
Tatsumarini wanasir mazarish yusiychiya. Tsap tatsumaam wanasir yanungaku, zapan yusiyku, anoo pusaksin, waanshu watsapun taachinllinaya. Tputsireetsi wanasirsha wayakchuri, yuw tputsireetsi kiyung yachaksin, tumuchchurtarangana, anshtisin tputs nuwaa naatstakchusin, in Apanll Taarashipancha, táchinllinaya.
Arapcheewtam tputs ndusha tputsireetsi kiyung yachaksin taachinllinaya. Mishat, manginshuchtam kázamish ndusha zayaru katungku, uru kissha taaksin, nda punichinllinaya.
Anuw nuw tsap wanasir wayakchuri, zapan tatsumarineetsi pusachinllinaya. Ashkusin, ndusha marizimum kiyung kachiychinllinaya. Mishat, nduntam tputs waatsin tayutaritkusin, michitchinlliniya.
Anumun tputs nuwaa yasachinllinaya, nuw Apanlleeruri tputsiripti taaki anootsi. Nuw Israelchichee tputsirtana. Nuw zurampatari atina.
Nuw tputsireetsi opeej tamapari ashiruri siyaa ksutchima. Siysa nuwaa apartana taatssa, nuw Apanlli Taarashipani siyaa atina, Apanll siyaa Israelchicheetsis átcha, nuw Esekiyeli atina. Ashiriya, kamaneena yuwaa Israelchich kurak tiptsiree mantsir ksutarangsin, itaru Apanllsha waana wanasir ksutchu anootsi.
